Title: The item was at a good price and was‚Ä¶
Content: The item was at a good price and was easy to order and arrived on time (in 24 hours).  I gave 4 stars not 5 because it was delivered to the wrong address and I was told it was at a third address by the delivery company.  I was at home waiting during the delivery to a house near me.

Title: Can't fault Wex,but I can the courier
Content: Can't fault Wex,but I can the courier, tracking numbers "not found".So lucky we was at home when it arrived.

Content: I like the fact that I can trust wex for clear descriptions, good quality items and reasonable delivery times. Some things can cost a little more but as long as they get the above things right I will buy from them. Its about the customer experience and maintaining trust and thats what keeps customers.

Title: Great service

Title: Once again Wex showed the two sides of‚Ä¶
Content: Once again Wex showed the two sides of their character. Great people, lots of helpful knowledge and a clear desire to put a deal together. Set against this is the other side of their operation, sending out emails saying that the packaged has been dispatched when it clearly hadn't been, nor would it be until after the weekend. It's such a simple thing, being honest with the customer, but such an important one. End result - I was within 12 hrs of walking away and demanding my money back. The hard working staff at Wex deserve better - as do their customers

Title: Too many staff dealing with your‚Ä¶

I subsequently ordered a replacement (from WEX) For ¬£14 couldn't you have just included one? after all I still spent over ¬£4K with you.Having already spent a good deal more over the last 3yrs.

Content: I bought a used lens but when it arrived it had some defects that had not been included in the description. I decided to return the lens and the response was quick and efficient. A return slip and courier service was arranged immediately and a refund issued on receipt. Overall happy with the way the issue was resolved, though obviously the item description should have been better in the first place.

Title: Wex is always good service

Title: Generally happy with the product and‚Ä¶
Content:
Generally happy with the product and service from Wex. Item was delivered very quickly and packaged with care. 

The condition rating I would have put it down a level as there were faint brown marks on all the f stop markings which I had to remove myself. This soured the experience as I want sure if they were tea/coffee stains or something else. 

Otherwise the lens works perfectly and other than the stains, is in good condition.

Title: Items found on website

Title: Would recommend to family excellent‚Ä¶lee

Title: Great ordering, delivery & refund experience
Content:
Ordering and delivery were extremely easy and the item I ordered arrived very well packaged. 
Unfortunately I had to return the item, a flashgun that had been converted to UV. While this was mentioned in the small print as someone new to photography I had not realised. Really if an item is modified from factory conditions I think the product title should make this clear with bold text advising customers. 

I then realised Wex don‚Äôt offer free returns and don‚Äôt have local stores like CeX where free returns are very quick, easy and convenient. Though their refund process once they had received the item was the quickest I‚Äôve ever experienced. All in all it cost me ¬£14 to return an item that had the description been clearer I wouldn‚Äôt have ordered.

Title: An honest and decent business
Content: My order was delivered promptly but was missing accessories stated as included in the specs on the product page. Customer service arranged for return and replacement. It turned out the inclusion of the accessories on the specs page had been a mistake but the company sent them to me anyway (as they should). They were professional and decent throughout.

Title: Good value used item which works‚Ä¶
Content: Good value used item which works perfectly. Packaging could have been a little letter.

Title: Batteries
Content: The items were exactly as I ordered and delivery was prompt. The packaging could have been more robust, the box inside for one item was no longer holding the contents.

Title: Excellent all round
Content: Excellent all round

Title: Lens exactly as described.
Content:
Lens exactly as described, however, I haven't been able to field test it properly, so, I can't give a proper review.
Delivery let WEX down though, as lens wasn't delivered to work place as  requested, but to home address.
Luckily this worked out OK, as wife just happened to be in when DPD, delivered it.
On the plus side, I've bought several items from WEX, over the years and I've never had a problem.

Title: Firstly I'm not sure what you are‚Ä¶
Content: Firstly I'm not sure what you are asking about. I've shopped with wex a few times lately all is good.

Title: Printer box was open on delivery and‚Ä¶
Content:
Printer box was open on delivery and the printer has a scuffed top but a ¬£50 refund was given. I would rather have had a replacement but were out of stock for 4 weeks.
I understand this is outside of Wex's control, otherwise always impressed with the service recieved from Wex

Title: Timely service and great prices.
Content: Timely service and great prices.

Title: Great professional service with smooth‚Ä¶

Title: Usually my go to for film supplies
Content: Usually my go to for film supplies, but this time I couldn't re-arrange a safe place delivery, so had to be home for delivery. That was a pain tbh.

Content: Everything was very smooth and fast. Delivery was super fast. I just had a little problem with my revolut card while making purchase. It caused a slight delay which I hope won‚Äôt be a matter next time but in general, very good service

Title: Helpful staff and great service
Content: Helpful staff and great service

Title: First class service
Content: My recent purchase was a camera and a lens adapter.  The camera was delivered as promised on the day after order.   A hiccup in the WEX stock system resulted in a delay to the supply of the adapter.   Contacting helpful WEX staff by phone managed to quickly resolve problem and the adaptor was supplied on the following day.

Title: Fast delivery and delivered in excellent condition
Content: Fast delivery and delivered in excellent condition, thanks.

Title: I received my order within 5 days
Content: I received my order within 5 days, so really happy with that

Title: Bought memory cards
Content: Items arrived promptly.

Title: Order delivered in good condition eventually
Content: Order dispatched promptly as usual and well packaged. Several days delay with the courier as only one of three parcels could be found. Unable to verify this with Wex. Contacted Wex Customer Services via the chat bot and was told I would get an email. Never received this, but all arrived in good condition the next day. Never had any problem before, would happily shop here again.

Title: Excellent WEX let down by courier choice
Content: Usual excellent service from WEX, but sadly let down by their courier of choice. Only DPD takes an overnight delivery and turns it into a 5 day delivery, treating you like the proverbial mushroom through the entire ordeal.

Title: A good experience from start to finish‚Ä¶
Content: A good experience from start to finish‚Ä¶. Easy to use website and ordering, fast and efficient service with on time delivery, good communication on the progress of the order. Polite and helpful staff.

Title: Largely straightforward & efficient
Content: Ordering was straightforward and an out of stock situation seemed to be resolved quickly. Delivered item was as expected, and help with Olympus Cashback was really useful when I called the helpline (thanks Jack). The only let down was the lack of communication from DPD. By chance I was in when they arrived, but would have been upset if they had left the item in the porch!

Title: Easy & confident online purchasing
Content: Such an easy process to select and buy a used Canon EF24-70mm L4.  Rapid delivery via DPD gives a lot of confidence it will all go smoothly.

Title: Ordered 4pm one day
Content:
Ordered 4pm one day, delivered 10am the next. Cannot get much better than that.
Brand new lens, all looks good so far!!

Title: For all your photographic needs.
Content: Great photographic store for new or second hand photo equipment. Quick and efficient service with a fair trade in price offer. I have delt with Wex for  a number of years with no complaints.

Title: Friendly staff willing to help
Content: Friendly staff willing to help. Always a great experience buying from the shops

Title: Overall a good experience over several‚Ä¶
Content:
Overall a good experience over several orders with one exception. Ordered 4 off of an product but only 1 was delivered with no explanation as  to why. I had to log on to my account and delve through my orders to find out that only 1 was in stock.  I would like to have known that bit of info when the order was placed as I might have needed the items for a deadline and could have ordered from another supplier able to meet my deadline. Equally the paperwork with the single item should have included an explanation of the shortage and when the outstanding items would be delivered. I had to call to ask when I could expect delivery of the outstanding items. Again this is something Wex should communicate immediately rather than leaving it to the customer to log on for half the story and then have to phone to get the delivery date.
I did receive an email after several days informing me of the expected delivery date of the outstanding items.

Title: I found the selection and ordering of‚Ä¶
Content: I found the selection and ordering of the item was quick and easy. I was informed of a delay due to the item being out of stock and offered the option to wait or to cancel. I decided not to cancel and the wait was not too long.

Title: Camera bag was as expected and arrived next day
Content: I ordered a Lowepro camera bag. I could get an idea of it from the description on the Wex web site. The price was competitive, and the bag arrived the following day well packaged. It's as good as online sales get.

Title: Wex was fine, DPD delivery not so....
Content: Service from Wex was fine. It was the delivery service from DPD that was underpar. Rang the door bell, turned on his heels and was going straight back to his van. Didn't give us a chance to get to the door. Called him back and he was annoyed because he said he was behind schedule. Not good enough.

Title: Initial problem was sorted out by Wex Manager
Content:
Very disappointed with my recent experience with WEX used equipment.  I placed an order for a used Canon EF 70-200 f/4 IS USM lens which was graded condition 9+, I received the non-IS variant which I had to return. 

I spoke with WEX online and they reassured me the 9+ condition lens was available and would be sent out out me.  

Then I received emails stating that a 9- lens would be sent out, I queried this and was told it was just part of their automated process and the correct lens would be sent out.  

The next day I was told again that a 9- lens would be sent out as the 9+ lens was no longer available (no explanation was given as to where the original lens had gone).  

Very disappointed with the initial failure to fulfil the order as made, then the subsequent mixed-messages were very disappointing.  

At no point was anyone from WEX willing to explain what had gone wrong and where the original 9+ lens that I had ordered had gone :-(


UPDATE Tuesday 13th March - After speaking with Peter from Wex on the telephone last week, he was able to find me a suitable replacement lens which I am now very happy with.  Thanks to Peter for his excellent customer service skills.

Title: Sales person did not ask my colour‚Ä¶
Content:
Sales person did not ask my colour preference during ordering process. 
This caused a delay but Wex was able to reverse the process resulting in a two day delivery instead of one. 
In other respects Wex performed well.

Title: Item was a described (unlike other‚Ä¶
Content:
Item was a described (unlike other camera trade shops), and delivered quickly and well packaged.
I would have given x5 stars but the online registration process failed to work, having tried several times!  However, once on the phone to WEX they soon sorted out what I wanted and were helpful in the process.

Title: I have given Wex 4 stars because of‚Ä¶
Content: I have given Wex 4 stars because of their excellent service. I had bought a Kenro Video Monopod Kit (Carbon Fibre) with VH01F Fluid Head (Flat Base) which turned out to be faulty. I returned it and got a refund. Wex enabled quick and free return of the item. The monopod was new, sealed and (I believe) Wex was not responsible for the fault. The top of the monopod (not just the head) was loose on the shaft.

Title: Prompt service
Content: Prompt service. But still waiting for addition item which was not in stock.

Title: PartEx process
Content: The PartEx process can be quite involved if you have several items of equipment.  The team responded quickly and clearly and the emails outlined the options and next steps.

Title: Postage was almost as much as the cost‚Ä¶
Content: Postage was almost as much as the cost of the item ordered. But hey ho.

Title: Quick delivery
Content: Quick delivery.  Excellent service

Title: Prompt service and clear return policy
Content: Prompt service and clear return policy

Title: Received the items that were in stock‚Ä¶
Content: Received the items that were in stock very quickly. Withheld a star as still awaiting details of the status of the camera on preorder. Hopefully it won‚Äôt be long as traded in my only camera for it.

Title: I'm very happy with the second hand‚Ä¶
Content: I'm very happy with the second hand lens I bought from WEX.  They could take more and better pictures of the items they have for sale.  But perhaps better that items exceed expectations.

Title: Good delivery times
Content: Good service

Title: Would have been 5 star if the couriers‚Ä¶
Content: Would have been 5 star if the couriers you use didn't class mainland Scotland as a remote post code. No next day delivery available (however Royal mail will deliver next day from businesses in Kent!) Don't mind paying extra for next day instead of waiting 4 days.

Title: Very easy-to-use website with huge‚Ä¶
Content:
Very easy-to-use website with huge choice

Title: I purchased a Sony 2x teleconverter‚Ä¶
Content: I purchased a Sony 2x teleconverter which was easy to order online. DPD  would deliver the package and DPD gave me  delivery slot then changed the time. A text later saying no one was in and they would try again next day. DPD sent me a photo of the house drive way they tried to deliver to which was #8 and my house is #6. I went onto DPD chat line and tried to explain there mistake but there chat line just kept saying they did not understand and that there driver had tried to deliver the package. For this reason I am given a 4 star.

Title: Good advice and support but DPD delivery was late
Content: Good advice and prompt sending off of my ring flash for next day delivery but sat in DPD depot and arrived a day late despite paying premium postal delivery rate. When I rang WEX member of staff was apologetic and refunded my delivery fee. These things can happen and response was good. Thanks.

Title: Fast Delivery but poorly packed
Content:
The delivery was fast and efficient. The only thing I have as a negative is the box it was in, the Polarising Filter was not held in place, but was rattling about in it's container. I would have expected it to have been securely in with a protective foam supporting it. I have not used it yet, but think it is ok, but would definitely look at improving that.
Thank you.

Title: Fantastic service as always
Content: Fantastic service as always except one lens cap supplied that was completely wrong and held in place with a rubber band ! It‚Äôs a difficult one to find, so I get there was an issue. I‚Äôve been looking but can‚Äôt find one yet. Was for Fiji X 1.4 teleconverter.

Title: Part of my order soon came in perfect‚Ä¶
Content: Part of my order soon came in perfect condition.

Title: Their service is excellent and cannot‚Ä¶
Content:
Their service is excellent and cannot fault it. The only down side was the trade in price which is totally reliant on supply and demand.

If you want to sell your old camera equipment quick and easily this is by far the best option. If you want to get a better price for your old equipment you can sell it privately with all the problems that go with it.

Overall I have used them many times and will continue to do so.

Content:

The only reason I put 4* & not 5* was that the box my item was packed in was way too large.

Title: Epson V600 Scanner
Content: Easy navigation and puchase on the website and speedy delivery.

Title: Listed with company and received‚Ä¶
Content: Listed with company and received regular replies. In the end did not purchase the item and received a full and prompt refund. Hope to do with them again

Title: Good service but sadly an incompatible product with my system
Content:
After requesting advice on the compatibility of the product with my camera and lens combination I decided to buy it.
Upon receipt I found that the autofocus didn‚Äôt really operate correctly, hunting around even after finding a lock.
I returned the product, at my own cost for postage, and received a full refund within a couple of days.

Title: Shame it couldn‚Äôt have been five stars‚Ä¶
Content: Efficient, professional, don‚Äôt use wanky couriers. Overall only one minor issue; when I check the box that says ‚Äòno marketing emails‚Äô, can you actually go out that please?! I‚Äôm still getting rakes of marketing emails from you.

Title: Superb service and used products as described
Content: Superb service and used products always exactly as described - telephone agents are very helpful and knowledgeable. I hate the popups after buying a product online

Title: good customer service
Content: good customer service

Title: Quick service much appreciated.
Content:
Quick service much appreciated.
Only problem was that a small part of the kit (not a show-stopper) was missing. Very quick to respond with a new order to replace. 
Would have been a 5 star if everything had been present!

Title: Very fast delivery
Content:
Very fast delivery. Only negative is excessive packaging. Simple lens adapter ring for Lee Filters packed first in box 6"x5"x5" then again in box 11"x9"x8" plus lots of paper inside both boxes.
Same sort of packaging for a filter too.
Even makes Amazon look conservative in their packaging

Title: Service speedy
Content: Service speedy, and used camera mint condition as described and with guarantee. Only downside was I had no dispatch email, so no awareness of when delivery would be. DPD threw the parcel onto my doorstep with such a bang it made me jump. As I was expecting another delivery I didn't realise it was the camera or would have remonstrated. Fortunately I haven't found any damage. I've bought from you before, and would do so again

Title: After initially missing my delivery as‚Ä¶
Content:
After initially missing my delivery as I was out the country with no signal, or access to internet. I contacted customer service to say yes I wanted lens but they said no you‚Äôve missed you now go to back of queue!! Id been waiting since November 2023 so was very upset. 
So I almost gave up. My daughter ordered same time in November,as me,  she had email saying hers was ready , she contacted and said the was not fair and Wex decided to send her lens plus mine out. 
So thank you wex

Title: Great product overkill packaging!‚Ä¶
Content: Great product and very quick delivery through standard postage. Only issue was i ordered a battery (small fuji one), and it came in a box big enough for a full frame camera, with padding and another box inside - so green credentials a little lacking.

Title: WFT-R10B customer return purchase
Content:
I bought a Canon Wireless File Transmitter WFT-R10B listed as customer return. At the RRP this is an expensive item, but the 40% reduction tempted me. A call to the Norwich store to find out more about the condition and warrantee proved unhelpful other than stating that the warrantee was twelve-months.
I decided to gamble and purchased online. The item was received within two days, packed in a strong outer carton. The WFT-R10B was in the original OEM box complete with internal packing and documentation.
Close inspection did not reveal any indication of use, it was as new from the factory, with connector protection caps in place. I registered the item on the Canon site.
The Advanced User guide was downloaded from the Canon site. However, IT knowledge is helpful in setting up the WFT-R10B for file transfer using FTP on a Windows 11 server. LAN connection to the EOS Utility was easier. File transfer from an EOS R5 over a 1GHz LAN network is rapid, a wireless connection is slower.
So far, I am pleased with the performance of the WFT-R10B, which has proved a shrewd buy. I am now better informed, but it would be useful for WEX to explain the terms MO, open-box, customer return, in terms of warrantee and registration. My invoice stated the item as "used", which has a different connotation to the other terms.
I have bought several items from WEX, both new and used, and have been satisfied with the service.

Title: Goods arrived in nice boxes which are‚Ä¶
Content: Goods arrived in nice boxes which are unopened. Therefore my review is based on the delivery.

Title: Good service
Content: Ordering was easy and my item arrived in perfect condition.the delivery time was good too.

Title: I bought DJI OSMO POCKET 3 From them‚Ä¶
Content: I bought DJI OSMO POCKET 3 combo From them when it was hard to get in the UK as it was mostly sold out

Title: camera batteries came quickly just as needed
Content: I ordered two second-hand camera batteries. They came promptly. But the packaging was completely over the top. Each battery came in its own box, well-padded with brown paper. The boxes were huge camera-sized boxes! And the batteries were packaged and sent in separate huge boxes although I ordered them at the same time. So I thought that was rather strange.

Title: Very prompt delivery
Content: Very prompt delivery of the Canon lens I wished to obtain. It was in stock and available at a good price. The range of associated in-stock UV filters was somewhat restricted. The Hoya filter I chose is ok but not my preferred product, which was out of stock.

Title: Buy with confidence from WEX
Content: I received excellent service and love the product I purchased. Their communication and shipping is very good. However, I like to see more details/photographs on their used products. Their website is uninspiring.

Title: Goods great, phone line no so
Content:
Everything delivered on time and in good order.  

Sadly I had to call back due to a problem with the phone line. I had no issues phoning other people at the same time.

Title: Availability
Content:
Availability, price and interest free credit.
The reason you only get four stars is because you use DPD as the carrier.

Title: Once stock was in it was great and‚Ä¶
Content: Once stock was in it was great and quick service.

Title: Kenro speedlight
Content: Great product and excellent service.

Title: Products great
Content: Products great, the order now with in so many hours to get delivery before Christmas didn't work as communicated but goods as described and packed well.

Title: Rude telephone service marks down overall good experience
Content:
The goods were delivered on time and as expected, well packaged and as described. Generally, that part of the service was great and I'd give it five stars, but...

I made the order late on a Saturday night, in two separate orders. In the first, I paid for next-day delivery. In the second, I didn't, because I didn't want to pay twice for something that could be sent in one box!

So, first thing Sunday (about 10am local time), I called the shop and asked that the orders be bundled. The gentleman who answered the phone was extremely rude and wouldn't even take my order number, just told me that what I was asking was impossible, and they'll ship separately. I asked him to cancel the order so that I can re-order. He again refused and told me I'd have to ship it back to them.

Except... that when the orders arrived on my doorstep the packages had in fact been combined and shipped as one in overnight delivery.

The rude customer service, then, is the only reason I have to mark WEX, which I generally like and trust, down to a four.

Title: Almost always great
Content: Great stock, usually good prices. My only problem is it really does depend on who serves you - some staff are friendly, helpful and knowledgable but others are just not quite so great and it is the luck of the draw who you get. The next day one neighbour returned home from holiday and gave the parcel to me. It had been left in her bunker with a note from the delivery guy. Phew

Title: Delivery of printer was prompt but it‚Ä¶

Title: Delivery address roulette
Content:
Ordered a camera from WeX and they managed to give the courier the wrong details as to where to send it - having contacted support, this has gone unanswered and the package remains destined to the wrong address.

WeX seems to have become more careless of late, my previous order of a lens had to be returned because it had not been properly checked and had a sticking aperture, leading to overexposed shots (something that didn't occur in transit), so when not being sent to the wrong place, it's not being checked before it is sent sufficiently.

Whether I get my parcel now will be potluck it seems - quite appalling when this is expensive electronic equipment.

Update: True to their word, WEX contacted me and sorted the address issue out, and offered a partial refund. 

The camera did thankfully then arrive at the right address, and it is in a good condition and as described in the listing on the site. So, all sorted in the end and I have revised the rating based on the CS making things right.

Title: Disappointed
Content:
***UPDATE***

My complaint was handled swiftly.  Whilst I didn't get the amount I initially expected, they did increase the offer to something more respectable.

***

I really don't like leaving 1 star reviews, but I feel like I've been let down after what was a really promising start.

I sent in my camera and graded it as per their website, there was a minor bit of paint loss to the front dial but barely noticeable.  On top of that, it included a genuine battery, along with additional extras such as a lens cap, genuine hand grip and wrist strap.

I called up and they said there were a couple of dents, however, I took a set of comprehensive photographs of the camera before packaging it up - along with photos of the packaging itself, and there were certainly no dents.  I'm more than happy to provide these photos to you.

Given how carefully packaged it was, I can only come to the conclusion that the 'dents' are fictional and they're just trying to bump the price down.  I appreciate they say it's a 'grey import', however, that should have 0 effect on the price as that only really matters in terms of manufacturer warranty, which isn't a factor here?

It feels like a bit of a con and now I don't know what to do - I don't really want the hassle of having the camera returned, but the amount they offered is quite derisory.  I did call to see if they could reassess and offer a little more, but seems they're pretty inflexible.

A real shame, I had high hopes.

Title: Good overall, some improvement in communication.
Content:
I had to call for a second hand purchase and also to pay a deposit, with the rest on finance, which was handy for me. 
 The agreement was a bit tricky agreeing to it on a mobile device as I couldn't see the second part to sign.. Which after some communication mixups with WEX I managed to find the second part... Unfortunately I never received am email with a tracking number for the camera which did arrive on Monday. I still haven't found the tracking email... Not in inbox or spam...
Item was well packed and to be fair camera came with all the parts which weren't mentioned on the description so that made up for it.
There's room for improvement on coms and I feel the finance agreement side needs to be clearer on mobile devices, as most just ask for a text code rather than a double/triple sign... But everyone has their own ways of doing things.

Title: WEX IS Excellent at New, Partex But Choice of USING DPD IS WITH DANGERS NO DLV
Content:
WEX Is superb - selling good, used items cameras, lenses, accessories, etc - No issue with WEX on Normal Basis. - 

Update 27/10 - WEX Received the parcel in one day by excellent Royal Mail Parcel Force, examined efficient my part/ex, trade in items and offered very good price with the money efficiently transferred into my Account.        Certainly will keep using WEX to buy from now on both used Nikon F & Z and new items - although taking my time to learn and buy on adhoc basis from WEX.

Will however insist from now on with my purchases to not use DPD but Royal Mail Parcel Force; even if it means me paying bit extra.

Original Review Left for WEX to Sort out And to Have
Strong words with DPD - Non DLV & collection is not acceptable - Impacts on Good Reputation and service of WEX Photo Video.
==================================
However - this is Association review of them using DPD UK - having endless problems with DPD - associated with WEX Pick up ignoring pick up from my house; NOW on TWO Occasions - with it seems DPD Driver booting it past my house; no excuse and lying on the system about me advising I did'nt want a PICK UP - lie; info recorded by Security Camera.

Spoke to Nice WEX Spokesperson via Live chat; not just me having issues of DPD not delivering or picking up.

PLEASE WEX PHOTO VIDEO - make serious complaints to DPD NOW and move from DPD or they are unfortunately going to ruin your reputation.

Again if you order from WEX Photo VIDEO Insist they use ROYAL MAIL Parcel Force (Certainly NOT DPD) for delivery and collection of ITEMS.

Title: Overall great, with a minor annoyance on this occasion
Content:
I'm rating my latest purchase from Wex. I love this company and have been using them for years. I almost always buy used items from them. Their pricing is reasonable and have a 12 month warranty.

My most recent purchase was for a used video camera which is ideal for my current work. It was advertised as well-used. I don't mind. They are always clean and fully functional. The price was about 1/5th of the current new price. Yes you read correctly. So I jumped at the chance.

When I received it, it was pretty well as described and seems to be working as expected. However I noticed that on the underside, the main tripod connector was missing. There is an alternative connector which is slightly larger. But the main one that attaches to everything, is missing. This is a bit of a big deal. It's a heavy camera and I'd feel more comfortable using both connectors for safety. The only other issue was already mentioned and I was ok with it (scratching on viewfinder).

Wex tend to be poor at photographing their used items. I would expect about 12 pictures for a large complex video camera. And definitely one showing any declared damage. The issue I found wasn't declared or photographed.

So I have written to Wex to ask what can be done. I realise the options are limited. I don't really want to return it, but think this damage should have been declared, so there's no nasty surprises.

Overall though, and as often happens with Wex, there were a couple of extras I wasn't expecting, so that's a plus. Thanks Wex - you're my go-to store for everything phtogrqapic, and have the nicest staff!

The only grip I do have and this isn‚Äôt just with WEX is when you have a specific offer ‚Äì in this instance ¬£100 off plus a second battery you shouldn‚Äôt have to populate the offer code section with a code. If I hadn‚Äôt entered the discount code I wouldn‚Äôt have received the discount (This was a manufacturer's instant discount to be clear), and this needs to be rectified. On a plus note, the battery wasn‚Äôt in stock when the order was placed and WEX has kept me informed via email to let me know that they are still awaiting stock.

Title: Would Liked To Have Awarded Five Stars
Content: I was looking for a good quality used lens. The information on Wex website stated that it was in mint condition and came with original box, both rear & front caps and original manual. It was as described and in pristine condition with all the accessories, the only downside was the manual was in every language but English. Neither Wex nor Nikon could supply an English version. I knew that I could download a copy from Nikon but I like to have originals - just a personal thing, hence the four star review. In every other respect Wex cannot be faulted and offer first class customer service along with sound technical advice.

Excellent service and advice. If anything, the price ( for a canon rf 1.4x tc) was equal to the highest, equal to canon's own store price, and they had a 2 year guarantee, not a 1 year, but wex's delivery better , 1 day compared to a few days.
Could so easily be 5stars if price more competitive. But it took a while to convince myself at upto ¬£100 more than some! 
Wex very good. But could be excellent by some price improvements!

Title: Very smooth and positive experience, delivery partner could be better
Content: Had all necessary equipment in stock, ordered on Friday with the Novuna 0% finance, application was approved on Saturday and order dispatched the same day. Staff on the phone were helpful and answered my questions about the finance quickly and effectively. The actual equipment arrived well packaged and undamaged. Overall everything went smoothly and I will buy from Wex again in the future, would recommend! I only take 1 star away because they used Parcelforce for the delivery, which is perhaps the worst delivery company - I paid for Sunday delivery and waited at the door all morning, only to get a text saying that they'd attempted delivery but there was nobody in. Not Wex's fault, but  they could pick a more reliable partner for sending such expensive items.

Title: Wex service is great, but undermined by poor Royal Mail delivery
Content: Wex service is great - prompt dispatch and good prices. Unfortunately its let down by Royal Mail (which they use for standard delivery )- texts from Royal Mail said they'd deliver on Monday, but it wasn't.  Finally turned up late on Wednesday.  Good job I didn't have to re-arrange my job to be when they said they'd deliver :(

Title: Delivery on time
Content: Delivery on time, no issues, happy with video head.

Title: Polarizing filter and lens hood,
Content: Good range of products, mostly at reasonable price. Polarizing filter, although expensive is excellent as is the reasonably priced lens hood which neatly rotates and clicks into position on the Canon lens.

Title: Good firm with backup if needed
Content: Purchased a few items. One of them wasn‚Äôt suitable so had to be returned for refund. Return process and refund were hassle free and prompt. Despite hiccup will happily use again and are recommended.

Title: The item I purchased was not compatible‚Ä¶
Content: The item I purchased was not compatible with my equipment. The organisation of this was carried out with no hitches. The same as I have experienced in the past.

Title: Delivered as requested
Content: Delivered as requested

Title: Purchase of used Nikon D 3300
Content:
Excellent product, just as described, and very happy with it.

Only negative aspect on purchase is that after ordering the item I heard nothing until the item was delivered. Until I received it I wasn't sure if the order had gone through, or when I might get it. No e-mail acknowledgment of the order at any point, which I thought was disappointing.

Title: Delivery was fine quality and condition‚Ä¶
Content: Delivery was fine quality and condition fine. Only comment I would make is that the order was split into two closely timed packages which in one case was way oversized. This is not sustainable, particularly if one considers the delivery vehicle volume occupied.

Title: Parcelforce made a right mess of‚Ä¶
Content: Parcelforce made a right mess of delivery but staff at Wex were very helpful and sorted out redelivery, so they get a good review. Product as ‚Äúused‚Äù as described and will do the job!

Title: Leica V-Lux 5 and card
Content: Quick, albeit late by a few days (not the fault of Wex), delivery of a great camera.

Title: Needs a box rather than 'click here' for vouchers, otherwise a good service.
Content: Thorough item description on the web site with clear purchase procedure. One star down though as the voucher code mechanism now seems to be a 'click here' option rather than a simple 'enter your code in this box' option. As such it might be missed. Phone calls detailing delivery give confidence that item is safely on its way.

Title: used item
Content: goods ordered online and arrived with in two days standard Parcel Force service .  Condition of goods as described

Title: Very helpful on the telephone
Content: Very helpful on the telephone. Prompt dispatch and delivery. More information about he Canon cashback would have been helpful.

Title: Helpful in solving a problem, reasonable quote for trade in
Content: Got a great trade-in quote and pick up of my kit was quick and efficient. There was a 6 day period where I heard nothing whilst they assessed my gear and I chased them and got a final quote that day. The quote was less than originally stated, for an issue I didn't know I had, but don't dispute. I wanted to part ex my gear against a used lens they had in stock to use on holiday but the above delay meant I needed the lens to arrive the following day for my holiday. The team were great-they swapped the trade in from Wex Credit to bank transfer and organised speedy delivery. I confirmed the lens sale with them at 4:30pm and received it the next morning at 9:30am!

Title: All as expected
Content: Delivered on time and as advertised, thanks

Title: Did not receive goods on day agreed(1‚Ä¶
Content: Did not receive goods on day agreed(1 day late) which was a bit of an inconvenience. Have always used WEX and will continue to do so.

Title: Product as described but
Content: Product as described( Nikon D780. Mint). Great service. But one thing I was disappointed with. Later I chose a Nikon 70-200 and a Tamron 24-70 but together a finance option was not available. Had to do separately. Two time two credit checks thats not good. But why?

Title: Quick delivery
Content: Quick delivery

Title: Wex were very good but ...
Content: Wex were very good, had exactly what I was looking for. Ordering was easy and clear. The quality of the lens and packaging was great. However, I paid for next day delivery, which would have been fine except Parcel Force hung on to my package for 5 days at the local distribution centre before it arrived. Wex were as helpful as they could be and did refund the cost of delivery so I have no complaints as far as they are concerned.

Title: Very helpful team
Content: Very helpful team

Title: Happy purchase
Content: Happy purchase. Delivery was fast and safe. I liked smooth S5

Title: Nikon 500mm PF
Content: I am not sure I would have rated the lens I purchased Grade 10 simply because it has a few small marks on the lens body and lens hood, however it as great lens optically so I am overall happy my purchase.

Title: Good Service
Content: Easy to use website, fair prices and prompt delivery. Nuff said!

Title: It does what it says on the tin
Content: It does what it says on the tin. Product well displayed and delivery as stated.

Title: Speedy delivery.
Content:
Speedy delivery.
I received the item as described.
Reasonably priced.

Title: Extremely good service!
Content: Extremely good service, I wouldn't buy camera equipment anywhere else. However, their website does need an update. The galleries/product pages could be miles better. I've found myself looking at products on other websites due to richer media experiences, looking in-depth to ensure I'm buying the correct thing, and then coming back to WEX to make the purchase.

Title: Impressed with the Go 3, however the included case is lacking.
Content:
I'm really impressed with the Insta360 Go 3. Delivery was flawless. As was buying experience. 

My only critique is that the included INOV8 flight case is sub par. I don't intend to use it for the Go 3. The Go 3 sits in the case with the lens pressed up against one half of the case, with the screen pressed up against the other half. With the Go 3 being slightly thicker than the inside of the case this means that any pressure applied to the case is going to be translated directly onto arguably the only two parts of the camera you would least want it to. I purchased a Lowepro CS20. If Wex want to significantly increase the value of their premium Go 3 bundle, I recommend including this small case in the bundle instead.

Title: Good service
Content: Good service - waiting for product availability a little frustrating

Title: The item I perches I am very satisfied‚Ä¶
Content: The item I perches I am very satisfied and happy please let me know when you have offers going time (GoPro 11) accessories

Title: Smooth and easy trade-in
Content: Smooth transaction from collection to payment. I traded in a lens at a seemingly busy time of year(July) as it took longer than expected from delivery(Monday morning) to processing payment (Friday afternoon) but they were clear and helpful chasing it up for me. Those I spoke to over the phone were very professional and quick to answer my queries. Can‚Äôt fault the service at all. And of course they offered a good price compared to others I‚Äôve used in the past so overall I‚Äôm happy with how this trade-in went and I‚Äôd be inclined to use Wex again over other competitors.

Title: Slow Delivery
Content: No concerns regarding Wex themselves, but the 'Next Day Delivery' took two days

Title: Prompt service and a good product
Content: Prompt service and a good product

Title: I've used WEX for many years now and‚Ä¶
Content: I've used WEX for many years now and always reiceved good service.  The reason I dropped 1 star is I felt slightly agrieved about my recent purchase etc.

Title: An all round good experience if‚Ä¶
Content: An all round good experience if somewhat slow at times

Title: Old fashioned customer service at its best
Content:
Customer Service has been brilliant had a problem with first order.
No issues returning and even paid postage.
Upgraded to a different camera delivery in all cases within 24 hours.

Title: Usually very quick service.
Content: Usually very quick service.

Title: Feedback
Content: Mixed messages from staff re price. Need to simplify Checkout and not have PayPal as a bolt on. David & Jonathan both excellent. Delivery perfect!

Title: kept fully informed
Content: After a lengthy wait caused by Canons delay due to shortage of electronic parts I was kept fully informed by Wex and was delivered next day free of charge. Once again great service from Wex

Title: Fast dispatch of package
Content: Fast dispatch of package, excellent price and good quality second hand items. Only downside was the use of Parcelforce as the courier who give little info on delivery progress

Title: I was able to speak to someone on the telephone
Content: I was able to speak to someone on the telephone and place my order. My camera was delivered within two days. Very good customer service.

Title: All good,but the courier wasn‚Äôt very‚Ä¶
Content: All good,but the courier wasn‚Äôt very that good,it turned up a day early,than showing on the app.

Title: Mainly very positive but still waiting‚Ä¶
Content: Mainly very positive but still waiting for money back on my trade in after a week.

Title: Was everything Ok
Content: Was everything Ok, apart delivery, I've been waiting for my parcel one week. But because of that I've got discount from Wex which is very good.

Title: WEX Kept Me Informed About My Delayed Order
Content: I had to wait for WEX to receive a Manfroitto tripod head for almost 2 month due to Manfrotto being slow with supplying WEX.  WEX kept me updated every few weeks so I knew they had not forgotten about my order and they dispatch it swiftly once it was back in stock.  My only issue was with their use of Parcel Force as they did not call me from my front gated entrance to deliver on the arranged date and had to attempt another day.  All other couriers (like DPD etc.) seem not to have this issue.  Otherwise I would give 5 star

Title: Goods arrived as described and website‚Ä¶
Content: Goods arrived as described and website is reasonably easy to navigate. Only hitch, I ordered 2 batteries and paid for next day delivery. Only one arrived the next day, the second arrived later in the week with no explanation or comms from Wex which I've taken a star off for.

Title: ss of buying over net‚Ä¶
Content: The whole process of buying over net was good an easy . It's been two weeks since I put my order in an have not received my camera . This is down to cannon supplying though so I can't really review the product . Wex have emailed saying they would keep me informed a plus point . An estimate of time would be good . But all in im happy to wait then review properly

Title: Prompt delivery.  Excessive plastic.
Content:
Prompt delivery.  Although my order was split into two deliveries for some reason.
Disappointed that excessive amounts of plastic were used to package a small, textile cable bag.

Title: Good service and frequent emails with‚Ä¶
Content: Good service and frequent emails with status of order, especially for a lens with a 12 month waiting list

Title: Easy to order online
Content:
Easy to order online. Was great to have option of named day delivery.

I do think that given the amount spent, you could have a loyalty scheme in place.

Title: The "in stock" item was quickly‚Ä¶
Content:
The "in stock" item was quickly delivered and as advertised.
I was not given a timescale for when they would get in the "out of stock" item so cancelled and went elsewhere.

Title: Order took a very long to be filled.
Content: Order took a very long to be filled.

Title: Service execution is excellent
Content: Service execution is excellent - but the frustration with item availability prevents the fifth star. I realise that the expectation for product availability is at the root of the frustration but having experienced it several times now - unless an item is in stock I will not place an order

Title: New camera arrived promptly
Content: New camera arrived promptly, but not next day. I'm very happy with the quality.

Title: Good service
Content: Service was as good as usual. Correct Equipment delivered on time

Title: Nice and simple purchase.
Content: Nice and simple purchase.

Title: You need to check the specifications against the equipment
Content: I telephoned my order as I wanted an answer to a particular technical question. The gent who answered was very helpful and polite and answered the question speedily so I decided to place an order for a new monitor. All went smoothly and it was delivered the next day in good order. On opening the box I found that the specifications shown on the internet stated that the unit had hdmi, dvi-d and playport input sockets but in fact it had hdmi, playport and vga sockets, but no dvi-d socket! Hence only 4 stars. Having said that I would still recommend this company as they are usually reliable.

Title: Usually very good
Content: Usually very good, but this time they ignored my request to delay shipment.  This caused me some problems, otherwise, I would give 5 stars.

Title: Wex are helpful and fast to despatch
Content: Wex are helpful and fast to despatch. However I have reduced the rating to 4 stars because unfortunately they use some less reliable couriers in terms of goods arriving within an allocated time slot. My purchase arrived too late for a photo job and there was no option to request it be delivered to a neighbour instead, only if requested for 3 days later. So very stressful! Luckily the driver did leave it with a neighbour so I was able to use it on day 2 of my job. I would suggest to Wex, in terms of reliability on delivery timing which can be crucial, DPD are the best.

Title: New camera failed after 10 weeks' use, but...
Content: Bought a new, top of the range OM camera from WEX which failed after 10 weeks' use. Phoned customer service and I was offered a repair only, which meant I was left without a camera. After two weeks I'd had no word, so called again and only after insisting firmly that I wanted my call to be upscaled was it dealt with and a replacement offered which came two days later. That was great, but the camera should never have been sent in for a repair in the first place - not after a mere 10 weeks of use. In the end Wex really stepped up to the mark; I'm snapping away happily again with my new OM1 and WEX has honoured their offer of a goodwill gesture.

Title: Always quick & efficient service
Content: Always quick & efficient service, prices sometimes a little high compared to other suppliers.

Title: An assistant's help
Content: An assistant's help

Title: Items arrived quickly and as advertised
Content: Very good experience.

Title: Great used lens purchase and customer service!
Content:
Overall, I have had a great experience with Wex, both in terms of the items and service received. I have bought a new camera, new audio equipment, a used camera, and a used lens (my most recent order on the 17th June). All of the items were well-packaged and of good quality/ as expected. 

I have to say that, with a couple of previous orders, I had a few minor issues. However, these were dealt with very promptly, professionally, and satisfactorily. I had a great response from Martin from the Customer Service Team. He explained why the delivery of my items did not arrive when I expected them. He generously offered some credit on my account to put towards my next Wex order because of the inconvenience experienced. I felt that Martin listened to my feedback about the communication of expected delivery times on the website.

I've not given 5* because I think the item descriptions for products could be better/ clearer. The used lens I ordered was described as grade 9+ and in mint condition. But there is a fairly deep ding and several light scratches on the top of the lens near the front. Also, my previous order (for a used camera) came with the official battery charger with a European plug rather than a UK one. It's not the end of the world as I have several plug adapters. It would have been useful to know this though before ordering that particular camera.

Title: Wex do a good job although trade in‚Ä¶
Content: Wex do a good job although trade in prices could be fairer

Title: Worth considering as a source of used gear.
Content:
I bought a used camera, which was delivered quickly and in roughly the condition described. 
However, I think Wex could improve their service to potential buyers of used cameras by using higher resolution photos and providing top, bottom and side views, not just front and back, in their listings. Descriptions and ratings alone are too open to interpretation by the customer. For example, one phrase used in Wex descriptions is ‚Äú shining to edges‚Äù, which means very little to most people, I would suggest. On the other hand, being able to see in a photograph the condition of, for example, the base of the camera, gives a clear indication of wear and tear, and of the care with which the camera is likely to have been treated generally.

Title: Easy transaction.
Content: Easy transaction.

Title: The Item arrived incomplete
Content: The Item arrived incomplete but I used webchat and the customer service agent gave me a partial refund and I was able to buy the missing parts from Amazon.  So for customer service 5 stars, only scored 4 as it should not have been nessessary and Item should have been complete and as described.

Title: I have dealt with Wex for many years‚Ä¶
Content:
I have dealt with Wex for many years and find staff helpful and courteous. They advised that one of my part exchange items was a grey import, and so managed to get a full refund from original seller.
Thank you Wex.

Title: Xh2 (OB) was OK but I noticed a‚Ä¶
Content: Xh2 (OB) was OK but I noticed a copyright entry, for a professional wedding photo company, ( web site visited to confirm ). I then looked at shutter count 3550 very high for ( OB-open Box ). Others Ive spoken to have had a similar experience. My point is, pro outfits should not be " borrowing to use " for profit. Wex should in these cases mark product as used.

Title: Used Wex previously and very satisfied‚Ä¶
Content:
Used Wex previously and very satisfied with their service. 
However on this occasion delivery for an stock item took 4 days hence 4 star review

Title: Very good as always
Content: Very good as always

Title: Good overall service
Content: Good overall service - good, fair price for lenses I was selling though it took slightly longer to get the prices than expected.  Parcel Force took 3 attempts to deliver new lens.

Title: A positive experience let down by‚Ä¶
Content: A positive experience let down by Parcel Farce

Title: Good customer service with interacting skills.
Content: Ordered an item which was out stock and received email to ensure that the stock would be available within the next few weeks. Wex had said  unable  to supply the 2CR5 panasonic and would I like an alternative the 2CR5 energizer.

Title: First time buyer from wex
Content:
First time buyer from wex. Order was received and promptly despatched. I gave 4 stars because the purchase included a battery and no strap, opening the package it contained a strap and no battery. Called wex immediately and a battery arrived next day.
I can't make any comment other than that. Hopefully nothing goes wrong and I don't have to experience that side of customer services, who knows it may be good too.

Title: Good and friendly communication
Content: Good and friendly communication by phone (immediate response) the live chat wasn't functioning. The exchange system was a bit complex , but worked in the end

Title: The item was correct and delivered‚Ä¶
Content: The item was correct and delivered quickly no problems. Ive come off their mailing list because Ive had emails about their slavery policies and diversity in photography, I would rather buy from a business which stays out of the culture wars, you may feel differently

Title: Back ordered item as out of stock‚Ä¶
Content: Back ordered item as out of stock arrived within a week

Title: Fast service and good quality product
Content: Fast service and good quality product. My only criticism is the huge amount of packaging for such a tiny product. Save paper - pack in a small padded envelope next time please

Title: Competitive price
Content:
Competitive price, and great delivery.   

Would have ben 5 stars but my expectations of Wex are so high it's not easy to exceed them!

Title: Wex Photo video
Content: Wex photo is a company that I can whole heartedly recommend to everyone.  The products are excellent for second hand items and the prices are quite competative.  I use them when I require photographic equipment.

Title: Phone order for Fujifilm dual battery‚Ä¶
Content:
Phone order for Fujifilm dual battery charger but on receipt there was no charging cable and instruction leaflet next to useless I'm afraid. I phoned WEX for help ~ due to the fact that I'd grabbed a USB C to USB C I had I on hand  to charge. Only displaying one of the batteries charging and despite >4h had only reached 77% charge. Advice was to use cable received with my X-T5 (purchased a few days before). Immediately 'both' batteries displayed on charger and were charging simultaneously üëè
A bit of advice during a phone call order wouldn't go wrong üëå
Otherwise great service as usual ...

Title: Pleased with the new camera body‚Ä¶
Content: Pleased with the new camera body ordered over the phone.  Unfortunately it got delivered to my home after I said I would come to pick it up, so less pleased about that!  Good products available so a great store.

Title: The service that was provided by wex‚Ä¶
Content:
The service that was provided by wex photography was good and communication with them was good the only little problem was the confusion over the postage 
I would recommend the company

Title: I tend to buy from Wed over the phone‚Ä¶
Content: I tend to buy from Wed over the phone as speaking to someone I find is much more helpful. The advice I've received has mostly been reliable.

Title: WEX got everything right
Content: WEX got everything right, the only thing that prevented the full five stars was the delivery. They entrusted a very expensive item to Parcelforce but didn't mark it FRAGILE which I believe they should have done. The box had received a lot of damage and was ripped open when it arrived, fortunately the item inside was undamaged, I was lucky on this occasion.

Title: Tech Support par excellence!
Content: Great customer service helping me sort out an issue with my Velbron tripod mount

Title: I can usually find the gear I need at ‚Ä¶
Content: I can usually find the gear I need at  a reasonable price. Wex support is excellent but regrettably their usual first class delivery was let down on this occasion by poor performance from their carriers.  Hopefully just a one off.

Title: Good price and prompt delivery.
Content:
Good price and prompt delivery.
Delivery, however, was through Parcelforce whose service was not flexible (no opportunity to either alter the date of delivery in advance, or to suggest an alternative delivery option until a failed delivery had occurred).

Title: New Lens
Content: Even though there was a delay in getting the lens, I was kept informed why and it was dispatched as soon as they could.

Title: Delivered promptly
Content:
Delivered promptly. Well packaged. Chat line is useful for any issues/questions, and responded to promptly.
Used items are always accurately described for condition, often looking as new.

Title: Fast prompt delivery but the product not quite as good as expected
Content:
Fast prompt delivery but the product was not as good as expected. There is an issue with the unit not being fully in focus when set up as it should be. 
The unit is all plastic which is not a problem if the focussing was correct. 
Not sending back as it has done the job I wanted it to even though it is not perfect.

Title: Cheaper alternative for a Tether Block please
Content:
Bought a Tether Tools cable and it's great. Wanted something to keep the cable fixed securely but the only choice was a Tether Block at ¬£104, a ridiculous price for a block of aluminium.
Could Wex source something equivalent at a lower price please.

Title: Delivery Issues
Content: Should of been five stars but delivery was a fiasco however the lens I purchased which was described as 9+ was perfect and looks unused so very pleased.  A total of four different tracking numbers and two delivery confirmations for two different days plus an incorrect address was a shame but otherwise very pleased with the purchase.

Title: Easy to use service
Content: Easy to use service

Title: Fantastic after-sales service
Content:
Wex offered a very good customer after-sales service and did a good job with my purchase.

And they offered a competitive offer for my purchase!

Title: Bought a nice used lens
Content: Bought a nice used lens, although they sent the wrong one but was swiftly replaced with the correct one, but again wex were let down again by parcel farce the delivery is so poor

Title: Wrong item sent.
Content: Only four stars because they sent the wrong item out first BUT, it was resolved in 24hrs with a ¬£50 transfer back on my card as an apology (not store credit).  Had to ask for a manager to do this also.  Don't know why the guy who picked the phone up first could not do this or tranfer me over to a manager straight away if they did not have the authority to do this??  I will still use them again.

Title: Some confusion regarding PX but all‚Ä¶
Content: Some confusion regarding PX but all good in the end.

Title: Delivery was a lot faster than‚Ä¶
Content: Delivery was a lot faster than promised. And everything arrived in good condition

Title: Wex are great and communicative
Content: Wex are great and communicative. Took 1 star off because of the experience with parcel force is not great at all.

Title: A good micro four thirds lens 40-150‚Ä¶
Content: A good micro four thirds lens 40-150 very useful, reliable from Wex

Title: Care delivery
Content: Care delivery, I bought two Canon RF lens but no one with warranty card. I don‚Äôt know why?

Title: All good here
Content: Everything came on time and well packed, and was as described

Title: Hard to find lens ordered in January
Content:
Hard to find lens ordered in January. Wex regularly reported the situation and eventually delivered safely.

Perhaps 5 star would have been fair. The delay was Nikon's and it came from China.

Title: Will deliver batteries to islands
Content: Would send lithium battery to me when Amazon would not.

Title: Good value for money
Content: Good value for money, fast service and easy to deal with. Not 5 stars as I never give five stars as I have not had to use there customer service yet , so not sure how good there after sales service is.

Title: Good products good value good service
Content: Good products good value good service

Title: Good product
Content: Good product, but had to wait as out of stock.

Title: Order mix up issues, but Wex sorted it out
Content:
I've shopped with Wex online a few times and had things delivered without issue, but this time when I ordered a used lens they mixed up the order with someone else and we got the wrong items.

Wex sorted it all out quickly though and provided free shipping to return and get the correct item and gave me a 'good will' voucher as recompense for the mistake.

When I got the lens it was a different model to what I ordered (not the IS version), I asked them to refund the difference which they did quickly.

Customer support were fast to respond via email and helpful.

Although this wasn't the perfect experience, I'll still shop with them in the future.

Title: Always great customer service and‚Ä¶
Content: Always great customer service and professional staff to assist.

Title: Great service
Content: Great service, one item was out of stock but arrived the following week

Title: Everything arrived on time and purchase‚Ä¶
Content:
Everything arrived on time and purchase was easy to complete on line.
Had been recommended by a relative

Title: Great product and service. Admin not so good.
Content: Great product at a great price as is to be expected. However the reason for reducing the award by one star is because of all the faffing about trying to get cash instead of a credit for my P.ex.Mistaked do happen but we should never have got into this state in the first pace.

Title: Fair treatment
Content: Fair treatment, speedy response to my needs and concerns.

Title: Haven't let me down.
Content: Despite my initial disappointment when I discovered that only one item was in stock after placing my order, I must commend Wex for their consistently quick service and delivery. I have ordered from them four times now, and each time the delivery has arrived promptly. This level of reliability sets them apart from other companies I have dealt with. I am impressed with their efficiency and will certainly continue to order from them in the future.

Title: Initial I interaction was poor due to‚Ä¶
Content: Initial I interaction was poor due to paying for next day delivery for product not to arrive, contacting the company who refunded me straight away the extra delivery charge and said they would be in touch about the product. This never happened. After writing to complain this was followed up by William and very professionally handled and apologised for the poor service. The company turned this around and the product is great!

Title: Easy to find items required but limited‚Ä¶
Content: Easy to find items required but limited info about additional requirements such as batteries and chargers which need to be ordered separately.

Title: I brought a product but when I‚Ä¶
Content: I brought a product but when I contacted them for the consumables for the equipment they said they would look into it.....nothing. Other items of a similar type the clearly advertise the consumables..... don't get it?

Title: Customer service made distance shopping‚Ä¶
Content: Customer service made distance shopping work for me. It would have been 5 Stars and an even better experience, if the trade in team and the sales team could communicate effectively and quickly.

Title: I can count on them always
Content:
My order arrived in time, with no damage, exactly what I ordered, as usual.
 I never had problem with WEX Photo and it's so easy to talk to somebody on the phone when I need help this is the raison why I am Wex Photo's customer for many years .

Title: Great company to deal with very‚Ä¶
Content: Great company to deal with very professional. Only issue I had was my part wasn‚Äôt in stock and had to wait over a month to get it.

Title: The service I've received from Wex has been very good.
Content: The service I've received from Wex has always been good.  The only shortcoming that I've experienced is that on this occasion (and one other) when I have paid for "Named Day Delivery" the delivery didn't arrive on the named day.  In both cases delivery was by Parcel Force!

Title: Great range of products
Content: Great range of products, easy to order the only negative was the courier which took ages to deliver my order.

Title: Would have been 5 stars
Content: Would have been 5 stars, if the lens hood hadn't have been missing from the delivery. However, after a sincere apology it was sent a few days later.

Title: Prompt service and Delivery
Content: Would recommend them

Title: Wex is a very good company to deal‚Ä¶
Content: Wex is a very good company to deal with. I wish they wouldn't use Parcelforce for delivery though.

Title: Nikon Z50
Content: Great efficient service

Title: Finally got the products
Content: Finally got the products after phone and emails.  It took 2 weeks rather than next day but postage was refunded.  Great outcome but less than great process

Title: Good value and speedy delivery.
Content: Very good service from Wex. Only took a couple of days and packaging was excellent. Highly recommended. Thanks Wex. Only slight niggle was the product was not quite as good as the product reviews suggested. Product review is another matter though.

Title: Always receive great and prompt‚Ä¶
Content: Always receive great and prompt service. Only reason for not getting five stars is second hand lenses. Every lens description states there is light dust within the optics. Surely not every lens has this problem!

Title: Waste full wrapping it would have been 5 stars but the box it‚Ä¶
Content: would have been 5 stars but the box it came in was 50 times the size of the battery, why?

Title: Delivery issue
Content: The purchase and product was all fine. The slight issue was with the delivery. I was emailed my delivery 1 hour window which I scheduled to be home for, but the delivery was attempted 4 hours earlier with no notification. Delivery missed and had to reschedule for the next day!

Title: Canon EP-EX 1.5II Eyepiece Extender
Content:
This was the the 3rd time I purchased an Eyepiece Extender for my Canon collection.

I found the service very good.

Title: Consistently Good
Content: Friendly, helpful and efficient across all aspects of the business; they are my usual ‚Äògo to‚Äô retailer for all/any photographic equipment needs. My only dissatisfaction is with the relatively paltry trade-in offers for used equipment (but that seems to be common across most retailers who offer trade-ins.)

Title: Order processed and delivered quickly
Content: Order processed and delivered quickly, product as expected. No issues.

Title: Amazing on-line presence
Content:
with best prices, on-line advice and awesone ordering a day later
it's the 1st stop for buying

Title: It should have been 5 stars.....
Content: I would have given them a 5 star rating but unfortunately the used camera I bought came with a charging cable that didn't fit, therefore the 4 star rating. Luckily I had one at home that fitted! Other than that, the camera and service were great.

Title: The ordering and delivery of the camera‚Ä¶
Content: The ordering and delivery of the camera and lens was very good

Title: Easy website to negotiate and to find‚Ä¶
Content: Easy website to negotiate and to find the camera I was after. Simple check out procedure and delivered on time although Royal Mail don‚Äôt give a 2hr delivery slot like DPD etc. You have to get to the door quickly otherwise you‚Äôll just be left with a ‚ÄúSorry you weren‚Äôt in‚Äù card hence the 4 Stars.

Title: Customer service needs improvement
Content:
Having bought from WEX before they were my first choice when wanting a camcorder. The camera arrived and I am pleased with it although not yet used it properly.
However, their customer service is lacking. When I looked and the camera was out of stock, I spoke to someone by phone who said that they would let me know when it came in. As I was going away for a week, I placed an order expecting to be notified when it came in stock. However, they shipped it without notifying me. Thankfully a neighbour was at home and could take it in. I didn't even get an email saying it had been shipped.

Title: Staff at WEX are very helpful - but‚Ä¶
Content:
Staff at WEX are very helpful and friendly. It‚Äôs a problem (and a stressful one) that they couldn‚Äôt tell me earlier what kind of account I had but kept insisting that they could see credit I couldn‚Äôt see, when the issue was that my online account wasn‚Äôt the kind where you can see your credit! Customer service resolved this for me over the phone.

*The reply claims this was due to different accounts being used but in truth the credit showed on neither account and the problem appeared instead to be that neither account had been linked to online purchasing. The same thing happened a previous time when I traded but the issue was never explained then.

Title: Bought used Wimberley gimbal head ~‚Ä¶
Content:
Bought used Wimberley gimbal head ~ nothing much could go wrong. Delivery was great. Product performs as expected.
I use WEX only if I have to since I tried a trade in for a Z9 & was thoroughly disgusted at the trade in price offered for my recently purchased camera [A+] body.  Top to "only if necessary" in one phone call.

Title: All good except their choice of courier
Content: Wex themselves were great, no issues. But they used Parcel Force to deliver my camera, which loses them a star: it may be a quid or two cheaper than other carriers, but there's a reason for that. Obviously the delivery was later than PF had indicated, the tracking turned off for the last few hours, and there was no option for delivery to a local shop, so I had to try to arrange my day around it.

Title: I bought a tamron tap in console
Content:
I bought a tamron tap in console . It was faulty when I tried it, and the discussion I had over the phone led to a return paid for sticker , and I returned it. 
I did have to enquire after a couple of days when a replacement would be sent, and they said new ones had been ordered, and I was asked to emphasise ' as soon as they received the replacement', by the person I "talked " to ( e mails really) , on the return e mail,  but after another 2 days the replacement was signalled as arrived at WEX , and next day I had it.
This one worked! 
If I hadn't had to emphasise 'as soon as possible' they would have got a 5.

Title: Look nowhere else for second hand gear
Content:
The camera was exactly as described and packaged very well to protect it en-route. All contents were included as described and in good condition. 
Highly recommend Wex for gear and customer service.

Title: Fairly slow in responding to emails at‚Ä¶
Content: Fairly slow in responding to emails at times but all issues resolved and will continue to use them for future purchases

Title: Efficient and timely
Content: Efficient and timely. Kit arrived just as described.

Title: Very pleased with the light pad I‚Ä¶
Content: Very pleased with the light pad I purchased from you. Wish i had invested in this previously instead of a cheaper one. Arrived on time, well boxed.

Title: Good returns service
Content: Good returns service and despite being let down by a faulty lens purchase, my return was very quickly delt with. Also I wasn't left out of pocket as  a prepaid label was emailed to me.

Title: Bought a used Canon 35 14Lii described‚Ä¶
Content: Bought a used Canon 35 14Lii described as 9+ condition - came with a chip on front element. I returned it after some test shots and I asked for lens to be regraded to reflect condition but stated I still wanted it. They just gave me a refund which was a little bit annoying. However they later contacted me and the issue was resolved successfully.

Title: Helpful
Content: Very helpful and gift vouchers arrived without any delay.

Title: Wex quick, Royal Mail nightmare
Content: Ordering and shipping were quick and seem less, the only spoiler was Royal Mail as I needed the item quickly, I paid for next day delivery, the deliver driver lied, stating that he‚Äôd attempted delivery but nobody was in, this was a lie as we are a business premises and there were three people in front shop at the time that he claimed that he attempted delivery, this made a weekend shoot difficult. I called Wed who‚Äôs customer service representative was excellent, as I say, Wex service was fantastic, but I‚Äôd be cautious of Royal Mail 24hr service when ordering.

Title: Outstanding customer support
Content: Outstanding customer support. Thank you.  A very helpful response to enquiries by chat on the website or when I called. This is my fourth purchase through Wex  . Excellent experience every time

Title: RECOMMENDED SUPPLIER
Content: As a regular customer, I can say that I go back to WEX because they are a reliable supplier, with good prices, product range and service. No supplier is perfect (hence 4*s), but on the few occasions there has been an issue, it has been satisfactorily resolved.

Title: Extremely efficient company only‚Ä¶
Content: Extremely efficient company only criticism there were some niggilng little things missing, having said that the camera was as described.

Title: Purchasing was Great, P/x was a bit of a faff.
Content:
In terms of trust - there are no issues at all with this company. My experience was okay. I had about ¬£1k worth of gear in my basket and wanted to trade in some older gear I had. The valuation and exchange process was relatively quick and easy. I had a bit of a faff with being told that the 2nd of 2 boxes of goods for trade in was not received but after I found the tracking and showed it was signed for, it was soon found. Due to the delay with the 'lost' items, one of the products that I was looking to buy (the main item in my basket) sold out with none in stock and no-one able to advise the next available delivery of stock which was super frustrating as the whole point in ordering from Wex was to trade in old equipment and use the trade in value against my own purchases...so I had to purchase the main item elsewhere. They also couldn't find my account, to add the store credit to but were soon able to once I screenshot my account when logged into their page.
All the goods were then purchased and delivered quickly so I think for purchases only - great site, great price, great delivery, decent communications....but with the Part Exchange, I think I just got unlucky with the various things described above which is why I'm going 4* instead of 5*. 
Would I deal with again - absolutely. Should anyone be put off - not at all.

Title: Good Service
Content:
Was able to source camera from here that I could not find anywhere else online.
Good communication and arrived the following day.

Title: Great and honest description
Content: Buying used from the website is always good, with honest evaluation of condition.

Title: Very helpful and informed advice over second hand camera
Content:
Very helpful and informed advice over the phone. 
I don't give 5 stars because the used camera that I bought came with the unhinged battery door, but this was not in the description of the camera. Never mind, the camera seems good so far, there are 45 days for trying, and 1 year of warranty on second hand is twice as long as all other shops. Thanks for your service!

Title: Hehlpful staff with good advice
Content:
Hehlpful staff with good advice helped me to find the goods that meet my requirements.

I await delivery of one out-of-stock item

Title: every think about ordering was good
Content: every think about ordering was good. Only niggle was confirmation of delivery date.

Title: Excellent service
Content: Excellent service.  Goods as described and well packaged.

Title: Good service overall
Content: Good service overall. Product I bought wasn‚Äôt in stock when I purchased but was kept informed of expected delivery dates etc and didn‚Äôt have to wait too long.

Title: My go to place for new photo equipment....
Content:
may be a little expensive bit generally Wex Photo have it either in stock or direct from manufacturer.  

My go to place for new equipment, they deliver fast as well, service sorting out returns is great, easy.

Title: Rapid service‚Ä¶
Content: Item was processed and despatched promptly. Easy online experience and no issues.

Title: Notifications could be improved
Content: The only complaint would be that I ordered a product which was on back order/awaiting stock and had no idea when it might come back into stock and if I was likely to be supplied the item. I appreciate that you might not know when such items are likely to get delivered to your warehouse until delivered there, but the only notification I received was that it had been scheduled for delivery with the courier. It would be better if customers had some forewarning of incoming items once an order has been placed. It is a small point, but allows customers to plan around the items being delivered.

Title: The patience and professional approach‚Ä¶
Content:
The patience and professional approach from the staff, I'm very new to photography (DSLR) and the staff at your MK branch? Exemplary! Really have helped me, despite my inexperience, I applaud them, too many people within the service industry, are forgetting just who pays their wage and can be really dismissive towards customers, but the better you treat your customers, the more chance of returning business. 
So, I'd like to extend a big thank you to your MK branch for helping me feel less of an idiot üòÖüòé

Title: My first order from Wex
Content: My first order from Wex, and I am pleased with the good prices and delivery time.

Title: Item as ordered
Content: Item as ordered
