Title: Great product delivered on time
Content: Great product delivered on time. But it came with a six-month warranty extension offer. The information on the card was incorrect and I did not get the extention.

Title: Fast and efficient service
Content: Great website, easy to use, fast and efficient service. Lost one star for using more packaging than was necessary.

Title: Nothing wrong with Wex at all but‚Ä¶
Content: Nothing wrong with Wex at all but Parcelforce let your service down hence only 4 stars

Title: What happen to Express
Content:
Wex used to stand for Warehouse Express. On this occasion the Express was missing from the service.  Goods arrived 3 days after the dispatch notice said they should and tracking number given was invalid.

Following on: I had a telephone call from a very pleasant member of customer services and some compensation and 
apologies made.  Much reassured. Thank you

Title: WEX is maybe a good company, but is using the worst delivery couriers.
Content:
Edit:
I have to say that the customer service from Wex is excellent thou. I been contacted by them few time on that occasion. I got some small refund for inconvenience. As my drone did't arrived on time. Because of that  I have added a star to my previous review.
i will buy more stuff from them for sure but will wait till they will change the courier company.


Orginal:
I just bought the DJI drone together with the fly more kit.
Over 1k order and there was an option for named day delivery that I have used. It was supposed to be delivered the next day and on that occasion I took off from my work to be at home when the courier knocked on my door.
But....where the problem starts. Wex Photo uses the worst courier company on the market -Parcelforce! and like you can guess they did not deliver my parcel on that day when I was waiting for them. So... they probably will do that on another day but no one is going to be home so in that case the parcel will go back to the depot which actually is far far away from my home.
If only Wex could use a DPD......

Title: Good reliable company with good‚Ä¶
Content: Good reliable company with good customer service and support

Title: I love Wex, but not parcelforce
Content:
I love Wex, but please stop using parcelforce. If I‚Äôve paid ¬£5 for next day delivery, I expect DPD. Parcelforce just pop a note through my door and get me to pick it up at the post office. 

Unless you choose a different carrier I won‚Äôt be making big purchases through you online  as I would only trust DPD,UPS for handling expensive purchases.

Title: Reliable  been a wex customer for years‚Ä¶
Content: Reliable  been a wex customer for years  though you can find items cheaper on the net  I would always buy from a shop I can trust

Title: Waited till item was in stock received‚Ä¶
Content: Waited till item was in stock received next day

Title: Parcel Force delivery
Content:
I would give Wex 5 stars, but the reason I give 4 is once again their choice of delivery Parcel Force.  Next day delivery is just not in their vocabulary when it, comes to delivery with me.  Even after a text from Parcel Force giving my the delivery day, it never arrived, came a day later. The problem arises 
in that they won‚Äôt give you a delivery time like every other courier (1-2hour window) and if I‚Äôm not in Parcel Force take it back to depot and you can only collect it between 8-10am, so basically you need to be there when delivered.

Title: Used camera equipment.
Content:
I ordered a used camera body with some lenses and a flash gun. The products I ordered seemed to me to be in even better condition than stated and they were all packed very well. I emailed their customer service over the weekend regarding the contents of one package and they responded within the hour. Exceptional response time. 
One thing I would add tho is that it would be good for the customer to be able to see the contents of their order once ordered, some items come with varied additional contents, like neck strap, batteries, leads, it would be good to be able to see this after the order is made so that the missing bits (if any) can be purchased separately at the same time.

Title: Great Company
Content: Great Company, always use WEX for all my photo needs

Title: Very good customer service.
Content: Very good customer service.

Title: Backordered portion of my order handled well
Content: This portion of my order was backordered, but arrived a very reasonable 8 days later. Thank you!

Title: The order process was easy
Content: The order process was easy, packaging was spot on. Only reason 4 stars didn‚Äôt arrive on day said would arrive, day after.

Title: Good service
Content: Good service

Title: Marked down because of Parcel Force due‚Ä¶
Content: Marked down because of Parcel Force due to their unnecessary and highly irritating voicemails, which were early in the morning, wrong, and screwed up my telephone system!

Title: New Camera Gear & trad-in
Content: Purchased a range of items recently from Wex London and Wex Milton Keynes both stores provided a good level of service and I was happy with the products I purchased

Title: Good lens at a great price
Content: Good lens in decent condition - at a great price. Thank you.

Title: Great Customer Servie.Sorted the issue‚Ä¶
Content: Great Customer Servie.Sorted the issue promptly.

Title: Please keep using Parcelforce
Content: I prefer WEX because they use Parcelforce and deliveries generally arrive before 9:00 the next day. However I waited five months for this item to come back in stock.

Title: Would have been a 5 star rating save‚Ä¶
Content:
Would have been a 5 star rating save for delivery a day later than promised and delivery date on this occasion was critical to me. 
Products great and packaged well.

Title: Skywatcher 130P Telescope
Content: I'm very pleased with this Telescope, as a beginner it's simple to use, allowing me to concentrate on learning the night sky.  An expert Astronomer friend of mine carried out Collimation & made a small adjustment to the main Mirror as the locking screws had become loose in transit. It's very portable & well made for the price point.  Parcelforce messaged me with a lunchtime 1 hour time slot at 8am, but didn't deliver until nearly 6pm. 4 hours late.

Title: They got it right in the end
Content: I enquired about an expensive monitor and got a rather negative response, not normal for Wex. I raised my concerns over this and then the issue was investigated thoroughly and resolved amicably. I was offered a useful discount, which I accepted, and then my monitor was delivered very quickly.

Title: Good service
Content: Good service, quality products

Title: As a regular customer
Content: Prompt service once again.

Title: Customer service is great
Content: Customer service is great, reliable and quick.  However I've knocked off one star because I left a 3 star review for a Samyang 12mm AF lens (Fuji fit), and the review highlighted that the lens works fine on a T4 but is a bit erratic on a T5.  I went back to amend it, and discovered they'd deleted it.  I was quite surprised at that!

Title: Product arrived on time and was exactly‚Ä¶
Content: Product arrived on time and was exactly what I wanted.  The only negative was that I discovered I could have bought the same item ¬£10 cheaper on Amazon.

Title: Always very helpful and customer‚Ä¶
Content:
Always very helpful and customer focused.
My first choice for mail order.

Title: Fast service
Content: Fast service, just a slight hiccup with Wex getting my email wrong so had to phone to find out about value of trade-in gear but was sorted quickly. Otherwise would have given 5 stars. Would highly recommend.

Title: Recent Purchases
Content: In stock items were reasonably priced and delivered quickly. Out of stock item remains to be seen as not available yet

Title: Item missing from order
Content: Item missing from order, incorrect replacement sent two weeks to get correct item.

Title: Excellent experience
Content: Excellent experience purchasing from Wex photo

Title: After an initial online error
Content: After an initial online error, my purchase was confirmed and delivered. The delivery was very good by the courier and the item was well packed.

Title: Difficult buying a used lens for the‚Ä¶
Content:
Difficult buying a used lens for the first time. Made easy by their grading.
Excellent all round experience.

Title: Very good.
Content: Quick and efficient

Title: Good overall
Content: Good product at a god price Speedy delivery spoilt by chaotic Parcelforce

Title: Always had good deals with Wex
Content: Always had good deals with Wex

Title: Good service and quick delivery but I‚Ä¶
Content: Good service and quick delivery but I don‚Äôt like getting hassled about leaving a review one email should be enough

Title: Website order
Content: I bought directly from the website.What I wanted was available and delivery was quick

Title: Helpful staff
Content: Helpful staff

Title: Amazing service and products
Content:
Amazing service and products. 
The only little thing I would say would be could do with more protective packaging.

Title: Wex part of the order great as usual
Content: Wex part of the order great as usual. However on this occasion Parcel Force informed me Friday delivery which didn‚Äôt turn up until Monday

Title: Good.
Content: Good,helpful,friendly service

Title: Almost perfect
Content: Based on my personal experience, the customer service is excellent, product delivery is rather quick with updates from the delivery company. The only disappointment was to see the large amount of plastic bubble wrap WexPhoto used for packaging. It's unnecessary and very damaging for the environment. There are other/ better and more environmental friendly wraps to protect items. WexPhoto should really do more for the environment as it's their corporate responsibility.

Title: All good
Content: All good, though there was a slight delay with delivery

Title: Great service
Content: Great service

Title: Very fast delivery
Content: Very fast delivery.  Nothing wrong with the item delivered. I wondered why they are discounting the gh6 heavily but it does not have the facilities of the gh5 mkii for delivering over Wi-Fi/ telephone so there must be a gh6 mkii coming down the pike.

Title: Nobody EVER gets five stars
Content: They were very 'accommodating' to an idiot.  I already have more than I intended to buy and offered a place that might fix its issues!

Title: Product was as described
Content: Product was as described,  only thing was the delivery  that I had said over the phone that I wouldn't be at the house until 21st, but it was unsuccessfully delivered on the 17th , finally got it and pleased with the lens though.

Title: Good communication and easy to speak‚Ä¶
Content: Good communication and easy to speak with a human

Title: Camera charger for eos 550.
Content: Was out of stock but wex got me one in the end, only had a short wait.

Title: Correct goods recieved
Content: Correct goods well packaged and delivered promptly

Title: Easy ordering
Content: Easy ordering; quick delivery.

Title: Not great exactly but very useable
Content: Not great exactly but very useable.  Canon prices too high, especially a decent lens but they are good.

Title: Why not send both products together?
Content: Both products received, as ordered.  However, as one product (the adaptor) was dependent on the arrival of the other (the camera) it would make sense, be practical, save money, energy, etc if both had been delivered together rather than separately.  Yes, I know, one was out of stock at the time of ordering but the adaptor was no use without the camera, so why not send both together?

Title: Good service
Content: Good service

Title: I would have given 5 stars but I order‚Ä¶
Content: I would have given 5 stars but I order a Lensbaby Double Glass II Optic from wex photo video.com but a mix up with my payment through my bank

Title: The order went though smoothly but the‚Ä¶
Content: The order went though smoothly but the items were out of stock and took some time to arrive.   We then had a delivery followed by two the following day.   That was not a problem for me, but not quite as efficient as it might have been from the firm's point of view.   I'll continue to use WEX as I've done for many years now.

Title: A first class company but let down by‚Ä¶
Content: A first class company but let down by their delivery choice - namely Parcelforce, who enjoy a deserved rating of 1.4 stars on this site. As detailed here by other customers, their text messages and web tracking data are meaningless. If they miss their delivery date they simply advance the website data (which has stated yesterday and today that the parcel was 'out for delivery') by one day - and no text message to offer new delivery times or explanation. Given the value of the items and sensible necessity to sign for delivery this means sitting at home all day. One understands that sometimes next day deliveries can be difficult but the failure to inform customers when things go wrong is unacceptable. Find a new courier Wex - or perhaps demand a refund, which is probably the only way to gain their attention...

Title: Better than average
Content: Better than average

Title: Deliver what they promise
Content: I've used this company a number of times and I have to say that I've not had any issues with either their products, delivery times or prices. They've delivered what they promised.

Title: Prompt delivery as Stated
Content: Prompt delivery as - Stated

Title: Wrongly advertised lens!
Content:
edit: Wex reached out and made everything right by supplying the correct lens for the price originally agreed. 
---
Wrongly advertised lens which took too long to arrive and then had nothing but an apology and wasted time for my troubles.

Title: Incorrectly identified unsitable Product
Content: Very promptly accepted that an ink pack was not suitable for the Printer it was advertised as being specific for as it contained 2 (out of 6) cartridges that were NOT for that Printer.  A mistake in identification on the website.  Promptly accepted that the order was incorrectly advertised, discussed a recovery process, issued Free of Charge postage Return label  and refunded the money on receipt of the package as well as compensation.  I would of given 5 stars but the error in dispaying the wrong item for that model of printer is still showing on the website a week later.

Title: Great purchase from wex but let down by‚Ä¶
Content:
Great purchase from wex but let down by poor delivery firm Parcelforce again
Don‚Äôt rely on next day delivery coming,it takes longer.

Title: Just a very good company to deal with
Content: Just a very good company to deal with

Title: Good service and quick delivery
Content: Good service and quick delivery

Title: A good experience with a minor hiccup
Content: As normal the ordering process is easy and fast. This time however I was a little dissapointed in the click and collect service. I waited for my 'ready for collection' email which never arrived so phoned the store who indeed told me it was ready. When I checked my account I found the item had been delivered into the store two days earlier than expected with no communication. Hopefully just a one off.

Title: Ordering good, delivery poor
Content: Ordering was easy, delivery was named day (a Wednesday). However, although tracking showed the lens at the local delivery office, the lens was not delivered. I contacted Wex on Thursday - "probably due to sickness", they would check and get back to me. I called again late afternoon - no progress. It arrived on Friday, still no call from Wex.

Title: Another order from Wex very smooth‚Ä¶
Content:
Another order from Wex very smooth operation. Source the item, buy and it arrives very smooth.
The thing is there website is pretty flaky feels very old school and clumpy please üôè sort it!

Title: Reasonable price
Content: Reasonable price, it is still in the box as it is for a present in May, so cannot comment about the product.

Title: When trading with WEX your are with‚Ä¶
Content: When trading with WEX your are with photography experts who know and test trade in - give one confidence in purchasing used equipment from them

Title: The service was on time and the product‚Ä¶
Content: The service was on time and the product was as ordered.

Title: Purchased a Wex gift voucher which was‚Ä¶
Content: Purchased a Wex gift voucher which was delivered directly to recipient. Delivery was fine and very prompt. One small niggle though there was nothing included with the voucher to say who it was from. I had to tell my son prior to his birthday that it would be arriving and was from me.

Title: great service
Content: Consistent great service

Title: Out of stock‚Ä¶
Content: Excellent service but unfortunately a few items are out of stock and put on backorder very frustrating.Out of stock.

Title: A beautiful camera
Content: A beautiful camera. I borrowed my friend‚Äôs  Nikon D90 for many years and now I have my own. The camera was packed without a body cap for some reason. The dusty papery wrapping didn‚Äôt cover the sensor with dust thankfully, so I got away with it. I use a D600 for photographing paintings. The D90 is the chill camera, a lovely walk-around DSLR.

Title: Easy to deal with
Content:
Great website, very easy to use and purchase vouchers.

Trying to use PayPal was an issue, but used alternative card option instead.

Query about voucher purchase was responded to quickly.

Title: an efficient and reliable service
Content: Telephone backup is readily available

Title: Good,helpful and rapid customer service.
Content: Good,helpful and rapid customer service.

Title: Good  quick customer service & product‚Ä¶
Content: Good  quick customer service & product advice when I asked.

Title: Helpful advice
Content: Helpful advice - quick service.

Title: They can get what I need from Pentax, even if Pentax is being unhelpful
Content:
They can get what I need eventually, but I get the impression that the manufacturer, Pentax, would prefer not to serve customers in the UK. Links in documentation to download manuals don't work for UK customers and so on.
Wex got me a link to the ESSENTIAL information on a Japanese website, but this was despite Pentax customer service rather than because of. So, Wex are great, and the Pentax products are great, but Pentax customer services sees UK customers as somehow unworthy of service, as far as my experience goes.

Title: Good price, fast delivery
Content:
Good price for one of the two articles I was looking for. No deal to be had on the second with online chat, so ordered separately. 

I was impressed with the fast delivery and refreshingly appropriate packaging (compared to the wastefully overpacking competition!), so I will certainly prefer Wex over Bristol for further purchases.

Title: Picking error
Content: I saw what I wanted on the website, payment was easy and it arrived promptly.  However, the wrong product arrived (a picking error).  I contacted customer care by e-mail and received an apology.  The product was resent but again the wrong product arrived.  We agreed that I would do a swap at the local Wex sahop and I was given a gift voucher.

Title: All great but Parcelforce?...
Content: All great. I withheld a star because you use Parcelforce as a delivery courier and they are not up to scratch (i.e. they say they have attempted delivery on due date when they haven't and similar dubious techniques, which is quite unprofessional)

Title: When will out of stock items arrive?‚Ä¶
Content: Great that the items that were in stock have been supplied very quickly, however the camera strap that I ordered at the same time was out of stock, but you have the item on back order, it would be better if you could provide a best estimate of when the item is likely to arrive. Apart from this minor issue, a great service.

Title: Great list of hardware and experience staff
Content: I think they could offer a discount at times they do when they need to get rid of excess stock why not do this at all times.

Title: WEX has always been brilliant until DX
Content: WEX has always been brilliant, but most recent purchase was delivered by DX.  email arrived saying parcel had been delivered to a neighbour and "details were on card posted through my door".  Called my wife who said no card had arrived and she had been in all day.  Checked front door and found package on doormat with dent in it!  WEX had packaged the lens well and it was okay.  But wary of using home delivery again if they are using DX.

Title: Quick, professional actions
Content: They had the stock that I wanted (used grip) that fitted my camera and the description on the website was accurate.

Title: Goods (SD Card) delivered on time
Content: Goods (SD Card) delivered on time

Title: Reliable and swift service
Content: Reliable and swift service. My purchase arrived on time and in great condition.

Title: Good service and prompt delivery
Content: Good service and prompt delivery

Title: Used chat.Very helpful and quick
Content: Used chat was after a macro Len‚Äôs.

Title: Good customer service.
Content: Your returns system is efficient and speedy.  I'd prefer not to have to use it but appreciate the economics of holding expensive items in stock for customer evaluation.

Title: Just what I needed
Content: As described, quick dispatch and delivery. Packaging was a little over the top for just a lens filter and a bit too much waste, but it arrived safely and didn't get lost in the back of a huge van/lorry.

Title: Prompt delivery
Content:
Prompt delivery, everything was well packaged and arrived the same week as I ordered. 

One thing though- I'd have preferred to have everything in one box and save on the extra packaging! I can see why you might do this when you only have part of the order in stock and the customer requires the items ASAP, but definitely not necessary in this case.

Title: Excellent customer service
Content: My order came within the estimated time as promised.  It was good to talk to someone when I needed to return a filter and its replacement was sent to me urgently again as promised.  Customer service was excellent.

Title: Online purchase and delivery of a computer monitor.
Content:
[A review of the service received, not the product purchased.]

Excellent on-line ordering and delivery of a computer monitor.  I've knocked one star off purely because I was unable to specify a collection point delivery (and I live miles away from Norfolk).

Would I recommend them ?  If they have the exact item in stock that you require, then yes.

Title: As above
Content:
Have purchased many products from Wex Video over the last 15 months. And spoken to people on the phone and find that they are one of the best I have dealt with.
The only time I have been let down is when I tried to sell a item back to them being told that I would hear there verdict the next day then failing to inform me of the verdict.

Title: Good service
Content: Good service, prompt replies to all my emails. Postage supplied for sending part-exchange items Not the full 5 stars as the valuation was reduced a little when they received my part-exchange items. The new lens was delivered promptly after I agreed the revised valuation.

Title: Happy customer
Content: Happy with the website, price, and customer servixe when I had to follow up on a few points after ordering. Only negative was the fact Wex can't issue part of an order when something is out of stock if buying on a finance plan. That meant a 3 week wait for my order as a filter accessory was ou lt of stock. Apart from that though, all very good!

Title: Problem solving
Content: This has been a bit of a saga to be honest with the purchase of a printer from Wex. The first had a paper feed problem the replacement had the same problem but a change of make and the third Is working just fine. The team worked well to sort out my problems. I cannot fault them likewise I cannot hold them responsible for two faulty printers it‚Äôs just a bad batch. The way they resolved it was great and timely. Good job

Title: Managed to find lens at a good price.
Content:
Managed to find lens at a good price.
Promptly dispatched, thank you.

Title: Good product and Customer Service
Content: Small issue on delivery of what was advertised but quickly rectified plus a "good will" gesture. Main product good, ordering simple and delivery prompt

Title: Ripidy-do-dah
Content: I bought a good used piece of kit from Wex. The service, mail order was good and prompt. The item was excellent, the only let down (1 star off!), Was the price, basically what a new one would cost. I think pricing should be more realistic for used items.

Title: Very friendly customer service team
Content: Very friendly customer service team, however inconsistencies in information given depending on knowledge of operator.

Title: Service was friendly and efficient.
Content: Service was friendly and efficient.

Title: Battery faulty
Content:
Battery faulty - told to send back at my expense and inconvenience for ¬£20 - won't bother just never use again
 - Issue resolved - in the end excellent customer service

Title: delivered on time and works a treat?
Content: delivered on time and works a treat?

Title: Good trade-in
Content: Good trade-in, for another used camera. This was about good equipment, with reasonable prices.

Title: Quick delivery as per stated
Content: Quick delivery as per stated. Well packed...no issues

Title: Product and delivery good with excellent customer service
Content: Delivery good and major part of product as advertised with customer services rectifying minor  omissions to my satisfaction immediately.

Title: Returns process
Content:
I had to return an item that was unsuitable for my camera. The process was straightforward and I received a prompt refund. I would have given 5 stars if the Wex website had ‚Äúasked‚Äù
Will this fit my camera?

Title: The sales staff were verVery Helpful Staffy helpful in‚Ä¶
Content: The sales staff were very helpful in finding answers to my questions.

Title: Delivered promptly and as advertised
Content: Delivered promptly and as advertised

Title: Took responsibilty and made right
Content: I purchased a used camera backpack from WEX and it didn't quite meet my expectations due to not being in the condition advertised. I let WEX know I was not pleased and they responded by apologizing profusely and offering me a partial refund, which was satisfactory to me due to me still being able to use the backpack once I had cleaned and repaired it. I was very pleased with their customer service and taking ownership of the situation so I can recommend WEX.

Title: Good
Content: Exactly as advertised

Title: Straightforward purchase & delivery
Content: Straightforward purchase & delivery. However although the item was used goods a couple of minutes brushing to remove the storage dust would've attracted a 5 star review

Title: Lens was clean and as described
Content: Lens was clean and as described: Nikon 24-120mm f/4. Sadly in a white box - down to the original owner I guess. Delivery was prompted and as notified.

Title: Help is available
Content: Quick response

Title: Good customer service
Content: Good customer service. kind people on the phone very helpfull. Very short waiting time. Excellent

Title: Having to wait on you getting the‚Ä¶
Content: Having to wait on you getting the printer and then your delivery company messing me about lost you 1 star

Title: Insta360 X3
Content: Great communication when I had problems ordering online the team made sure my order went out the same day and it arrived the next.

Title: Good but p\x feedback could be better
Content:
Part-exchanged my D7100 + 18-200 DX lens for Z5 + Z 24-200 + FTZ II.  I'd assessed the D7100 as 9- as it showed some wear and the lens as 9 however when my kit was inspected the lens was downgraded to 9- but no reason was given and I had to email them to find out why their assessment differed from mine.  It would have been better had this information been provided in the first place.

Having said that, the rest of my dealings were excellent.  The Z5 and lens were out-of-stock but I wasn't asked to pay anything until they came into stock (by which time the listed price had gone up substantially), I was kept updated by email and when my order was available customer services processed my payment (at the original price) & arranged delivery for a day of my choosing.

Title: Delivery was very fast
Content: Delivery was very fast. The only thing to mention is too much packaging was used for my product. Box with in a box with bubble wrap for a metal ring. Small bag to fit through the letter box would have been fine.

Title: Good service and good quality used‚Ä¶
Content:
Good service and good quality used equipment at good prices (Godox V360iii) as always. 
Would have been 5*, but unfortunately the original box was missing the insides and the flash and accessories were rattling around, fortunately no damage as flashgun was in a soft case. There needed to be some kind of packing inside. Unusual for Wex as all my previous orders over the years have always been extremely well packaged.

Title: Excellent service ordered one day‚Ä¶
Content: Excellent service ordered one day delivered the next but could not open it to put in the batteries had to get someone else to do it and they struggled but when it was finally opened and the batteries in it worked great hence the four stars instead of five.

Title: More compact delivery
Content: My only complaint is that my relatively small order could have been sent in one package rather than three. A quick email could have determined the level of urgency. I am merely upping my stock levels. Otherwise great website etc etc

Title: They did what was said on the tin
Content: They did what was said on the tin, although the advisor was a little rushing when i was asking various questions about the lens

Title: Good range of equipment.
Content: Good range of equipment at a great price. Fast delivery, will shop at Wex again.

Title: Fast delivery and a great peice of kit
Content:
Fast delivery and a great peice of kit.  
ALready made a big difference....

Title: Incomplete Delivery address....lucky that I received the package
Content: The order was fine but on receiving the confirmation email I noticed that the delivery address had missed a line out but the billing address was complete. I rang immediately and was told that the courier company would be informed. The parcel was sent out with the incomplete address.  Luckily the driver dropped into the village tea gathering to ask if anyone knew where I lived.  Even more luckily I was one of the few at the tea so the parcel was delivered to my own hands.  The person I spoke to at Wex said the he thought the the delivery address had been culled from PayPal.... except PayPal has the full address... so somewhere there seems to be a systems issue.  Otherwise everything has gone well.

Title: A Moaning Customer left Smiling
Content:
I ordered 4 of the same piece and it was only after my order was sent out that I was told there were only 2 on their way as they were out of stock. A week later thre's stil no news of the other two. Poor showing when you're usually 100%.

ADDITIONAL :
After my above moaning (and one star review) I was contacted by WEX with an apology, an explanation and the further pieces sent with a goodwill refund offer too. 
Yes I was unhappy as not getting all my bits on time left me in the lurch for a job BUT I'd still rate WEX as a class act and clearly Customer Service is a priority . . even for little guys like me. Thank you for taking the time to put a smile back on my face.

Title: First one did not work no problem‚Ä¶
Content: First one did not work no problem replaced within days good

Title: Easy to order
Content: Easy to order, delivered on time and the used lens was exactly as advertised.

Title: Missing uk adapter
Content: Easy of ordering and delivery was great but talking with the first customer assistant they did not know that the camera should have an English adapter and suggested I bought a third party adapter which would have invalidate my warranty if anything had gone wrong, the second assistant dealt with the missing part perfectly

Title: The teleconverter I ordered arrived‚Ä¶
Content: The teleconverter I ordered arrived safely and in good condition, however it did not arrive on the expected day but was delivered by parcel force the following day.  This was annoying as I had waited in for the delivery.

Title: Excellent Service.
Content: Very knowledgeable, very helpful, great price and superb delivery. Would definitely use again.

Title: Great products
Content: Great products, has been great getting, delivered all safe and well and packed well. Really good, want to use Wex again!

Title: No communication about shipping once‚Ä¶
Content:
No communication about shipping once order confirmed. 
Correction - no information forthcoming from Parcel force. Did receive an email from supplier - apologies web photo.  
I don‚Äôt expect to have to track a parcel via a link daily as normally get emails sent in advance.

Title: Quick delivery of what I wanted and at‚Ä¶
Content: Quick delivery of what I wanted and at a good price, but a relatively straightforward transaction so only 4/5

Title: Purchased a used item (Profoto B10 x)‚Ä¶
Content: Purchased a used item (Profoto B10 x) which arrived within 24 hours of ordering, unfortunately there was a missing cable.  Wex were very responsive in finding a replacement C7 cable and deducting the cost from the invoice.   The equipment is now up and running.

Title: The item is absolutely fine and finance‚Ä¶
Content: The item is absolutely fine and finance was easy to sort but we had a really poor delivery service. This was ParcelForce‚Äôs fault, not Wex, but I‚Äôd hope Wex look at their courier of choice as it was such a let down.

Title: Good products
Content: Great service on the first product unfortunate for me out of stock on my second order. Not their fault I guess. Great choice of products and would purchase again.

Title: Excellent phone service
Content: Excellent, patient, friendly and knowledgeable telephone advice. No pressure to buy on the spot. In a perfect world there would be more information available about the products online.

Title: GREAT SERVICE ON THE MEMORY CARD.
Content:
GREAT SERVICE ON THE MEMORY CARD.
No stock of basics Canon spares such as 
neck strap and interface cable.
Got these by return from Castle Cameras

Title: Goods were as described & delivery was‚Ä¶
Content: Goods were as described & delivery was prompt.

Title: Overall great company to deal with
Content: Used item matched the description of condition and sent promptly, great company to deal with. I would have given 5* but the item (expensive) was delivered a neighbour and marked that I had received it, not really Wex's fault but they do choose the couriers...

Title: Pity about the website
Content:
Quality of items: Great
Delivery: Great
Cost: Reasonable
Range of items available online: Great
Ability to choose most suitable item from website: Very poor
I wanted shoulder bag (any colour, brand or price) and was faced with 24 pages (288 bags) to look through. Not able to select on size.

Title: Delivered promptly
Content: Delivered promptly. Item as described

Title: A long wait as goods in short supply
Content: A long wait as goods in short supply, but once in stock delivered quickly.

Title: Quick delivery
Content: Quick delivery. Accurate description of 2nd hand items.

Title: Extremely good service throughout
Content: Extremely good service throughout, from initial ordering through to rapid delivery, and prompt response to my reported fault with the binoculars I received.

Title: Made the purchase easy through a quick‚Ä¶
Content:
Made the purchase easy through a quick 0% interest deal over 12 months applied online.

The choice of delivery partner (Fedex) was a disaster however. They left it with an unidentified neighbour and never put an advisory card through the door. Their online details claimed it was delivered, and I had to make several follow-ups via phone and email. Given it was over the Christmas period it took almost 2 weeks for delivery.

Title: GOOD COMANY
Content:
Good service offered and easy to order online.

My package arrived late and Wex were quick to respond to my email. I expected my package to arrive on 22 Dec and received a text from Parcelforce confirming this. It did not arrive until 28 Dec after contacting both Wex and Parcelforce.

I would use Wex again and recommend there service.

Title: The item I needed was in stock
Content: The item I needed was in stock, at a reasonable price and promptly delivered. What more is needed?

Title: Ordered a 2nd hand lens
Content: Ordered a 2nd hand sigma 70-300 lens. The item was as expected but there has been some misunderstanding about the condition of the lens as it was listed and as it was in reality. The whole issue was handled swiftly and efficiently by Customer Service which issued a partial refund; I'll definitely buy again from them. Five stars for the customer service, four for the whole experience.

Title: Great product at a keen price
Content: Great product at a keen price.  A bit disappointed at the delivery time as I paid for next day, but took 3 days! However, it was the Christmas period, so I‚Äôll let WEX off.

Title: You didn't have my item in stock
Content:
You didn't have my item in stock, but you kept me informed and it eventually arrived safely.

26/12/2022 updated.
I had no problem with the item not being in stock - I'd just watched a live video talk about the lensbaby omni and I suspect that quite a few viewers went straight to the website to buy it (the only supplier in the UK).

Title: Very quick delivery
Content: Exceptionally speedy delivery given the time of year.

Title: Good service and keen prices
Content: Good service and keen prices make Wex Photo Video the supplier of choice for me.

Title: Buying a Zoom f3 sound-recorder on-line.
Content: My Zoom f3 sound-recorder was supplied at a good competitive price from a company I trust, in good protective packaging. Only 4 stars because I paid for next-day delivery (Friday), but Fedex didn't deliver till Monday. But I notified Wex, and they have offered to refund the extra postage paid.

Title: Renting Sony Lenses
Content:
I was looking to rent a lens that I needed for a project for a day and WEX had it available and helped me with all the protocol as it was my first time renting gear.
Everything was smooth the only but is the time that had to spend in the premises as it was a bit slow customer service.Other than that, very good.

Title: Always a pleasure doing business with‚Ä¶
Content: Always a pleasure doing business with WEX

Title: Good honest service
Content: Camera and lens as described, delivered on time. No problems and will definitely use Wex Photo again

Title: Great customer service and shipping
Content: Great customer service and shipping

Title: Ordered a canon r6 mkii when it was‚Ä¶
Content: Ordered a canon r6 mkii when it was first announced and overjoyed when they said it would be dispatched not too long after. Had a small payment glitch which was sorted. Unfortunately the dispatching of my order didn‚Äôt go as planned. Two days after I paid and no tracking of order being dispatched, I made a phone call and was informed that item had left the warehouse but was assured that he would get in contact personally with warehouse to clarify and if there was a problem would get in contact. 2 days came and went and still nowt. Got back in touch and the person I spoke to was really helpful and said he would email the manager as well. Soon after got email the manager and further reassurance that item would be dispatched that afternoon and should get order next day or end of week latest. And sure enough received order next day. On top of that got a free gift for the trouble I experienced. Didn‚Äôt expect that but was a lovely touch. Much appreciated. I would given 5 star if not for the slight blip. But wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to use them again.

Title: Good service.
Content:
Overall, order received on time, however, outer package slightly crushed on end, luckily, goods do not appear to be damaged.
Would use service again.

Title: Delivery
Content: Great experience

Title: Products in stock and delivered quickly
Content: Products in stock and delivered quickly

Title: The camera was just as described
Content:
The camera was just as described, although I did have to call before I placed the order, to clarify what was meant by "having dust particles inside the camera".
I called again to place the order for the camera, additional battery and memory cards, as the online order form would not let me place the order for all the items, and use a discount code which was only applicable to the camera itself.
I also had to call when I received a delivery which didn't include the camera, just the additional new items. Wex then explained that the camera would be delivered separately, as it would be sent by the Bristol branch. It arrived the next day.

Title: Use Wex quite a lot over the last‚Ä¶
Content: Use Wex quite a lot over the last several years. I‚Äôve been in film 15 years and they have been a reliable source of equipment. Quick deliver and friendly service. David DMC Media

Title: Definitely would use again!
Content:
The price of the item, the delivery time, the packaging, and the little cracker with chocolates all made the buying experience with Wex great!
If I am to be fair and honest about the lens I bought, it had dust on it and lots of it around the cap especially. None of that makes the lens function any differently, but if I was to send out this type of equipment I‚Äôd give it at very least a once-over just to make it more presentable.
That‚Äôs the only criticism I have for an otherwise faultless service.
I will definitely consider them for my next purchase‚Ä¶ which may well be very soon as we‚Äôve realised the limitations of our current camera body when trying to take more professional photos.

Thanks Wex. I hope you see my comments as constructive and fair.

Title: They should change delivery firm
Content: I requested the 'Next Working Day delivery' at the checkout. My order has been divided in two. First part of gear arrived smoothly after 2 working days. And the second after well over a week. It was not fault of Wex but rather Fedex which kept my parcel in their depot for a week and then delivered to wrong place. The shop should change delivery firm. Other than that, my experience was good.

Title: A competitive price and speedy‚Ä¶
Content: A competitive price and speedy delivery. It is a gift for Christmas so has not been unpacked and used.

Title: Fast delivery once in stock‚Ä¶
Content: Fast delivery once in stock (pre-order). Well packaged and arrived in excellent condition. Have used WEX for many years, always a fantastic service.

Title: Wex Photo brilliant, Parcelforce woeful.
Content: Have had no problems with Wex Photo; fast delivery, well packaged, item exactly as described. It's unfortunate that the one star knocked off is down to the delivery going to the wrong place, AGAIN. I'm beginning to dread ordering anything when Parcelforce is involved, they are shockers.

Title: Normally it would be more than 5 Stars
Content: Normally it would be more than 5 Stars.  However, at this period we are all contending with Postal Strike days. I am still awaiting delivery from Parcel Force for my R6 Mark II. It should have arrived on Thursday 8th, but I hope it will be delivered on Monday 12th. I suggest that Wex use an alternative delivery company when their preferred delivery company is unable to guarantee 24 hr delivery. Just put the customer first as you normally do.

Title: Everything great..
Content: Everything great... delivery was a little slower than Amazon would have achieved... but I get that's hard to compete with sometimes.... I think I waited about a week rather than 'next day'.... but it was cool. Just thought I'd mention.

Title: Used Canon 18-55 lens.
Content: An accurately described used item that fitted the bill and was sent as a gift.

Title: I found trying to pay using part credit‚Ä¶
Content: I found trying to pay using part credit quite frustrating.

Title: Prompt delivery
Content: Prompt delivery, great product as described

Title: Had the product that I wanted
Content:
Had the product that I wanted 
Although it wasn‚Äôt in stock they done their best and wasn‚Äôt too long to wait very efficient company.

Title: Late delivery
Content: Only problem was the item came the day after  it was meant to come, not wex fault , Royal Mails, it meant I stayed in all day on my day off not knowing it wasn‚Äôt going to  be  delivered, wex refunded the postal charges.

Title: Excellent Item and Customer Service
Content:
Website: Used lens equipment: Item ordered, details disappeared from the listings.  Invoice only listed the item, NOT the serial no. or any details on condition or grade of the one purchased. 

No option but to cancel; requested Wex send lens details as it leaves it open to be sent any similar lens listed. Their staff very quick to respond to negate cancellation. 

Improve : Lens serial no. should be listed on the website and on the invoice so that it can be matched. The lens was, as new, however, very clean and accurately described, certainly the best available compared to competitors. Excellent transaction and will use again.

Title: Satisfactory
Content: Satisfactory

Title: one accessory purchased, minimal fuss
Content:
- What I was looking for was easy to find, although I did place a very specific phrase in the search bar.
- It was easy to take through to purchase
- my card was verified by the bank on my phone app (2 factor verification is a good / essential move)
- it arrived when it said it would

What else is there to say?

Title: Nikon Prostaff P7 promptly delivered
Content: Nikon Prostaff P7 was out of stock when ordered but was promptly dispatched via parcelforce and delivered the following day. Not used the binocs in anger yet but look like a suitable replacement for my existing Nikon Travelite III.

Title: The online experience was quite good!
Content: The online experience was quite good, would have popped to the shop having checked on line, but not available in my local store. Took a chance and ordered, and I am now enjoying my purchase.

Title: Wex were helpful when I had a problem‚Ä¶
Content: Wex were helpful when I had a problem that needed to be resolved with a new large format printer.

Title: Friendly and helpful customer service.
Content: Friendly and helpful customer service.

Title: Really fast and efficient service
Content: Really fast and efficient service

Title: Great value
Content: Good website. Good prices. Great warranty on pre-owned. The condition of my secondhand camera is way better than the description might suggest. Only one downside, please don‚Äôt use Parcelforce - three days to deliver a next day parcel!!

Title: Can't fault WEX
Content: Can't fault WEX, despite the 6 months wait for my new camera, They informed me when it was in stock and posted next day.

Title: Only marked down to 4 stars
Content:
Only marked down to 4 stars, as an option to choose to ship everything in one go, or slit, would be nice.
Other than that, I cannot complain at all. CS promptly responded to an email question I had, Shipment was on time (well the main item, anyway. Other bits came early).

Top company. Top CS.

Title: All the people at WEX that i spoke too‚Ä¶
Content: All the people at WEX that i spoke too were excellent, the only complaint i have is that during the wait i had for an out of stock item it would have saved me having to contact if they had been a little more proactive, a quick email would have been nice

Title: Fast delivery. Good Price, but not perfect
Content: Fast delivery.  Good price.  Invoice was a bit confusing:  Why highlight in bold in the Description column 'second hand margin supply scheme' when it doesn't apply?

Title: Very Quick delivery service.
Content: Very Quick delivery service.

Title: Prompt service
Content: Prompt service

Title: Good equipment but‚Ä¶‚Ä¶..The items I have purchased (secondhand‚Ä¶
Content:
The items I have purchased (secondhand and new) over a number of years I have found to be excellent in value and quality with the exception of a ‚Äúduff‚Äù battery supplied with my 7D Mark ii, causing me to spend online another ¬£50+ urgently. My recent purchases/returns and refunds have not been as smooth as I expected with the exception of certain members of staff. The Bristol store have been exceptional (Steve). Norwich (Jack and Jonathan) have also shown good customer service, others not so. Others gave the impression that they wanted to get you off the phone as quickly as possible.
I hope this is helpful to others. LAC

Title: Delivered on time well packed
Content: Delivered on time well packed

Title: Very pleased with my quote.
Content: Very pleased with the price for my equipment and that of my purchase. Only 4 stars as the delivery of my purchase was delayed for some reason.

Title: Easy to order
Content: Easy to order, came in 3 days,

Title: Reliable as always..
Content: Reliable as always.... can recommend

Title: Amazing looking Telescope
Content:
Amazing looking Telescope, although very weighty to move around a building. 
I'm yet to use it properly yet as the weather in Wales is a bit up & down, & very cloudy in the evening. 
But looks extremely expensive.

Title: Good price and service
Content:
I recently bought a used lens from Wex. The service was smooth and the lens was delivered promptly. However, the lens did not arrive as described by Wex, and was missing a key accessory (lens hood).

After raising the issue with Wex they quickly addressed it and offered me a partial refund to cover the cost of acquiring a new lens hood. I was satisfied with this solution (albeit would've been happier if the product had been delivered as described). So, overall a great service (and competitive price), but not perfect.

Title: prompt delivery of item when ordered‚Ä¶
Content: prompt delivery of item when ordered and good info supplied

Title: SD Memory Card
Content: You had the item I wanted in stock at a decent price and free delivery is always welcome.

Title: Competitive and friendly service
Content: Great stuff at reasonable prices, good service and response period no quibble returns policy what‚Äôs not to like.

Title: Better wrapping needed
Content: First time of ordering from this company but it was made very easy. The package arrived quickly and the item was as described. The reason for only 4 stars is it could of been packed a lot better as the "bubble envelope" was torn and it was the only bit of wrapping/protection  on the item.

Title: Lens condition rating misleading
Content: Purchased a used lens online, Wex swopped the lens for another one no problem, thanks. However the replacement (rated at 9) I felt did not the reflect that rating when compared to other items I have purchased from Wex in the past.  The lens elements front and rear were dirty, the lens cap wasn‚Äôt original and there were noticeable marks on the plastic lens mount - it looked as if someone had mounted the lens wrongly at some point. The lens appears to work okay.

Title: Good range
Content: Good range, accurately described.

Title: Very good but not perfect
Content: Online purchase was problem free. If it wasn't for the poor filtering of items on the website I may have given 5 stars.

Title: Wex brilliant, shame about Parcel Force
Content:
Placing the order was easy enough and the item (a Canon printer) was cheaper than everywhere else I looked. I was disappointed that there was no Sunday delivery available for this item.  I placed the order on Friday, paying for priority delivery on Monday.  The item was not delivered - Parcel Force had too many items to handle! On Tuesday they held industrial action, so I eventually got the printer on Wednesday.
Wex's customer service agent was very helpful and, whilst they aren't responsible for Parcel Force's incompetence, given the number of complaints I've seen about delivery on Trust Pilot, I think it's about time they changed to a more reliable carrier!

Title: fast delivery
Content: fast delivery

Title: Process of purchasing was quick and‚Ä¶
Content:
Process of purchasing was quick and efficient.
The downside was that the parcel took five days to arrive via Royal Mail Parcel Service.

Title: Good service
Content: Good service

Title: Product buying experience was great but......
Content:
The buying of the item was quick easy and pain-free. I got quick and update emails checking on how things were going which was a nice touch.
When I received the box it was well-packaged and item well-protected without being over the top. 
 My only gripe was not down to Wex Photo but they did not respond to my service complaint about it at all.
Although it said next day delivery I was not really expecting this as I was aware of things out of their control causing a delay. But it sat in the local post office depot for a week before it was delivered.
I had sent in an update to Wex and suddenly it appeared but not sure if this was down to them or Parcelforce deciding it needed delivering.
Reply to response:  Again I was not expecting one straight away and that is a reasonable turnaround time.  I was just not sure if my email had made a difference or whether suddenly it being delivered was a coincidence.  All in all very happy customer and want to recommend hence the 4 stars.

Title: Good in lots of ways
Content: Good in lots of ways, but felt a little let down by lack of notification of stock untill my order was placed. As this was a gift for a birthday I was a little worried as the store couldn‚Äôt give me Evan a rough estimate of when the product would be in stock and shipped out. Caused a bit of anxiety in my part but I did eventually get my product after a couple of weeks.

Title: Purchased new camera.
Content:
Purchased new camera.
So far so good

Title: DJI2 Combo
Content: The oppertunity to get equipment I so wanted.

Title: Good prices and a responsive part‚Ä¶
Content:
Good prices and a responsive part exchange dept. were both very helpful.

Less good was the delay in letting me place my order for the new camera, which looked like an internal system glitch that took time crediting my account with the value of the trade-in.

Title: Only 4 stars
Content: Only 4 stars. Selling my used camera equipment.  Good price on the 2 x converter. Not a good price for a Canon 5DS. I had a few hundred more, elsewhere.

Title: I received my product throughout the‚Ä¶
Content:
I received my product throughout the entire transaction. 

There was some confusion with the split payment. But eventual overpayments were refunded without having to ask for it.

Title: Long term reliability
Content: I've now had a number of transactions with Wex, both via on-line and in store purchases. Whilst sometimes you just have to look at what you-re buying, I'd have to say that Wex give a better service on-line than in store! And things occasionally go wrong but Wex have been very good at sorting the issues. I don't give 5/5 so this is as good as it gets!

Title: Wex delivers but system communications undermine confidence
Content:
Wex is true to process (I traded in but had to wait two months for a new Panasonic lens release, which eventually came) and pleasant to deal with. However, their systems fail to reflect the value of a trade-in on all of the communications they sent me re the new purchase, prompting a call for reassurance that the trade-in value WOULD BE TAKEN INTO CONSIDERATION AGAINST MY NEW PURCHASE. 

Staff are helpful, explaining they all know ‚Äúit‚Äôs wrong‚Äù, but why not fix the system that undermines confidence in the integrity of their process?? It matters in the game of trust and loyalty!! And would reduce customer service calls‚Ä¶..

Update: as per their response, the final, separate attached invoice does reflect the net cost, but the email body doesn‚Äôt; so only after paying is the cost breakdown confirmed. Nevertheless, I accept the mitigation ‚Äôin the end‚Äô.

Title: Surprised at the speed the package was‚Ä¶
Content: Surprised at the speed the package was shipped! Arrived with 2 working days

Title: Great range of products available to‚Ä¶
Content:
Great range of products available to purchase. The item I purchased arrived very quickly and was exactly as expected. 
I would have rated this as a 5 star experiece but there were technical problems with the website and I had difficulty making the payment.

Title: Wex five stars, Parcel Force zero stars
Content: Ordered my camera at the end of May and have just recieved it. This was due to short supplies not Wex who have be good all the way through. I have deducted one star for Parcel Force who were meant to deliver the next day (Friday). They missed the next day due to strikes, but didn't deliver until Monday as they charge extra for Saturday delivery. Poor show Parcel Force

Title: The carrier caused a lot of stress with‚Ä¶
Content: The carrier caused a lot of stress with SMS messages on  landline . Had to rush to phone on 6 occasions for SMS delivery information that was not needed. It was worse because Wex sent two items separately . Sent filter first and lens one day later. Obviously two bought together to be used together so a bit of common sense could reduce carbon footprint and stressful remaining in for delivery slots.

Title: Prompt delivery, but website searching needs improving
Content: Ordered a filter which arrived promptly the next day. The only issue I have is that searching for the correct filter brought up many filters which did not meet my requirements. Improved searching would be beneficial.

Title: Amazing service. Awful packaging.
Content:
Amazing service. Ordered one day, delivered the next.
However, I have no idea why they sent an SD card in a 27x17x16cm box with lots of plastic to stop the sd card from moving. WHAT.

Title: USED Fujifilm XF 100-400mm f4.5-5.6 R LM OIS WR
Content:
Great service and a lovely lens I've got some great results with. Condition was as described, the only fault I could find was that the lens mount was a little loose resulting in the lens rocking on the body of my XT-4...this was addressed by simply tightening the lens mount screws.

Maybe an additional check Wex can add to their QC processes?

Other than that, great lens and would buy certainly from Wex again.

Title: Easy ordering but delivery poor
Content: Easy ordering. I would have given 5 stars but for 1 annoyance. I paid for a specific day delivery. This was ignored as they delivered next day when I was out. And a valuable package was left unattended all day. More the fault of Parcelforce I suspect but this should be made clear to the Company.

Title: I used to give 5 stars for this company‚Ä¶
Content: I used to give 5 stars for this company as the Items, Prices and Experience were the best out there, however for the past two expensive used items I have bought this year, they have been much more than their competitors London Camera Exchange.So far I have spent more than 3000 pounds with them instead of Wex. In these times of hardship, luxury Items like photography have ment that a lot more people are interested in used items and so I think that more competitive rates are needed on that department of Wex.

Title: No problems at all
Content: No problems at all
Reviewer Name: David and thanks for your order

Title: Helpful experience with my purchase
Content:
Helpful experience with my purchase. It took a couple of days longer for delivery.
Wex‚Äôs choice of Parcel Force was not great as the box arrived very badly damaged and squashed. Luckily the air cushions had saved the day.
The lost star is really down to the shipping but I notice Parcel Force don‚Äôt do well in other reviews so it‚Äôs probably reflecting badly on Wex.

Title: Camera and lens purchase
Content: Ordered by phone on 8th, order arrived on 10th. All to my expectations.

Title: Fast shipping
Content: Fast shipping, camera and lens came in good condition, however please change yours shipping boxes to some thicker one, as mine one was badly damage on one side, lucky every thing else was fine.

Title: Happy in the end
Content: Ordered an item online, but all 3 delivery attempts failed for some reason. I consulted WEX‚Äôs help team and they immediately issued a refund for the item+delivery and sent me the item for free as an apology. Did not expect that, but it was a nice gesture, so I‚Äôm very happy in the end. I am deducting 1 star for the failed delivery attempts, but I‚Äôm giving out 4 stars for the great service. Thanks again!

Title: Very uneventful.
Content: I ordered some stuff, and they sent it.

Title: Excellent products, but problem shipment
Content: The service of WEX is very good and the products are excellent. However, it was sent by Parcelforce. It was not delivered on the day I expected it to arrive. When I called the next day, I was told that industrial action caused a delay. If only someone notified me, as I had to arrange to be home to receive the parcel.

Title: Very helpful staff
Content: Very helpful staff. Initially wrong item sent but quickly rectified and correct battery sent following day.

Title: New Lens  - excellent service.
Content: New Lens  - excellent service.

Title: Good product dispatched by Wex but poor‚Ä¶
Content: Good product dispatched by Wex but poor delivery service by Parcel post.

Title: Excellent telescope, frustrating admin
Content:
My son Duncan is very pleased with his 
Sky-Watcher Mercury-607 (AZ) Achromatic Refractor telescope. He opened the package today, his birthday. I would have given 5 stars but for the admin confusion I encountered in ordering. It all went through smoothly up to & including the immediate online receipt: myself Ian Falconer & my S43 3TU billing address & Duncan Falconer at his NE13 7FG delivery address. But the 1st email confirmation gave my address as both billing & delivery. I phoned & a nice gentleman said he'd correct it. A 2nd email confirmation then gave Duncan's address as both. After a further phone call it still wasn't sorted, but as I'd paid by DD & it had the correct delivery address I gave up & left it at that & FedEx speedily delivered it. Since then I've corrected the account name to mine. So - excellent telescope, incompetent admin! But we got there in the end!

Title: All as described
Content: All as described

Title: Usual good service
Content: Ordered item arrived well packaged and earlier than expected and was exactly as described on the website.

Title: Wex was great, courier not so
Content:
I ordered a Tether Tools cable on line on the afternoon of Wdnesday, 28 Sept. Parcelforce collected it and it arrived at their Edinburgh Depot at 06.22 on Friday, 30 Sept. Disappointingly it was not put on the delivery van that day but was on the delivery van on Monday , 3 Oct which left the depot at 9.52 and I took delivery later that day. 10 out of 10 for WEX, 5 out of 10 for Parcelforce.
The cable works fine.

Title: A bit more attention to detail
Content:
I usually trust Wex as it is great to talk to a real person who is able to give expert and impartial advice. 
This would be 5 stars but I was advised wrongly that the comparison between 3 differently priced used Sigma lenses (17 -70mm F2.8 -4 DC Macro OS HSM) was based on them being identical models. They were not, and even after I had pointed out the slight variation in the specs I was assured on the second call it was still the same model. I made an order which I then cancelled when it was conceded after some investigation that I was right. After 3 calls I got what I wanted but kind of felt that at least an apology was in order. I'm pleased with the lens and the price but initially more attention to detail would have been good.

Title: Ordering  straightforward and delivery‚Ä¶
Content: Ordering  straightforward and delivery efficient.

Title: Impressed with the response from Wex after reviewing.From not wanting to shop with  them again  they have given me confidence to make them first choice.Thankyou for listening to your customers.
Content: Arrived on time.It was for a present so disappointed the box looked second hand.Could not get the marks off.So a bit embarrassing.It wasn't a cheap thing.Ok inside though.

Title: Wex Glasgow
Content: Wex, at the beginning nobody bothered about customer walking into the store. No assistance/ or customer care at the beginning at all. Few days later I visited, and one of the staff came straight with proper customer care,  he was dealing with me in the last 10 years came straight  "Tim" if I remember correctly - great experience that day.

Title: Speedy online service
Content: Ordered battery and memory card online late on Saturday arrived by Parcelforce on Monday morning, great speedy service, will definitely buy from Wex again.

Title: I traded an EOS R for an EOS 90D
Content:
I traded an EOS R for an EOS 90D, which in reallity should have been a sraight swap but my camera was undervalued due to being an import?? They are all imports are they not?
I accepted the trade reduction as I was eager to get the deal done due to holiday requirements. WEX are great communicators and helped me through each step.

Title: WEX 5 Stars Royal Mail not so good
Content: I am very happy with WEX but have removed one star because of Royal Mail Parcelforce. They never sent a notification that they were going to deliver a day earlier than original and it was only by chance that I was in.

Title: Good service despite a power-failure at‚Ä¶
Content: Good service despite a power-failure at there end!

Title: Where's the rest?
Content: Thanks for sending me the item I ordered. However it is pretty useless without the other items on my order of which there is no news.

Title: very good and helpful
Content: very good and helpful , would use again

Title: This is the second Nikon Z6 that I have‚Ä¶
Content: This is the second Nikon Z6 that I have bought from Wex, as they have very competitive prices. However, the finance option was lacking this time around ( 0% interest period not offered), so I dropped a ‚≠êÔ∏è

Title: Bit of a hiccup with my delivery of the‚Ä¶
Content:
Bit of a hiccup with my delivery of the Lumix1000 but I am sure mostly to do with parcel force.
Shipped to me on 7th but only received 14th.
Not a complaint but you should know about this.

Title: Very good stuff.
Content: Very good stuff.

Title: The usual friendly service and the‚Ä¶
Content:
The usual friendly service and the goods turned up on time.

The website used to be so far ahead of the rest. But is loosing the edge.

Title: I ordered two Kenro Negative binders‚Ä¶
Content: I ordered two Kenro Negative binders and one came slightly damaged. A quick email and reply saw another one being sent out to me immediately. Can't say enough good stuff about this level of customer service. There was no faff or messing around, straight away got it sorted. Thanks.

Title: Wex service was polite and‚Ä¶
Content: Wex service was polite and (over-)efficient. I had my OM-1 on order for 5 weeks and when it came into stock Wex were quick to let me know. However, I was away at the time and asked that the dispatch could be delayed a couple of days to give me time to get home. Unfortunately, that request (by email and phone) was ignored and the camera was sent out immediately. Parcelforce did redeliver thank goodness so I am now happy!

Title: got there in the end‚Ä¶
Content: Took quite a while for the item purchased to come into stock, but got there in the end

Title: Great service as always
Content: Great service, delivered earlier than expected. Have been a customer for a while now, always a pleasure.

Title: Good website
Content: Good website

Title: As usual arrived promptly and all in‚Ä¶
Content: As usual arrived promptly and all in good order.

Title: The assistance given by staff at Wex‚Ä¶
Content:
The assistance given by staff at Wex Whitechapel was excellent, especially Sabrina.
I've not given Wex 5 stars though as sadly they are not really able to support professional photographers (like Calumet did prior to Wex taking them over).

Title: Wex very good
Content: Wex very good service from start to delivery. Item as described. Would use again.

Title: Very helpful
Content: Very helpful. Answered my online query. Only 4 starts because they didn't have all the quipment I wanted in stock.

Title: Part x went very well
Content: Part x went very well, very friendly customer services but felt that the amount offered for my camera was too low. Went with it anyway because if was convenient.

Title: Wex is trustworthy
Content: Wex is a well established company with a good reputation.

Title: This would have been a five star score‚Ä¶
Content: This would have been a five star score but my request for a specific day  (which I paid extra for) was missed out and caused some inconvenience by having to be in on a day I hadn't planned for.

Title: Canon lens purchase
Content: Item was delivered a day earlier than expected so an extra star. They sent the item I was buying, there was nothing wrong with it either. I believe this company to be reliable.

Title: Order worked flawlessly and delighted‚Ä¶
Content: Order worked flawlessly and delighted to get a thank you for your order email the following day after delivery.  I would give 5 stars but need to test the service again before committing :)  However, I will be buying from them again.

Title: Great value but...
Content:
Purchased some used Olympus lenses, all were in better condition than described and excellent value for money.
My only criticism is that my goods arrived the day before I had requested and delivered to an elderly neighbour who wasn't expecting them.

Title: Good service from them
Content: Good service from them after crappy Oly lenses broke.

Title: Product was great
Content: Product was great delivery by parcel force not so great!

Title: My purchase was well priced
Content: My purchase was well priced, promptly delivered and we'll packed.

Title: Good camera
Content: Good camera. Some scratches to rear screen which I didn't expect but it's a used body so I suppose it is par for the course

Title: Product as described at a competitive‚Ä¶
Content: Product as described at a competitive price. All runs pretty smoothly except the delivery, mainly because they use Parcelforce, which in our village at least is notorious as a complete nightmare. If they used a proper delivery company then I'm sure they would get 5 stars but their choice of courier lets them down. I notice that on Trustpilot Parcelforce is rated with 1 star (you can't leave less) by 42% of 44,000 reviewers!!!!! That's unbelievably bad. I really think Wex should reconsider putting their reputation in the hands of such an unprofessional partner.

Title: Among the best
Content: Good stock, service is fine, prices competitive. One of the best UK photo suppliers.

Title: Packaging could been better
Content: Packaging could been better, rear element of lens was not clean.

Title: Almost Happy Customer
Content: I am very happy will my new lens it works really well.  Only problem, the delivery driver by the name of Brian arrived early, we were not in so he put it in our garden wastebin, his card only just showed in the letter box, it was only by luck that my husband checked it before we put it out for collection.

Title: Always happy with the service from WEX
Content: Always happy with the service from WEX, and this occasion was no exception. Why a four star? I requested delivery on a particular day and soon after the order was accepted I was notified it would be delivered a day earlier, in the end it didn't matter as the delivery was delayed and I'd made it home in time to receive itüòÅ

Title: Consistently Good
Content:
Used WEX several times over the years.  
Good website with good info.  
Easy ordering.  
Very fast delivery. 
Pricing fair->good
Useful support info also via website and email.
Never had an issue!
def. recommend+++ :)

Title: Good but...
Content: One star lost because the used camera I bought was missing its charger and that the original box it came in was full of rubbish some of it not even from the camera eg. A clothes tag size 6, a cable not from the camera. Just makes you feel not much care is taken with used items. The charger issue was promptly solved by the aftersales team.

Title: Very quick if they have the stock
Content: Very quick if they have the stock

Title: Item arrived on time and as stated
Content: Item arrived on time and as stated

Title: A very speedy service provided
Content: A very speedy service provided, would have given them 5 stars, but, unfortunately a free lens worth ¬£149 advertised as part of the deal, was out of stock and still not yet received, no expected date of delivery given and no guarantee of ever getting it. Very disappointing as it was a big part of what influenced me to use this company.

Title: Thank Wex have always been very helpful‚Ä¶
Content: Thank Wex have always been very helpful and courteous. The staff have a good knowledge of products and are able to give help to enquiring customers.

Title: Service
Content: Delivery was prompt and the cancellation for a delayed item was straightforward.

Title: R3 late delivery
Content: R3 late delivery

Title: Happy Customer
Content: I have bought photographic equipment from WEX over a number of years and never had cause ti complain.

Title: Totally excellent experience from Wex with one exception
Content: Totally excellent experience from Wex, with one exception, possibly beyond their control. I ordered a second hand camera, it was a reasonable price, perfectly described, arrived very quickly, and was just what I wanted. So, very very pleased with the camera. So what was the glitch? The delivery company left the camera on my doorstep, 3 yards from a busy road, in plain sight, where it remained for about 6 hours until I returned home. It could easily have been stolen, it was lucky that it wasn't, I have had goods stolen before from the doorstep. Not acceptable behaviour by the delivery company. Wex get 5 stars, the delivery company, hmmm, you decide!

Title: On the whole super pleased
Content: Excellent prices, very fast shipping and delivery, provided exactly what I needed. I would definitely trust them again in the future. My only gripe was the packaging... three times as much as was needed, it was like a Russian Doll set of boxes and totally overkill which I don't think is particularly environmentally friendly.

Title: Wex were brilliant
Content:
Wex were brilliant, given the circumstances - a severe national shortage of stock for the new DJI drone BUT as soon as it was available I received it the next day. The only reason this isn‚Äôt five stars is because there was a lack of updating on what was happening at their end, I had to call several times to enquire where things were, only to be told they didn‚Äôt have any idea when stock was arriving and that I was currently on a waiting list for orders and that when stick did come in, it would be allocated first come first served, but they couldn‚Äôt tell me where I was on the list ??? Which was very odd as they were telling me they had a list and would use it ! - just a simple text message / group email each week to advise (if only to re-affirm the fact they were still awaiting stock) would have been most helpful. 
But - will I recommend and do business with them again - DEFINITELY

Title: Helpful staff but gave me space to‚Ä¶
Content: Helpful staff but gave me space to browse on my own too.

Title: No free delivery option.
Content: The package arrived unexpectantly as there was no tracking link on the e-mail I received. It stated on the website that free delivery was available, but at the checkout, the only options were chargeable.

Title: Received full refund yesterday
Content:
Update: 12/07/22

Received full refund yesterday, after review was published here. Updating my rating from 3/5 to 4/5.


------

If not for poor return experience it would be 4/5 stars. I was charged with additional fees for a personal return to the store for an order that was shipped in two parts (which I didn't request - to be split in the first place) - I assume additional deduction was just for that.

Otherwise everything was alright.

Title: Computer problems, but good staff
Content:
Negative: The company has a 'software problem': the ordered item was sent to the billing address and not to the delivery address. 
Positive: They were responsive to both email and telephone and did put the issue right.
The price was good, and (importantly) this isn't Amazon- so I assume that they pay their UK taxes :)

Title: The service I had was excellent and‚Ä¶
Content: The service I had was excellent and everyone was friendly. However, the incorrect item was delivered and, for me, it was awkward to sort out the problem and get the correct item. A little more time spent checking the item to send should have stopped the error.

Title: Not bad at all
Content:
The company is pretty good, Staff are helpful and polite. Got exactly what I was after and they explained my pre-oreder process well.
My only reason for not giving 5 stars is simply because I was not updated when my camera was availible and I had to chase this up myself, if i had'nt I may have had to wait longer than I needed to.

Title: Always good
Content: Always a good experience while shopping at Wex I‚Äôve found over the years.

Title: Good selection, not the cheapest
Content: Good selection, speedy delivery. Not the most competitive prices.

Title: Ordered online an Epson projector for‚Ä¶
Content:
Ordered online an Epson projector for delivery to a friend's address but when I checked this hadn't happened - this was probably a combination of my unfamiliarity with your system and a possible system quirk. I phoned in and your staff quickly put things right and promised dispatch for overnight delivery which they did.
However Parcelforce failed to send it out for delivery next day (a Thursday) and also on Friday. Of course when they finally tried to deliver on the Saturday nobody was in but they did finally deliver on the Monday. This item wasn't particularly urgent but what is important is certainty of when it is going to be delivered - no communications were received from Parcelforce although they did leave a card after the delivery attempt.
My previous experience with Parcelfarce(not involving Wex) is that they are one of the least satisfactory delivery companies and I would suggest you might look elsewhere for a new delivery partner.
Tony Eaton 07547431659

Title: Overall a really good experience
Content: The website was easy to use.  My new camera and lens were delivered promptly.  And I even received a follow up email offering help with setup, which was a really nice touch.  The only thing preventing me from giving 5 stars was that the Olympus "camera and lens kit" outer box was ripped, and inside that I found the Olympus camera box was scratched.  I wouldn't expect this on a brand new high quality camera kit.  But apart from that the overall experience was really good, and I'll definitely shop with Wex again (in fact I already have, as I needed a camera bag for my new kit).

Title: Everything fine at the Wex Photo Video‚Ä¶
