Content: Everything fine at the Wex Photo Video end; very quick turnaround.  Only problem was using Parcelforce to get product to me; it took four days to arrive.  Other couriers are quicker, eg. DPD.

Title: Darkroom materials
Content: Item ordered and sent! That's it.

Title: They resolved my issue promptly!
Content: They resolved my issue promptly!

Title: Wex is my number 1 go to place for the‚Ä¶
Content: Wex is my number 1 go to place for the majority of photography equipment. Very fast order order turn around and dispatch. Brilliant! So why not 5stars? Because you insist on using ParcelForce for delivery which takes days to fulfil. They don‚Äôt seem to  work weekends and don‚Äôt even deliver properly if you‚Äôre out. I had to fetch my ¬£5 item (which could have gone in the post box ), from the post office which cost additional time and money! It would have been quicker to collect in-store.üôÅ

Title: Delayed delivery
Content: Usually a great device from Wex. On the most recent occasion I needed a replacement for a broken camera body quickly. The website promised next day delivery but that didn't happen. Instead of appearing on Friday my order arrived on Monday. A little disappointing.

Title: Order for a DJI mini 3 Pro
Content:
The order has been received in good order, so I want to update my rating from 2 to 4 stars. It is still annoying that Wex Photo Video accepts orders without having any idea of delivery dates.
=============

I have placed an order for a DJI mini 3 Pro more than a month ago. The only news since, after reaching out to support, is that they do not know when the delivery will happen. Days, months, years?

Title: Almost Perfect
Content: Four stars because everthing worked out fine in the end. The only problem was I requested delivery on a Tueday because I knew I would be at home all day but the lens arrived a day early and it was fortunate that I was able to accept this very expensive item rther than it being left on the doorstep or whatever.

Title: Satisfied overall with level of service‚Ä¶
Content: Satisfied overall with level of service especially efficiency of collection from and delivery to me. Only negative would be the complexity of the ordering and confirmation of purchase process which I had to iron out by follow up emails. However, I would be happy to trade again with the company and to recommend them to friends.

Title: Z9 purchase
Content: Got an excellent trade-in towards the Nikon Z9. Delivery of that took months, but that's not Wex's fault.Staff in Leeds store very helpful.

Title: Bought an SD card
Content: Bought an SD card. Wex responded promptly and the item arrived quickly. Many thanks.

Title: Always efficient,
Content:
Always efficient,
Order arrived well pack3d and on stimated time.

Title: Would have been 5
Content: Would have been 5, but I bought two items and the second arrived after the first.

Title: two questions asked one answered
Content: I asked two questions and got an answer on one .Had to go back to get that answered . Otherwise fine .

Title: Poor communication about status of order
Content:
Managed the sale and despatch of the camera I ordered.
Waited nearly four months for my order. Not very good at keeping customers up to date about the status of the order.

Title: Your website guided me to an incorrect‚Ä¶
Content: Your website guided me to an incorrect and poorly described item which was frustrating, but the sale and inevitable return process nonetheless went smoothly.

Title: Prompt deliver(very)
Content: Prompt deliver(very), Excellent condition,all good

Title: Hello
Content:
Hello. I paid to have the delivery on a set day, knowing I would be at home. It came a day early! Luckily I was in but just about to go out as planned otherwise  I would have been in the cycle of organising a new delivery.
All well that ends well but come have been awkward.

Title: I purchased a extension tube for my‚Ä¶
Content: I purchased a extension tube for my Canon camera/lens, it was second hand however it is in excellent condition, the price was competative and it arrived the next day!

Title: The product probably is brilliant as I‚Ä¶
Content:
The product probably is brilliant as I have ordered many things from Wex before and everything always was spot on!
This time it was not delivered 
I had so many deliveries to my place in recent days and this is the only one that was not delivered , not sure what happened. 
It was dropped off at local post office which is mostly closed.
I attempted to visit it 3 times and so far had no luck.
Obviously delivery service fault.
Thanks delivery guys 
V

Title: Great service but missed a fault on used lens
Content: Ordered a used lens (9+ rating) and it arrived quickly and well packaged. I was delighted with the lens but on testing, it didn't focus under certain conditions. The returns process was very easy and I was refunded immediately. 10/10 for their service and prices just a pity they missed the fault during their testing and I was left  very disappointed.

Title: The service from Wex as a website was‚Ä¶
Content:
The service from Wex as a website was really smooth but the one problem I experienced was when I made payments through PayPal it automatically copied the address from PP without any option to edit it later on at Wex  Where things got problematic is that my apartment number wasn‚Äôt present in the PayPal address and the parcel got sent back multiple times due to this problem. 
So people paying through Paypal please update the right address first and then process it through wex

Title: Great service
Content: Great service

Title: Wex are generally pretty good and do‚Ä¶
Content:
Wex are generally pretty good and do usually do what they say they will. But last time I wanted shipping delayed 24hrs, as I was planning to be out the following Monday. So, confident that a Tue delivery had been agreed, I was surprising to find a courier delivering Monday (luckily I was still in) so it wasn't a  problem.

Learning - don't count on your best wishes for freighting to be observed. In fairness it isn't just Wex. Other dealers have also done similar previously. I guess they have little real opportunity to influence their 'back office team' and manage logistics to suit customers.

Title: Outstanding purchase and very knowledgeable sales assistant But?
Content:
The complete purchase process and delivery was outstanding. Discussed my requirements at about 3pm and my A7iv arrived before 10am the following day. 
PartX and payment process was not good and needs to be assessed. Several calls with one lasting 13mins on hold. All sorted now but it should have been five stars.

Title: Service was perfect from start to‚Ä¶
Content: Service was perfect from start to finish and even got a 20% discount voucher for future purchase. The lens is in the condition as described if not better so I am very happy

Title: Good service absolutely no complaints
Content: Good service absolutely no complaints

Title: I have visited wex Birmingham several‚Ä¶
Content:
I have visited wex Birmingham several times now, each time different people have served me.
Their knowledge and advise has been helpful. 

On one occasion I ordered the wrong item on their website, I took it into store to explain my mistake and changed it for the one I intended to purchase.

This was done without fuss and or loss to myself.
I can't  fault the service given and the expertise displayed by the staff in Birmingham. 
They are a credit to the company.

Title: Great product, appalling courier service.
Content: Product absolutely fine. However your carrier Parcelforce are an absolute shambles. Tracking said out for delivery Thursday. Not delivered taken back to depot. Friday never left their Exeter depot,Saturday still in depot. Eventually delivered Sunday. Weekend of photography missed due to their appalling service. Please change your courier or I will have to take my business elsewhere.

Title: Very easy to deal with
Content: Very easy to deal with, my only concern was that after I sent my equipment I got the final quote which was less than the original quote which I accepted but there was no explanation as to why it was reduced, other than that the new camera I chose was in stock and delivered free the following day so overall a simple process.

Title: Goods not received quickly
Content: Goods not received; did not arrive on the day mentioned at time of ordering, and told on chasing the goods that tracking number not relevant as I live in a remote place (which I don't - where I live is Parcel ForceZone 1 - not the Scottish Highlands). However, they did resolve this very amicably and apologised once the problem was identified...thanks

Title: Purchased Billingham Bag from WEX
Content: Purchased Billingham Bag from WEX - transaction completed easily and the item delivered promptly.

Title: Great but delivery times are misleading
Content:
I have had a few things from Wex new and second hand and they are tryst worthy and the kit is as described.
The only reason this is 4 stars is the web site says next day delivery on things and then it is sent Parcelforce that doesn't operate on the weekends etc.
If the website said that it would not be an issue, bit we are all so used to Amazon saying it will come tomorrow and it does, that I don't really feel you can not meet that standard and get a full 5 stars.

Title: Great service from purchase onward
Content: Great service from purchase onward. Only problem was that I couldn't redeem my gift voucher for an online purchase. Had to call Wex. Otherwise Gerry happy with my purchase.

Title: The service from WEX itself is first‚Ä¶
Content: The service from WEX itself is first class, no complaints there. Unfortunately their choice of courier  - Parcelforce - is not so good.  On the day of delivery Parcelforce's "time-slot" is 7.00 am to 6.00 pm!  "Customer service" does not seem to enter Parcelforce's thought processes unlike companies such as DPD which advise you, early in the day, of a one hours time slot.

Title: Ridiculous packaging size.
Content: The product and service was excellent but I was amazed to find that a single camera battery was packaged in a box 29cm x 21cm x 19cm. Surely Wex must have access to smaller boxes (I accept that padded envelopes may not be the best for posting batteries)

Title: Great product and a fair price
Content: Great product and a fair price. 0% finance details were not as clear as they could be which resulted in a short delay. Totally my fault and Wex were amazing at helping me out. The item was a gift and it still arrived in time, thank you.

Title: One item not in stock ,probaly not‚Ä¶
Content: One item not in stock ,probaly not their fault but enough not to give 5 stars

Title: Excellent Service
Content: Excellent Service & polite and efficient staff.

Title: Reliable as ever.
Content:
Reliable as ever.

Items delivered promptly and as ordered, no errors.

Satisfied once again so Thank you Wex.

Title: Excellent service but had to chase for updates
Content: Great choice on offer, prompt and friendly customer service. Only lost a star because one of the items (not in stock) delayed the order for a couple of months and there was no contact from Wex during that time. When contacted, staff were happy to provide updates.

Title: Rycote micro windjammer
Content: Delivery very fast and great price.

Title: Good retailer, great product, poor delivery....
Content: Good price, quick delivery, excellent product. The only downside was that Parcelforce did not find me at home at around 10:30 am so they took the parcel to a post office five miles from my home and did not get it there until 5:30 pm. I had to make two visits to the post office to get the product.

Title: Sustainable transport
Content:
The tripod head arrived earlier than I expected - excellent. 
However, this robust device was in the manufacturer's box, 345 x 135 x 120.mm, in a larger box 470 x 315 x 325 mm, surrounded by non-recyclable plastic, Then it came in one of several diesel vans delivering to this road that morning. Perhaps not a reflection on Wex, but more on the environmental unsustainability of the current mail order delivery system.

Title: Refunded a faulty used lens without quibble
Content: I ordered a second-hand high-end lens for my Fuji camera. The lens turned out to have a major fault (blurry image), rendering it lower quality than even the cheap kit lens that came with the camera. That issue should have been flagged up in quality control, when the lens was tested. Hence losing one star. This was my first time buying used goods from them, so I don't know how common this is. However, after informing them of the issue, Wex accepted an immediate return for refund, without quibble, and at no cost to me.

Title: Good customer service and good range of‚Ä¶
Content: Good customer service and good range of products. Product range may not include some products. Prices are quite good and pretty much set the "standard" for equipment pricing for several well known brands.

Title: Just got it out the packaging on charge‚Ä¶
Content: Just got it out the packaging on charge thanks

Title: Ordered 4 ink cartridges only got 3
Content:
Ordered 4 ink cartridges for my Canon Pixma Pro 10s. Three came quite quickly. Still waiting for the fourth.
I only became aware of the out of stock cartridge after the order was finalised. 
If It was shown as out of stock I would have delayed the order. In the meantime I have paid for 4 cartridges but can‚Äôt do any printing.

Title: Was a positive experience
Content: This was a positive experience. When there was a system problem concerning delivery address, customer service were quick to resolve it. If an issue concerning return was handled adequately, it would have been a 5star.

Title: Always like to use Wex services,really‚Ä¶
Content: Always like to use Wex services,really good to deal with too!!

Title: Impressed with quality of my kenko macro tubes‚Ä¶
Content: Impressed with quality of my Kenko macro tubes. Only thing I would suggest is a bag or case for them.

Title: Quick delivery of my CPL filter
Content: Quick delivery of my CPL filter

Title: Happy photographer
Content: Really good from making order to recieving it. Will use again with no issue.

Title: Excellent service
Content: Saw an offer for free next day delivery but couldn't find it on their website. Emailed them with a query and they explained exactly how to place my order. Very happy with their service.

Title: An amazing printer Excellent.
Content: An amazing printer. A bit advanced for me.

Title: Would have put 5 stars ,but paid for‚Ä¶
Content: Would have put 5 stars ,but paid for next day delivery but five days later and lots of phone calls to parcel force costing nearly as much as the item i purchased,item was excellent.

Title: Fast service even itam was not in‚Ä¶
Content: Fast service even itam was not in stock. It was there the next day.

Title: Good company
Content: Good, reliable company - if order is out of stock or a special order then it would be good to know this to save having to ring and enquire a few weeks down the line when the item still hasn‚Äôt arrived

Title: Good buying experience
Content: Good buying experience. Would have been nice if the web interface  did not make me tick every weight bellow one that was acceptable for me when selecting product.

Title: Good overall service
Content:
Easy to navigate website.
Even standard delivery is fairly quick (3/4 working days).
Only irritation is that when searching the website on a mobile device - if you click on a product for more details, and then go back, it takes you back to page 1, of the search results, rather than the page the item was on, which can be quite annoying if there are a large number of pages.

Title: I did not get the camera I ordered and‚Ä¶
Content: I did not get the camera I ordered and when I called the shop, I was told that I actually got a better camera than the one advertised. As I have no way of checking up, I have to take their word. This should not happen. At leased they should have got in touch with me to tell me before sending the camera out. I haven't had a chance to test the camera yet, but I'm looking forward to my first shoot.

Title: Good service and would use again
Content: Good service although delay of one item (I sent two packages) didn't help. My vote for two items to trade in became two items and some emails appeared out of sync with earlier phone calls. In the end all worked out and I got an OK trade in for a new lens. Would use again

Title: Mostly a very positive review
Content: Delivery times are a bit hit or miss but ive never not got a product, ive bought. All orders so far have come well packed, and in good order. And all products are well priced really pleased Glasgows new shop is up and running I can now go in person order or collect after receiving excellent advice

Title: Used SmallRig L-bracket
Content: Very happy with my used SmallRig L bracket I ordered from Wex Photographic- it was in much better condition than I previously thought, arrived when it was supposed to have been using it every day since üëçüèª

Title: A mini stand was mentioned in the‚Ä¶
Content: A mini stand was mentioned in the instructions, but was not included in the package. The purchase itself was straightforward and was delivered ahead of stated time. all was in good order

Title: Easy to shop and reasonable prices.
Content:
Easy to shop and reasonable prices.
The only downside was the Royal Mail parcel service initially giving a delivery day which did not arrive until the following day.

Title: Excellent service
Content: Excellent service, but expensive.

Title: Overall great
Content: Handled a return very effectively/promptly but rather miscued a sale of camera case, stating it was due 5 - 7 days but in actual fact it 2 - 3 weeks. Responded quickly when contacted,  overall - great

Title: Great next day service
Content: Great next day service. Product was competitively priced. Only negative was that rubberised grips looked 'tired' and 8.5 would have been a more realistic rating as opposed to the 9 it was advertised at.

Title: Lens arrived fast and as described
Content: Lens arrived fast and as described.  I had a lot of Choice, pity I chose one without a hood as that may offer a little protection when out and about.  Have had a few lovely shots already so am happy with my  purchase.

Title: the deal was fair
Content: the deal was fair, just a bit loose on the mode dial lever ottttherwise ok

Title: Excellent pre-sales service and‚Ä¶
Content: Excellent pre-sales service and generally competitive pricing. I marked them down 1 star because they are generally not competitive on trade-in values.

Title: Good service
Content: Good service

Title: Good service.
Content: Very easy ordering and prompt delivery. Knocked off one star for putting a camera battery in a ridiculously large box.

Title: Top quality used Canon 24-70mm f2.8L II‚Ä¶
Content: Top quality used Canon 24-70mm f2.8L II lens, exactly as described by Wex. The trade in price offered was lower than I'd hoped for, but I'm very pleased with my new lens and it's already begun paying for itself, which is nice.

Title: Goods arrived as stated packed well
Content:
Goods arrived as stated packed well 
Would buy from Wes photo in the future

Title: Very helpful
Content: Very helpful. Checked my lens to ensure all ok. Prompt delivery next day. Will visit store to buy a bag as I would rather try before buying.

Title: First time buyer after a friend told me‚Ä¶
Content:
First time buyer after a friend told me of WEX.
I can honestly say it has been the easiest  piece of kit I have bought.
The description and condition are accurately  described and I have no doubt will be using them again

Title: Having use wex  a few times I have‚Ä¶
Content: Having use wex  a few times I have always been very happy with the service I have received when I have bought from there online service delivery has always been on time so would recommend them

Title: Easy ordering and efficient service.
Content: Easy ordering and efficient service.

Title: Excellent
Content: Excellent. Order arrived very quickly even though I had free delivery, Also, best price I could find for Canon Ink.

Title: fast shipping
Content: fast shipping, reasonable prices. OK!

Title: BenQ SW240 Pro 24" Monitor
Content:
The BenQ monitor was received within a couple of days of ordering. It was well packaged and safely delivered.
Looking at the instructions for the connections to make to my Dell laptop there was a lack of clarity about the cables supplied. The Quick Start installation manual does not include any text but shows a choice of up to 6 cables - only 3 were included in the box and none of them were able to connect to my laptop which has USB-C ports.
I ordered a Dell multiple port adapter to connect HDMI/DP and another cable connector to plug into the monitor. 
With this set up I finally managed to get the monitor to work - but at an extra cost of ¬£48.00! 
I think that BenQ should supply a connector cable which is compatible to the latest USB ports that have been in use on laptops for at least 18 months. 
i am now delighted with the screen quality and the screen hood that was included in the price.

Title: Top service
Content: Top service, dispatched promptly, arrived next and a good price too.

Title: Always good service
Content: Always good service, when they have the product / item in stock. My local store (Birmingham) never seems to have any stock it is always in Norwich of London. Which is a shame. But otherwise excellent service.

Title: Purchased gift vouchers for a present
Content:
Purchased gift vouchers for a present. Had them sent direct to recipient as had left it a bit late. Would have preferred to have e vouchers which I could have emailed to him.
Disappointed that it said they could only be used in store or over the phone and not online. 
However they arrived, not sure if in time for the birthday but it was on a Sunday and I've been told they've been spent already.

Title: Excellent customer service
Content: Good catalogue and order was delivered quickly. Slight mixup with the availability of one item, but Wex's customer service was great and very rapid at sorting that out, on a Sunday no less!

Title: Shipment was delayed but otherwise a good experience
Content: I had to wait for the item as it wasn‚Äôt held in stock but to be fair I was kept fully informed and payment wasn‚Äôt taken until the item had been shipped.

Title: Managed to resolve a delivery issue easily
Content:
While the site wasn't entirely clear on the Saturday delivery rules (I ordered on a Friday within the time required for 'next day' delivery, and selected Saturday delivery, thinking the same cut-off would apply, but the 'following' Saturday was placed on my order for delivery), Customer Services were quick and helpful sorting that out, and I managed to get my item a few days later, instead of waiting for the next weekend.

Arrived in perfect condition.

Title: Great shop let down by Londons branches‚Ä¶
Content: Great shop let down by Londons branches ability to never answer a phone call or e mail. I sent e mails re 2 or 3 items which were never answered.

Title: Delivery 'some time before 6pm' - Not good enough!
Content:
Great product at a great price but the delivery notification of 'sometime before 6pm' was a pain in the proverbials. 
The delivery arrived okay, but I had to sacrifice a whole day waiting in for it. 
Other companies can give a morning or afternoon window, or even a one hour window, so why can't you?
It would have been five stars but for that.

Title: Excellent service and delivered on time
Content: Excellent service and delivered on time

Title: Very pleased with lens, disappointed with delivery
Content: Very pleased with lens, slightly disappointed with delivery. It was supposed to arrive on a friday but did not get to me until monday, even though your advert stated something like 'order within the next hour and receive if by friday'

Title: Excellent condition
Content: I am very pleased with my recent purchase, ordering was easy, for a second hand camera it is in excellent condition, delivery was very quick around 3 days.

Title: Thought I'd try your pre-owned lens to‚Ä¶
Content:
Thought I'd try your pre-owned lens to save a bit. Wish I had the peace of mind of buying new now, if it wasn't for the clutch locking the focus ring, I would not have been happy with my purchase.
Would was my money back if it was brand new. The ring adjusts to infinity too quickly for focusing accurately.  Have to rely on clutch to lock on the nearest setting. 
Otherwise, this Fuji xf 16mm 1:1.4 is a very impressive for an amateur like me 4* not 5 though!

Title: Good people and helpful
Content: Good people and helpful, only the lack of stock parts stopped a 5 star

Title: The item arrived on time even earlier‚Ä¶Good
Content:
The item arrived on time even earlier than expected and it‚Äôs precisely what I ordered.
Good purchase I must say.

Title: Good service let down by delivery company
Content: Very happy with Wex service, but your choice  of carrier Parcelforce very poor no communication with me about deliver except we have your parcel ! And the next time was card through  my door saying my parcel was left at the town post office..

Title: Great service, disappointing packaging.
Content: I ordered a camera battery, which arrived promptly, as promised. My only gripe is the packaging. While I am pleased the battery was protected in transit, it was the size of a matchbox and arrived in a box the size of two shoe boxes and surrounded by plastic. So as not to mislead, the box the battery was in from the manufacturer was about the size of a box of extra long matches.

Title: Excellent for photography
Content: Wex has an excellent collection of all things photography. In my case the product was dispatched directly from the importer so Wex did not have control over the turnaround time and thus it took longer than I hoped. However on previous occasions when Wex was in control all went smoothly and as quick as possible. Wex also has a fantastic collection of 2nd hand gear, however the website for searching among the 2nd hand gear could do with improvement - have a look at the competition for the 2nd hand gear!

Title: Great service
Content: Great service, good product.  Loses a star because Parcel Force took getting on for a week to deliver.  I completed the order with Wed on the phone and I was assured I‚Äôd get texts when delivery was due.  I spent 4 days watching PF move the status around untruthfully (‚Äòdelivered‚Äô, then ‚Äòrecipient requested later date‚Äô) finally, the parcel arrived with the status still on ‚Äòat depot‚Äô.  Very glad it wasn‚Äôt a ¬£3k camera.

Title: One star to the Parcelforce
Content:
One star to the Parcelforce
The Wex and product are both five stars but the Parcelforce is zero stars. It takes me one week to deliver my parcel. The tracking said they attempt to deliver but nobody answers. However, I wait at my home for the whole day. No one comes to deliver my pracel.

Title: Always good value for money
Content: Always good value for money. Quick delivery. Have purchased many times.

Title: Nice paper vouchers delivered in a‚Ä¶
Content: Nice paper vouchers delivered in a paper holder. Only 4 starts, as it would be great to be able to buy e-vouchers as well to e-mail to recipients.

Title: Fast delivery
Content: Fast delivery. Refurbished Items in great condition.

Title: Good
Content: The prices are competitive and I have been pleased with the delivery service.

Title: Overall I had a great experience with‚Ä¶
Content: Overall I had a great experience with Wex Photo Video. There was a severe delay on my order and I initially had to prompt them for information on when I'd receive it. However, after this, they kept me fully informed on the progress of my goods. I like using this company because you get a real person at the end of the phone and the staff are super helpful and friendly.

Title: A tripod.
Content:
I ordered a tripod over the telephone and it was delivered in fine
fettle by WEX.
Thank you.

Title: Bought a Nikon d7100 really pleased‚Ä¶
Content: Bought a Nikon d7100 really pleased with the purchase the staff were very helpful giving information about the camera

Title: Quick service and fast delivery
Content: Quick service and fast delivery. A bit of a shame that the return policy does not include trying items and you have to read the return policy carefully to know that. Apart from that, good customer experience

Title: Great service from Wex
Content: Great service from Wex, would have given them 5 stars but let down by there choice of delivery service

Title: Purchased a Nikon 18-55mm DX zoom‚Ä¶
Content:
Purchased a Nikon 18-55mm DX zoom supposedly complete with lens hood.
The supplied lens hood was a non-nikon item fitted the wrong way round and totally unuseable as it would not fit any other way.

Title: Great website with lots of choice and‚Ä¶
Content: Great website with lots of choice and good prices! Prompt delivery

Title: Excellent service
Content: Excellent service, fast despatch and delivery, very good communication and tracking.

Title: Lens arrived as described and on time
Content: Lens arrived on time and as advertised

Title: Dear Wex,
Content:
Dear Wex,
Parcel delivered with product in good condition.

Title: Price was "good" and the order was‚Ä¶
Content: Price was "good" and the order was despatched "speedily".

Title: I ordered my printer with next day‚Ä¶
Content: I ordered my printer with next day delivery. WEX were offering a free sample pack of Canon paper but this was out of stock, the invoice said delivery would be delayed until the free paper was in stock! A quick phone call brought sense to the matter and the printer was delivered next day. Top marks to customer service.

Title: Ordered Hawke binoculars arrived next‚Ä¶
Content: Ordered Hawke binoculars arrived next day however parcel force didn‚Äôt leave a calling card as I was at work, only when I logged onto tracking the following day did it tell me that they‚Äôd dropped them off at the local post office so I don‚Äôt really think they even tried to deliver them to be honest I reckon they just took them to the post office without attempting delivery no fault of Wex photo great binoculars and would have been next day delivery which would have been great

Title: Camera arrived quickly after ordering
Content: Camera arrived quickly after ordering. Condition better than I expected.

Title: No complaints
Content: My purchase was promptly dispatched and I received accompanying email to confirm the progress of my order including a parcel tracking reference. Equipment received in good condition.

Title: Goods arrived OK eventually
Content: Goods arrived OK eventually, but 'chat' with staff while chasing my order was not helpful.

Title: Easy site to use
Content: Easy site to use

Title: Good selection of equipment
Content:
Good selection of equipment. Good prices. Prompt delivery.
Only issue is with the ordering sequence on the website. My order was for several items. I accidently ordered the last item twice. Unfortunately this wasn't apparent until after the order had been confirmed. Not a big problem as it was  a low value item (lens filter) which I will keep, as  no doubt one will eventually need  replacing. 
Otherwise good service.

Title: Items work and as described delivered‚Ä¶
Content: Items work and as described delivered when requested.

Title: Spoke to someone on the phone
Content: Spoke to someone on the phone, placed and paid for the order, delivered the following morning within a one hour slot. Thank you

Title: All fine.
Content: All fine. Item delivered on time and as described.

Title: Good ordering experience, but...
Content: Good ordering experience, delivery was indeed next day as stated, the only issue was I didn't receive any order updates so I didn't actually know my order was sent or arriving until it was delivered. My account just showed my order as processing.

Title: Very good service as usual from Wex
Content: Very good service as usual from Wex

Title: Excellent service
Content: Excellent service, reasonably priced and quick and efficient delivery.

Title: Good service
Content: Good service

Title: Really quick service
Content: Really quick service. Good advice on the phone as well.

Title: Good store but website sucks
Content: Order was fulfilled as expected and on time. Though the website has more than 50% of products as out of stock with no way to filter these out of searches. I would buy from wex again but preferably in store as their website functionality isn't great.

Title: Got good advice on a replacement camera‚Ä¶
Content: Got good advice on a replacement camera bag and am quite happy with the outcome

Title: Parcel Force were appalling
Content:
WEX photo were fine and I had no problems.

However, Parcel Force  were very poor. They gave no indication of when they were planning to deliver, failed to follow my redelivery instructions sent via the link emailed to me and tried  to redeliver again despite instructions to the contrary  and then gave inaccurate location instructions when I eventually had to collect the parcel by hand.

Title: Easy to order and good prices
Content: Easy to order and good prices

Title: The service provided by WEX was‚Ä¶
Content:
The service provided by WEX was excellent and the item supplied is in perfect condition as described. 
The biggest let-down was WEX using Parcel Force who only delivered on its third attempt. No excuse for this as the vehicle passed my road on two different days.

Title: Very good
Content: Very good, although used it was in excellent conditions. The delivery was prompt. I would recommend Wex to my friends.

Title: Wex still great
Content: I have used wex for a number of years. This time 4 stars, had an issue regarding arca Swiss compatible plate to take an l bracket for a manfrotto 190 with ball head qr plate. Unfortunately technical did not quite get what I was needing, I had ordered the wrong part, thinking I was getting the vice/clamp. I have sourced a 3rd party plate to fit to the ball head elsewhere. Having saying that this is first time in 10 years had a problem. I will still use them regardless.

Title: Straightforward service
Content: Straightforward service. Ordered camera on 28/01/22, knowing it was out of stock. Although confirmation of order said they would email to let me know when back in stock, I didn't receive an update - just a dispatch email on 08/02/22. Camera arrived safely.

Title: Quick delivery
Content: Quick delivery, packaging poor

Title: Happy user!
Content: Quick delivery and is keeping our in house photographer happy :)

Title: Friendly service
Content: Great service. A bit more expensive than some others, but friendly.

Title: It was a present for my granddaughter‚Ä¶
Content: It was a present for my granddaughter and she's over the moon.

Title: I think their delivery service could be‚Ä¶
Content: I think their delivery service could be better got my item two day after they said it arrive.

Title: Great lens once it arrived
Content: As soon as the lens was in stock Wex got it to me as quickly as they could.  It's an amazing product and I'm happy with its performance.  It's only 4 stars because of the 3 week gap between accepting the order and getting the stock - it would have been helpful to receive some updates on when it might arrive, and had to chase a bit.  I guess this is a UK wide problem with overseas stock.

Title: Bittersweet experience...
Content: Good service from WEX, order process was smooth and they dispatched the camera in good time. The problem was who they use for deliveries - Parcelforce. Didn't knock, didn't leave card, didn't tell me where they had delivered my ¬£700 camera...I had to track it down so a bittersweet experience using WEX... so use them at your own risk while they use Parcelforce

Title: Great camera equipment seller
Content: Great site, good products and quick delivery.

Title: Good service
Content: The website listing was sightly incorrect but the issue was quickly sorted without fuss.

Title: Overall
Content:
Overall, very good indeed. The order was delayed for several months because of supply issues, clearly not their fault. The original price quoted was kept. Impressive.
Very pleased when the order was delivered.
Just maybe they could have kept me better informed of progress. Hence 4 stars instead of 5. Otherwise excellent. Would use them again without hesitation.

Title: Pros and cons
Content:
Pros: The item arrived quickly.

Con: The box the item came in was damaged

Title: As always order arrived promptly
Content: As always order arrived promptly and as usual securely packaged.

Title: Generally did well.
Content: Generally did well.

Title: Great service overall
Content: Great service overall, good comms and offered a fair price for trade-in.  I feel though that the trade in service is a bit slower than it could be with the constant exchange of emails where sometime you may not get a reply until the next day.  Sales and used items, again no real problems there.

Title: need to say who the gift is from
Content: I sent a gift voucher direct to the recipient.  That was fine and it arrived on time for a birthday.  But, I would like a space on the website to send a message saying who the gift has come from - not to mention a greeting to them.  Amazon and flower deliveries etc. do this.

Title: Very quick delivery of tripod
Content:
Very quick delivery of tripod- well packaged. 
The tripod had been a ‚Äòreturn‚Äô and on receipt, one of its legs was very wobbly and had to be tightened up. It would have been better if someone had checked before posting as I almost sent it back! Happy with my ‚Äòthree legged thing‚Äô now.

Title: Ordering on line And the website is‚Ä¶on line ordering
Content: Ordering on line And the website is easy to navigate and find things. Also the information on each product is informative and clear.

Title: Check they are paying attention!
Content:
Lovely friendly team but second hand stock list was out of date and assistant did not listen when  repeatedly said I wanted to shoot 4K video and sold me a camera that only shot 4K photos! 

Such a wasted visit and I had to cross from West to East London to return the kit.  Not cool.

Title: Just placed an order for a lens which‚Ä¶
Content:
Just placed an order for a lens which is time critical so paid for upgraded delivery. Have a screenshot of the order confirmation page showing a different delivery address to the billing address, but now in email and on my account they've changed the delivery address to billing. This now means the lens is going to end up over 200 miles away from me

Not holding my breath on this being sorted before they dispatch

Changed to a 4 because the did actually fix it. Awaiting to see if it arrives tomorrow

Title: Excellent customer service product was‚Ä¶
Content: Excellent customer service product was damaged still waiting for a replacement, delivery (royal mail) not very good but eventually received after contacting customer services, would use again

Title: There were delays in getting the order‚Ä¶
Content: There were delays in getting the order but I was kept informed

Title: Used Wex previously
Content: Used Wex previously. Very competitive, Easy to make purchases and good selection. No after sales service required only reason for being marked down to 4

Title: Good
Content: Good price. Efficient delivery

Title: Great service
Content: Great service

Title: Great item
Content: Great item, just a shame that it has no Guarantee apart from the manufactures 12 months .

Title: Would have been 5 stars pre COVID p-ex‚Ä¶
Content: Would have been 5 stars pre COVID p-ex inspection and waiting time could be much better‚Ä¶.. it used to be

Title: It's all good
Content: It's all good - though I'm puzzled why such a small thing arrived in a massive box ????

Title: Had to pay postage on a small‚Ä¶
Content: Had to pay postage on a small filter-you would had 5 stars if it was free. I‚Äôve just spent ¬£2,700 on a lense

Title: Simple and on time
Content: Simple and on time

Title: NanLite LumiPad 11
Content: Very fast delivery and a good price. Slightly disappointed that the item didn‚Äôt come with a power supply but purchased two batteries which should give enough life for what I require.

Title: Prompt and efficient service
Content: My online purchase from WEX was straightforward. The price paid was competitive, and the selected option of free delivery was delivered by Royal Mail within the 48hr stated. The product was delivered in a "padded envelop". This does not protect the goods from crushing. An improvement would be a crush resistant wrap or box. The product packaging did show signs of crushing, however, the Rode wireless Go II was undamaged. I will use WEX again.

Title: Only partially answered the original question about stock but swift follow up
Content: Only partially answered the question. I asked how i should go about canceling my order and getting a refund, this was not originally adressed but once notified response was very quick

Title: The slide projector arrived much more‚Ä¶
Content: The slide projector arrived much more quickly than expected An excellent service

Title: What ever you want just ask
Content:
A delay from EU but Items are now out for delivery 
I find an excellent verity of products.
Service is good and options for a trade in is a bonus 
This company is managing to keep up to date with the latest products and discount pricing.
Well Done 
B

Title: Amazing product but over packaged
Content:
Amazing product but over packaged. I ordered a small camera battery and it came in a massive box filled with air bags and a small box inside it where the actual product was. I understand you need protection but this is unnecessary, wasteful and bad for the environment. 
Nevertheless, I am happy with my product. It was cheap and good quality!

Title: Overall great service and great people‚Ä¶
Content: Overall great service and great people to deal with, only very slight negative it was a bit long winded sending emails and waiting for a reply  it would be nice just to speak to someone, sort it on the phone job done although it was over the Christmas holiday, I would definitely recommend Wex Photo Video.

Title: Nikon 200-500mm f5.6E ED VR lens
Content: Pleased with the service from Wex although it did take a day or so longer than expected but Wex kept me well informed of progress before dispatch. Have just had the lens a few days and already I‚Äôm very impressed with the quality. I aim to hold onto this lens for many years so I feel assured that I have made the right choice!

Title: Lens Hood
Content: Glad to find the lens hood for an old lens. Good service.

Title: Not as good an experience as expected.
Content:
My item was not in stock so it took a few weeks to arrive, which was fine. This is my first telescope and I spent a fair amount of money and had expected everything to work. So, I was very disappointed when I tried to align the sighting scope only to find that it didn't work. I found the whole process of constructing the telescope quite nerve racking as the 
guide was not great and assumed prior knowledge. I contacted the helpline and they sent out a new scope within a few days. Well done support team. Overall, a little annoyed with the purchase process as what should have been an exciting experience was disappointing and a little bit fraught with problems. Scope should have been checked before being sent. However, I am quite happy with my purchase. Maybe Celestron need to look at their quality control because, from what I could gather, this happens quite a bit.

Title: Couldn't believe how quickly you‚Ä¶
Content: Couldn't believe how quickly you delivered

Title: Item/postage as expected.
Content:
Item/postage as expected.
Wex reliable as always.

Title: Good service as expected
Content: Good service as expected

Title: Very speedy service of delivery of film‚Ä¶
Content: Very speedy service of delivery of film stock. Box slightly damaged.

Title: The price was competitive
Content: The price was competitive. The problem I have is that although I received an email to say the item had been dispatched, I received no notification from Parcel Force to say when they were going to deliver it. In this day and age virtually every other delivery service gives the customer an idea when they will deliver! Because I was out the parcel was taken to a post office several miles away! Parcel Force needs to get their act together and I feel Wex should try to address this issue also.

Title: Wex have been very good to deal with
Content: Wex have been very good to deal with.  My only problem was that the replacement rechargeable battery I bought for my camera, though having the same number/code as my original one, was different and too big to go into its chamber.   This was really a fault of the manufacturer rather than Wex's.  Money was refunded with no problem.

Title: My order is incomplete at this time as‚Ä¶
Content: My order is incomplete at this time as waiting for one more item.  So far I am pleased with the service and the product.

Title: Good supplier next day delivery
Content: Good supplier next day delivery

Title: Wex Online
Content: Wex were excellent. Parcel Force (their chosen delivery service on this occasion) were incommunicative and impossible to contact.

Title: Ordering was easy and quick
Content: Ordering was easy and quick. Would have liked a little more feed back . Apart from being informed that I paid  I would not have known that the order went through .

Title: A quick delivery of photo paper of 2‚Ä¶
Content:
A quick delivery of photo paper of 2 days, well parcelled.
W. Proctor  NG17 7EA      13/01/2022

Title: YOU DO WHAT YOU SAY
Content: YOU DO WHAT YOU SAY

Title: Good service all round
Content:
Good service all round, I know I had to wait 3 months for the Tamron lens to arrive but that was not Wex Photo's fault as the lens was not released  until January, but it was shipped to me by Wex promptly.
Ron Andrews

(I do have one issue with this lens which I would like to speak to your technical department about.)
Can be contacted on 07947356681

Title: Log In problems
Content: Not a regular purchaser from this site, so had difficulty logging in, never received a requested password re-set. Eventually guessed my original password, after that all went well.

Title: In any potential purchase
Content:
In any potential purchase, question arise and it‚Äôs good to speak to a knowledgeable person to obtain good unbiased  advice which is my findings when in contact with this company.
Yes, we all check around for best prices ~ but you cannot beat after sales help from WEX Photo
Video.
Really appreciate such a company.

Title: Items ordered arrived on time
Content: Items ordered arrived on time, and in good order. No problems, would use again.

Title: Not cheep but
Content: I received my item in good time and in good condition Thank you

Title: Excellent service from start to finish
Content: Excellent service from start to finish. Quick delivery and on time as promised. One star deduction due to the amount of packaging for a small item which seemed a little too much.

Title: Product delivered promptly
Content: Product delivered promptly , notified at every stage of the process, the items I ordered where in the condition or better than discribed, the only issue I had the battery which with camera body did not work or charge I contacted customer services, a new battery was sent straight out to me. I was very impressed with the service.

Title: good product and quick delivery and i‚Ä¶
Content: good product and quick delivery and i will be ordering again but the packaging was crazy! a massive great box with unnecessary plastic when a jiffy bag would have sufficed, please review your packaging!!Thank you

Title: An accurate description of the‚Ä¶
Content: An accurate description of the condition.

Title: Trust and confidence is key.
Content:
Though I have previous experience of buying new from WEX, this was my first experience of buying and trading used equipment with them. The process worked flawlessly. They did everything they said they would and did it when they said they would do it.  Buying used equipment is for me a matter of trust and confidence in WEX's description of the condition of the used item. The items I bought arrived in exactly the condition described.  I certainly would use WEX again should the need arise. 

Please note: I have no relationship with anyone at WEX and have not been paid or otherwise influenced in posting this review.

Title: I absolutely love the site and service
Content: I absolutely love the site and service, my only 1 problem was, the order information wasn‚Äôt updating as often as I hoped but other than that, it‚Äôs great

Title: Item was not in stock but arrived in 2‚Ä¶
Content: Item was not in stock but arrived in 2 weeks.

Title: Purchased camera
Content:
I recently bought camera for which I had to wait for a while as it wasn't in stock which I knew at the time of purchase. The camera came with great deal from Canon and would give cash back after purchase which is great. This was my first purchase with such offer therefore I had no idea how this works. Sadly WEX didn't sent an automated email to tell me what steps to take to receive the cash back. I had to emailed them and received a short email back to say what needs to be done. Wouldn't be a better customer service if all the info was sent automatically to customers post purchase? I know you are not responsible for the cash back however the only reason why I bought this camera was because of the great offer therefore you're getting my sale. This isn't a complaint but a constructive feedback. Also please work a little on less dry replays as your emails always sound like customer is bothering you. Otherwise, I'm very happy with my purchase and quick delivery once the item was available.
Regards,

Title: Item was received ahead of expected‚Ä¶
Content: Item was received ahead of expected date, well packaged and a good price

Title: I asked for recommendations of a geared‚Ä¶
Content: I asked for recommendations of a geared head for my Astro photography using a 100-400mm canon lens and on occasions my 300mm lens with my 1DX MKII, the advisor recommended the manfrotto  XPRO geared head MHXPRO-3WG. I have found that when I use the virtical fine adjustment it doesn‚Äôt work very well!

Title: External box split on delivery..
Content: I would have rated the service as excellent but one seam of the large cardboard box was split. The contents, the manufacturer's box wrapped in air-filled, continuous strips of plastic, were intact and I don't know whether the split was a  handling accident or an unsuccessful attempt to pilfer. However I was not impressed.

Title: Normally have great service from Wex‚Ä¶
Content: Normally have great service from Wex but on this occasion there was a bit of confusion with some items I traded-in. All was resolved in the end but so unlike Wex for it to happen in the first place. However, Wex will remain my #1 choice for photography, as their service is normally faultless, friendly and very efficient.

Title: Nice monitor
Content: Nice monitor. Well packaged. Came with EU power supply but rectified promptly by WEX without issue.

Title: Good service
Content: Good service, quick delivery of photographic chemicals relatively difficult to find elsewhere

Title: Very good service
Content:
Very good service, I did have to wait for the printer due to the world wide supply issues. 
But once stock arrived Wex dispatched the item very quickly. 
The Epson xp15000 prints come out great with good colour and so far no sign of any colour casts. I sold a Canon pro100s recently and the prints from this printer where very inconsistent. 
Epson performance is much better.

Title: Good product, good price, but could have been a little easier
Content:
I‚Äôd been looking at a new camera bag for a few months in various places. We‚Äôd had it for a good price come Black Friday. The site could have been a little easier to navigate (when I put the brand into the search box, it didn‚Äôt come up, and I can‚Äôt remember how I found it eventually). The product itself is faultless.

Delivery was via Parcelforce, who attempted a delivery (no one home), I tried to rearrange for a day when someone be in as per the instructions on the delivery card. They attempted again the next day as per their delivery policy, so I rearranged again for the same date I‚Äôd already tried - the main problem with Parcelforce is that I didn‚Äôt get any acknowledgment of the new delivery date so it was a bit of a waiting game.

So, it was a happy outcome but the experience could have been a little easier overall. I would still use Wex again for the right product and price.

Title: As good as it gets in difficult times
Content:
Not all ordered items were in stock, it took a few days before I was offered a partial delivery. One item not delivered was marked "5-7 days" and is still that way three weeks later -- I would prefer to see a vaguer but accurate statement of availability. The other (frustratingly, the lens to use with the new camera) is marked "awaiting stock" which I understand, given the world chip supply situation.
One minor website annoyance -- it is not possible to click through items in an order to check current availability. Each item description has to be copied to the search box.

Title: Great service
Content: Great service

Title: Ordered via the web
Content: Ordered via the web, twice the order did not go through but everything was seamless afterwards, hence not 5 stars.

Title: Always done 5* for Wex before
Content: Always done 5* for Wex before, but partial refund for voucher was forgotten & had to be chased later.  Rectified quickly as always, but not a fantastic as usual!

Title: very good
Content: It was very good

Title: Would have been 5 but Wex and myself‚Ä¶
Content: Would have been 5 but Wex and myself slightly let down by courier

Title: previously owned 70-200 lens
Content: ordered a previously owned 70-200 lens, delivery was as promised, and lens was in excellent condition. good service overall

Title: Good customer service....
Content: Good customer service....

Title: Good customer service
Content: Good customer service

Title: Prompt delivery
Content: Prompt delivery, printer was excellent.

Title: had difficulty when trying to order on‚Ä¶
Content: had difficulty when trying to order on line so had to phone but service was great and operator was most helpful

Title: Perfect packaging
Content: The product is great. The package was packed so well. As our package contained some glassware,the extra coat of bubble wrap and boxes were quite helpful.

Title: Happy with service
Content: Excellent correspondence on the enquiry chats, helpful and knowledgeable. Product has arrived but I'm waiting for the battery I need to be in stock before I can try it out.

Title: Good service
Content: First time I've used this company. Far better range of memory cards than other retailers I checked. Good website, efficient delivery.

Title: Tested the umbrella
Content: Tested the umbrella - gives very good lighting coverage.

Title: Always bought on line from Wex and‚Ä¶
Content: Always bought on line from Wex and never had any problems. Orders arrive on time and prices are very competitive. I will continue to try them when I need any photographic equipment.

Title: Good product advice and good sales‚Ä¶
Content: Good product advice and good sales service, however, back office missed two promised delvery dates.

Title: Olympus Lens & Filter
Content:
Placed order/part ex changed Olympus camera/lenses in April, received lens/filter  on the 23-11-21.
Was not expecting the above till early next year. Was aware of the global problems &
factory fire so expected even further delay. 
Received email on Friday 19 late afternoon 
that the goods had arrived & to contact WEX to arrange for delivery. 
Would have given 5 stars, but lack of regular/monthly communication/updates from Wex.
Very pleased with the lens/filter, will now go out & enjoy.

Title: Helpful advice
Content: Helpful advice. Efficient service. Easy to contact.

Title: Non delivery is an issue.
Content:
Staff and product service have always been good.
However delivery or should I say non delivery for ¬£75 of batteries for a dead line I have is a problem. Need a better deliver service.

Edit - Resolved by WEX staff. Product delivered

Title: Excellent Used Stock to choose from
Content:
My 19mm Panasonic lens for my Oly OMD EM10 IV arrived safe and very well packed and presented ...in its original box!
Excellent service and a 'just like new' used lens.
Very happy.

Title: Arrived on time
Content: Bought as a gift so haven't used the product yet. Everything arrived on time and was a competitive price.

Title: Acceptable
Content: Acceptable experience

Title: Use wex for quite a bit of my‚Ä¶
Content: Use wex for quite a bit of my photography purchases and always found them reliable with delivery. Would have given them 5 star but I have not long since visited their new store in Gosforth. Very helpful staff but it became a bit of a pressure sale and they tried to sell me a camera that personally should not have been on the second hand page because the body was in a shocking state and was told it was still a great camera. Thing is I was looking to buy a new camera not a overpriced second hand camera that had been abused. Probably go back to the shop in the future but they need to be careful with customers as there are other camera suppliers out there.

Title: Quite pricey
Content: Quite pricey

Title: Great shop to buy from
Content: Great shop to buy from! The only reason not 5 stars is because I paid extra for a nominated delivery day and that was ignored - it actually came early but I caught it (more the delivery companies fault?)

Title: Communication between WEX AND SONY‚Ä¶
Content:
Communication between WEX AND SONY COULD BE IMPROVED .
The consumer rights are muddled leaving the paying public frustrated.
Many thanks phill p.

Title: Lens was in great condition as‚Ä¶
Content: Lens was in great condition as advertised.  Don‚Äôt know why it has come with a tamron lens cap when it‚Äôs a Sony lens.

Title: Excellent selection of products.
Content:
Excellent selection of products.
Just need to use a better courier service.

Title: good customer service
Content:
good customer service, i bought the wrong S/H lens for my camera, when i realised my mistake i went into Leeds shop and they sorted it out for me.

thank you

Title: The item arrived in very good condition‚Ä¶
Content:
The item arrived in very good condition , delivery driver pleasant and no issues however fed ex were late item should have arrived 3 days earlier as next day service was compromised - maybe its the brexit situation or not . 
However the guys at Wex were helpful in finding out what was going on and the equipment was competitively priced - I'm happy with the outcome as i can now reschedule using my new Benro monopod with the new Sigma 150-600mm  long lens also from WEx.
wex guys did support me so outcome secured ! i'm a glass half full person 
enough said

Title: I find Wex very helpful
Content: I find Wex very helpful and very fast on delivery would recommend

Title: Prompt responses, Guernsey stopped supplying
Content: Helpful staff, prompt responses.  Unable to supply to Guernsey due to "website needs updating" but that has been a long time and no solution.  Had to ship via agent.

Title: Speed of delivery
Content: Speed of delivery, price and crucially availability, was excellent. Only slight detraction for me was not having emails confirming the order was processing and then being dispatched. I could log into the account to see this but compared with other shopping online this was an absent element.

Title: A very professional company
Content: A very professional company. Thank you.

Title: Nikon part exchange order
Content: No issues with generous part exchange and no issues with next-day delivery when it arrived. However the item which I ordered was initially out of stock, which I understood, but I received no updates about ETA etc. I had to get in touch a couple of times to ask. Review would have been five stars otherwise.

Title: Good prices
Content: Good prices, excellent stock and fair delivery costs.

Title: Excellent fast service and delivery
Content:
Excellent fast service and delivery. Good stock. Decent prices.
My only issue is  having great difficulty changing addresses on "my account" section so delivery went to wrong address, my old house!

Title: Good customer service
Content: Good customer service. Ordered a fist card over 2 weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. Wex customer service were good that they emailed the voucher code to use but would have preferred the card as it was a gift to give to a friend.

Title: Delayed postage
Content: Purchase as described.. Great!!  Postage duration was 11 days though. From UK to UK.  Package languished at FedEx Norwich  a bit too long for my liking.

Title: Great Service at Point of sales but let‚Ä¶
Content:
Great Service at Point of sales but let down by Parcel Force unable to deliver
next day. Impressed by Sales department advice and followup service.

Title: Placed pre_order for Canon lens
Content:
Placed pre_order for Canon lens. At time of ordering stated lens hood came with it. When lens arrived no hood included. 
 Unfortunately I did not keep a copy of order when placed but will in future. They have agreed to provide a hood when in stock. Noted other dealers were clearly offering lens hood and bag with this lens.

Title: Delayed order promptly sorted
Content: One item that I ordered could not be found in their warehouse, so my order was delayed. Once I had contacted them to query the delay the rest of my order was promptly despatched, and the missing item followed soon after when extra stock came in. A good outcome.

Title: Prompt and efficient service
Content: Prompt and efficient service , no fuss.

Title: I found the staff very helpful and‚Ä¶
Content: I found the staff very helpful and informative.

Title: All very straightforward and very happy‚Ä¶
Content:
All very straightforward and very happy with my lens. The only fly in the ointment was that I paid ¬£8 for a Saturday delivery and it didn't arrive until Monday, however, that criticism isn't levelled at Wex as its down to Parcel Force, but maybe Wex shouldn't offer the service given the unreliability of Parcel Force?
Overall, I'd be happy to buy from Wex again.

Title: Good service from staff
Content: Good service from staff. Care needs to be taken when buying secondhand as  products have been mis-labeled.

Title: Once all items were in stock the order‚Ä¶
Content: Once all items were in stock the order was delivered the next day. The only flaw was receiving an e-mail saying I needed to contact Wex if my order was made over 28 days ago to confirm my payment details. It transpired that because I was using the 0% finance option to complete my purchase there as no need to contact them. All items were received in good working order.

Title: Superfast standard delivery but...
Content: Superfast standard delivery - within 12 hours! However, I had not expected that of a standard delivery so we were out when the package was left on our doorstep for 8 hours. Luckily, weather was dry and we live in a relatively safe area. Otherwise this would have been 5*

Title: Excellent purchase & service
Content: Excellent purchase & service. Delivery by FedX shockingly slow

Title: Quick delivery, mostly
Content:
Quick delivery - though oddly two things arrived separately the same day, with 2 cleaning cloths in their own box
Still waiting for the lens cleaner - I knew it was out of stock but was hoping for an update by now (2 weeks)

Title: Good sales rep dealt with enquiry very‚Ä¶
Content: Good sales rep dealt with enquiry very well

Title: Good service
Content: Good service from WEX

Title: Ordering from the business
Content: I telephoned the Wex branch to check they had the item in I wanted and ordered it directly over the telephone. It arrive well wrapped exactly on the day expected. Good service.

Title: Staff were really helpful
Content: Staff were really helpful with exchanging old equipment and buying new items. Delivery was prompt. Transaction processing credit was a bit bumpy largely due to staff trying to speed things up by pre-processing purchase, may be better off letting the process flow through the system. Despite hiccup very happy.

Title: Got my item quickly
Content: Got my item quickly

Title: Generally Happy.One exception.
Content:
Happy with buying experience.
Not happy about being hounded every day to give a review.
Maybe this will stop now.

Title: Wex from customers view
Content:
Have used store in Manchester Leeds and event stand at the photography show.
Event stand staff friendly and ordered online for me equipment arrived within couple days.
Leeds visited twice once when they opened. Staff seemed busy had to chase after them. Lots of Nikon lens not in stock no monitors on display.
Manchester store last time visited staff more interested in football on tv.
More stock but short on Nikon. Plus they did have toilet that was able to used.
Have purchased from both stores and don‚Äôt feel welcome 
Have ordered online products came well packaged and within reasonable time frames.
I really want Wex  to be my go to company for photo equipment. At the moment there one of three.
Would like to point out that I am well aware of the Far East shutdown due to COVID and delays that it caused.
One hopes that Nikon get there act together and gets stock out to uk pdq. Lots of people are upgrading to mirrorless but want the accessories.

Title: Good company, let down by choice of carriers
Content: Good company, good prices, just let themselves down by using parcel force for their deliveries which I cant trust for essential purchases.

Title: Delivery delays and communication
Content: I ordered 3 items, two were in stock and were delivered, awaiting the third item  I then ordered another item which wasn't in stock.  A friend then told me it had come into stock so when I queried it I was told that the previous not-in-stock item had run out.  I think Wex could have informed me about this.  I now have all the items I ordered and are happy with them.

Title: Consistently reliable and excellent customer focus
Content: Consistently reliable and excellent service. Wex has always been my first port of call for camera gear but recently I have noticed better deals elsewhere. In addition, I have recently noticed that a number of links on the Wex website are broken making it easier to use other Companies websites and losing Wex my business.

Title: Customer service is excellent. Back-ordering system could be smoother.
Content:
I've placed three orders now with Wex and have always been impressed with the quality of customer service they provide over the phone. Great phone service should be a given in retail, but many e-tailers go out of their way to make it difficult to call them. Not so with Wex, their number is easy to find and I always get through after a couple of rings.

My only quibble was with the back-ordering system they have in place. After placing a back order, I waited several weeks without contact and had to chase. The response I received was vague. I understand many businesses are struggling with supply chain issues right now, but that only makes it more important to keep the customer fully apprised at every step along the way.

When my order did come back into stock, the onus was on me to call up and reauthorise payment within 7 days. I could've easily missed that email and lost my order entirely, after having waited for more than a month. A more pro-active approach from Wex would've made the experience more pleasureable.

Title: Product was great but delivery needs attention
Content: The product delivered was fine, entirely as expected and of good quality. However the delivery spoiled things. Because I was planning to be out on the Monday  I had paid for specified date delivery on the Tuesday when I knew I would be home. I unexpectedly returned home late on the Monday  morning to find the box left on my doorstep. (I received no notification of delivery having been made). If  by luck I hadn‚Äôt returned unexpectedly the item could have disappeared and I wouldnt have known until the end of Tuesday. I contacted customer service who refunded my shipping costs and undertook to pass the information on. Credit for a good response but it shouldn‚Äôt have happened.

Title: A4 light table review
Content: I ordered an A4 light table to act as a backlit stage for a boom-mounted bench dissecting microscope, which by its nature can't have an underlit stage as found on a stand-mounted microscope. I expect that's not a typical use! The order arrived promptly and although the outside packaging looked a bit battered, everything was adequately protected within and it was easily installed, works fine and is robust enough for the intended use. For this purpose, I would have liked a bit more light intensity on the highest setting, but it does the job, and adjustments can always be made on captured digital images. The millimetre rules on long and short edges are a bonus I hadn't expected.

Title: The sales team were very helpful
Content: The sales team were very helpful, patient and polite; most importantly highly knowledgeable about products. It was a pleasure seeking their advice and assistance. However, a couple of items I wanted were out of stock and the replenishment date was months away ~ this was the only snag I experienced. The delivery (Parcelforce) was satisfactory.

Title: Good customer support.
Content: Bought a used bag on WEX but it was missing a few things on delivery. Contacted WEX and they had mid-described it and we settled on a partial refund. Very efficient and good customer support.

Title: We rented a lens for pick up at Wex in‚Ä¶
Content:
We rented a lens for pick up at Wex in Norwich after travelling up from London and the lens never turned up.

Never had any other problems so its a 4 out of 5

Title: Excellent supoer for new and used gear
Content:
I have used Wex a few times now and have found them an excellent supplier.

Recently purchase a second hand lens for the first time and am very happy with it.. there was a small amount of damage that wasn't mentioned in the description otherwise it'd be 4.9 stars if I could! I will be back again soon for sure

Title: Delivery hiccup
Content:
The item I ordered was on back order which meant I had to call to confirm that I still wanted it and to agree shipment. I wanted the shipment to be delayed until I knew someone would be in the house due to courier issues in the past. 

I was told that this wasn't a problem but unfortunately this request managed to get lost and the items were shipped earlier than planned. Thankfully the courier delivered late in the day and we were home from our weekend away or it would have probably been left on the doorstep.

Apart from that - very happy with the item, packaging etc. silly mistake by the Wex delivery team.

Title: Fast delivery
Content: Fast delivery, well packaged, got the product I wanted. The mic itself works well and is so small! Did have to look up how to fit the clip onto the lavalier  mic for it though as the set-up instructions didn't include this

Title: The purchase and delivery was excellent‚Ä¶
Content:
The purchase and delivery was excellent but the packaging was poor. It said original packaging which turned out to be a kit lens box with the camera only literally rattling around inside. The outer box was filled with air bags but they didn't surround the kit box so all in all it was poorly packed. 
Although rated 9 there are deposits on the sensor which it says in the description was checked and clear. The other issue is sticking buttons (AE lock). I did ask about repair but have been offered a refund assuming because the sticky buttons would be quite an expensive strip and repair.
On the plus side I am really, really happy with the camera CANON EOS7D and the general condition is excellent so i am torn as to taking the chance on the sticking button getting better with use and cleaning the sensor or taking the refund. Summing up, it could have been better but i am very happy with the camera (niggles aside) and would certainly use them again.

Title: Excellent service and support offered‚Ä¶
Content: Excellent service and support offered by knowledgeable staff

Title: Great customer care
Content: Didn‚Äôt receive the exact product I ordered but Wex compensated me very swiftly and I kept the product sent. Customer service was excellent.

Title: Would have been 5 stars but still you‚Ä¶
Content: Would have been 5 stars but still you use the inconsistent parcel force to deliver!

Title: My order arrived next day as promised
Content: My order arrived next day as promised. I have ordered many times from wex and as long as in stock always come quickly.

Title: Very pleased with the service and‚Ä¶
Content: Very pleased with the service and delivery time. Their customer communication is very good and informative, prices are not always as competitive as some but this can be expected from a trusted quality distributor

Title: Please change your courier
Content:
Please change your courier! Fed-ex are always late or losing items. 

Aside from that great service from the Wex customer support team!

Title: Gift vouchers
Content:
I ordered gift vouchers for my husband for his birthday. I never received them and when I called them to enquire they said my order was put on hold by mistake.
They apologised and gave me an additional voucher for my inconvenience.
So was sorted out very well. I will use them again.

Title: Had to wait a long time due to delivery‚Ä¶
Content: Had to wait a long time due to delivery issues, but service from WEX was good (answered enquiries promptly). A more proactive approach to providing information may havebeen better.

Title: Overall excellent service... One area does need improvement...
Content:
Recent purchase using a gift certificate. Top marks for efficiency, quick delivery, excellent product -- all areas where Wex regularly performs very, very well. 

Have removed one star simply to provide constructive feedback to improve an already superb company. This pertains to the Wex website, which is unable to process its own gift certificates. This necessitates a call to Wex - with the attendant inconveniences, time spent hold etc - but most importantly, introduces a significant security risk, because you have to pass your credit card details, including Security code, to someone on the phone. Wex should improve this.

Apart from this, superb service as usual.

Title: The used equipment is very good
Content: The used equipment is very good, the service is good, the phone response time is short and the advisors are knowledgeable and helpful. The website is pretty good but the search facility requires exact spelling in order to find stuff. I'd mark  4.5 so as to leave a little room for improvement.

Title: The item chosen was as described and‚Ä¶
Content: The item chosen was as described and was delivered quickly. Many thanks

Title: Wex did good
Content: Wex did good, I‚Äôd have gave 5 stars if they didn‚Äôt use the worst delivery company in the country‚Ä¶. Parcelforce.

Title: Prompt delivery of one pack of printing‚Ä¶
Content: Prompt delivery of one pack of printing paper but excessively packaged. I understand it has to arrive safely but definite overkill and waste of packaging in this instance.

Title: Nice quick service and used lens as‚Ä¶
Content: Nice quick service and used lens as advertised.

Title: Excellent service and quick delivery‚Ä¶
Content: Excellent service and quick delivery but, a huge amount of wasted packaging

Title: All round very good
Content: Very efficient dealing with my part exchange. Excellent order delivery.

Title: Very prompt delivery
Content: Very prompt delivery - ordered on Saturday, received on Monday. Unfortunately, I ordered 2 of the same product (photography gloves), and only one pair was sent. Easily sorted out by a quick phone call, apparently a warehouse error, and the the other item arrived within a couple of days. Product itself appears very good but not tested out fully yet in the cold.

Title: The wrist draper is excellent
Content:
The wrist draper is excellent 
A bit pricey but works really well
The only down side was the time taken to deliver

Title: Needed it in a hurry for work
Content: Needed it in a hurry for work. WEX did their bit in getting it to me next day. Physical setup was easy. Sorting out the features was a bit more challenging.

Title: Great buying experience.
Content:
Great buying experience.
Thanks!

Title: Good response to customer concerns.
Content: I ordered and paid for a used Olympus 60mm macro lens advertised with hood and lens caps. My order was delivered on time and well packaged, but the lens hood was missing. As I intended to use the lens outside, the hood is essential for minimising glare and protecting the lens. I contacted Wex and was told that an order for a hood had been placed with Olympus. I have just received the hood and am now very happy with the service provided.

Title: Fairly easy to order from WEX although...
Content:
Fairly easy to order from WEX although I had to open a paypal account to purchase the item I wanted, as you do not take Visa accounts from Canada.
And here is the thing, we still have the Queen on OUR money. Other than that things went ok.

Title: great service.
Content: I traded in a lens and I am now looking to purchase a new lens. I was happy with the service received.

Title: Customer service makes the difference
Content:
I ordered a small, second-hand, camera accessory via the Wex website.  It arrived promptly.  Unfortunately, it was not as described: it was a similar item, with a very similar part number, but which did not meet my needs.  Wex customer services immediately agreed that the problem was at their end and arranged for the correct item to be sent.  They didn't ask for evidence of the mistake, they just took my word.  And, as the first item was worth barely more than the cost of arrange its return, they allowed me to keep it as a small gesture of good will.

Anyone can claim to provide competitively priced items via a website.  Providing knowledgable customer service staff who are empowered to make decisions is a different matter - and is the reason I have retuned to Wex again and again over the years.  Not that every order needs a discussion with customer service.  But it's good to know they are there when needed.

Title: As Usual WEX Delivers an Excellent‚Ä¶
Content: As Usual WEX Delivers an Excellent Service. Will Continue to Use Them in the Future.

Title: 2nd person I "spoke" to on the live‚Ä¶
Content: 2nd person I "spoke" to on the live chat came across a bit arrogant and dismissive.

Title: Good and cheapest
Content: Good. Had a little trouble as the website didn‚Äôt select the monitor shading hood even though it was a free accessory but customer services sorted this and I‚Äôve had everything.

Title: Overall happy enough, however‚Ä¶..
