Content: Overall happy enough with my purchased item and the process,  I was however disappointed - I bought a used Fuji camera from Wex costing over ¬£500 then a week later a used lens that cost over ¬£300.  I was charged postage on both occasions despite stating free postage for items over ¬£50 on Website.  Items were delivered by my normal postman and I live on mainland UK??  Sorry Wex given the business I gave you this is a bit excessive.  I was given a ¬£20 loyalty voucher which unfortunately can‚Äôt be used online or against used items so no use to me - this also affected my decision to go elsewhere for my next purchase - I went directly to Fuji, the overall cost for a lens, including postage was cheaper. I have used Wex successfully in the past and will probably use them again in the future.

Title: Item came quickly and a nice price
Content: Item came quickly and a nice price

Title: Excellent service and swift delivery‚Ä¶
Content: Excellent service and swift delivery but Paypal's Pay In 3 appears to go through but actually fails without warning and returns to the Wex payment screen giving the impression you're about to be double billed.

Title: Part ex handled very easily and fast‚Ä¶
Content: Part ex handled very easily and fast delivery of my new Olympus lens.

Title: Not infallible but quick to rectify.
Content:
I have been dealing with WEX for years and have always valued their customer service.  I recently part- exchanged a lens to WEX and before the deal was done I specified it was to be a cash payment to me.  When the inspection result was received it specified a credit to my account.  In the circumstances a credit is no use to me because I no longer need to buy any photography equipment.  (My earlier review describes how the wrong lens was sent to me by WEX, forcing me to purchase another one from MPB.) 

I was expecting a battle to obtain cash, as I would have experienced with many other vendors.  I called WEX to challenge the credit offer and without quibble they immediately changed it to cash and confirmed it by email.

So well done WEX for quick action and excellent customer service after a false start.

Title: Good but
Content: Always very good service but recently I lost a purchase because I was unaware that they were not automatically saved until checkout

Title: Everything Wex did was fine
Content: Everything Wex did was fine, paid for next day delivery. Waited in all that day and the following day. Ended up with a 60 mile round trip to collect. Not Wex problem but should think about a new courier.

Title: Wrong item supplied, not ideally resolved.
Content:
I have been dealing with WEX for years and have always been impressed by their customer service. I recently purchased a USED Canon EF 70-200mm f4 L IS USM Lens from them but the lens which arrived was the cheaper, non IS version. I emailed them to point out the error.

The outcome was not ideal but it was promptly handled.  WEX was unable to supply a correct version of the lens purchased so I had to settle for a refund.  I wanted a lens, not money.  They did also offer a ¬£20 credit to my account as an apology.

Now I will have to find one elsewhere and I will be disadvantaged because only WEX provides a 12 month warranty on used equipment.

Title: Item ordered and delivered as promised
Content: Item ordered and delivered as promised. As usual, the boxed lens was contained in a much larger box with bubble wrap. Normally the bubble wrap would be wrapped and secured around the lens box, but on this occasion it was just loose pieces of bubble wrap thrown in, and when opened the lens box was up against an inside edge of the box, so not exactly ideal.

Title: Professional Service at Competitive Prices
Content: I have been a Wex customer for many years and have found them to offer competitive prices and great service. I have recently purchased from other sellers, only due to the fact that of late Wex don't have the products I am looking for in stock, or I have to wait too long whist on pre-order. That is the only shortcoming I can think of. So, my first choice is Wex, if the products are not in stock or on pre-order I may purchase elsewhere.

Title: Upgraded my spotting scope for a new‚Ä¶
Content:
Upgraded my spotting scope for a new one using their part exchange system. Everything was organised very well and made easy. Even had to return a faulty item for replacement which was also made very easy for me.
My only gripe was that none of the dates for things happening were ever kept, which was a bit frustrating at the time, if it wasn't for that I would have given 5 stars.

Title: Order and payment process very easy
Content:
Order and payment process very easy, however not impressed with the outer packing of my printer. On collecting from my neighbour the outer box had been split open and had been crushed at one end. Luckily no damage was caused the the printer box.
Would use Wex again.

Title: Really helpful staff at Wex
Content: Really helpful staff at Wex, smooth and efficient service. The LaCie SSD is fast and good value.

Title: Excellent service
Content:
Excellent service, helpful staff.

A star lost as the drop down selector for a lens I sent had two almost exactly the same. I was told mine was cashable but turns out it wasn‚Äôt once I sent it.  I bought a lens anyway but would have been less happy if I wanted the cash.

Title: Thx for the delivery
Content: Thx for the delivery

Title: Don‚Äôt pay for delivery.
Content: Usually excellent service but on this occasion I paid for a named day delivery which cost ¬£4.99 as I was going to be away for a few days.  My parcel was sent out and delivery was attempted earlier than the specified day so I ended up wasting my delivery charge as I had to then re-arrange delivery.  I could have just had it delivered for free.

Title: Item arrived in good condition.
Content: Item arrived in good condition, not the fastest delivery but to be fair I chose free delivery, there was also a weekend in the middle. Have used Wex before and will definitely use again.

Title: Good service on Canon printer
Content: Good service, quickly delivered, definitely would use again

Title: It is difficult to only give 4 stars...
Content:
But I must be honest here. If I were only reviewing the Milton Keynes store, they would get 5 big fat golden stars, no question, but I am reviewing the chain, not one individual store, and the truth is, there are some issues, ones that can no longer be blamed on Covid etc. These issues are largely down to the way items are moved between stores, particularly used equipment, so be aware that if you are buying something used to collect in store, or having things shipped to your local store for pick up, you are most likely going to be hit with delays and other issues. Some work needs to be done there to improve speed and efficiency. 

Having said that, they are exceptionally competitive in terms of both their prices in store and online, as well as their quotes for any used equipment you want to trade in. The quality of any used equipment you buy is clearly defined, so you know exactly what you are getting and there are no surprises. 

Customer service from the Milton Keynes branch was exceptional enough to win my consumer loyalty, they bent over backwards to get me exactly what I wanted, then ruthlessly hunted down my items when the aforementioned delays occurred. They kept me apprised of the situation at all times and took measures to make it right on their own accord. I value good customer care  highly, and was not disappointed.

Title: Usual good service in the end
Content:
Usual good service in the end, but disappointed that having completed placing my order on line on the Saturday the system didn't acknowledge my order, or go back to a summary page, and neither did it send a confirmation email. Hence I was concerned about what the order status was.
In the end my ordered goods were delivered on the Tuesday before I received your confirmation, but it left a couple of days of convern.

Title: Customer support
Content: Very good communication from them

Title: Usually very good but when it goes wrong it does so with style!!
Content: I have used Wex a lot over many years. Most of the time everything goes well but sometimes their use of Parcelforce lets them down. There have also been occasions when Wex let themselves down- in my most recent transaction a trade-in got ‚Äúlost‚Äù in their systems after they had agreed a final price and the funds took many, unexplained days to be credited to my account with them. It was put down as ‚Äú one of those things‚Äù and it took several days and many emails for them to solve the problem and put the funds in my account. Not encouraging as their competitors often do much better.

Title: Excellent service
Content:
Excellent service, I really appreciated the call just after my order to make sure it was me that ordered the item and not a fraudulent purchase (not bought online with Wex before). 

Only downside was delivery by Parcel Force. I had to go and collect the item in the end despite paying for next-day delivery. I realised this is out of Wex's control, but their choice of delivery service could be reviewed if consistent poor reviews are received. I would buy from Wex again though, may just opt for  a different delivery service.

Title: Quick service
Content: Quick service, goods arrived well packed and intact. Price reasonable but I have since found the product cheaper from another supplier.

Title: the service & goods were excellent
Content: the service & goods were excellent, but the packaging was oversize & wasted for such a small flat item.

Title: Faultless Transaction With WEX.
Content: As far as the transaction with Wex is concerned the service was great. Received the order within 3 days. Full communication from them and the courier regarding the shipment. It's not there fault that Nikon could not produce a battery for over 12 months!

Title: Positive
Content: The Canon printing papers arrived in good time.

Title: Good service quick response via email
Content:
Good service quick response via email. Phone lines are almost impossible to get through talking to someone always help.
Limited stock on rental equipment

Title: Excellent service and response
Content: Excellent service and response - thank you.  My only criticism is do you need to put a binocular strap in a large cardboard box packed with with plastic buffering?

Title: Leica camera purchase.
Content: The camera came on time, and was working well.  The only thing missing was the Instruction Manual, which was not mentioned in the product description.  I'v e since downloaded a PDF version from Leica.

Title: Helpful customer services, website not quite so brilliant.
Content: The description of the camera was good, but there needs to be a 'what's in the box' section, because my camera had no memory card included in the price. Had I known, I would have ordered one at the same time. But the help on live chat was very good and sorted me out the right item.

Title: WEX are great but they need to work with a better courier service.
Content: WEX, you yourselves provide an excellent service, but why in the world do you choose Parcelforce as your courier? It took three attempts for them to deliver the package, making it a week late and completely redundant for an important project. Parcelforce suck, work with someone better.

Title: Review
Content:
this is what i expected when l purchased my camera which l am very impressed the service l got from WEX in Birmingham was excellent the staff knew their products 
Also online l purchased some items and got a good service from your online service

Keep up the good work l would recommend WEX to my Friends and collegues.

Title: Very good as always!
Content: Very good as always!

Title: Great except delivery courier choice
Content: Everything to do with WEX is amazing, but please stop using Parcel Force to deliver in the UK. They are dreadful!

Title: Easy to order
Content:
Easy to order 
Quick to deliver

Title: For the first time since placing my‚Ä¶
Content: For the first time since placing my very order with WEX almost two years ago, the expected delivery date was missed.

Title: I was rather upset that as a regular‚Ä¶
Content:
I was rather upset that as a regular customer of yours, for the second time I was sent a camera in a slightly dented presentation box, damaged on the corner. The outside delivery box was perfect, which indicates the damage was apparent when the person packed the camera. Having spoken to Simon about my concern, he offered me a ¬£50 rebate, which I thanked him for and accepted. However, this is not the point, having spent nearly ¬£2,000 on the camera I felt it was not good enough. Plus no time was given by Parcel Force of delivery date or time, again this has altered as this never happened in previous orders. 
Now I have replied to you and awarded  you 4 stars, before I have always given you 5 stars. Will you please make your comments as to what happened to me please?

Title: Order delivered promptly
Content: Order delivered promptly

Title: Quick, efficient and friendly.
Content:
Wex were excellent. Return of one lens, very fair price. Purchase of SH camera body - condition as reported. Purchase of new (i.e. not SH) lens.
Lens arrived in manufacturer's original packing, which had evidently never been opened. It was a mirror lens, and the cover over the central mirror had been displaced - glue had failed. Return of lens was quick and hassle-free. 
In all the contact with staff, email or phone, they were brilliant. Would not hesitate to use again.

Title: fast delivery time but could have been‚Ä¶
Content: fast delivery time but could have been better pictures of the secondhand object I purchased to help make my initial purchasing decicion.

Title: Good service and helpful staff.
Content: Good service and helpful staff.

Title: Good Price
Content: Good price and item arrived as described with the bonus that they DONT use hermes to deliver their stuff

Title: Firstly said in stock
Content: Firstly said in stock. Ordered 2 then hadn't got any. BUT when they came in they messaged us and sent straight away.

Title: Cashbach Confusion
Content:
WEX gave me a good trade-in offer against the purchase of a new Sony ZV-E10 with kit lens and I was very happy with that part of the transaction.

However, the website is very confusing about some of the cashback offers.
What appeared to be a ¬£100 cashback offer on the camera was in fact for the purchase of an additional lens.

Result: I'm delighted with the camera and trade-in but ¬£100 down on where I expected to be.

Title: They are real deal
Content: They are real dea. Wex is the best. I give them 4-5.

Title: An excellent service from start to‚Ä¶
Content:
An excellent service from start to finish. Regular updates when no stock of an item, followed by very regular communication with stock availability and regarding delivery details, when the goods were ready for shipping. 
These guys are solid with their customer service and make a trustworthy and caring team!

Title: Wex ace at new stuff but no so good on used
Content: I have been a customer of Wex for over 10 years! Excellent company, great customer support and team knowledge. The key thing has been great stock range, fast delivery and good after sales, as over many thousands spent a few things are dead on arrival, fail, need returning, etc, for which they have been excellent. More recently I have bought and sold a lot of second hand kit with Wex. Unfortunately this is not so good and could only get a 2 star at best. The range is low, speed of checking kit very slow and I have had VERY confused customer service on more than one occasion, especially over trade-ins. MPB their main rival is really superb on used, far far faster and really efficient and clear customer service. So Wex, thanks for being great, I will buy new from you as ever, but PLEASE fix your used side and customer service/processes on used side.

Title: Efficient and quick
Content: Arrived quickly and without fuss. A little expensive.

Title: Be Careful. !!!
Content:
Hi,
I received my camera in very quick time, however the courier handed
me a box that was completely crushed and said nothing ??
I told him to photograph it, which he did, just in case of any problems 
However luckily it was in one piece apart from a crumpled box.

You would think being camera equipment they would be more careful.. it
makes me nervous about ordering from Wex again ?

G Smith

Title: A good experience
Content: My experience overall was quite good in terms of getting advice and making an exchange; which was also processed and shipped very quickly.  However response time in the first instance, when I was trying to make a decision and act quickly with limited stock, was a little long and I ended up making the initial  purchase before hearing back; and in fact it wasn't the right kit for me.  I was kindly provided with a free interface cable, which wasn't included in the kit.  The chat function on the website wasn't working, although I was able to connect with someone at Canon regarding specific product queries.  Finally, it would help if the store here in Edinburgh stocked more models (including used models) to try out; when I went there to talk to them there wasn't much to work with and if one is inexperienced as I am, looking at a picture and reading the specs doesn't necessarily tell me what I need to know about size, weight, ease of use, etc.

Title: Issue with the packaging
Content:
Two points really...

First; box was slightly damaged om arrival though doubtless that is most likely down to the Royal Mail and their generally slapdash handling...

Second; the box was inappropriate.  Two small batteries (for a Canon Powershot) packed into a box easily big enough for DSLR and padded out with a couple or 3 airbags is not smart - they could easily have been packed into a padded envelope and been just as safe and secure and probably a lot more environmentally friendly as well...

Title: Brilliant service
Content: Brilliant service, Just one hiccup, and that was post code was wrong for delivery, not sure what went wrong, But any way I spotted that on the day of delivery and was all rectified, No problems with the delivery, would recommend Wex Photo anytime.

Title: Great selection of products
Content: Great selection of products, pretty much anything and everything you could need for photography/video. The prices on new and used were competitive and they offered me a very good price when I traded in a lens. I had some problems when communicating via email, where it seemed to take days to reply but by web chat or by phone was satisfactory.

Title: Package received promptly.
Content: Package received promptly.

Title: Very good service.
Content: Very good service.

Title: Delivered on time
Content: Delivered on time, well packed, no problems.

Title: A good service and all is up and‚Ä¶
Content: A good service and all is up and running. Would have liked an update on on expected delivery date as item was out of stock

Title: I ordered
Content: I ordered, on line, an out of stock item and gave payment details. The item arrived in stock after 28days so I had to reconfirm my payment details. Wex was not contactable on the working  day when I attempted to do this and I had to wait until the following day. Apart from that everything else proceeded very smoothly.

Title: Great service
Content: Great service, but for such a small item, could you consider using a smaller delivery box in future? This would cut down on packaging, which is good for the environment, and allow smaller items to be pushed through letter boxes. In this case Parcelforce had to redeliver on Monday because we were out on Friday.

Title: A good site for buying all sorts of camera
Content: Spotted the new Canon Powershot Zoom was in stock on the website. Checked the description and thought it looked interesting and would be good for having in my pocket when out walking and spotting wildlife. So I ordered one. Had seen it needed a microSD card, so I had added one to my order. It arrived promptly and I've been having fun playing with it. Only quibble I've got is the lack of a USB C charging plug that's essential for charging the camera battery. I couldn't find one for sale on the Wex site and ended up going to Amazon. It was actually quite difficult to get the correct plug to use as the specification on the Canon web site didn't seem to match the specifications on any online shops I looked at and I couldn't find the model recommended by Canon anywhere. That's more a criticism of Canon than Wex though.

Title: Competitive price and prompt delivery
Content: Competitive price and prompt delivery. No resolution to query after 7 days although initial response within 2 days hence four stars not five.

Title: Overall a good buying experience good‚Ä¶
Content: Overall a good buying experience good communication either email or phone, had to call a few times to get correct information, it seems different store locations gives varying information  items delivered on time well packed will use Wex photo video again pleased with items purchased

Title: Really easy to purchase product and‚Ä¶
Content: Really easy to purchase product and very  speedy dispatch.

Title: Good and friendly service
Content: Good and friendly service; good products at reasonable prices

Title: Good but, a couple of hiccups!
Content:
The item I ordered showed as in stock online, but, wasn't in stock when they went to pick my order.
Good communication and I changed my order to the same product in a different colour - I did receive an email regarding lack of stock and responded but, I then had to use live chat the following day to resolve the issue.  A phone call would've been much quicker!
Once I'd changed, the order was received in perfect condition and arrived the next day - Postage cost was removed on the updated order confirmation, but, I'm still to receive it.  Overall, good service with a couple of hiccups along the way.

Title: Just as advertised
Content: Just as advertised - dorsetphill.co.uk

Title: Would use again happily
Content: Not my first online order from Wex and happy to order again. Deducted a star only because of inconvenience caused by delivery glitch. Ordered on Friday and paid in good time for Saturday delivery. Unlike previously a confirmation email did not arrive. Later on I received an email informing me and apologising that the order had been received in the warehouse too late for Saturday delivery. They were looking into this. The order had been upgraded to Sunday delivery at no extra cost to me. I thought this meant not increasing the charge from ¬£7.95 to ¬£8.95! Actually the order was delivered free of charge on Sunday so thank you Wex.

Title: Olympus lens and camera body order / Used kit exchange.
Content: I was getting too much shoulder cramp etc., carrying my Canon gear which had served me well so I decided I wanted a 4/3 "carry-around kit" but to keep my canon 5dMklll / 100mm macro lens and newish 100-400mm telephoto (and teleconverters) "wildlife lens".  I wasn't convinced the 4/3 kit would replace the performance of these. So I cleaned up my "collection" of canon lenses (5) I had accumulated over the years, and my Canon 7D, and sent them off to Wex for valuation. After a bit of haggling I was offered an acceptable price (bit lower than hoped for!) which gave me 80% of my initial 4/3 kit. (Rate 4/5) On the advice of a fellow sufferer who had swapped his heavy Canon gear for Olympus kit, I ordered my "starter kit". An Olympus "pro" 12-100mm lens and the OM-D M3 Mk lll camera in early May. The lens was in stock. The black camera body not but I contacted "chat" and I was told a delivery was expected in a few days. If I ordered both together I would get one as soon as next "black" batch arrived. As I expected this in a few day, I ordered both. The lens arrived as expected (rate 5/5). I was still awaiting the "black" body 2 weeks later (but stocks of the silver had arrived). Despite 2 chat sessions I really was given no idea of the camera body delivery date (Rate 2/5). I contacted customer services by email and had a prompt reply saying black body hopefully late in May and I could have a silver now if I wanted one.  I marginally preferred the black body - but a bird in the hand - and the sun's out. It's technically the same! So I rang customer services (replied after a few rings) and requested a change to a silver body. This was agreed and rapid despatch promised. Next day I see its "out for delivery" with Parcel Force. Excellent (rate 5/5). All well that ends well. Olympus seem to be the issue here with stock not keeping up with demand - but they may well have good (pandemic) reasons for this.

Title: Ordered a new Nikon 18-200 VR ii
Content:
Ordered a new Nikon 18-200 VR ii. Arrived very quickly, so really pleased with that.

I can only give 4 stars though as they automatically sign you up to their newsletter and email marketing. At the end of your order the box to opt in is already ticked, you have to untick it if you don't want to receive marketing. I just think this is a bit scummy, so can't give 5 stars.

Title: good‚Ä¶but
Content: Well packed and reasonably good turnaround from ordering. Not impressed with online ordering as unless you log in it doesn't work (error message "can't deliver to NON UK address" which I haven't got)

Title: Package arrived water damaged
Content:
Package arrived water damaged, very poorly packed and handled.
Luckily contents ok, but overriding feeling is of disappointment.

Title: Product ok But cock-up on delivery
Content: Product ok But cock-up on delivery. Needed 3 phone calls to sort it out. Think they may not have used all address details.

Title: Two out of three items delivered‚Ä¶
Content: Two out of three items delivered promptly, top quality. There is a wait for the third with no indication of when, (a battery for a mirrorless camera). Would be nice to know when expected delivery time would be.

Title: A great service marred by a couple of weaknesses.
Content:
I think that WEX provides a very good service that is only spoilt by two things, first their dogged determination to use Parcelforce as their standard delivery option for online orders (DPD might be a better option) and the slowness in responding to e-mail enquiries.
If e-mail enquiries could be responded to much faster, it would speed up transactions considerably and make the whole process more efficient.

Title: Should be 5*, but 1st lens faulty
Content: 4 stars because the lens was faulty (sticky zoom ring) when delivered, but 5 stars for everything else! Delivery of the lens and the replacement (once stock arrived in UK) was excellent - 1 hour time slot, next day delivery - and the c/service team were very keen and helpful. Also well done to the shop in Manchester where I took the lens for a 2nd opinion - compared it with a display model, agreed the fault and took care of the return all in 20 mins.

Title: Sort of OK
Content:
Sort of OK. I have made purchases with Wex before and on such a large purchase this time, I didn't want to trust in any other supplier. Communications were good (considering the pandemic) and everything arrived the next day after the order. 
Annoyingly, I just received an email from Wex 1 week later offering the same Nikon Z camera and lenses I bought, offering a saving of ¬£540 +VAT!!  That has taken the edge off my experience somewhat. I would have gone for some lighting gear or another lens had I known or waited 1week!

Title: The Best customer service.
Content:
I am extremely pleased with customer service at Wex.
Their communications are the best.

The only reason I have not given 5 stars is that I was bombarded with sales emails (to be fair I had signed up for these) which I deleted. 
So I missed the one saying that my back order was now in stock. However,  because Wex emailed me to say order would be cancelled, I recovered the situation.

Title: Prompt and responsive service
Content: Telephoned with queries. They were answered, goods ordered, dispatched promptly and received in less than 48 hours.

Title: Because you get busy at Norfolk branch‚Ä¶
Content:
Because you get busy at Norfolk branch and their is such a lot to take in, have you thought of free coffee machine whilst people are waiting. A next costumer ticket machine. Obviously have small seating area when drinking. 
Just joking, but it's an idea though.
Oh. The staff are very friendly and helpful.

Title: Good advice for a novice
Content: I am very happy with my camera and equipment from Wex. I am a novice to photography, so I was heavily reliant on the advice I received. The salesperson listened to my requirements and put a package together that met my requirements and budget. The only product that let me down was a pop up light tent for product photography. The salesman was unable to fold it back up for storage, and for some reason I bought it anyway thinking I would be able to do it at home. Wex happily accepted the return and refunded the money.

Title: Quick and easy had no problems
Content: Quick and easy had no problems

Title: Efficient respoinse and prompt dispatch
Content: Efficient respoinse and prompt dispatch

Title: Easy process
Content: Easy process, good delivery, very happy with product and overall experience

Title: Good
Content: Good service, products as expected. Prompt delivery

Title: Superb service as always despite giving‚Ä¶
Content: Superb service as always despite giving me some wrong information regarding screen protection.

Title: Part exchange
Content: I knew exactly what I wanted and therefore my trade experience was very easy. I like the part exchange arrangements, the only drawback being that it is a credit to your account with Wex. If they do not have in stock what you want then it is best to go elsewhere.

Title: Very happy with the product
Content: Very happy with the product, packaging and delivery service. Would recommend this service.

Title: Fast turnaround.
Content: Fast turnaround.

Title: Great company!
Content: Great, reliable company. Generally always my first port of call whenever I need some new photography equipment. Fast and reliable delivery - easily rivals that huge online competitor that shall remain nameless. Only reason for 4 stars and not 5 is that some products have only 1 image which makes it difficult to properly review.

Title: Generally very good.
Content:
Generally very good.
The only disappointment was when I rang to get advice and details about products, the answers were always "if you check the website....."

Title: Would have been 5 stars but delivery‚Ä¶
Content: Would have been 5 stars but delivery was a circus sadly.

Title: Exceptional service
Content: Ordered a tripod bag around 4pm one day and was delivered by midday the following morning. The only small quibble I have is the amount of packaging used.

Title: Pretty good service
Content:
I ordered a printer, which they had very competitively priced. They told me up front it would be a very long while before they could deliver, and I accepted this.
When they finally got it in stock, they delivered promptly and at the original price. Exceptional value. Very friendly and helpful at point of sale.
Only niggle: I emailed after a couple of months waiting to ask if the printer was *ever* going to be in stock or whether I should buy another brand; their reply was simply "The printer isn't in stock yet" and rather missed the point of whether I should give up and cancel the order. But that's a small thing, and I'd definitely buy from Wex again.

Title: Very efficient and helpful customer‚Ä¶
Content: Very efficient and helpful customer service when I required a refund after purchasing a milano grey backdrop that arrived that was a teal colour not illustrated by the photo online.

Title: could not find what i needed‚Ä¶
Content:
could not find what i needed immediately.
once found ordering was easy
price reasonable

Title: All around good service.
Content:
All around good service.
My item was initially out of stock though re-stoves within a couple of weeks.
Recommended seller.

Title: Great  company & service shame you have‚Ä¶
Content: Great  company & service shame you have to pay for returning goods!üëç thou!

Title: Hoping to see a big range of m mount lenses.
Content: Very happy with a good selection of your m mount lenses, hoping to see more from the likes of TTartisan and 7artisan of China, and Zenith of Russia, to keep Leica photography at a reasonable price.

Title: I'm still waiting for my order its been‚Ä¶
Content:
I'm still waiting for my order its been over a week. Parcel force say they have attempted delivery everyday. But its a lie i have been home every day waiting for the parcel. Wex aren't replying to my emails.

Update, wex came through and got parcel force to actually deliver it, i've now changed from a 1start to 4star it would be 5 stars if they didn't use parcel force

Title: Very fast delivery and the product‚Ä¶
Content: Very fast delivery and the product arrived with no issues.  Would recommend.

Title: Wex Photo Video has an easy to navigate‚Ä¶
Content: Wex Photo Video has an easy to navigate website and their prices are comparable to others. The camera was despatched very promptly and arrived safely packed. My only complaint is that the camera did not have a connection lead provided for uploading photos to a laptop, and I had to purchase this separately. Not everyone wishes to upload their photos remotely to cloud storage.

Title: Fast efficient service
Content: Fast efficient service. From ordering to delivery.

Title: Would have been five stars if the‚Ä¶
Content: Would have been five stars if the tracking side actually worked . Having the message that item was being delivered on the same day as the message doesn‚Äôt help planning

Title: Good service.
Content: Good service and communication, unfortunately not always received due to an over zealous security protocol in my system.

Title: Items arrived promptly
Content: Items arrived promptly, safely packaged and in the condition identified. Very happy with the service

Title: GREAT SERVICE AND DELIVERY ON TIME
Content: GREAT SERVICE AND DELIVERY ON TIME , STAFF ALWAYS KNOWLEDGEABLE

Title: Service is Good but could fo with more‚Ä¶
Content: Service is Good but could fo with more communication I understood that the product was out of stock and is usually available in 7 days but had to wait 2months with no communication to let me no that it was going to be that long but apart from that am happy with the service

Title: Arrived before due date and well‚Ä¶
Content:
Arrived before due date and well packaged.
I accidentaly ordered two items due to my not reading the web page correctly.
As I was phoneing to correct this error a young lady from Wex beat me to the phone to ask if my order was correct or a mistake.

Well done & thank you.

Would recommend them.

Title: Trade in process a bit ‚Äòclunky‚Äô
Content:
I love my camera and I felt the overall deal was good, however the process of trading in was very tedious. I dropped off my equipment at the local branch, who then sent it down south. It was received on the Friday, but it had to wait till the Tuesday for the condition to be verified. 
Why couldn‚Äôt the equipment condition been verified by your competent and professional staff at my local branch?

Title: Good service and prompt delivery
Content: Good service and prompt delivery

Title: Very helpful overall but did not inform‚Ä¶
Content: Very helpful overall but did not inform me that you have to wait 5 weeks before you can even claim ¬£300 cash back from Panasonic !!

Title: Wex themselves are great - just buy in store
Content:
Wex themselves are great, good range of products at competitive prices and they are good at keeping you up to date with orders.
However they use Parcelforce, a company that almost makes Yodel look competent (almost) for delivery. 
So whilst I will use WEX again without hesitation, I will be collecting in store.

Title: Tried tricking me into thinking I‚Äôve saved money
Content:
EDIT After reading and responding to this review, Wex refunded some money and gave me a lot better deal which I‚Äôm happy with. I‚Äôm obviously a little put off about the original customer service, but this team member was bery helpful. 

Due to the softboxes in the kit I wanted to buy being out of stock and Wex said they had no confirmed date when they‚Äôd be back I had to buy everything seperatly from the kit including 2 softboxes of a different size from those in the kit. Of course this made it a lot more expensive to buy inidividually. On an email, a team member said to ring up and they could possibly try to do a similar deal. I did so, and placed my order. However they tried to make it seem like I have saved a discount of ¬£104 when really I wasn‚Äôt saving anything as I could have bought the 2 flash heads and stands in a kit, then the softboxes seperately. The team member just did the entire order individually then took off ¬£104 to make it the same price as if I had done it with the kit and then softboxes. 

So basically, I have paid more money and recieved less items than what would be in the out of stock kit as you also get a case with that. I just don‚Äôt like the fact they have tried to trick me into thinking I am saving money. And lastly, they really need to put fragile stickers on boxes, and ensure they aren‚Äôt damaged. One of the flash head boxes had been punctured which isn‚Äôt good on a piece of kit that is worth hundreds

Title: Easy to make the order and arrived in‚Ä¶
Content: Easy to make the order and arrived in good time

Title: Great phone support
Content: Excellent customer service with someone on the phone to speak to. A much better service than other online retailers

Title: Purchase of used items

Content:
Generally good
...but my order was split (expected), and instead of 3 in stock items followed by an out of stock item, I got 2 in stock items and am having to wait for the out of stock item to come in (when?!) to get last stock item üòî

Otherwise, excellent.

Content:
Not much communication went on with regards to my tracking of my order. 
I was reassured that orders had to be signed for and both orders were not. One being left in a communal post area corridor if a block of flats. Not great when it‚Äôs camera equipment.

Title: The website does not allow access to‚Ä¶Rating
Content: The website does not allow access to products easily. It is focused on promotion items which I do not want. Otherwise it would be 5 star.

Title: Mostly great and not Wex's fault
Content: Mostly great and not Wex's fault, but Parcel Force who delivered were pretty hopeless and a mix up of their's meant a delay in receiving my goods.

Title: Excellent product coupled with poor delivery service
Content: Excellent product (Peak Design Slide Camera Strap) coupled with poor delivery service. Parcelforce stated that the delivery would be between 14:31 and 15:31 on Wednesday 7th April. Waited in all that afternoon, no one turned up, tracked the parcel at 17:30 only to be told that as I hadn't received a card through our letterbox the driver had been unable to find our location. Next morning (Thursday 8th April) the tracking stated that the parcel would be delivered that day (no timings given), the parcel arrived at 10:36 am.

Title: Everything is smooth except for the‚Ä¶
Content: Everything is smooth except for the delivery which was delayed for a day. Overall, very good.

Title: Recent purchase
Content: Easy web site to browse and select products.Just a shame adaptors not available to use new Canon R6 with my nice EF-L lenses. Customer service helpful in sorting query about charging and hopefully full face to face tutorial on all features will be soon. Wex always been good price and quick service.

Title: Excellent service from Wex and‚Ä¶
Content: Excellent service from Wex and Parcelforce, as usual.

Title: As ordered and does the job but !!!
Content: As ordered and does the job but paid for Saturday delivery - web site did not take into account no deliveries during bank holidays so did not arrive until Tuesday.

Title: 5 stars for service but product faulty
Content: Would have been 5 stars for service and 1 star for the product. The speed of response justified 4 stars overall. The initial product was faulty and was replaced very quickly. The replacement was also faulty but I can make 1 product work from both products.

Title: Good service except delivery took few‚Ä¶
Content: Good service except delivery took few days longer than stated. Not a problem this time but hopefully not to be repeated once business gets rolling again as this was ordered for a non-urgent job.

Title: Fortunate timing
Content: I ordered a camera accessory as a Christmas present and was disappointed to find it wasn‚Äôt in stock. I then forgot about it. Wex notified me in March that it was now in stock and I was asked to call to confirm that I still wanted the item. As it happened, although it was too late for Christmas, it was in time for the intended recipient‚Äôs birthday!  On the phone the Assistant was very helpful and dispatched the item straight away. It arrived the next day and has saved me having to find a birthday present in lockdown. A positive outcome all round.

Title: Great products
Content: I would have given 5 stars but you was let down by parcel force who didn‚Äôt deliver on time, but other than that you provide great products and great prices.

Title: Wex Photo Standards
Content: Wex Photo standards dont slip from order to door step quick and efficent well done

Title: There was a long delay in fulfilling‚Ä¶
Content: There was a long delay in fulfilling the order because of non-availability of the stock (printer). Once it became available the order went smoothly.

Title: Long wait for product but great service
Content: Long wait for product due to an item shortage but it wasn‚Äôt in stock when I order  and this was handled really well by the WEX team and they kept me in the loop. Super helpful customer service team. Would definitely Recommend

Title: Standard delivery was 9 days!
Content: Standard delivery was 9 days!, this was due to a bank holiday stuck in the middle. However I do think that we should point this out when ordering. Had I known I‚Äôd have paid for next day delivery. Other than that the printer was a breeze to set up and seems to be working well.

Title: My item arrived earlier than expected
Content:
My item arrived earlier than expected, as I was told it was on back order.
The item itself, although it works well, (microphone wind muff thingy) is just an expensive bit of fluff! Full marks to Rycote for exploiting the necessity of this equipment (if you are going to make any successful recordings outdoors). I'd love to see how they work out the price for this. I'm not sure how much Wex add on to make a profit!

Title: Battery fine - delivery not ideal
Content: The battery is as described and a good price. Unfortunately this tiny battery was packaged in a large box (about 15 x 10 x 10 cm box) that wouldn't fit in the letter box, so Parcel Force couldn't leave it and I had to have it redelivered several days later.

Title: Very good  service from Wex delivered‚Ä¶
Content: Very good  service from Wex delivered on time well packed no problems love the lens.

Title: Is very heavy
Content: Is very heavy

Title: Quick delivery
Content: Quick delivery, not the cheapest but certainly reliable. Import prices of products post brexit don‚Äôt appear to have been added as yet

Title: Camera great, battery missing
Content: Camera arrived as ordered and seems great.  Only 4 stars for Wex as there was no battery included. I had paid extra for Saturday delivery as needed camera on Monday. To their credit Wex sent a battery as soon as I was able to speak to customer services on Monday and refunded Saturday delivery charge.

Title: Quick efficient service
Content: Quick efficient service

Title: I got printing inks the progress of‚Ä¶
Content: I got printing inks the progress of which I could track. They came at the appointed time, were well packaged. Very good  .

Title: Great service as always.
Content: Great service as always.

Title: Arrived when expected
Content: Arrived when expected. Incredibly heavy duty cardboard - but probably justified. No problems with set up [did have help mind you]   Jean Pratt.

Title: Easy online selection and purchasing‚Ä¶
Content: Easy online selection and purchasing (pretty good website). Item delivered on time. Packaging was grossly oversized for the size of item though (Box of A4 printer paper in a very large box).

Title: Pleased with the delivery and quick‚Ä¶
Content: Pleased with the delivery and quick arrival, the fact that unable to autofocus with is disappointing

Title: Mostly very good
Content:
A little confusion and delay over my software order completion but otherwise good service and
a quality procurement

Title: everything went OK with the order
Content:
everything went OK with the order
and arrived near the time on the text message

Title: I think overall the service was‚Ä¶
Content:
I think overall the service was agreeable. Few things I would have appreciated to be done better:
1. Delivery could be faster than 4 working days. Especially for clients of Wex (those with an account). In today's world, the competition is capable fo better.
2. The online chat service did not get all the information and was not really able to respond positively to all my concerns.
3. Why you guys are using those delivery companies (you know the one you use) whose services are known to be less efficient than the big names?

Title: A little more care please
Content:
+Things are tough for retailers during lockdown and obviously I couldn't try the camera in-store but I got a prompt and helpful reply to my email enquiry.
+I found the product I wanted 'Used -Mint' for about 20% less than new and ordered online.
-ParcelForce are not the best at keeping you informed and I actually feared that my new camera was lost in transit. But it did eventually turn up.
-The packaging was poor. 
-The battery should have been in it's pouch but it was rattling around loose. 
-And the camera had not been restored to factory defaults. I'm not surprised it had been returned because as it was set up there was no way to get an in-focus, properly exposed image! I felt the panic that I'd received faulty goods. However, easily fixed by simply restoring to defaults.
+Result is I got a camera with a shutter count of only 400 for a bargain price.

Title: New Lens
Content:
All staff were very courteous and helpful. Its a company with enthusiastic employees. it would have been 5* BUT My new lens arrived in store and I opted for click and collect. I duly arrived at 16.30  to find the store closed. Both the email  I received and the staff member I spoke to both said the store is open to 6pm. This meant a further round trip of 40miles the following day 
Fristrating!!

Title: Prompt efficient service as usual
Content: Prompt efficient service as usual. Would have appreciated a note to indicate how difficult it is to get high power rechargeable batteries for Neo LED light, if I had known would have ordered batteries at same time.

Title: I've bought from Wex used and new‚Ä¶
Content:
I've bought from Wex used and new lenses and cameras over the last 10 years.
Customer service and knowledge is 5 star ! Choice of gear and availability also 5 star ! 
The reason I'm deducting 1 star is Wex grading system for secondhand items. It doesn't use traditional exc , exc+ etc but numbers from 1-10 (it seems). Why I find this grading system misleading is that almost all their goods fall into 9, 9- and 9+ area. This would indicate almost mint / 10 to me but is far from it. I recently bought a used camera which was graded 9 and had obvious signs of wear and use. Wex does give a more detailed condition explanation for each individual item. Nevertheless the first thing potential buyers see is the grading number which I find misleading !
As long as buyers of second hand goods are aware of this there is absolutely no reason not to buy from Wex ! 
On top of that they accept returns readily within a set time scale.
An excellent photo company !!

Title: I ordered a telescope as a gift
Content: I ordered a telescope as a gift. Unfortunately the person received the same model from someone else so I had to return the telescope unopened. The Wex customer service team were excellent and I was reimbursed promptly.

Title: All went well except they reduced the‚Ä¶
Content:
All went well except they reduced the value of my camera that I sold them.
This had never happened to me when I have used other similar companies.

Title: Prompt delivery and response to query‚Ä¶
Content: Prompt delivery and response to query as the new Hawke (8 x 42) monocular's manual/warranty was crumpled and looked like it had been dropped/stood on. i didn't realise it had come direct from the manufacture and pointed out that the manual was just a little too big for the size of the box which meant it had to be placed on top of the item, not snuggly underneath which would have meant a pristine, flat manual. As its for a 60th birthday present, I wanted it to look perfect. I fed this back and asked that it be fed back to Hawke. I have not had a reply to let me know that this happened. I was pleased with the speed and efficiency of delivery and would use the company again. Have yet to try the monocular.. Will re-post when it has been put to good use. Many thanks.

Title: Large photographic blower-brush
Content: Delivery fast and all OK. I suggest a slight design improvement on the item. There is a small design flaw: the retractable cover-sleeve of the photographic blower brush does not wedge open, so it slips back down over the brush as you dust/blow the negatives - both a nuisance and a risk of scratching the negatives. I am going to have to try to use a bit of tape to help wedge the sleeve, but I still reckon it was good value for money.

Title: Overall very good
Content: Overall very good. Would have been 5 star but no clear guidance on sending off my camera for Wex valuation. I asked and was casually told -our guy will pick it up! So I didn‚Äôt pack it well enough for a courier service to take it for 2 day trip to to Norwich. Was concerned that my valuable camera would be damaged. Think they must give clear guidance on this. But very pleased with new camera - so far (only got yesterday).

Title: Reliable service
Content: Reliable service

Title: Well packaged and prompt delivery by‚Ä¶
Content: Well packaged and prompt delivery by Parcel force. Advice given prior to purchase which helped with buying decision. Efficient customer service. Will use them again. A good experience with Wex.

Title: i have always had good service from wex‚Ä¶
Content: i have always had good service from wex photo video i am now waiting for a credit note for a camera i sent back almost a week ago.

Title: Item in stock and dispatched quickly
Content: Item in stock and dispatched quickly with appropriate communication however only four stars as Royal Mail did not deliver in the promised 24 hours.

Title: I really wanted to receive the lens‚Ä¶
Content: I really wanted to receive the lens next day and paid the ¬£4.99. However it was delivered a day late. I was refunded the overnight payment without quibble hence the 4 stars. Apart from this there were no problems. The dial in chat worked well as I initially got the order wrong, but it was very easy to correct

Title: Nikon camera/lens trade-in and upgrade
Content: I recently traded in my Nikon D80 body plus now unwanted Nikon lenses to obtain credit on the purchase of a second-hand Nikon D7200 body. The valuation of my kit on inspection was disappointing compared with the original estimate. However, an explanation was politely given when I queried it. The D7200 body was in excellent condition as advertised but was missing accessories provided with the camera when new i.e, USB cable and eye cup. Wex did not stock these items (disappointing). I obtained the USB cable from elsewhere and await the eye cup from Wex. All 'phone calls to Wex have been dealt with efficiently and politely and the courier system was excellent.

Title: The delivery was just as I expected it‚Ä¶
Content: The delivery was just as I expected it to be. It will be 3 more weeks before I will be able to test the product supplied.

Title: A very well run outfit with plenty of‚Ä¶
Content: A very well run outfit with plenty of aftersales messaging with relevant and useful information. Dropped one star for not telling me the circumstances of an out of stock item.

Title: Very happy with recent purchase
Content: Very happy with recent purchase, but delivery very slow.  Maybe I‚Äôm spoiled by Amazon!

Title: 4 stars may be a little harsh
Content: 4 stars may be a little harsh, my only grip is I applied for buy now pay later and it was a bit of a faff, other than that I have no complaint. great product best price on line at the time of purchase (from any reputable dealer) fast delivery well packed and great customer service.

Title: Really pleased with this telescope and‚Ä¶
Content:
Really pleased with this telescope and the order arrived quickly.
However, it came in a box with massive writing on it which stated the contents. Rather inconvenient when it was a surprise for hubby's birthday and I was at work when it arrived. He's happy though, so that's all that matters (even if his birthday isn't for another week.)
The image quality on this is incredible for the price. I'm really impressed.
*Written by Mrs W*

Content: Very smooth Process I was impressed with the speed of delivery

Title: The telescope was a present for my‚Ä¶

Good value item ordered (kodak paper+ink), although knocked 1-star as box torn on top. Content still sealed inside and looked ok.

Shipping was also a bit lagged by a day or so, although can‚Äôt complain about that during a pandemic.

Title: A fairly extensive website product‚Ä¶
Content: A fairly extensive website product range but a bit constipated.

Title: Lumic Panasonic 100mm-300mm Lens for Lumic G Camera
Content: The lens is up to my expectations.

Title: Excellent website and straightforward‚Ä¶

The only small thing that could have been done better is an intercom system on the door. I had to phone to say I had arrived which would have been a problem had I popped out without my phone which I do occasionally!

I would recommend Wex Photo and Video for all your Photographic needs.

Title: Please stop "saving" viewing entries‚Ä¶
Content: Please stop "saving" viewing entries which do not result in a purchase. It is just a cheap trick and leads to future mistakes in orders.

Title: Quick delivery and efficient comms
Content: Quick delivery and efficient comms. Reliable supplier.

Title: Very good experience

Title: Good service
Content: I ordered a lens hood for my 40-150pro and I got it the very next day. In my book that is good service. Nothing more to say.

Title: The product was great
Content: The product was great, the ordering was simple and I was kept informed. The only issue I‚Äôd have was the enormous amount of osckaging for two rolls of film

Title: Wex fine but delivery slow
Content: The despatch was quick by the firm but the courier was very slow.  Tracking was inaccurate and not up to date

Title: Good service and fast delivery
Content: Good service and fast delivery. Will definitely use again.

Title: Ordering was simple via the website
Content:
Ordering was simple via the website. Selection was not thar simple for an amateur 
In the end had to ‚Äòphone up to just check that what I was ordering was compatible with my camera. Delivery etc., perfect.

Title: I was very satisfied with the service‚Ä¶
Content: I was very satisfied with the service provided,being quite a novice with photography the people I spoke with were most helpful and polite,I wouldnot hesitate in using Wex again & have actually recommended you to a colleague

Title: Clear website
Content:
Clear website, swift dispatch (even during the pandemic), clear communication over delivery, perfectly & safely packed.
Great!

Title: Happy with product and service
Content: Delivery of ordered item came through within a couple days as expected. Response to my after sales query was spot on and immediate.

Title: I believe it is worth paying a little extra
Content: I believe it is worth paying a little bit more to use a professional, dedicated photographic dealer. Could have saved ¬£50 buying from amazon, but wex have always provided a good professional service and if necessary after sales service is worth the extra cost. Was a bit disappointed with slow delivery over weekend hence the 4*. Paying ¬£1200 + and took 5 days to arrive (admittedly 3 "working" days. Would have been nice to have next day delivery included.

Title: Took a little longer to arrive than I had expected
Content: I was delighted to receive my new camera which was just as described. Although it took a little longer to arrive than I had expected.  Otherwise there were no problems.

Title: Great service
Content: Great service. Great products. Very competitive prices.

Title: Quick and easy shopping with Wex as‚Ä¶
Content: Quick and easy shopping with Wex as always.

Title: Improve description
Content: Very helpful with initial purchase of 'open box' item. However, when received it was not as listed - accessories were missing. Then helpful when contacted about discrepancy and gave partial refund. But I would have preferred an accurate description to begin with.

Title: Nervous re all the extra info required‚Ä¶
Content: Nervous re all the extra info required for anti fraud purposes. Started wondering if all legit. Obviously was. Timely delivery. Love my product

Content: The process of ordering was straight forward. The order was fulfilled in the time frame specified. I would have no issues ordering from Wex Photo Video again as and when I need something.

Title: Very fast service and the staff now‚Ä¶
Content: Very fast service and the staff now their products

Title: Quick delivery
Content: Quick delivery.  Good communication re delivery.  Everything as I expected

Title: Good service
Content: Good service

Title: Mend the doorbell!
Content:
very helpful staff on the phone lines but when my camera was ready to collect I went to the Hellesdon store to collect. The notice said to press on the button and a staff member would appear. The button was by a notice saying it was broken, and to ring a phone number. My wife has a mobile so rang the number given. Just went to the usual number giving loads of options. After a few selections still got no reply from a person, so was reduced to hammering on the door. After a bit someone heard me and I got the camera. 
What is the point in giving advice to ring if the doorbell is broken? Get it mended!

Title: Used, but worth a look!
Content: Just bought a second-hand (used) lens from Wex.  Turn round was quick, and was as described.  Not much to complain about really, but may be a few more shots of the used article in question, and clearer specifics on the grading of the artilces (8, 9, 9+ seem very close together in some cases).  Would recommend though; good value with a 12 months used warranty a bit of a no brainer.

Title: Really good
Content: Really good, quick and easy service using the finance option. Only downfall was that the whole amount had to be financed would have liked the option to pay a deposit.

Title: Better communication from. supplier when product out of stock
Content: There was a lengthy delay from ordering to delivery due to lack of stock.  I had to make contact because of lack of communication with the supplier.  Whereas I appreciate in these difficult times supply might be unpredictable I think that information from the supplier might have been more forthcoming.  Having said all that I am delighted with the product which was supplied at a very competitive price

Title: Very happy
Content: I have just bought a pair of binoculars through Wex. They were efficient in placing and delivering my order. They even took off the VAT without a grumble which was much appreciated. I have dealt with them before and they have been consistent in their speedy dealings with me. I do not give 5 stars as a rule but this is not intended as a slight on this company.

Title: I bought a Leofoto smart phone table‚Ä¶
Content:
I bought a Leofoto smart phone table holder from Wex Photo Video. It came well packed and I am very pleased with the design and build quality.

It was delivered by FedEx and scheduled for delivery on the Monday. However, it did not arrive until the following Thursday, having toured England for several days before arriving in Northern Ireland. This was a little disappointing, however I was in no hurry for it and the delay was not down to Wex Photo Video.

Title: Wex is the best photo equipment‚Ä¶
Content: Wex is the best photo equipment provider I know in London even though prices are higher I would always buy my equipment with Wex as I have all the service I need if anything needs replacement or retuning. Policies are very clear and costumer support is incredibly fast and helpful.

Title: I paid to have next day delivery but‚Ä¶
Content:
I paid to have next day delivery but the parcel was delivered 4 days later....
Otherwise great service as usual

Title: Excellent service
Content: Excellent service, good advice on chat line to help me decide what I wanted.I ordered a small connector for tripod but it was the wrong part. Customer service was very helpful and replaced it with the right part. The cover for my scope was not in stock when I ordered but I was later emailed to say there had been a problem. I eventually received the cover but only after I had emailed again 2 weeks later.

Title: Excellent service and equipment and good prices
Content: They have a huge collection of photography gear, and pre-lockdown I used to visit the shop/showroom near Whitechapel and you could try out all equipment. Great range of new and used equipment and very decent prices and excellent service with very helpful staff. Dropping to 4 stars because of 1 call when the customer service person just wanted to be off the phone and was rushing and not really wanting to help. All other calls were top notch service

Title: Pleased with the speed and efficiency of delivery..
Content: Pleased with the service on this occasion. Delivery was quick and efficient, though would have liked better communication as to approximate delivery time on the day.

Title: Overall a good experience
Content:
Great products as usual - took a bit of time to process the trade in due to covid and the severe weather but overall a good experience.

Slightly disappointed that the day the camera arrived was when there was a cash back promotion which wex failed to make me aware of so missed out by one day to save ¬£100

Title: as usual
Content: as usual - great service from Wex

Title: Would have been 5 stars but
Content: A glitch re a revised order, otherwise would have been 5 stars, but so helpful in accepting a return, quick response to email queries and general excellent customer service

Title: Service is good but I find your prices‚Ä¶
Content: Service is good but I find your prices are on the high side.

Title: Good camera arrived on time.
Content: Good camera arrived on time.

Title: Helpful and polite
Content: The item was delivered promptly as soon as it came back into stock and during my waiting period the customer services were helpful and polite. The only reason I didn't give them 5 stars was because of the wait I experienced for the item to get back into stock.

Title: Happy but be a little careful.
Content:
I'm happy with how quickly my purchase arrived and jt was very well packed but I do have one issue.

Under the lens cap, there was a lot of sand that might have caused some issues with the mirrors. 

Thankfully my wife is a photographer and knows how to properly clean it but others might have issues with this.

I might ask the company to properly check over everything before selling it to people.

Apart from that, I'm happy with my order and I would be happy to order again.

Title: Always very good service.
Content: Always very good service.

Title: Great service, great product, but poor value for money
Content:
WEX were there usual first class selves in terms of dealing with my order & the delivery.

The product itself, a Lens Coat Cover for a Canon 300mm lens, was well designed and thought out but the price at over ¬£90.00 was a huge amount of money for the amount material and production involved. So great service, great product, but poor value for money.

Title: Great service and super quick delivery.
Content: Great service and super quick delivery.

Title: This would have been 5.
Content:
This would have been 5.

When looking for a product that has a number of options it would be much easier to specify from one web page rather than having to look through pages of similar products to find the one you require.

Title: The delivery was fine
Content: The delivery was fine. Unfortunately due to other orders not being available for another 4 weeks or so, beyond the control of WEX, I will be unable to use the camera.

Title: Sent as expected in good time
Content: Sent as expected in good time

Title: good product
Content: good product, well packed I like it.

Title: Wex is great, just needs a better search function.
Content:
Wex is great if you know exactly what you're looking for. I've docked a star though because the search function of the website is woeful. If you search for a specific item, you're often swamped with irrelevant results and it can be hard to find what you're looking for.

What I do appreciate is how often I've been able to find secondhand or opened-box items at very good prices. I always check out the site to see if what I need is available used. Their new prices can be very good and I've always had good customer service when I've needed it.

Just get that website search tool working better!

Title: Nikon Dk19 eye cup
Content:
The service from Wex is normally excellent, 
however ,  the item took over 2 months to arrive  from ordering. This might be down to supply from Nikon, but even so.
Also the item seemed slightly more expensive  than some other sellers.
I went with Wex having had excellent service from them in the past.
16/2/21 Following the above review,  Wex have very kindly  refunded my payment in full as a good will gesture. An extremely  professional company and customer care. 
Many thanks,

Title: Fast and reliable service.
Content: Slightly more expensive than other retailers, but my order turned up the very next day and I cant complain. Fast and reliable service.

Title: Great supplier and service co
Content: Great supplier and service co. Only one negative for me and that is the use of chosen distribution supplier to deliver orders. Wex's supplier of choice tracking is not the best, if an order is placed later in the working week with Wex, while one receives a dispatch note from Wex (always on point), logistics tracking may not be updated until COB the following Monday in some cases . As I am a Logistics SME I can tell you that even with resource challenges, pandemic or weather related, there are systems and processes available to Logistics Service providers to do much better than outlined in this assessment.

Title: Problems of incompatibility
Content: This is a well made but of kit but....and it's a serious but, I had understood that this would take a Arca-Swiss camera bracket. But it's the old chestnut. They only want you to buy more stuff, so you have to buy their pesky bit of kit. Wouldn't be brilliant if this well made but of kit fitted the Arca-Swiss design which differs by a few mm. So build warrants 5 stars, but due to lack of compatibility drops down to 4.

Title: All good
Content: All good - product was exactly as advertised

Title: Excellent service and advice
Content: Excellent service and advice

Title: False hope now rectified
Content:
I ordered this printer on 31 October and received it 3 months later on 1 Feb.  Not Wex's fault as there has been a supply problem.  It was, however, disappointing to be told on 16 December that they had it in stock and arranged for it to be delivered on 31 December.  When it did not arrive, I contacted Wex who confessed that they'd made a mistake and it had not been in stock.
Otherwise, I can recommend Wex, which I have been using for over 15 years without any problems.

Title: It was going to be a much lower score‚Ä¶
Content: It was going to be a much lower score due to a big issue when trying to place an order for click and collect. When I called back I spoke to someone else and they sorted it.

Title: At last my lens ordered at the‚Ä¶
Content:
At last my lens ordered at the beginning of December has arrived. Good communication  and arranged payment etc. All good. 
Then offered to collect rather than post.
All good.
The only reason for the 4star is that the guy who came to the door to serve me was not that user friendly, very efficient but just somewhat brusque.
Lens is great!!

Title: Maybe not perfect but still goodish
Content: good prices and normally quick delivery. I have given five stars in past but only four here due to their not replying to an email that demanded a reply, i call that poorish service.

Title: Excellent customer service
Content: Ordered R5 in September received it in February. Not the fault of Wex. They responded quickly to every enquiry by both telephone and email. Always polite and knowledgeable.I will be making further purchases with wex without hesitation.

Title: Product was exactly what I needed
Content: Product was exactly what I needed, delivered promptly. The only reason I did not give 5 stars was that a 15 cm usb lead in a flat, 3‚Äù square plastic bag came packed in a disproportionately oversized (9‚Äù cube) box full of plastic bubble wrap. A standard paper envelope or at most a small padded envelope would have been more appropriate and environmentally correct.

Title: Good buy
Content: Good buy, shame mirror had finger print on it

Title: Spyder X Pro great -- Parcel Force totally useless
Content:
Spyder X Pro does what it say's on the tin at an amazing price

Parcel Force totally useless.
paid for Saturday delivery , but didn't happen. the tracing claimed an attempted delivery but no card.
Phoned Parcel Force and arranged to collect from depot but door bell rang 7:00 am on Monday with said package.

Title: I would have like to see how I would be‚Ä¶
Content: I would have like to see how I would be able to use the tripod flat on the ground. It took me sometime to work it out. Video just skipped over it and did not show details of where the screws are. I thought they were delightfully hidden away. I could not move rubber stopper. However I succeeded in the end. Hope this is helpful for future use to you. Some of us are non techy females in our 80s but still trying. !    And enjoying !!

Title: Speedy Delivery
Content: Speedy delivery packed well product in good condition for second hand camera/lens

Title: I wasn't told that I would require‚Ä¶
Content: I wasn't told that I would require batteries and SD card with my order, but not only did it get sorted quickly, but I was given a small refund. Many thanks to Wex.

Title: Epson Perfection V600: 'Does what it says on the tin'
Content:
Epson Perfection V600 arrived two working days following my order placement via Parcel Force which I could track using the link provided.
Have been using unit and getting to grips with the software products provided.
I purchased it to facilitate digitising my old 35mm transparencies and for day to day document scanning.
Is much faster than my previous HP unit but that was to be expected.
The software to clean up my transparencies looks to perform a good starting point.
Also the discounted price was a bonus.

Title: Helpful Website - Internal procedures need a little improvement
Content:
I bought a Canon camera recently and the website was clear to read and helpful to get around, although sometimes became a bit cluttered with information. Understandable given that some purchases can be very expensive and one wouldn't want to making that kind of mistake ! This is in total contrast to Canon's own website which I have found to be more than unhelpful on several occasions.
Where there was a fall off in helpfulness was when I was attempting to get information only about part exchanges and found myself actually making an application when I did not mean to. The person on the Chatline helped sort out the situation calmly and patiently.
The suggestion that the part exchange process was pain free also left a little to be desired in that it appeared that an original offer had been reduced based on incorrect information, but then that incorrect information had no bearing on the matter - confusing and time wasting !

Title: Excellent.
Content: Easy, straightforward ordering and delivery the next day, excellent.

Title: Split Shipment Problems
Content:
My shipment was split for out of stock items. The in stock item went very well
The out of stock item had no delivery outlook so I went elsewhere

Title: All was as described and arrived quite‚Ä¶
Content:
All was as described and arrived quite quickly.
I wanted better tracking info as they assumed they could leave it with a neighbour if I wasn't in
 When I complained I got some rubbish about paying extra. It's my money mate! It costs nothing to improve tracking. So they lose a mark

Title: Speedy delivery and great service
Content: Speedy delivery and great service, very good quality. Would recommend.

Title: Quick delivery ..
Content: Quick delivery ... good stock

Title: Great experience
Content: With a slightly heavy heart I have  to take off one star. This is due to problems with delivery that was late due to the courier. Otherwise the experience with Wex was definitely 5 stars as ever. Easy to navigate on their website and to find the product I was looking for. Smooth and safe payment process and almost immediate dispatch. It is worth noting that the Wex staff was responsive and helpful with sorting out the bit of a cock up with the delivery (including  refund for the failed ‚Äúnext business day‚Äù delivery). The product arrived meticulously packaged in a pristine condition. I am recommending Wex to all my friends and colleagues as a reliable online store with photographic equipment.

Title: Usual Good service from Wex
Content: Usual Good service from Wex

Title: Photolux A4 LED Ultra Slim Light Panel
Content: I'm happy with the quality of the product I purchased, a Photolux A4 LED Ultra Slim Light Panel, but quite disappointed that no protective cover/case was provided with it.

Title: The back pack is great
Content:
The back pack is great, well balanced and comfortable to carry.
Just what I was waiting for. 
Thanks yet again for a great service.




Jonathan A Milton

Title: Lens arrived quickly and well packed‚Ä¶
Content: Lens arrived quickly and well packed but they reduced the trade in offer. Not enough to make me refuse it but its annoying when they don't give a reason

Title: Five stars for customers service
Content:
Would have been 5 stars but they are using Parcel Force for delivery.
Customer service is excellent, the product was cheaper than anywhere else.
I find the local post office very good but parcel force not so good.

Title: Service was excellent
Content: Service was excellent, advert a little bit misleading but that's probably mis reading it against another supplier. Swift delivery . Really 4.7/5 rating

Title: Painless and efficient
Content: Painless and efficient

Title: Overall the service was good but when‚Ä¶
Content:
Overall the service was good but when ordered I was told it would take 4 weeks to deliver but it took around 6 weeks.  It wasn‚Äôt a problem in this case and combined with Christmas post, acceptable.
All communications were good keeping me updated.

Title: Good value and reliable service

Title: Nikon battery easy to find & purchase

Title: Found item I was looking for

The shop has very good stuff :-)

The only reason that I did not give 5 stars is that the item I ordered was supposed to be in stock, but it was not and I had to wait for it.

Title: Good service.

Title: Poor start, good finish!
Content: While I encountered a cumbersome and time-consuming process to get my trade-in camera valued (three separate and ever-decreasing quotes!) and found the special offers on the website confusing (overlapping/contradictory offers depending on whether buying items separately or together), the problems were resolved eventually thanks to some very helpful contact staff available by phone. An offer price for my purchase camera was also held owing to the delays despite the offer period having lapsed, for which I am grateful. The prices were also the best available at the time of purchase.

Content: Fast service but disappointed ParcelForce used for delivery.  Notoriously slow!  Otherwise, good service from WEX.

Kind Regards.
 Ivan. Leonard. Clunn

Title: Wonderful fast service.
Content: Wonderful fast service.

Title: TRADING IN EQIPMENT
Content: I decided to trade in two of my lenses, and was more than happy with the quote given, this then allowed me to purchase a new and better lens. The staff and turn around with WEX could not have been more professional.

Title: Packaging too much for a smallish robust object‚Ä¶

Title: Wex Review

Title: Excellent service

Title: The devil you know
Content: I‚Äôve been a WEX customer for 30+years and always found them to be fair on PX and reasonable on pricing....although since the Calumet merging, their prices have become 5-10% more expensive compared to the other 3 main retailers, I have occasionally used. This could be countered by a price matching policy.  That said, their service has always been helpful, efficient and fast ...so I don‚Äôt begrudge paying a little more for ‚Äòthe devil you know‚Äô reassurance.

Title: Excellent service.
Content: Excellent service.

Title: Recent purchases.
Content: I have bought things on line from WEX a few times since lockdown. An expensive way of going about it, especially when retuning unwanted items. I had to pay ¬£10.00 for 2nd class signed for to send back a DSLR rucksack that was too big for me. Despite this, I have found them efficient, will patiently answer my questions and everything I have purchased has been well packaged. I have since bought a smaller DSLR rucksack from WEX and despite this time being second hand, it was in perfect condition, like new. Am pleased.

Title: Good experience with Wex photo/ video.

Title: Good company, somewhat disappointing product

However, the Kenro film scanner I purchased has two flaws - firstly, it won't accept the old thick plastic slide mounts which were used in the 70s and secondly, the output from colour positive slides is very contrasty.
