Title: It was OK but long time ariving
Content: It was OK but long time ariving

Title: Telescope purchase
Content: I ordered a Dobsonian telescope in November and the order has been dealt with fully at every stage. I knew there would be a wait until my order arrived in store but I was never left hanging or wondering what was happening. So full marks for customer service to Wed.

Title: Very good service and prompt delivery
Content: Very good service and prompt delivery, even during the Xmas Postal rush.  Only thing that let you down was sending me an email about a week after I made my purchase to say the item had been reduced in price?   Why?

Title: Good Photo & Video Vendor (UK)for New , Used, Trade in Goods - Extremely Good Online /  Remote Vendor
Content:
04/01/2021 Experience
===================
I have used WEX Photo Video for many years and found there are very good on price, selection of items and the most important point I look for (and others) good customer service (especially on occasions when things go wrong).     Having trade in some old equipment which WEX Photo Video gave me a fair price (also they have very good used equipment on sale) I put in order for a new Nikon Z7.     Unfortunately due to stock issues (not WEX's fault - supplier issues from Nikon) I had to wait and wait until I had to unfortunately contact Wex to find out what was going on.      Due to Wex and other UK retailers not knowing exactly when Z7's will be sent from Nikon I received order for Z6 II + lens option instead - although I would have liked and paid for the Z7 II + lens option + Grip option; Wex stuck to the Guns of Z6 option.

I have marked down my score down to 3/5 due to this and for items out of stock like on pre-order from supplier, e.g., Nikon UK, etc or not fulfilling my final wish.

There should be update emails / messages along the waiting for item process to tell the customers on the progress of full filling their item.

Updated 14/10/2021 - In the past my engagement with Wex has been without issue and previously marked my experiences as 5/5, it was just this transaction that went a bit south and still at moment likely to purchase from Park cameras and local stores to me - London Camera Exchange.

12/07/2023 - Part Exchange
======================
Whilst slowly moving over to Mirrorless (Nikon Z & small Sony E system) I looked at trading in some of my older Nikon F mount lenses and 1 Z lens 28-75 F2.8 Z (non S) for cash to purchase (over time) some new Z lenses - like Tamron Z 70-300 & rest of cash received in trade in to use in future.

The process of Trade in by Wex is excellent, Online quote generator is easy and offer fair price, next:- drop in store but in my case Royal Mail picked up,    Wex received it, inspected each item and then give their findings.      In my case 3 of my modern lenses 70-300 AF-P, 24-85 & Z 28-75 passed QC and received good trade in price by WEX.

Unfortunately one of my older Nikon F DX lens 16-XX had damage / moist and fungus; (used it on DX older bodies in and outside ; may got some moisture in.    Hard for me to spot damage - in the elements; especially if you don't know what you looking for.     Wex explained the damage and offer choice of disposal or return back, - As this lens is not worth much now; selected option A and Wex took care of this.

The final trade in process - of paying the customer is easy - Wex gives you secure link, fill out your information (make sure the TRFX Info is correct) and you get paid via TRF 1-3 business working days.

13/07/2023 - Extremely Happy with WEX - buy new, trade in and buy second hand - from now on when I have the $$/¬£¬£ saved up will use either WEX or for me (just as good) local London Camera Exchange branch.

Both WEX and LCE are excellent - hope they can also keep relevant (tech) and branch out, e.g., unlocked Mobiles, tablets, etc.

Remember to Find / Source some Cardboard boxes & pack well - with gear wrapped around in bubblewrap

Title: good service, rubbish delivery
Content: As always Wex was excellent with good information, advice and service.  For some reason the delivery was a nightmare.

Title: Prompt delivery
Content: Once my initial query was sorted out, the ordering process was easy and the product, a monopod, arrived much sooner than expected. Happy with the service and would both recommend and use again.

Title: Poor comms during out of stock period, but good when stock came in
Content: There was a very long lead time on a printer I ordered, and the comms during the delay from Wex weren't great, but once it arrived in stock Wex were easy to deal with

Title: Very well priced item
Content: Very well priced item.  Was ¬£70 less than anywhere else online.  Delivery was next day despite quoting 48hrs on the website.  Great in theory but this did cause me an issue though as it was a present and the recipient ended up taking receipt not me as it would have been if it had been 48hr delivery :-(   The item was also in a massive box, way bigger than it needed to be.  All in all a good experience and as I say, could not be beaten on price.  Would definitely use again.

Title: Very fast and affiliate service
Content: Very fast and affiliate service as always

Title: Great
Content: Great - my regular go-to!

Title: Straightforward transaction
Content: Straightforward transaction. What you see is what you get and the customer service was very responsive, helpful and easy to reach.

Title: Having ordered many times from Wex‚Ä¶
Content: Having ordered many times from Wex Photographic, I didn‚Äôt have a second thought about ordering from them again! The service is always second to none. With prompt delivery and excellent product stock. Thanks Wex. Making business easy.

Title: only glitch was royal mail tracking‚Ä¶
Content:
only glitch was royal mail tracking didn't recognize the number WEX supplied.
Fortunately I was in when delivered but it would have saved a bit of worry if I had been able to track the parcel.

Title: Fujinon 10-24mm F4 R OIS lens condition 9
Content:
I expected the lens to be in slightly better condition than it was, suppose I should have gone for a 9+ instead of a 9. I guess my grading is a little harsher than theirs!
Still have to test the lens for sharpness etc, so this review is a moveable feast until I've had time to make sure of it's qualities. I still may want to try a better condition one but we'll see.
WEX staff as usual were very helpful, 10/10 to themüëç

Equipment arrived on time with parcel force all good packaging.
Now to p[lay with the toy!!

Delivery service, very good

Title: Product did not synch with existing‚Ä¶

Title: Great ordering experience (as always) with Wex
Content: Great ordering experience (as always) with Wex, great product (Olympus 100-400mm lens) but arrived a day later than promised! Carrier problem, not Wex!

Title: No wet paper
Content: No wet paper, 10"x 8" pearl why not, i now go to Ilford.

Title: Great deal on bundle set
Content: Great deal on bundle set. Paid for next day delivery which didn‚Äôt arrive frustratingly after waiting in, but they refunded delivery and the communication was really helpful

Content: Wex,   for me they have an impressively large range of both new and used equipment. I mostly deal with the Norwich branch - The  staff are always friendly and helpful and I have often found that their promotions and offers can be amazing value.

Title: foods arrived in good condition and on‚Ä¶
Content: foods arrived in good condition and on time

Title: Great product, quick delivery
Content: Great product. Arrived in good time. Only reason for 4 stars is that it came in a large box despite being a flat foldable item which could have been packaged more economically.

Content: Only four stars as there are cheaper places to go for kit.  But I return to Wex due to the wide selection and reliability.  Also their reviews of kit is really quite good

Title: Reasonably efficient
Content: Reasonably efficient. Pleasant manner on phone.

Title: The item arrived super-quick and in‚Ä¶
Content: The item arrived super-quick and in perfect order.  As always Wex comes up trumps.

Title: One star off because the returns are‚Ä¶
Content: One star off because the returns are not free (for collection), and the fact that this is not clearly apparent at the time of online purchasing. No other issues.

Title: Only negative was timing
Content: Only negative was timing. Didn‚Äôt arrive within timescale

Title: Almost 5 stars
Content: This would have been five but having asked a technical question and ordered on the strength of that I then found I needed a further part. Delivery has been prompt and I wouldn't hesitate to order again and would definitely recommend this company.

Title: Really good responses and advice/‚Ä¶
Content: Really good responses and advice/ support.

Title: Fast dispatch and reliable delivery as expected
Content:
The goods arrived exactly as expected and according to the postage method that I paid for (next day service). The goods were expertly packed and overall it was a great buying experience.

The only reason for not giving five stars is the price, although I realise that the selling price for these egg crate grids is pretty much the same across all retailers. My issue is that we pay through the nose for these grids that cost a fraction of the price that we pay. Moreover, they are almost definitely manufactured in China or similar.

The grids perform quite well but they should be much, much, much cheaper to buy.

Title: Fantastic service.
Content:
Fantastic service.
Honestly. 

Small advice would be nice to be informed of delivery date or times or choices proper to ordering. As only the delivery firm gives info, would be nice if website offered some info apart from generic 3-5 working days. Purely so someone there to sign for parcel or arrangements can be made.
Otherwise would have have been 5 stars.

Title: Good
Content: Good service

Title: Nice case.
Content:
Nice case.
As described.
Reasonable price.
Thanks

Title: Purchasing equipment was excellent
Content: Purchasing equipment was excellent, But part exchange value of existing equipment lower than competitors

Title: Excellent service
Content: Excellent service

Title: Very helpful Staff to get my EOS‚Ä¶
Content: Very helpful Staff to get my EOS adaptor from Canon.

Title: Delivery of Lensbaby Trio 28 for Fujifilm X
Content: Very pleased with prompt delivery of the item (Lensbaby Trio 28 for Fujifilm X).  The reason for only four stars is a minor gripe with the lens itself. The three effects (sweet, velvet and sweet) are not in synch with settings on the dial. However, the selected option is easily discerned when viewed through the viewfinder of the camera to which the lens is attached.

Title: Good value
Content:
Good value; efficient updating; very prompt service. 

One criticism from many years of using Wex: the search engine on your website needs considerable refinement to home in on the desired product... far too generalised/time-wasting.

Title: Item was in stock at a competitive‚Ä¶
Content:
Item was in stock at a competitive price. Ordered on line , click and collect. Notified within 24 hours that item was ready for collection.
Good service.

Title: I was in the market for a backpack for‚Ä¶
Content: I was in the market for a backpack for my photo gear. Wex staff were fantastically helpfully and actually recommend me a backpack which was a lot cheaper than  the one I was going to buy. I trusted there choice only to find I cannot get all my gear in the Backpack they recommend which was a stipulation of mine when we spoke. A bit disappointing but not the end of the world really

Title: It was a few days later than I expected‚Ä¶
Content: It was a few days later than I expected but the parcel didn't have too much packaging and the products are exactly as advertised.

Title: An easy process
Content: An easy process, speedy delivery (next day) what`s not to like?

Title: Great service and prompt delivery
Content:
Great service and prompt delivery. 

Very knowledgeable and helpful when discussing our requirements. All items delivered promptly.

Would use again.

Title: Good for used DSLR's - many to chose from in great condition
Content:
I got a lightly used EOS80D & the description was very accurate, the staff responded quickly to a question before I ordered & it came very quickly.  I am now getting used to the new features.  

I have also in the past bought a new camera from them as well as having one repaired.  Each time they respond promptly & fairly.

Title: Profession service from an excellent local supplier,
Content: Fantastic price for a superb lens. Only criticism is of Parcelforce. The deliverer left the goods on the doormat without confirming someone was home. Could have led to a very expensive loss. Wex - you may want to look at an alternate delivery service.

Title: Overall pleased with the the whole‚Ä¶
Content: Overall pleased with the the whole buying experience. A bit of a delay in delivery but that was no fault of Wex. I am planning to buy a camera and accessories from them in the near future.

Title: Very good and very quick service and‚Ä¶
Content: Very good and very quick service and delivery. Only small thing was that outer box was ripped half way round. But items inside were fine.

Title: Yes very helpful no fuss good
Content: Yes very helpful no fuss good

Title: Bought a canon IP8750 printer had‚Ä¶
Content: Bought a canon IP8750 printer had issues connecting WiFi after hours of YouTube videos I took out all ink tanks cleaned the head installed the ink tanks again al all worked fine. Just frustrating as the printer was new out of the box surely they are factory tested before dispatch ??. Continuous flashing orange light on the front of the printer was the problem before I fixed it.

Title: Great Customer Service, pity that the product didn't work and had to be returned.
Content:
If the product I bought had worked properly then I would have given 5 stars. Unfortunately it didn't because the required supporting computer software "bricked" my computer and it took me many hours to get it restored to the state it was in before installing the software and thus working again.

However Wex's Customer Service was brilliant and they immediately arranged to have a courier collect the item the next day and they have refunded my money and for this reason they fully deserve my 4 star rating.

Title: Online Purchase
Content:
Online Purchase
I have a branch of WEX near my home so I can click and collect. I usually buy instore but due to lockdown this wasn't possible. Their online team member was friendly, helpful and knowledgeable. Email communication post purchase was excellent and had it not been late afternoon I could have collected within a couple of hours. They lose a star for closing at 4:00pm so I had to go next day.

Title: Quick delivery but lots of goods not in‚Ä¶
Content: Quick delivery but lots of goods not in stock. Don‚Äôt pre-order especially Canon gear or u will wait for months.

Title: OK in all respects
Content: OK in all respects

Title: Fast, efficient and respectful service
Content: Great customer service when placing my order over the phone, only waited a few mins on the line before being answered. Product arrived promptly with a dispatch text for expected delivery time. Product was faulty and so I went to the store in Birmingham where is was credited back and a replacement received within 24 hrs. Pleased with the customer and service support.

Title: Good service and products
Content: A good hub for photo gear, at reasonable prices with good delivery service

Title: Fantastic used lens, poor delivery service
Content: Fantastic used lens - as described, brilliant quality. Delivery from parcelforce was shockingly bad.

Title: Service was ok bit slow on info on‚Ä¶

Title: The price was good
Content: The price was good, the delivery was prompt and the tripod is very good. Only dropped a star because the outer packaging and the tripod box were damaged in transit. Fortunately didn't damage the tripod.

Title: Great Service - but too much spam afterwards
Content: Great Service, would have been 5 stars except for the fact that ever since I ordered, I have got more than 2 emails a day from WEX with other offers.

Title: easy to use site & prompt delivery
Content: easy to use site & prompt delivery

Title: Bought a couple of used battery grips
Content: Bought a couple of used battery grips, the items were as described and able to use them a few days after my purchase

Title: Speedlite 430EX RT
Content: Ordered and delivered quickly at seasonal Black Friday discount. As normal, no hassle and very reliable.

Title: Very quick and efficient service would‚Ä¶

Title: I am really happy with my purchase.I‚Ä¶

Monitor as advertised is a god send during lockdown

Title: great service
Content:
great service
telescope order one week, delivered the next week.

Title: 90% great. 10% annoying.
Content:
90% great. 10% annoying.

The service was great, I called up, placed my order and paid over the phone - then went to collect within the hour. This wasn't bad as far as Covid times go HOWEVER, the online chat and phone support centres are CLUELESS! 

I was told that to pay 'cash' I could pay online, get a refund on 'collection' then pay cash. When I called to place the order/confirm, I was told that there's no cash payments. Which is somewhat fair, but all support staff should be going from the same guidance, not giving misinformation. Lost a star for this foolishness.

Title: Great service
Content:
Great service, competitive prices! 

Very Happy Customer ****

Title: Site very easy to use
Content: Site very easy to use. Excellent quiick delivery .

Title: Camera bag
Content: Good service would recommend

Title: "Enquiries super answered  about an old‚Ä¶

You have lots of knowledge there and service was efficient. ( Feel confident about calling you again if necessary)  !

Satisfied of High Barnet.

Title: Favoured online camera shop.
Content: Favoured online camera shop.

Title: I still miss the Drummond street store‚Ä¶

Title: Slight stocking issues
Content: Slight stocking issues

Title: Very help staff at Norwich store and‚Ä¶
Content: Very help staff at Norwich store and quick phone response on general enquiries.

Title: WEX customer service as good aa ever.
Content: WEX customer service is as good as ever. A shame that my new tripod arrived with a broken head. Very good that a replacement was reserved awaiting the return of the damaged one. A score of 4 and not a 5, as I had to call after emailing the day before.

Title: Gearup creator box II XL
Content: Great product which was exactly as described and very well made. It was offered at a special price as it was a pre-order but I didn‚Äôt realise how ‚Äòpre‚Äôorder it was going to be...My order was place at the end of August and the item finally arrived in mid October......the WEX ordering & receipt process worked as smoothly as usual. The only reason I deducted a star is that no-one could advise when the item would be in stock.....and waiting two months is a long time....I realise Covid was the cause but the lack of an anticipated delivery date was frustrating and the item became a very late birthday (nearly early Christmas) present.....

Title: I bought a used nikon zoom lens
Content: I bought a used nikon zoom lens; the product was clearly and factually described on the web site, and delivered promptly and well-packaged. Good company.

Title: Incorrect Address
Content:
Incorrect Address
The label on my parcel was in my name but addressed to a totally different company. The accompanying invoice was correctly addressed  so I cannot see why the label was so totally incorrect. It was only due to being tracked down by the recipient on facebook that I got the parcel. Luckily I hadn't ordered an expensive piece of photographic equipment. This is the first time I've had a problem with WEX but it is a worrying one.

I am now updating this review as WEX has sorted out the problem with upmost efficiency! Thank you WEX you'll be seeing me again!

Title: Click and Collect timing was unclear
Content: Click and Collect service was great. The only thing is that I expected to collect my order the same day that I made the order (which is what I have been able to do with other camera stores like Jessops) and I would have had it posted directly to me if I had realised it would take a day to get to the shop. I think it would be helpful if this was made clearer on the website.

Title: Wex fell short on this product
Content:
Wex fell short on this product. I emailed and asked if this view finder would fit a Canon 1DX II and was told it would. When I received the finder the adaptor plate was for a different model. Fortunately I was able to source a new adaptor plate from another supplier. The view finder was sold as 'product returned unopened' and  was on a special sale offer. The combined cost was about 25% less than a new finder and not quite the bargain advertised. 
Yes I will buy from Wex again based on previous experience.

Update
Thank you Amanda for your reply and partial refund. Yes difficult times. I have now upgraded the stars.
Lets hope we can all return to normal working soon.

Title: Service was very good
Content: Service was very good. Main issue was answering the phones. Advisors knowledgeable and delivery quick

Title: The lead I ordered for the Canon EOS R6‚Ä¶
Content:
The lead I ordered for the Canon EOS R6 works very well thank you in, downloading photographs from the camera to the computer.
The service and delivery as usual was very good, even finding the item on your website was easy to find.

Title: Good products and fair prices but‚Ä¶
Content: Good products and fair prices but disappointing that they we sent in a Jiffy bag that on arrival was shredded. Fortunately the filters were not damaged but a case of good luck not good management!

Title: great stuff

Content:

Title: Usually good quick service
Content: Usually good quick service. A little disappointed that an order placed on Oct 20th has still not materialised 3 Nov.

Title: Ordered Sony Camera used
Content: Ordered Sony Camera used - condition as described and prompt delivery pleased with service from Wex

Title: I ordered a new camera bag but it then‚Ä¶
Content: I ordered a new camera bag but it then transpired that it wasn‚Äôt in stock and potentially could take a couple of weeks or so which was a big disappointment because it was necessary for me to have it sooner however fortunately it did turn up sooner so all was well in this instance the bag itself is excellent and does the job very well, I‚Äôm well pleased

Title: Good service. Need to sharpen up QA slightly.
Content:
A good selection of photographic equipment generally with competitive prices. My only niggle was that the lens I ordered came in a damaged box (looked to have been dropped on a corner). While there are no obvious signs of damage to the lens itself, it does show a lack of care in the warehouse. There was plenty of surrounding padding and no sign of trauma to the outer box, the damage to the lens‚Äôs own box must have occurred prior to shipping. This suggests they need to take more care in their dispatch and/or warehousing dept. I always keep a lens‚Äôs box as it is useful in the event I trade the lens in. A damaged box can‚Äôt help with the value given to my exchange lens. May also have caused shock to internals - fingers crossed it hasn't affected the lens performance.

Update 3rd Nov. Wex have passed my comments to the relevant department and made a very reasonable offer of either a discount or replacement lens. You can't say fairer than that so I have increased my rating accordingly.

Title: Good service delivered very promptly
Content: Good service delivered very promptly

Title: No complaints
Content: No complaints. The delay in delivery was presumably because new stock was slow to come in from the manufacturers because of the Covid crisis.

Title: I gave this 4 stars only because of the‚Ä¶

Title: Great !
Content: Everything great about my purchase, can highly recommend the shop if you looking for good quality check out products. The only thing which I wasn‚Äôt happy about delivery, product arrived without any damage but I wasn‚Äôt home and delivery driver left my order with someone random who wasn‚Äôt me. I think if we order that expensive purchase then should be double check with the ID card or leave at post office to collect if I‚Äôm not home.

Order pentax lens conveta very reasonable price. Delivery was made by the time stated could not fault service.
5th

Title: A great customer experience‚Ä¶
Content: A great customer experience with decent website, friendly and helpful in-store staff (when I visit) and a good range of products at OK prices.  Ordered a few rolls of 35mm film online; Kodak Portra shipped straight away but had to wait a while for my 3 rolls of Fujifilm Superia Xtra. When the Fuji did arrive it only had a shortish (<1YR) shelf life too but I have put this down to coronavirus-related supply chain issues.  Has gone in the freezer so all OK.  Also, on the plus side this second half of my order came well packaged and with free postage too.

Content: A long wait for my pre-ordered EOS R6 but worth the wait. Once Canon supplied WEX,  the service was excellent. Would have been 5 stars if I'd been kept better updated on Canon's supply problems but recognise it has been difficult this year.

Title: As advertised and described

Title: Excellent resource to look For any‚Ä¶
Content: Excellent resource to look For any Photographic requirement. Great, quick and efficient services providers. I won‚Äôt hesitate to recommend this resource to any one.

Title: Delivered on time all working fine
Content: Delivered on time all working fine, however a 'normal' DP cable would have been useful as part of the package; not sure why the BenQ monitor came with a DP/Mini, which was of no use.

Title: Camera and lens purchased are great but‚Ä¶
Content: Camera and lens purchased are great but think there customer service could be slightly better in some of the departments.....

Title: Excellent Service.
Content: Excellent Service.

Title: Delay in payment for used items now resolved
Content:
The exchange was was agreed but only after was it suggested the money was against credit on the account. I replied that this was not expected nor acceptable. They have possibly agreed to give me the money but now it is looking like a delay for unknown reasons. There has been no correspondence regarding any issues. At worst Wex have my money at best there was initial obfuscation about the process and now a delay. Poor communication in any case.
Thanks for sorting out in the end,

Title: Check the description of second hand‚Ä¶
Content: Check the description of second hand items carefully. I purchased a Second Hand Studio Flash Kit and thought that as it was a kit it would have included the normal 'kit' items. When the kit was used as a trade-in some of the items were not present. While Wex dispatched the item very swiftly and were very good a explaining and sorting me out with one of the missing items, I have ended up having to get some of the items from e-bay as they are no longer stocked or current items. Do read what is included and make sure it is what you expect, query before you buy.

Title: Very efficient and helpful  customer‚Ä¶
Content: Very efficient and helpful  customer service. However, I did feel that the company policy related to GDPR guidance has been interpreted in an unhelpful manner. When I rang about the fault with the new printer, I was informed by the agent that he could not discuss the matter as I was not the named person on invoice. The printer had been purchased by myself as a birthday present for my 17 year old daughter (whose name was on the invoice). I was then required to email the manager to confirm that I was in fact her legal guardian. As a result it took over a week for the problem to be resolved, which was only a matter of replacing a faulty ink cartridge !!

Title: Good advice
Content: Good advice.

Title: First time purchase
Content: First time purchase, all good including delivery

Title: Great customer service
Content: Great customer service, thank you!

Title: Wex were great as ever
Content: Wex were great as ever, but disapointed with quality of colour card for the cost simply a piece of card in a sleeve for over ¬£100 expected a robust vinyl or plastic not just card board, could have got this from ebay for ¬£25 either way not worth much more than ¬£5.

Title: Having ordered an out of stock item
Content: Having ordered an out of stock item, I was informed that stock had arrived some time later but my payment details had expired. After resubmitting payment details I was told the item would be scheduled for delivery. After about one week I received an email asking for payment details. On phoning was advised that payment had in fact been made and despatch was actioned for the following day.

Title: Great service
Content: More than satisfied with the service from Wex in respect of a purchase of a new Nikon Z6 via the Virtual Photography Show September 2020. Everything going to plan in respect of confirming my order and delivery to home.

Title: Highly recommended
Content:
Very easy to use website. Very straightforward. Would highly recommend for photography related items. 

Would like to see more Godox products

Title: Good service
Content: Good service

Title: Enthusiasts!
Content: Make no mistake, Wex are a fantastic bunch to deal with. The staff are knowledgeable and enthusiastic and certainly look as if they enjoy what they do. It's almost a pleasure to part company with your money! The downside - The time it takes for the 'Used gear' department to a) assess how much a repair will cost to a traded-in item and b) the wait to receive the proceeds from that sale with the repair cost netted off. It's far too long.

Title: Almost never give 5 star's
Content: Almost never give 5 star's, very easy to purchase items, not the cheapest place for lot of things, but at least you know the quality of the item's and very good after service

Title: Ordered a Vanguard tripod online
Content: Ordered a Vanguard tripod online, which arrived very quickly, and was exactly as described. Good service.

Title: Camera advice
Content: Having spent a number of hours reading reviews on cameras I decided to go to WEX to get their advice. On arrival we rang the bell as requested and after waiting 10 minutes rang again and again. Whilst I appreciate that the shop may have been full I would have expected the courtesy of someone letting us know that we would need to wait rather than be left stood there wondering if they had heard the bell. Once in I was given unbiased professional advice based on my requirements and I was able to handle the cameras to help make my decision. The purchase was straight forward and I did not feel there was any pressure for me to buy. I would recommend WEX for anyone needing advice/guidance for all photography requirements and would use them again. I would have given a 5 star rating if the arrival/greeting had been better managed.

Title: Alternative to ubiquitous Amazon
Content: Bought a trail camera from them.  Attractive price, and speedy delivery.  Why go Amazon when you can use a UK specialist?!!

Title: Need better communication with customers.
Content: Good range of chemicals and reasonable prices. Dropped a star because there was no indication of when the out of stock item would turn up. As it happened, the stop bath arrived the morning I set up to process some film.

Title: all good.
Content: all good - good selection of products, info and good service.

Title: My products were shipped on time and‚Ä¶
Content: My products were shipped on time and arrived safely.

Title: I am enjoying my new printer from Wex‚Ä¶
Content: I am enjoying my new printer from Wex Photo Video just fine. Many thanks

Title: My past experiance of Wrex is very‚Ä¶
Content: My past experiance of Wrex is very good, I have given four stars and not five because on my most recent purchase there which was inconjuncdtion with a part exchange there was a delay in making the part exchange funds available for the new purchase.

Title: expected standard of service
Content: expected standard of service

Title: Good service
Content: Good service, from an easy website. Prompt delivery. Not sure the best prices.

Title: Was good couple of glitches sorted out by jack and billie
Content: Will buy again no problem

Title: Very good efficient service ,always use‚Ä¶
Content: Very good efficient service ,always use wex for my gear.l must had I was a bit disappointed  with a recent lens valuation, hence the 4 stars.

Title: Reason they lost a star was they‚Ä¶
Content: Reason they lost a star was they allowed me to order and took a payment although the product wasn't in stock. But I couldn't fault the speed of reply or service after I emailed to say I urgently required the product .So yes would use again, need to sort out stock availability though .

Title: Fantastic price
Content:
Fantastic price, exceptionally fast service and quality product. However the lav mic I bought only works with smartphone even though it has a camera option. 
Otherwise, I would 100% reccommend!

Title: Great customer service
Content: Great customer service, highly recommend

Title: Great communication
Content: Great communication. It was only the delay in receiving the order that lost a star. Although not totally their fault.

Title: WEX were the most competitive
Content:
WEX were the most competitive, the communication was very good the order process and shipping time super fast, for this I thank you.
I highly recommend you give WEX a try.
Why only 4* I'm sure WEX will agree there's always room for improvement ü§î

Title: Friendly enough and delivery was good.
Content:
Friendly enough and delivery was good.
Just a slight hiccup the part-ex dept failing to pass on to the main site that I was ordering a camera. This meant more delay than necessary. it was disappointing not to have my suggestion that I should be further up the list. I mentioned in several emails that I was asking to purchase an R6 body.
Reviewer Name: Robert Helliwell ARPS; President of SCC

Title: Exceptional circumstances for all meant‚Ä¶
Content: Exceptional circumstances for all meant a delay in delivery but i was kept informed and updated on order progress. Otherwise it would have been 5 stars.

Title: The camera arrived exactly as promised
Content:
The camera arrived exactly as promised, and is as described and I am delighted with its performance.  The support bracket and screen protector took rather a long time be delivered.
It would have been 5 stars but for the slow delivery of the second part of the order.

Title: They did what they promised.
Content: They did what they promised.

Title: I waited months for a new Canon camera‚Ä¶
Content:
I waited months for a new Canon camera on pre-order, which was more a problem with Canon's supply chain that anything to do with Wex. During this time Wex were very good at keeping me updated, and didn't require any deposit to be paid to secure the product, which was a plus.
The product became available on a Friday in September and rather than contact me directly to offer a Saturday delivery, someone at Wex made a decision to send it for a non-weekend delivery. This was a shame as this was one of the last good weather weekends of of the summer, which somewhat tainted the buying experience.
Other than this relatively minor issue, it's been a good experience and I hope Wex can learn from this and communicate more with their customers on delivery options.

Title: Delivery was a bit fraught but customer‚Ä¶
Content: Delivery was a bit fraught but customer service was excellent.

Title: package arrived safe ,well packed ,very‚Ä¶
Content: package arrived safe ,well packed ,very happy with telescope,would recommend this company,very helpfull,

Title: The customer service this time has‚Ä¶
Content: The customer service this time has improved on my last experience.

Title: I like the fact that you have a‚Ä¶
Content: I like the fact that you have a technical staff we can help convince me to buy a gadget

Title: Ordering a little confusing
Content:
I ordered the big stopper and little stopper and am delighted with both.

The only reason I dropped a star was when searching for the little stopper it came with options of just little stopper and little stopper with tin.  this led me to assume a tin wasn't included in the packaging.

I ordered a little stopper but ordered the tin seperately as to do this was cheaper than ordering both together.  A little confusing

The items arrived promptly and are of great quality

Title: I have already done this review.
Content: I have already done this review.

Title: Telecopse with a bonus
Content: I decided to purchase the starter Telescope having researched a number of products. As it happened the deal for the given price included a Hand Warming LED Torch. The price indicated for the torch was ¬£50. Normally these prices are inflated to make the deal seem really good. I am happy to say that, in this case, the torch was worth the price stated so I reckon I have a great deal.

Title: Reduce the size of box for packing
Content:
Delivery of a really tiny camera battery was fast and efficient.

I would have awarded five stars, if the battery had not arrived in a truly gigantic box, with mounds of padding. 

This rivalled the over packing (Amazon)  of a single fly swat. In that case I calculated the box could have contained over 200 fly swats! Please reduce packing to the minimum possible size.

Title: Great service with no issues.
Content: Great service with no issues.

Title: A simple business transaction
Content:
A simple business transaction
Ordered product over a telephone line.Call was short Wex assistant was cheery helpful and Delivery was as promised.
All together very efficient

Title: All OK but 'next day delivery' does not work
Content: Everything went smoothly online. There were no human interactions required (this is neither good nor bad; just a comment).  I went to the online store via a third party website where a 'next day delivery' code was on offer. This code was not valid when I tried to use it. Even so, the high value item purchased itself offered 'next day delivery' but unfortunately, the item was not delivered the next day. This is not a problem for me since I did not require the item urgently. However, I think 'promises / offers' should not be made if it cannot be fulfilled. It just creates an unnecessary feeling of disappointment.

Title: Happy with the product
Content: Happy with the product. But took longer than expected for delivery

Title: Quick service
Content: Quick, excellent service from Wex, but cannot understand why my order of two items, was delivered separately on the same day by two different delivery drivers from Parcelforce at different times. A waste of their time and mine, waiting for the second parcel.

Title: Item didn't show as out of stock until‚Ä¶
Content: Item didn't show as out of stock until after the order was complete which seems an odd way to do things ‚Äì howe er it was in stock within a couple of days and Wirth me the day after that.

Title: Wandrd PRVKE 31Back Pack photography‚Ä¶
Content: Wandrd PRVKE 31Back Pack photography bundle-Very happy overall with this back pack. I used it on a 5 mile walk and also on a 25 mile bike ride-comfortable to carry 100 to 400 lens attached to full frame camera body plus another smaller camera and lens. Side and top access were very handy and worked well.The only slight issue with the side access,is that the velcro cover that wraps round the open side zip of the cube, is narrow(approx 9 cm wide) and does not wrap round the whole zip (approx 15 cm long) leaving the zip exposed at either side of the velcro. When trying to remove the camera and lens this was slightly fiddly as the camera body got caught on the uncovered zip. I think this would not be a problem with smaller camera bodies.

Title: Generally happy
Content: Generally happy.  They downgraded my trade-in even though the shutter count was only 1600 but it wasn't worth quibbling over.  Buying was easy although they couldn't refund my trade-in until my credit card had been charged - I was asked to make the request again when the goods were delivered.  The package came quickly and well-packaged.  However, they use Parcelforce to deliver.  I was not notified on the day of delivery as I should have been, the delivery person turned up unexpectedly at 5pm and they didn't ask for a signature.  It is lucky that I was in to accept the delivery.

Title: WEX were excellent - Royal Mail not so good
Content: Product was in stock and arrived well packaged and in perfect condition. It took longer to arrive than I thought. The reason was Royal Mail which unlike other carriers don‚Äôt deliver Saturday or Sunday.

Title: Always good delivery time
Content: Always good delivery time

Title: Arrived before expected time protectively boxed
Content: Arrived before expected time. Protectively boxed

Title: Product delivered in a timely manner
Content: Product delivered in a timely manner, well packaged. No issues.

Title: Wex is my go to shop for all things‚Ä¶
Content: Wex is my go to shop for all things photography. All things good, apart from a disconnect over cut off times. When I placed my order just after 5pm it still said I was eligible for next day delivery which I paid for. Unfortunately the actual cut off is 4.30. Customer services were great in explaining the situation, just left a little sour taste having not received the items when I needed them for.

Title: I would have given 5 stars but I could‚Ä¶
Content: I would have given 5 stars but I could not get the discount code to work and when I contacted them their reply was if I order something else they would give me the discount which I thought was a bit of a cop out seeing as I'd spent ¬£250....

Title: Good follow up on delayed order
Content: My order was delayed for over 6 months. But as soon as the item became available I was informed and it was delivered very quickly thereafter.  Thee system was effective to enable this.

Title: Very good speedy delivery very happy
Content: Very good speedy delivery very happy

Title: Good service but did not have some of‚Ä¶
Content:
Good service but did not have some of the things I wanted to look at.
I purchased a Manfrotto Backpack.Pro Light 3N1-36. Good item and well made and it was at a discounted price.

Title: Good service Happy with the service‚Ä¶
Content:
Good service Happy with the service Item arrived quicker than expected
Will use again in the future

Title: Shopping experience was good as expected
Content: Shopping experience was good, as it should be, good arrived when promised.

Title: Not Totally happy with the response to‚Ä¶
Content: Not Totally happy with the response to a query sent to customer services, on a request for information. Only half the question was replied too.

Title: Peak Design backpack
Content:
Everything delivered on schedule and the tracking app was reasonably accurate 
A small part missing but wex sorted that with PD quickly

Not had much experience in using the backpack yet, i would want to see how this works in the rain but great so far. Size was 30l and a mirrorless camera with 3 adapted lenses covering 17 300mm plus accessories are fine in the bag

Title: Good trade in experience apart from the messy courier
Content: I traded in a Fuji 16mm f2.8 with a Voigtlander 21mm f1.8. I'm very happy with the exchange and the financial side of it. From a logistical stand point, Parcel Force failed to pick up my lens 3 days in a row, which forced me to bring it to the shop and finally delivered the new lens one day later than scheduled...next time I will ask for a different courier to be appointed.

Title: outstanding piece of kit for an amateur‚Ä¶
Content: outstanding piece of kit for an amateur photographer like me

Title: Happy to use again
Content: Everything went great apart some confusion over the required delivery date.

Title: No problems here.
Content:
A good, positive experience. WEX know what they are about, and this gives a sense of security. Speedy delivery, and well packed.
Why not 5 stars? WEX dropped the price of my lens by ¬£200 the day after I received it!

Title: Original order didn't register due to‚Ä¶
Content: Original order didn't register due to technical issue and had to call them, but all good in the end.

Title: Great service as always from wex
Content: Great service as always from wex, took longer than normal to get an exchange quote on my old equipment but was to be expected under the circumstances.

Title: Very helpful and polite staff
Content: Very helpful and polite staff. It did take six weeks for my order to arrive, but this was down to COVID 19 delays.

Title: There are some complexities due to‚Ä¶
Content: There are some complexities due to changes in the order. Wex coped with this very well.

Title: Excellent turnround of my latest order‚Ä¶
Content:
Excellent turnround of my latest order for an Insta360 OneR 1 inch Mod plus accessories.  Delivered next day, even though I did not ask or pay for that. Still one item outstanding, but that will no doubt turn up in the fullness of time 
One cannot complain about outstanding items when they are not in stock.

Title: Very good but no free delivery option
Content: An example of how other online retailers should be operating. Would have given five stars but I had to pay for delivery.

Title: I purchased a Sigma 100 x 400 Lens
Content: I purchased a Sigma 100 x 400 Lens which had to be ordered for delivery as they were waiting for them to arrive. Great Lens happy with it but I was unaware until it arrived that the Tripod mount had to be bought separately, so had to get one (specifically for the Lens) afterward. If I had been informed about this I would have ordered one at the same time. But all in all good prompt service.

Title: Really pleased with experience and‚Ä¶
Content: Really pleased with experience and service. One of items ordered was out of stock which had potential to delay my order but when followed up you were able to split my order to allow delivery that suited me. Would have been nice if this was more visual when placing the order but you managed it well.

Title: New eye piece for Telescope
Content: Packing was Excellent. Came early. Good price. My husband Very Pleased with it

Title: Great professional service.
Content: Great professional service.

Title: Arrived well before stated arrival date
Content: Arrived well before stated arrival date

Title: small item
Content: Ordered a small item no fuss no bother, item arrived earlier than expected

Title: Goods were as described and arrived as‚Ä¶
Content: Goods were as described and arrived as promised.

Title: A very good price and an excellent‚Ä¶
Content: A very good price and an excellent phone service.

Title: Good lens and service
Content: Good lens and service, although the pickup process could have been  made a  little clearer.

Title: Would be five stars but doesn't offer tracking
Content:
Would be five stars, but dispatch emails come with a tracking number that is actually just a "signed for" status. No tracking is available so confusing why it's even in the dispatch email.

I queried this with their live chat. They have no idea. A tracked service shows where the item is, the "signed for" service they use only shows when it's been delivered (which is pretty useless for me as I would presumably know where the package is at that point).

Title: Good service under the circumstances‚Ä¶
Content: Good service under the circumstances (global pandemic) but I would have liked to have received regular updates via email on the progress of my order as it was delayed due to supply chain difficulties.

Title: Excellent camera bag, prompt, cheap, but overpackaged
Content:
Lowepro camera shoulderbag, identical replacement for one stolen so I knew it would be excellent.  Very good price, came very promptly, within the 1 hour slot as stated by the helpful tracking (Parcelforce).

My only cavil: absurdly overpackaged.  I'm glad Wex pack cameras and lenses very carefully - but this was a ruddy BAG!

Title: Product arrived and was in fantastic‚Ä¶
Content: Product arrived and was in fantastic condition. Minor mix up with the delivery address but was resolved. Delighted with the product itself.

Title: good customer service
Content: good customer service

Title: Very good service
Content: Easy to navigate website, prompt delivery and safely packaged. Would not hesitate to recommend warehouse express

Title: A bit slow in delivering
Content: Took a bit longer than expected to deliver, but that may be down to current circumstances.  Overall, a good selection of kit at reasonable prices.

Title: Great initial service with delivery etc‚Ä¶
Content: Great initial service with delivery etc but unfortunately product was faulty but the returns and refund service was also very good as were the people I spoke with. Sadly they were unable to supply a replacement if they had it would have been 5*

Title: Pretty good
Content:
Pretty good; visual editor is a bit janky though - difficult to organise multiple assets in sections.
Also, hosted documents are given gibberish filename - does not keep original. Big minus.

Title: Generally no problem with Wex
Content:
Generally no problem with Wex , they only sell
Quality products and will recommend them .
Staff are very helpful and know what they are talking about regarding photographic equipment.
As said no problems.

Title: Good service
Content: Good service. That's all we need.

Title: Rapid and efficient service.
Content: Rapid and efficient service.

Title: I purchased a Sigma 70-200 f:2.8 sports‚Ä¶
Content:
I purchased a Sigma 70-200 f:2.8 sports lens from WEX and the chap on the phone was very polite & helpful, My order was delivered quickly and well packaged, I'm delighted with my purchase and would (depending on price) purchase from WEX again.

The only issues I had with my order were with third parties not WEX themselves, ie. WEX offer a 'Buy Now Pay Later' finance option, but despite having a good credit rating, their finance company was reluctant to provide the service offered and rejected my application twice.

The second issue was with the courier, I got no notification that my order had been dispatched, was on route or was out for delivery, therefore I came home to find a parcel containing an ¬£1,100 Lens dumped on my doorstep.

Despite this I would purchase from WEX again, but rather than purchase online, I would preferably visit the store with my Credit/Debit card, or cash.

Title: Good as ever.
Content: Good as ever.The technical advice about flash guns (which I didn't purchase) was indeed v good

Title: Online order of a zoom lens
Content: Online order of a zoom lens - arrived in 2 days, well packed. All good. In shop service not so good though.

Title: Used B+W 46mm MRC Clear UV Haze (010) Filter Review
Content: Wex always accurately describes their used products. Great product, great service, let down by sending a filter in a 15cm cubed box when a padded envelope would have sufficed. Otherwise Wex would have scored 5/5.

Title: Very prompt dispatch of orders
Content:
Very prompt dispatch of orders, and good efficient communication via email.
Orders were accurate and competitively priced.
Downgraded one star for their use of Parcelforce as their main courier. For each of my orders, Parcelforce were really inefficient and their tracking system is poor. One one occasion, they couldn‚Äôt find my address, which has been here for 25 years! Parcel came a day later.
Not really the fault of Wex, but if they have a choice of couriers, i would advise they change from Parcelforce to another more reliable courier.

Title: Great service
Content:
Great service. Did us a discount when we ordered several products at once.
We weren't able to receive all the products at once due to them not all being in stock, so they were sent at various times, as was agreed.
Only reason not giving 5 stars is that the communication could have been better to inform us when the delayed products were arriving. We generally had to phone and chase for an update.

Title: Allow longer for WEX vouchers  to arrive during Covid
Content: I've ordered WEX vouchers before & been 100% satisfied; the only reason for awarding 4/5 on this occasion was the length of time the original hardcopy took to arrive - 11 days. Some of that was due to the slow Royal Mail delivery (no doubt down to Covid) but it transpires that although the voucher was requested on a Thursday evening, the postmark proves it wasn't in the post until the following Tuesday. The customer service team at WEX was very helpful & after my second call on the Thursday a week after I had put in the order, they offered to cancel the original voucher & replace it with a pdf of another voucher which allowed me to get it in the post in time for the birthday.

Title: Th item I ordered was out of stock for‚Ä¶
Content:
Th item I ordered was out of stock for a very long time due (I think) to Covid 19 
issues. Once the item was in stock it was dispatched very quickly and efficiently.
I was very impressed with the on line chat service which I used on several occasions to receive updates.

Title: The Nikon D750 I ordered was described‚Ä¶
Content: The Nikon D750 I ordered was described as a 9 in the Wex advert. When it arrived promptly - with the lens I ordered - it was as described, and if I'm honest, generally better than I expected apart from a couple of issues. The rubber covering around the battery door was becoming detached. Secondly, I discovered that the D750 I received had not been returned to Nikon to have the widespread shutter fault repaired. I have returned the camera to Nikon myself to have this undertaken. I would have, at least, expected some warning of this in the camera description in the Wex advert. This would not stop me from using Wex again who I have, on previous occasions, found to be professional, prompt and competitive.

Title: Clear product choice, good service.
Content: Clear product choice, prompt system and delivery, does exactly what you need.

Title: Good value and quick delivery
Content: Good value and quick delivery, just what I needed when faced with a crisis purchase!

Title: I know this is not within your control
Content: I know this is not within your control, but the service from Parcel Force on this occasion was not the best, mainly down to them not delivering on the day specified and then trying the following day when no one was at home, without updating the day and time information on their tracking site. After a quick e-mail complaining the package was delivered the following day.

Title: The product is great
Content: The product is great. It can be further improved by making it waterproof. I am using it very carefully but I am afraid of spilling water on it.

Title: Screws for Lee filter holder
Content: Ordered screws for Lee filter holder , so nothing big or serious. But it was delivered on time ok, so no complaints. Fair price too.

Title: Prompt
Content: Prompt, accurate Service

Title: Very quick
Content: Very quick, efficient and helpful

Title: Arrived within 24 hours -condition of‚Ä¶
Content: Arrived within 24 hours -condition of camera was better than described

Title: Just delivery that‚Äôs the problem for...
Content: Just delivery that‚Äôs the problem for me. Staff are amazing, products when they arrive are always well packaged, prices are on par, but delivery is always a day out on expectations.

Title: Delivery agent let down a near flawless experience
Content: Pricing was excellent. Web site pretty clear. Promised delivery not quite so good. Could however have been outside of your control due to Parcelforce. However I was not made aware of any delays and my relationship is direct with you. In this day and age communication is everything.

Title: Very good service
Content: Very good service, excellent product, delivery could have been quicker

Title: Overall I am happy with WEX
Content:
Overall I am happy with WEX. They weren't perfect in relation to communication surrounding my order, but Martin was apologetic about that and I am pleased I shopped with a UK retailer rather than an online multinational company.
I will buy from them again and I will continue to support UK businesses for their contribution to our society.

Title: Replacement
Content: Initially equipment was out of stock, then sent wrong piece, but once recognized acted very quickly and efficiently to replace.  Would be happy to use them again.

Title: As always
Content: As always, helpful staff and my order was ready for collection. Would recommend the company for good value for money and helpful staff.

Title: Great service at Belfast store.
Content: Great service from staff in Belfast store, especially Angus. Very helpful and I got a great lens, exactly what I was looking for, and a good price. Thank you !

Title: Very good service
Content: Very good service

Title: All in all the service has been very‚Ä¶
Content: All in all the service has been very good, but although the camera ordered is out of stock they are unable to give me an approximate delivery date and said that they are unable or unwilling to contact Canon for delivery to their warehouse. Canon must know, I find this very frustrating.

Title: Great product to add to c-stand accessory
Content: The product was fine and good at the time of delivery. It is very durable and strong.

Title: The main service from Wex has been‚Ä¶
Content:
The main service from Wex has been good. Unfortunately my delivery was a day or so late (however after emailing the next day delivery postage fee was refunded). This may have been understandably down to COVID. 

I will use Wex again.

Title: Goods arrived promptly and were as‚Ä¶
Content: Goods arrived promptly and were as expected

Title: Nice easy transaction
Content: Nice easy transaction goods arrives as stated, While it was nice to receive an offer of money off your next order if you spend ¬£!50 within seven days, that's not much time if your looking for accessorizes,  why  not give a voucher that can be spent on your next purchase and not have minimum  spend. Sometimes it's nice when a company throws in a little gift as a thank you for spending a substantial sum of money. This keeps  your loyalties with the company. Like all buyers looking for the best price and service and treated as a loyal customer.

Title: Quick delivery
Content: Quick delivery

Title: Thought postage was expensive.
Content: Item was as described, though I thought the postage expensive considering it was put in a jiffy bag and the box squashed to get a cheaper rate. Lucky it wasn't a present.

Title: Good service would recommend
Content: Good service would recommend

Title: Excellent service
Content: Excellent service. The product I ordered was not in stock, however as soon as it was and dispatched I was informed. The only reason I have ratd four star is the delivery was overdue by two days. Not really a big problem, but you know what it is like awaiting new kit.. I

Title: Only 4 stars as there was no‚Ä¶
Content: Only 4 stars as there was no information on when out of stock item would be supplied.  I had to ask to get an estimate, it would have been nice to be kept informed.  Other than that the Lens arrived and was a great addition to my current collection.

Title: Poor communication/service
Content:
I have placed a "special order" item order. I have contacted twice for an update regarding a lead time. Twice I have been told a lead time could not be provided and I should wait for an email from purchasing. 
Communication from WEX is about as poor as any company I have ordered from. They have no automated process to provide a lead time on special order items. Having purchased special orders from other companies, I am accustomed to being emailed or called when the purchasing department has placed the order, to notify me of an anticipated delivery date. This has been the case with other companies despite the Covid19 pandemic.
I am awaiting an email today with the lead time for my order and if it remains awaited come the end of business today, I will be cancelling my order and taking my business and support elsewhere. 
Disappointing given that having had good experience with WEX in the past I have repeatedly recommended them to friends and family.

Edit: The response below is correct. I have received an email this afternoon stating that WEX received "an update on this via email this morning and this is apparently in transit to us as we speak so we would expect delivery early next week".

Martin has been helpful and communicative, better communication was all I wanted. I have raised my rating accordingly.

Title: Great service from Wex as usual but let‚Ä¶
Content: Great service from Wex as usual but let down by Royal Mail. The tracking did not work at all even on the day of delivery. Thankfully the item was able to be delivered through the letterbox.

Title: Delivery delay
Content: Camera didn‚Äôt arrive when I was told it would, however that was the fault of parcelforce not Wex. A review of service providers might suggest that parcel force could be bettered.

Title: Good service but delay due to lack of‚Ä¶
Content: Good service but delay due to lack of supply could have been helped by keep g me informed of the lead time

Title: Great service
Content: Great service - kept me informed of "out of stock" position but only delayed delivery be a day or so.

Title: Although my order was for modest‚Ä¶
Content: Although my order was for modest amount, a single box of paper, I received the same attention that I would expect had I been placing a much larger order. It is this sort of service that makes good customer relations.

Title: Kept up to date and very helpful
Content: Kept up to date and very helpful

Title: Easy to set up and very simple layout.
Content: Easy to set up and very simple layout.

Title: Very friendly and superb customer service
Content: Very friendly and knowledgeable over the phone. A few crossed wires of info due to lockdown and stock deliveries regarding the item I purchased but I‚Äôd definitely use them again.

Title: Very speedy and efficient service.
Content: Very speedy and efficient service.

Title: Parcel Force 'Next Working Day' delivery of DJI Mavic Mini drone
Content: Slight disappointment at not being told at the point of sale that Parcel Force's 'Next Working Day' delivery could not be guaranteed, due to Covid. Confidence restored through Wex's prompt and very reasonable response to this criticism, and, further, their freely given and invaluable specialist advice on the technical details and best methods of use of the purchased item.

Title: Whilst i am happy with the product
Content:
Whilst i am happy with the product, my initial experience was disappointing.
I received an e mail informing me that the item was available only to be informed it was not in stock after placing my order. My follow up e mail was answered but with no apology. No follow up just an e mail to say it was eventually being dispatched.

Title: Very prompt and good quality
Content: Very prompt and good quality. Only comment is that the frames were darker than I thought in colour and so do not match my walnut furniture as I had hoped. Calling them "dark walnut" might be more accurate

Title: Remote takes Photos but does not turn‚Ä¶
Content: Remote takes Photos but does not turn on Video function of camera, l was told it would, so disappointing

Title: You are perfect
Content: You are perfect - except that you use Parcelforce to deliver larger items and we are only 30 miles from you in Norwich but it has taken a number of days for stuff to get here on several occasions over the past few years - next day deliveries have been missed etc. Is it just us that have these problems, is it where we are or is this a general issue?

Title: Delivers as usual
Content: Ordering straight forward. Really swift delivery of products

Title: Very quick delivery
Content: Very quick delivery, even when some of my order was out of stock they divided the order and sent seperately which was great as I did not have to wait for the bulbs I needed, will definitely continue to use for my photographic supplies, thanks again.

Title: I had to return an item and things‚Ä¶
Content:

Title: The star rating is based on the after‚Ä¶
Content:
The star rating is based on the after sales service, not the product. I bought a lightly used e-m1x which was advertised as minus the camera charger, not an issue for me as I had used Olympus for years and had a charger. The camera is faultless (after 3 days) but there was no USB lead for connecting for updates etc. When I phoned to ask them to send one they said they wouldn't as it wasn't specifically listed in the advert ... not a great cost to me but it will affect any future purchasing decisions I make.
Edit
Wex contacted me and have sent a USB lead free of charge so my faith in them is restored and I have upped the rating accordingly.

Title: Everything I expected from Wex, but ...
Content:
The service from Wex was everything I expected.  I've used them before and been happy with their service then too. The lens was exactly as described, in fact it looked better than I expected.

However the company they use for delivery, Parcelforce are a shambles.  Paid extra for next day delivery, then got a message on the day, Friday, from Parcelforce to say there was a delay and the parcel would not be delivered until Monday.  No mention of refund of the cost and no details of the 'delay'.  That is just not acceptable these days.  Thankfully Wex were on the ball and reimbursed my delivery cost immediately.

Title: Recommended
Content:
The experience was really good overall. Easy order, fast delivery and in great condition. 
Only thing preventing a 5 stars is I had to clean the sensor, due to spotting on the images. This required a kit purchase. 
All good now but I would have expected that to have been checked.

Title: Had trouble getting stock during‚Ä¶
Content: Had trouble getting stock during lockdown, but delivered everything eventually.

Title: GOOS SERVICE
Content: I have only made one recent purchase from Wex. However, I was satisfied with the service.

Title: Brilliant thanks

Title: Wex Photo Video: Lens Purchase
Content: Great and friendly customer service via phone and online chat. Recommended pricing in terms of researching this particular product I was looking for. Slight issue with their chosen company for parcel transport, but otherwise great.

Title: review updated, to reflect good response
Content:
received my order today, however the battery charger was missing taking the shine off the excitement of trying something new.  I contacted via online chat and was informed they would get back to me today to see if they had a canon charger to send me!!  And that didn't happen, I have resorted to ordering a generic charger from amazon at an extra ¬£18.99.

review updated to reflect good response from WEX.

thanks for the reply I wasn't expecting that !!  
and due to the fact that this has been remedied I have increased my review to 4 stars

You are unable to contact them when the delivery time they give you is not convenient. They then deliver the next day but do not give a time so you need to be in for the day.

A different delivery company may make delivery more customer friendly. Service from Wex is good.

I'll contact the helpline again for ideas where the dust probably is and how to remove it (i.e. on the scanner plate or the transparency)

I highly recommend Wex to all professionals or starting video producers and photographers.

delivery was done in no time, the box inside the parcel was quite damaged , luckily it was nothing fragile but never a good first impression when you received a delivery. 
overal very happy with delivery time and price was ok , so i would recommend

Title: 3 Legged Thing Punks Travis Tripod
Content:
I looked at several makes of tripod, searching for something of good quality at a reasonable budget and preferably not made by one of the huge 'global' brands, many of which have European sounding names but are actually Chinese. Nothing wrong with that, I just wanted to support a home-grown company.
The 3 Legged Thing Punks Travis seemed to fit the bill perfectly.
So I was a bit disappointed to find that, while the website made much of it being British designed and engineered, when it arrived it still had a 'Made in China' label on it (no mention of that on the website).
Having said that, the quality is excellent throughout and the tripod is perfect for my needs. There are also a number of accessories available should I wish to expand the system later on.
All in all, a great buy. But why oh why can't they be built here in the UK? If not for that, it would have been 5 stars.

So my experience was certainly not what I expected, I have purchased a few products from Wex in Edinburgh and have been delighted with the service however not this time.

There was obviously an issue between getting information about stock deliveries onto the system. Overall though am happy as the price was competitive.

There was a delay dispatching the order then Parcel Force failed to deliver when they should have done (not WEX's fault although I did suggest that they should use DPD instead. So I feel that they did provide good customer service and therefore I have removed the 1* review and have left this improved review.

Title: Very useful product and glad I ordered‚Ä¶

Title: My Fujifilm X100V Purchase Experience
Content:
This is my second Fujifilm X100 series camera and I'm really impressed with this new machine with the quality of build and the range of functionality. I've always enjoyed using my previous X100T version and am looking forward to trying out the new one. I'm sure I won't be disappointed.
I found the Wex online purchasing system easy to use, but had problems at checkout forcing me to call Wex for assistance. The call was answered promptly and the issue resolved in no time.
At the time of ordering the camera and one other item was out of stock so I had to wait a while for new stock to arrive. I expected to receive a call from Wex on the progress of my order, but didn't receive anything. So I phoned to chase up the order and was told that the camera was now in stock, but that they didn't dispatch it as they were waiting for another item on the same order to arrive. However, they did agree to dispatch the items in stock, but the final part of my order is still outstanding and as yet no one from Wex has contacted me with an update on when it might arrive.
Wex would have got 5 Stars from me if only they had kept me informed on how the order is progressing.

Title: New Lens Order
Content: As usual easy ordering process, good gear (item as described) and great delivery service.

Title: Ideal photography shop
Content:
Ideal photography and video shop. Excellent service, product information with many helpful blogs and articles to improve your photography. Great for every kind of photographer and film maker alike. 

Generally OK on price. Just depends on what you're buying. Still worth shopping around since, understandably, it's not possible for WEX to stock or specialise in everything. 
Though WEX is one of the best specialist shops online I've found; for say sound equipment, I personally trust a shop like GAK. That said it all depends on what you're looking for.

In my experience WEX supply and keep up with most of the best gear on the market so if you're looking for reliable, practical and well designed gear, and an extensive choice at that, you can trust WEX. Well designed and functional gear is invaluable in my opinion and I know I'll find it here. Just do your research since most gear is not perfect. Although some of it is.

Title: Not in stock so had to wait a couple of‚Ä¶
Content: Not in stock so had to wait a couple of weeks but arrive it did safe & sound.  Considering the current climate World wide that was great.  Alan:-)

Title: Great service
Content: Great service and great products I highly recommend WEX

Title: All good except for price discrepency, though Wex did resolve this after the event
Content:
Item wasn't in stock at the time of ordering. Placed order all the same and was notified promptly when Wex received a shipment. As over 1 month had elapsed I needed to reauthorise card payment. This was all well managed and satisfactory.

What wasn't so good was that since ordering the RRP had fallen ¬£15 from the price I paid. Maybe technically I had entered into a contract at the old price but morally I felt a little duped. I discovered this price drop after confirming my card details and progressing with the order. To their credit Wex did refund the ¬£15 when I pointed this out. Ideally, and to be fair, this should have been pointed out to me when confirming the order. Possibly there was a 'disconnect' and the system wasn't aware of the change in RRP...

Not the first time I've ordered from Wex and certainly won't be the last.

Title: Great Service
Content: Great choice of products, competitive pricing, fast delivery, especially in the COVID19 crisis.

Title: Sound product descriptions
Content: The number of options can sometimes be large and it is a great help to have your sound product descriptions to help with the choice.

Title: Online purchase was easy
Content: Online purchase was easy. Progress of delivery easy to monitor and arrived on time

Title: Great selection and range‚Ä¶ comms needs a *bit* of work
Content: Wex had the best selection and range for binoculars that we could find, and they provided a good deal of useful information to help us in making our choice (though we also looked at other online reviews). Was slightly taken aback only to be told *after* placing my order (in the middle of a pandemic, to be fair) that I'd be emailed when the product was 'in stock'... but it nonetheless showed up on my doorstep within the week in spite of no further updates being received. So a slight weakness in their communications is the only reason they haven't received 5 stars from me; in every *other* sense I've had an excellent experience ordering from them and would happily do so again.

Title: A Bit Of A Mix-Up
Content: All the people I spoke with were very pleasant and helpful, but somehow they managed to send me TWO cameras and charge me twice, putting me into overdraft.

Title: Good Wex site but omitted a small item when posting.
Content: Wex has a good site and a wide range of cameras/accessories and I have used them before. I purchased a second-hand M43 camera recently. The condition was as described, well-boxed and all items, apart from the triangular metal pieces to attach the camera strap to the strap-post, supplied. I am still waiting for these little parts to arrive so I only give 4 stars rather than 5. I have taken the equivalent fixtures from another camera in the meantime.

Title: Fantastic service and prices and would‚Ä¶
Content: Fantastic service and prices and would have been 5 stars but have been let down by their courier on both orders so far

Title: Experience when buying was great
Content:
Experience when buying was great. Product is great.

My only criticism is the delivery experience by your carrier, Parcel Force - the first day delivery was due they didn't turn up because they couldn't find the address. I then had to rebook the delivery and wait two days for it. Parcel Force have delivered here numerous times before and we've never had anyone say they couldn't find us. Its not a new house or changed address - the house has been here since 1783 and is well signed in a residential road!
We have experienced problems several times with Wex orders in the past - we have bought the next day delivery option, you have dispatched the item but Parcel Force haven't come on the specified day - hence we often come and collect our orders in Norwich.

Title: This would have been 5 stars if the bag‚Ä¶

Title: The service was excellent but product poor
Content: The service was excellent, however, the product was poor. We ordered a 35mm slide converter but the instructions were very basic and despite having good quality colour slides (I had some transferred to digital professionally and they were fine), the viewing and printing quality from this machine was unusable. It's possible that editing would have improved the final result, but the accompanying instructions did not include editing. We had so many slides to convert that editing each one individually would take months so we returned it and got a full refund. The lesson is that if something seems too good to be true, it probably is!

Title: Very good service

Title: Well packed
Content: Well packed, all items arrived as ordered and within the time indicated initially.  Great camera too!

Title: WEX an efficient and trustworthy business.
Content:
WEX are an efficient and trustworthy business. I have bought several items from them in the past and have always received courteous service and help.   Ordering and deliveries are carried out like clockwork and I was kept well informed about my orders via my online account and through regular emails from dedicated and friendly Sales team.  Where I needed to return goods, this was carried out without any quibbles. The Returns Department are very efficient too, and provided a Returns Form and pre-paid labels to simplify the return of packages via Parcel Post.  
My one disappointment was when I bought a used lens which did not focus correctly and had to be returned,  A second replacement lens also had a similar fault.  I was assured that WEX had checked both lenses before they was sent out, but this was clearly not the case. However, I was able to return the items, without hassle and at no cost to myself. . For this reason I can only give a 4 star rating instead of a perfect 5.

Title: Part Exchange
Content:
I purchased a new Nikon camera and at the same time sent my old Canon for part exchange.  After a few days I phoned up and the department dealing with the refund  were unaware that I had bought a new camera from them.  The money was immediately refunded into my account.

Simple to use website and staff have a lot of knowledge and if they can't answer know someone who can.

Title: Emotional rollercoaster of delivery dates
Content:
Lots of stress as this said 2 working days when I ordered (perfect) then it became three (difficult) then 1 week (impossible), but in the end it arrived within 2 working days (perfect).

I realise these are stressful times, so I should probably give 5*, but we did end up having a second unit delivered just in case.

Monitor itself seems fine, some annoyances and some things I still can‚Äôt do with it, but otherwise I‚Äôm happy.
