Title: No instructions with this
Content:
No instructions with this, you plug in and play. Once plugged in and switched on it goes through a registration process that takes you to the Wacon web site, this was not the most helpful but if you google setting up the device there are some good online resources that can get you up to speed quickly.
If you are used to using the ALT key with the sliders in ACR or lightroom you're going to find this a challenge as it seems to respond in its own time and sometimes not at all, hopefully will crack this in time because right now it's really frustrating.
Wex did a good job of getting this delivered quickly even though I only paid for standard, but it did come in a box big enough for 20 devices.

Title: Excellent, Except for the Packaging
Content:
I purchased a portable SSD and an expensive LaCie RAID from Wex online.  The items arrived on time via Parcelforce 24 in a sturdy box.

Air bags had been used to pack the items inside the box but, unfortunately, they weren't up to the job.  The shipping box was undamaged, but had apparently been dropped and the weight of the RAID had burst the lower bags, leaving both units with little effective cushioning.  The bottom of RAID's own box was distorted, presumably from the impact.  That said, both units were undamaged and work well.

I've purchased from Wex before and would recommend this excellent company, but perhaps they should review the way they pack small heavy items.

Title: Two used transactions
Content:
I bought two used cameras.

- Fast delivery without hassle
- Well packaged
- All items promised were present and correct
- Minimal time to wait on the phone
- Transaction processed quickly and efficiently
- Staff good to deal with

The D300 was, in my opinion, better than described.  I was very pleased with everything about it.  The lens bought at the same time was equally better than described.

The D800 wasn't as impressive.  There was more paint loss than I was expecting, and due to a lack of photos I couldn't see it before I bought.  While paint loss was mentioned in the description, there is more than I was expecting for a camera with a low shutter count.  There is also a slight dirt spot on the mirror, I haven't fully tested the camera yet due to weather, but based on the D300 I'm sure the sensor will have been cleaned to a good standard.  The writing on some buttons (AF-ON, AE-L) is slightly faded which wasn't mentioned in the advert.  One of the plastic strap guides that clicks onto the mounting loops is also broken, but not mentioned on the advert - though I can't see these being essential or particularly expensive, an irritation more than an issue.

Positives though - wear to the rear screen was mentioned, having inspected myself, I cannot see any wear to the screen - just some usual scratches to the screen protector which is something to be expected.  I also can't see any wear to the base (paint loss as mentioned above aside).

Overall I'm happy enough to keep the D800.  My constructive criticism would be to upload more large photos of each camera as words don't always do the cameras justice or show the potential damage.

I've given a 4 star review because of the lack of photos and a slight optimism on the written description of the D800.  Perhaps I feel it was a bit optimistic because of the D300 far exceeding its description.  Both cameras were rated an 8 for condition, and I would say that they are absolutely not equal.  The D300 is definitely better than an 8.

This is by no means a negative review.  I would have no issue recommending Wex and would definitely use them again.

Title: NIKON Photography Equipment
Content:
I'm very satisfied and happy with Wex Photography Video's efficiency in speedily completing my recent Orders. BUT ....
My Orders also included three 'Out of Stock/Back Order' items (Nikon 500mm f5.6E PF ED VR AF-S Lens;  Nikon MB-D18 Battery Grip for Nikon D850; and Nikon MH-26a Kit with Adapter BT-A10) which Wex says I will be emailed to advise when the items are in stock.
I'm aware that these particular items (and, I assume, others) are currently scarce in the UK's Photography Equipment industry, generally. But as one of the UK's leading suppliers, even if only to maintain good customer relations, I strongly feel that Wex should consider posting periodical  'status updates' on its website (say, monthly?) showing estimated delivery periods. This could be based on their internal knowledge, expertise and expectations, taking account of the (short/long) lengths of their own 'Waiting Lists' at any one time. Otherwise, customers like myself currently have no idea if we might have to wait one week or one month or one year or forever!

Title: Nearly awesome.
Content:
Have used Wex for years and always had first class service.
I knocked a star off for the very last transaction. I ordered the new Canon 1DX mkiii and a 24-70. Total order ¬£7230.
The camera was delayed (no fault of wex). I got a call from them on a Friday to say it was in stock and they appreciated my patience but also the card it was supposed to be shipped with was out of stock. I agreed to take the camera anyway and wait for the card. The person I spoke to asked when I could take delivery and we agreed it would be the next day (Saturday). Just to make sure we were on the same page the agent confirmed a weekend was ok.
I waited in all day for a delivery that didn‚Äôt happen.
The camera arrived on Monday. No big deal but don‚Äôt promise what you don‚Äôt intend to do.
Basically Wex chose to cheap out on paying the Saturday delivery charge on a ¬£7000 order! Not great. 
My advice is don‚Äôt over promise and under deliver. If I was told Monday in the first place that would have been fine.

Title: New lens and review of 'pre loved' Canon equipment.
Content:
We went in for a specific Nikon fit Sigma lens having already done our research and comparisons on line and checked that Wex had it in stock.  The sales staff were very helpful and duly supplied the lens that we had requested.
In addition, Wex's consultant reviewed a number of Canon lenses and a D550 that we wished to trade in.  Regretfully the lenses were not found to be in a condition that Wex would have been comfortable to re-sell but the Canon body was taken in.
The consultant was not available when we called in but we left the second hand equipment with them and he called us the next day.
It was good to see the extent of the investigation that was carried out on equipment that Wex would be required to guarantee.  All in all a professional operation that instills confidence and quality.

Title: Good overall service.
Content: I use Wex for quite a few of my purchases. I often find though that the local stores often don‚Äôt carry stock, which can be frustrating at times when I want to call in and have a look at something before deciding whether to buy. I could rent and get a refund if I buy, but not quite the same. Overall very happy with them, more an observation on buying in general.

Title: A trusted supplier but be aware of possible issues with USED, BOX OPENED items.
Content:
I wanted to give WEX a 5 star review as the ordering and delivery process was as usual, great. I ordered a Wacom One Creative display that was described as used but only because the box had been opened. The display basically looked new and looked like a great buy until I tried to register it. Then some problems started. Wacom was appearing to bar access and I thought something was wrong with their website. It turned out that somebody else had registered the Wacom One which caused problems trying to get the included software downloaded. It was quite obviously a customer return but not mentioned on the WEX advert.
I was pretty disappointed that WEX had not told me this might be a problem. However, I managed to get Wacom to agree to reregister and open the software up when I sent them my WEX invoice. Luckily they see WEX as a prime supplier of their products. Due to this I have raised my score from 3 stars to 4. But I would like WEX to be aware of this kind of issue and make it clear on this type of sale.

Title: good after sales service
Content: good after sales service

Title: I purchased an Canon DS120 body only‚Ä¶
Content:
I purchased an Canon DS120 body only and I tried it out in a limited way after the purchase and it appeared OK, it did freeze once with a flashing error 005 message on the lcd screen. I powered down and back on and it has been OK since I did call WEX Photo and a very help full lady assured me if I was still unsure after the one failure I could return the camera for a full refund, this I did not need to do.
I would buy from your selves again, not just because the price for the Canon body beat many on ebay but because you were so helpfull when I did call a big plus in my opinion.

Title: Credited the wrong account
Content:
I traded in my lens and accepted the revised quote over the phone.
However I noticed my account (the one with the email address that all the correspondence about the lens was going to) had not been credited.
Later on I checked an old account I had with my old email address and found the money ended up there instead which was odd to say the least.
Unfortunately the delay meant I lost out on purchasing the lens I wanted and I am not willing to pay the extra ¬£50 for a different one.
Why could you not credit the account that belonged to the correspondence email?

*Update
Wex got in touch very quickly and sorted the issue out for me. Special mention to Joe who was excellent at customer care.

Title: Good website and correct items sent
Content: Good website and correct items sent. Poor delivery arrangements, meant I had to do 1hr round trip to Parcel Force depot.

Title: Lens arrived swiftly and well packaged
Content: Lens arrived swiftly and well packaged. Would use Wex again

Title: Original nikon Battery
Content: Wex has always provided great service, items are always dispatched quickly and are good quality.  I do price research and usually at the time of ordering their price is best for what I want.

Title: Great service but you are being let down by delivery
Content: Great service but you are being let down by your delivery partner (parcel force). A delivery company which cannot find my house, whilst the complete address was provided. I had to call them and tweeter. Not the first time I have had problems with them. This will make my choice of buying from Wed difficult if this delivery company is used.

Title: Detailed description of items
Content: Detailed description of items, competitive prices and reliabe delivery.

Title: Spot on with the view on the condition‚Ä¶
Content: Spot on with the view on the condition of the lens.fast and easy checkout,delivery was too long for my liking.but overall extremely happy with wex and the items ive bought from them.

Title: Friendly
Content:
Friendly, and polite.
All went according to plan.

Title: A good fast service but expensive
Content: A good fast service but expensive, and didn‚Äôt give me the a great price on my trading.

Title: Staff are very knowledgeable and‚Ä¶
Content: Staff are very knowledgeable and helpful, prices are ok but I feel they could be a bit more competitive

Title: As in the case of my earlier order
Content: As in the case of my earlier order, the service was very good, though Parcelforce late with delivery in first and slightly late in second.

Title: Well made product that should help with‚Ä¶
Content: Well made product that should help with focus issues on some of my lens/camera combinations, should give reassurance.    Instructions could be clearer but you can find more detailed instructions on line.  Excelent delivery service.

Title: Used Olympus camera
Content:
Ordered a used Olympus camera, which arrived as advised.  Very pleased with the product, in almost new condition, with only one minor issue, which was that the triangular "D" rings to which the neckstrap attaches were missing.  However, managed to find suitable alternatives, so it wasn't worth taking it up with Wex.
Otherwise very pleased with the camera, which replaced an older model Olympus which I had also purchased used from Wex, and which has been well-used.

Title: Good response and delivery from a‚Ä¶
Content: Good response and delivery from a responsible firm, have been dealing with them for some time now.

Title: Paid for next day delivery but items‚Ä¶
Content:
Paid for next day delivery but items didn't arrive until the following week.

Not the first time this has happened with Wex so avoid paying the extra cost of next day.....

Update - Wex have refunded the delivery charge which is much appreciated!

Title: Packaging much too big
Content: The order went through very quickly and was dispatched also quickly, but there was an offer for free next day delivery, but you weren't told how to get that. Also the packaging was far too big for what was inside!

Title: Very friendly and helpful staff at your‚Ä¶
Content: Very friendly and helpful staff at your Glasgow branch

Title: The Pre-order was easy to make
Content: The Pre-order was easy to make. A little more clarity over the actual expected delivery date would be helpful in future. That said when I chased the order via email customer were very efficient and open with a fast reply

Title: Amazing
Content: Amazing. Great price. Super easy. Took one star off as it promised Free one day delivery which they couldn‚Äôt fulfil.

Title: Friendly and knowledgable staff
Content: Friendly and knowledgable staff. Good stock. Only slight issue they were unable to install the latest firmware update to my camera which added support for CF express meaning I had to buy an XQD card that I didn‚Äôt want just to upgrade the firmware.

Title: There was a problem with the dispatch‚Ä¶
Content: There was a problem with the dispatch of my goods due to arrive on a Saturday. When I was aware of the problem I contacted Wex and they arranged for delivery on Sunday at no extra cost to me. I always believe that how a company acts when a error occurs gives you a better idea of how a comapny operates than when everything goes smoothly. The only reason I cannot award 5 stars is because the problem occured, but I give them 5 stars for how they dealt with it.

Title: Good service
Content: Ordered lens which I thought was in stock. Was on back order but not a long delay in getting it in time for Christmas. Good response from Wex customer service to chase and expedite it.

Title: Camera wrist strap
Content: Camera wrist strap . Woks well, nicely made, delivered on time thanks

Title: No problem at all with the service‚Ä¶
Content: No problem at all with the service first rate.

Title: expensive
Content:
expensive i do not need the twin battery holder which was free and valued at ¬£299, i would have prefered the ¬£299 of the final price.
but the srevice is good and reliable, I also know that any problem would be resolves efficently

Title: Happy shopper
Content: Nice product, helpful  staff arrived next day as promised.

Title: Large camera lens blower brush
Content:
Large camera lens blower brush 
Item arrived on time product as described

Title: WEX - you‚Äôve done it again!
Content: Easy navigation and a speedy delivery.

Title: Great service
Content:
The 2nd hand lens purchased was like new and correctly described at the right price. 
It arrived earlier than expected. 
The only criticism I would make. is that after the order was placed and I received an email reporting that the lens had been despacted, the parcel force tracking number was not included and did not appear to be available on the web site.

Title: First choice site for photo & Video‚Ä¶
Content: First choice site for photo & Video equipment. However, it lacks reviews of items and even full-specifications in some cases. These tabs are often empty.

Title: It‚Äôs worth using
Content: It‚Äôs worth using

Title: Only used you once but great service‚Ä¶
Content: Only used you once but great service and on the ball with my order.

Title: only my opinion
Content: easy to deal with.  I had to phone because free next day delivery option was not showing on web order page despite being heavily advertised by WEX.  Apparently, because I live in Scotland, WEX  cannot offer me next day delivery.   Maybe Royal Mail is not the best delivery company to use then.  WEX offered me free delivery at earliest date though and in fairness, Royal Mail did deliver item next day.

Title: A terrific camera store but maybe more‚Ä¶
Content: A terrific camera store but maybe more info on which items are for sale with a discount code

Title: Delivered very speedily and well‚Ä¶
Content: Delivered very speedily and well packaged. One star deducted for an initial error on the price. This was quickly corrected after I pointed it out but should have been picked up before the customer receipt was issued.

Title: Quick and painless
Content: Quite a quick process really. Was a bit more than I wanted to pay but can't complain.

Title: Some problem with system put my order‚Ä¶
Content: Some problem with system put my order into suspension. When I chased an acknowledgement problem was quickly resolved

Title: Efficient service
Content: Efficient service and item arrived well packaged and on time

Title: Excellent service
Content: A well structured website, making it easy to find the right product from an extensive range. Fast and efficient processing of orders. Products arrive as quick as (or faster than) expected in perfect condition.

Title: Good service, slight delivery issue
Content: Good service, let down slightly by the split delivery across 2 days, when I had specified I wanted it in one go and was given one dispatch confirmation.  Can't fault the high quality products they sell though.

Title: Timely delivery
Content: Timely delivery. Professional and personal treatment.

Title: A potential Christmas delivery failure averted
Content: A potential Christmas delivery failure was averted by chasing and arranging for split delivery which was not previously allowed. Delivery arranged for Monday, was actually delivered on Saturday when we were out as planned, so delivered to PO a mile away for collection on Monday. Ok but slightly stressful just before Christmas.

Title: Purchased a voucher for a present
Content: Purchased a voucher for a present. Website good and the voucher was mailed quickly. But why no ‚Äòe-voucher‚Äô option rather than having to mail a physical voucher?... Surely easier and quicker.

Title: Online review
Content: I redeemed gift vouchers and this went well. The telephone assistant was very good and took me through the order in a professional manner.  I ordered a Hahnal Viper transmitter and receiver that arrived in good working order and I am pleased with the product.  I took one star off for not being able to control the delivery day.  I was assured it would be a Wednesday but it arrived Tuesday and luckily my next door neighbour was in.  Wexphotovideo is great but please ensure your delivery contract is of a similar high quality

Title: Great service
Content: Great service - everything arrived well packed when they said it would. My only VERY slight moan would be about pricing - not the cheapest but reliable and fairly competitive.

Title: I ordered a camera on the internet (2nd‚Ä¶
Content: I ordered a camera on the internet (2nd hand). I went to collect it, only to find out it had been sent back to Fuji as there was a fault with it. Wex said I would have 1st choice of it when it came back. I had no phone call and could not get through on the phone. The answer phone was on and I left various messages & no one called me back, hence I had to go in to the shop. Apparently, the camera could not be repaired, but no one had contacted me to let me know. I asked if there were any other cameras available on the internet & was told that there were non. A friend of mine managed to find one on the internet straight away !!! Overall not impressed with the communication of the staff at Wex.

Title: Delivery came on time & packaged well.
Content: Delivery came on time & packaged well.

Title: Generally excellent‚Ä¶needs modernisation
Content:
Generally excellent (stock/service/reliability etc) but the web shop could do with modernisation. 
One significant improvement would be an online ‚Äòin account‚Äô returns process. It‚Äôs a bit archaic to have to email them, wait for them to email a standard returns form .pdf to ship at you own expense, or wait for them (a human) to email a parcel-force label.

Title: Good customer service but super poor delivery service
Content:
Good customer service, but delivery took ages and had so many problems. I ordered the item on the 5th of December and it arrived with a very poor Parcelforce service on the 19th of December. 

Products in store are a bit more expensive than online. Saw the Manfrotto Noreg-30 at ¬£130 in store when it's ¬£99 online, but sometimes I wish I just bought it in store rather than go through the Parcelforce hell. 

When I spoke to customer service about it they were really nice and helpful, however the delivery was not sent to a post office as required over the phone and eventually, miraculously it appeared at the address I ordered it to ... however they never really came there before when I got my notification... Anyway, the usual poor delivery issues.

Title: Good customer service
Content: Good customer service, good range of products etc

Title: Bought from WEX before and will do so again.
Content: Used WEX many times and always very good. This time, my order arrived and found to be faulty - no problem with that, its not their fault. Phoned customer services who said they would send a returns label.  It never arrived.  However, on the second call to customer services, they said that as it was not a very valuable item and so i could have it in time for Christmas, they would send me an immediate replacement and said to return the faulty item when convenient. Replacement arrived the next day.

Title: Bought 1 new and 1 ‚ÄúOpen Box‚Äù Fujifilm‚Ä¶
Content:
Bought 1 new and 1 ‚ÄúOpen Box‚Äù Fujifilm NP-W126S batteries. 

Unfortunately the description of the used battery was way off the mark with it clearly being pre owned and holding only about 60% of the charge expected. WEX followed up on this (Xmas eve!) and offered a refund for the used battery so impressed with their customer support. I would have hoped they might have described it more accurately from the start - hence only 4/5. 

Genuine Fuji ARE expensive though ultimately worth it in the long run.

Title: Price
Content: My order arrived very promptly which is good. The only thing is I see that the product I bought, Panasonic LUMIX GX80 is selling for less money at Curry‚Äôs PC World!

Title: Excellent service
Content: Delivery was as promised and the goods well protected.  The used lenses were in excellent condition, even better than expected.  My only "negative" comment is to suggest using shredded paper or cardboard to protect the goods in transit instead of air filled plastic bags which we can't recycle in our area, hence the loss of one star.

Title: Got incorrect advice
Content:
Got incorrect advice about the internet trade in process, item pricing, and cash back offers in store. This resulted in me missing out on a deal that would have saved me over 265 pounds on a camera kit. 
The extra ¬£265  put it out of my price range so I ended up buying the camera without the kit lens. There was supposed to be a ¬£70 discount on the camera I bought which was also not applied. I complained and got the ¬£70 refunded but I‚Äôm still annoyed at being left having to pay a about ¬£300 more than necessary to  buy the lens separately.

Edit: Customer service were great, they contacted me and figured out a way to give me all items for the original deal price.

Title: Overall Very Happy
Content: I was very happy with the overall service. I would suggest one improvement for 5 star service: the item I ordered was out of stock, this was fine as the page said it's normally in stock in 5-7 days. I didn't bother checking for a week, then started wondering what's happening. Logging in told me the item was "awaiting stock". This could be improved if there was an estimated time frame for when it would be available - it could save customers needing to contact WEX. The item arrived in stock the next day and I was kept fully informed of the delivery. The item was packed very well.

Title: Used lens purchase was exactly as‚Ä¶
Content: Used lens purchase was exactly as described, but poor trade in value was offered, which I was easily able to better elsewhere.

Title: Fantastic service
Content: Fantastic service. Unfortunately WEX use Parcel Force (Royal Mail) which is like taking a trip back to the 1970's. They only deliver when everyone else is at work. Once spotted my options were to have the package delivered to a local post office (5 days) or take a round trip of 60 miles to collect the item in time for the event it was needed for.

Title: Prompt service and they even gave me a‚Ä¶
Content: Prompt service and they even gave me a bit of discount.

Title: No problems.
Content: No problems.

Title: A great company but just a blip this time
Content: Normally it's five stars all the way for WEX but on this occasion there was a hiccup or two that I'll put down to Black Friday overload in their dispatch dept. They will still continue to be my favourite photographic supplier.

Title: Good service.
Content: Good service.

Title: Great service
Content: Great service. Free returns would be good though.

Title: I have always been pleased with the information from Wex.
Content: I have always been pleased with the service provided, just a little slip this time. I was offered Saturday delivery free of charge, but the item was not in stock. It came into stock when predicted, but was not flagged for Saturday delivery; this was the only shame as it meant my neighbour was bothered unnecessarily. The goods are great, and at an excellent price.

Title: A problem re the use of voucher codes‚Ä¶
Content: A problem re the use of voucher codes plus other voucher types made this transaction a bit of an issue but delivery was very fast and in general the experience of dealing with Wex Photo Video was fine. A small after sales issue was dealt with extremely well.

Title: Good Product, Exactly as Described
Content: Good Product, Exactly as Described.

Title: The items I ordered were delivered very quickly delivered.
Content: The items I ordered were delivered very quickly.  I trust Wex for supplying genuine branded items and not grey products.  For me the extra cost is worth the peace of mind.

Title: Sales staff were very good
Content: Sales staff were very good. However I paid extra for delivery before 9am the next day and my product didn't arrive until the following day.

Title: Good service
Content: Fast service, goods exactly as described (a little better in fact). Well packed. Will happily deal with WEX again.

Title: A rare failure for Wex, but it is an exception.
Content:
Good as always but two stars knocked off this time for some really irritating failures. (One star since added back for Wex‚Äôs follow-up reply. I also genuinely think that a two star reduction was too harsh).

Firstly, I ordered my goods to be delivered to Wex Kennington for collection on Friday. Original confirmation told me that they should be ready from 3:30pm but I‚Äôd get an email to confirm this. I didn‚Äôt get the email so had to phone to confirm that the goods had arrived, that‚Äôs the first niggle. But that was when I was told that Wex Kennington closes at 4:30pm on Friday, not 6pm as advertised so that was a really irritating error. So I had a mad scramble to get to Kennington from Wimbledon where I was working before they closed. So in reality, I had at best a single one hour window on Friday to get my goods, which is pretty poor. That also deeply annoyed me, as I had specially arranged an early start and finish for my Friday shift, and if I hadn‚Äôt known of the early closure or if my shift had slightly overrun, I would have had a totally wasted journey.

Details matter. On this occasion I regret that Wex got them badly wrong.

Despite that, I wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to make further purchases of new or used equipment from Wex and would certainly recommend them if asked by other photographers.

Title: Quick delivery
Content: Unfortunately Wex doesn‚Äòt deliver outside of the UK. I had to order it to a package forwarder, but everything was fine. 5 Stars, if you next time will directly send to Germany.

Title: Excellent service as usual
Content: Excellent service as usual. Knocked one star off as I Was told by the delivery company that my order would be delivered on a Wednesday, it arrived on Thursday

Title: The service by WEX was excellent
Content: The service by WEX was excellent, but Parcel Force failed to deliver on the day specified (this is not the first time).

Title: Really fast service when I ordered‚Ä¶
Content: Really fast service when I ordered vouchers. I scored a 4 as I couldn‚Äôt find vouchers on the online menu and had to call to find out how to order them.

Title: The staff had time and patience to‚Ä¶
Content: The staff had time and patience to explain some new tech. Happy with the experience

Title: Took one star off because 'Usually 5 to‚Ä¶
Content: Took one star off because 'Usually 5 to 7 days' availability turned into 'not in stock' on the order confirmation. Otherwise excellent.

Title: Good & efficient service.
Content: Good & efficient service.

Title: Wex is my go to place for purchasing‚Ä¶
Content: Wex is my go to place for purchasing camera equipment. Normally I can‚Äôt fault them but I have given 4 stars on this occasion as my order was very slow arriving and seemed to go awol during the delivery. It was sorted eventually but was a bit frustrating at the time.

Title: Arrival took longer than I thought
Content: Arrival took longer than I thought. But pleased that one had to sign for receipt

Title: Wex let down by ParcelForce
Content: I would have given 5 stars for Wex, as they have been exceptional in their service. Only, to be let down by ParcelForce. On day of delivery, I received a text saying that my parcel would be delivered between 12:00 & 13:00 hours. Then, attempting delivery at 10:35 hours, so I had to collect from post office. Why give a time and NOT be even close?

Title: Great company and products but the delivery partner sucks
Content: Great company and products, it should have been 5 stars, but you do insist on using parcel farce for deliveries and this is the 2nd occasion have had to refund my next working day delivery surcharge because delivery was 2 days late!

Title: Good supplier but at what price?
Content:
I have just bought a set of Lee 150mm filters for my 14mm lens: 8 items in total, cost a small fortune.

I only bought 5 items from Wex because prices for the three ND filters were much lower from other suppliers. I would have preferred to buy everything from one supplier. Wex has a wide range of products, is easy to deal with and delivers quickly but price differences of more than 20% are too high to ignore. I dealt with two other suppliers who delivered exactly the same products in about the same time as Wex.

Shame...

Title: Christmas Present
Content:
The purchase is a Christmas present and I can hardly wait!
I have read a lot about the camera and am greatly looking forward to using it

Title: Quick and efficient
Content: Quick enough, easy to order and pick up.

Title: Very good customer service
Content: Very good customer service

Title: Telescope for christmas
Content: Bought a telescope for my daughter's Christmas present. The price paid was reasonable compared to other websites. We had it delivered to the store in Bristol for no charge but it did arrive a day later than expected.

Title: Excellent staff communications
Content:
Excellent staff communications, however they dropped one star as the whole trade-in process took too long. Some equipment I was trading in needed repair, which wasn't a problem, but I did feel I was left hanging for a while.

That said, I would use them again, as I did have confidence in them.

Title: I thought  the sony a6000  came with‚Ä¶
Content: I thought  the sony a6000  came with the  basic lens?

Title: Good quick service.
Content: Good quick service.

Title: Great store
Content: Great store, plenty of "toys" and helpful information from staff. The website is good but often does not arrange items logically. You do tend to have to hunt for what you want.

Title: Great experience with Wex
Content: Great experience with Wex, let down by Royal Mail failing to deliver when they said they would.

Title: Good
Content: Really good service took no time at all to deliver great service

Title: First class customer service
Content: Unsuitable item advised by Wex and consequently purchased. Follow up replacement customer service was first class

Title: Thanks for the ability to be able to‚Ä¶
Content:
Thanks for the ability to be able to get a loan to purchase a camera. I am looking forward to get some great photos.
Thanks for the speedy delivery.

Title: Superb shop, service and price.
Content: Very good service, but asked me to verify my identity by sending a scan of an ID card...

Title: Great service
Content: Great service, speedy delivery, thanks.

Title: I wanted a part-exchange in my local‚Ä¶
Content:
I wanted a part-exchange in my local Jessops Branch, and was initially offered a dreadful p/x deal that was 50% lower than a Competitor! 
I did take the time to re-visit the Store and discuss this miserable proposal - which was then personally re-examined by their Manager; and I DID subsequently make make my purchase of Camera body (with an 'included' mediocre Kit lens) plus a separate lens too ~ all at an attractive over-all inclusive price.
In retrospect I was very pleased with my Deal, but initially it was an un-necessary uphill struggle!

Title: Good service for purchase
Content: Good service for purchase, not always the cheapest these days but carry a good stock. In the past did not have the best experience selling used equipment to them and have had much better service in that respect elsewhere.

Title: Lack of information
Content: Ordered camera and extra lens ahead of availability.  The camera was received fairly promptly after release date however over a month later the lens has not arrived.  Disapointingly WEX have not been able to supply any information just 'awaiting stock'.  I have asked on a number of occasions for some estimate of delivery.  I am told information is not available and dismissive of a customers concern.

Title: Purchased used Zeiss lens
Content:
Purchased used Zeiss lens
Would have been good for staff to show me the lens working on a body etc and explaining any warranty etc
Otherwise good product and price

Title: Every thing was very good except for‚Ä¶
Content:
Every thing was very good except for the choose
delivery date. I clicked on choose delivery date
next day or named day, it went straight to next day.
I could not find the named day, Mind you, that could be me
not being used to ordering on line.
J Halliday

Title: Would have been 5 stars but for‚Ä¶
Content: Would have been 5 stars but for delivery. It was promised within 4 working days. I had to ring and chase but the following day it arrived!

Title: Don't order on a Friday
Content:
Although the price of the lens I bought was reduced for "Black Friday" the price dropped more the following day, so I was not too pleased about that.  Also, if you order on a Friday, the "Next day" delivery price really means "Next Monday" delivery. You have to pay more for Saturday or Sunday.  In fact the free delivery would be almost as quick.
Overall, though, they have an excellent web site and good service and prices.

Title: The service from Wex was great but the‚Ä¶
Content: The service from Wex was great but the delivery by Royal Mail was awful. Notified by email that it was to be delivered by Friday afternoon. Did not arrive apparently they could not find our house. Text received during the night to say it will be there Saturday, afternoon time slot. No show, eventually arrived Monday afternoon with no further explanation. Result two days wasted waiting in.

Title: Generally good service
Content: Service was good. Delivery prompt and goods as ordered. Despite the supposedly free postage still had to pay for postage even though the order was considerably above ¬£50.

Title: Celestron Ultima 65
Content:
Celestron Ultima 65
I had no previous experience with telescopes so was unsure what to expect. Having spent a little time with the Celestron Ultima 65 I am happy with my purchase and feel it is reasonable value at this price point. The image quality is always better in good light as you might expect and a tripod is in my view essential.
The Parcel Force delivery service was poor however and although I was at home at the suggested delivery time I had to go to the post office to collect my parcel.

Title: Good company
Content: Good products and friendly advise, the adviser i spoke to was very knowledgeable and informative with my enquiry.

Title: I bought an Olympus M5 iii from the‚Ä¶
Content: I bought an Olympus M5 iii from the Belfast shop during the visit by the Olympus rep. and I am very pleased with the camera. I was told that I would receive a free extra battery, but I am yet to receive it. The shop salesman promised to follow up on 22/11/2019, but I am yet to receive an update. Otherwise, I would have awarded 5 stars.

Title: decent store helpful advice a bit pricy‚Ä¶
Content: decent store helpful advice a bit pricy and separate sales for lens & hoods not brilliant

Title: Excellent service
Content: My order was reasonably priced, safely but sensibly packaged, arrived on time and was exactly what I ordered. The only reason I haven't given five stars is that there is always some room for improvement. I wouldn't hesitate to use Wex again.

Title: Always deliver on time
Content: Always deliver on time. Prices could be more competitive

Title: helpful customer service
Content: helpful customer service - you reach an actual human quickly and they are proactive - very good

Title: Easy to contact and great customer‚Ä¶
Content: Easy to contact and great customer service.

Title: Wex handled my order 5* as per usual‚Ä¶
Content: Wex handled my order 5* as per usual but unfortunately Parcelforce took my new Canon printer for a drive around Shropshire and returned it to their depot.  I had waited in and only in the evening did I find out it had gone back.  It was delivered the next working day.  Not impressed with Parcelforce.

Title: Rainy day.
Content: Great cover easy to use.

Title: Excellent price and rapid delivery
Content:
Excellent price and rapid delivery. What more do you need ?
My only gripe is that  normally I buy on line so that I can get a donation to my chosen charity via ‚Äúeasy fundraising‚Äù . As I had a Wex gift voucher I had to place my order by phone, and the Wex salesman said it was not possible to get a donation to my charity.
That was a bit poor , and I won‚Äôt be asking for Wex gift vouchers in future .

Title: I spent ¬£2800 on a new camera and‚Ä¶
Content:
I spent ¬£2800 on a new camera and received a free grip - all well and good - but I still had to pay delivery! Bonkers! 

BUT 

Wex is always a go to, just wish they'd offer free delivery if you spend a decent amount!

Title: Honest Customer Service‚Ä¶
Content: They didn't have my item in stock and communicated honestly that they did not know when they would get any. I phoned them and they were fine with me in that if I happened to  get it elsewhere they would have njo problem with my cancelling the order

Title: Good experience
Content: Good experience

Title: Good service
Content: Good service, Delivered ahead of time quoted

Title: It looks like a great little camera
Content: My camera did not arrive on the day I was told it would be delivered so I lost a day. It was very well packaged when I received it and the box was in pretty good condition indicating that it was handled properly. I have operated most of the controls and it seems to be working as it should. The camera is pretty clean and it looks close to the picture adv. I have not been able to test it fully yet as I am still waiting for the CF cards to be delivered. The lens appears unblemished so I am hopeful that it will perform as well as it looks.

Title: I feel i should have given 5 stars but‚Ä¶

Title: Great deal on a part exchange but‚Ä¶

Title: Not the cheapest but the most reliable!
Content: Not the cheapest but the most reliable!

Title: A trouble free order and purchase
Content:
A trouble free order and purchase. I would award five star review, however I was misguided in thinking it would be a ‚Äú Next day delivery‚Äù which it wasn‚Äôt. 
I was furnished with tracking details, and therefore was able to make sure someone was available to accept delivery.
Very pleased with the product purchased.
Would use again.

Title: Part exchange
Content:
Collection of items for P/Ex was very good and was informed very quickly two of my items needed repair, fair enough, but what seemed excessive was the cost of those repairs in particular an administration charge of ¬£25 plus VAT for each item, whilst this in effect not a charge levied by Wex themselves it reduced the value of my P/Ex by ¬£300.  I accept it was my choice to go for the repair but in all honesty what choice did I have ?, if I took them back I would then have to go through the whole process again with another supplier, who would in all likelihood have to send them to the same repairer (Fujifilm).

Then to compound it I received an email saying my account had been credited with x amount, this being the full amount excluding repairs, I thought this was wrong but still ordered my new item leaving a small positive balance on my account, my item duly arrived well packed as usual, I then received another email  saying my repairs had comeback and the credit on my account was now x amount less ¬£300, meaning I now owed them this ( which I knew in reality ), being an honest soul I contacted them to pay them what I owed, although I was sorely tempted to wait whilst they asked for it.  When I did ring to pay what I owed I first contacted the sales office were the credit amount on my account still showed without the repair costs, I was then directed to the P/Ex department who listened to my tale and agreed that yes I did owe them so I settled the amount then, they also said they would delete the positive amount from my account.

On the whole I would still recommend Wex to anyone, but would caution to be wary of repair costs and credits to accounts.

Title: Standard delivery is 4 working days‚Ä¶
Content: Standard delivery is a mighty 4 working days whereas Amazon is next day.

Had to wait until next day to get the lens, just lucky I was in at that time as got off early from work. So parcelforce big thumbs down.

Title: Wex performed well in this transaction
Content: Wex performed well in this transaction, though I have one reservation: the supporting video for this product implied that a transmitter was part of the kit but of course it is not - an additional ¬£200 was needed to buy the transmitter on top of the ¬£900 for the three light kit. The jury is still out on the product itself and I am hoping to find some support regarding getting the best out of the Rotolight Neo II - at the moment, I feel like I bought some very expensive modelling lights!

Title: Replacement eyepiece for X-T2...
Content:
I ordered a replacement eyepiece for a Fuji X-T2. There are 3 sizes available, short, medium (standard) and long. I ordered the standard, medium one, but Wex sent me the long one which isn't as good for a spectacle wearer. I could have sent it back for replacement, but when I checked availability it was shown as "out of stock" so I stuck with the long one. They'd have got 5 stars if they'd sent the right one! Service was brilliant, as usual, apart from sending the wrong size. 
02/11/19; In reply to the comment from Wex; Sorry, but there are definitely 3 sizes, the camera comes with the MEDIUM (M) as standard.

Title: Express Delivery...Not!
Content:
UPDATE - Since reviewing, Wex have been in touch and refunded the postage charge as I didn't receive the service paid for. Also promised to take it up with their AM - As I mentioned in my first draft - I don't place blame at Wex's door but to ParcelForce. I will continue to purchase from Wex as they are a premier group to deal with. Thank you for the refund and getting in touch. Great Effort Wex! Impressed :0)
...
I paid for express or next day delivery via Parcelforce. Although I can accept that this wasn't necessarily Wex's fault but I waited longer than the next day. I ordered on the Thursday expecting to receive the order on the Friday but had to wait until Mon before the item was finally delivered. My issue is simply that I could have opted for the slower delivery and would have received my order most likely on the Monday. Therefore, I've been charged for something that was not provided. Again, I point out that this is not necessarily the fault of Wex but is disappointing nonetheless when a service is paid for, that service is not provided and there's no accountability for it. Effectively you are pointed to a disclaimer stating that next day is not guaranteed! Why offer the service then? Poor indeed

Title: Service from wex was good
Content:
Service from wex was good. Returned item as not fit for purpose & they refunded quickly and without quibble. 
Postage was delayed and they refunded postage cost without me needing to ask.

Title: Slightly disappointed as my order  a‚Ä¶
Content:
Slightly disappointed as my order  a Canon lens and a UV filter  didn't  arrive when expected 
I placed the order on a Friday and although it was  a next day delivery it couldn't be guaranteed furthermore told that your carrier  didn't deliver on sundays so as I was going to be absent from sunday evening to Monday evening I agreed to have the order delivered on Tuesday although  I would've like to use it then - 
As the order had not been delivered  by late afternoon  Tuesday  I called your call centre and was told  that the filter  was out of stock
and not sure when it would be so my whole  order was not sent .
I was not informed  of this delay  at all

Also told that your carrier  didn't  deliver on sundays but I believe  they do
I then agreed to split  the order and received the lens next day and the filter a few days later 

I have used WEX in the past and must admit this is the first  time  I was let down when I really wanted this lens for Sunday/Monday

Title: used camera purchase
Content: I have used Wex many times in the past with complete satisfaction with their great service, good communication and careful and accurate assessment of used photographic kit they advertise on the website. This time there was a muddle with the listed item and I received the wrong camera. They dealt with this in a considerate and friendly way and kindly included an SD card I presume as compensation for the error. My only reason for a non 5 star review was the communication was not as comprehensive as before and there seemed a slight level of lethargy in correcting what was their error. They are probably very busy but I will continue to use them as they provide great, friendly and honest service

The Delivery agent - Parcelforce was very poor - includes a missed delivery (drive by) -  arrived with bottom of box stained (oil) - in my opion Wex suggest you read the riot act to parcelforce!

Generally very good service in-store though I had a free setup session for my new camera but the tutor didn‚Äôt establish my level of expertise ( pretty basic) before launching into technical stuff - so perhaps sounding out the clients‚Äô starting point would be helpful.
Otherwise very happy with service and quality

Title: Good staff but they got my bill wrong‚Ä¶

Title: Packaging!!
Content: The item purchased was a Peak Design camera strap. The strap was excellent, which of course made me think "why didn't I get that before!" and the service was good with prompt delivery. The only "gripe" was that the strap (in manufacturer box) came in another carboard box approx 1ft cubed, which was filled with sealed air pockets. I know things have to be packed securely for shipping, but that did seem excessive (and not environmentaly sustainable) for only a strap! Had the packaging been more environmentally friendly, you would get the 5 stars.

I then ordered it online and the product arrived 2 days later. Originally it should have been next day but due to a warehouse error in the Norwich warehouse it wasn‚Äôt available for when I had ordered it. 
Overall the service that I received in store was excellent and was only let down by the warehouse error. I would definitely recommend the WEX store in London for their service and advice.

Title: Trustworthy & things get sorted
Content: Dealings with Wex are usually straightforward and efficient. Occasionally things don‚Äôt work out, but they do get sorted and I find that Wex are honest and work with integrity. Two recent incident worth a mention. I ordered a lens at an advertised discount (which was unmissable). After a wait, I was told the lens was no longer available at the advertised price. I politely requested that my order should be honoured. After discussion with the supplier, my order was indeed honoured! A recent lens I wanted to trade-in with Wex was rejected. They rang me personally to explain and return the lens. Whilst I was disappointed, I also know that used products I buy, are rigorously tested at Wex. Great Service!

Title: My last  visit was really excellant as‚Ä¶
Content: My last  visit was really excellant as it was in the past, but my previous visit was dreadful, I have ended up with a Black Go Pro which I cannot use, I was given bad information, I had explained  I only  had a very old basic mobile phone, and of course it does not work with the Go Pro. So I have wasted a lot of money on something I cannot use. Being a pensioner I have to save up to buy any equipment I want. I should have returned it straight away but kept trying to work out how to use it .I kept being told to watch videos of bow to use it but none answered my problems. I spoke to two  young people on your help line one had never used a Go pro the other just told me to contact the makers. In the past I have been given excellent help,and advised on whether what I wanted was right for me, so have used your Wex company. Last time I knew what I wanted ,but even so thought twice about using you again, so pleased that the lady I spoke to was great and when I had trouble with delivery it by the post office it was sorted out straight away, excellent service

However delivery was slow, especially when you consider the postage charges.

Apart from that, I have to say that the staff were very helpful and knowledgeable.

Fantastic aftetsales service with knowledgeable support - someone at the other end of the phone who was a photography enthusiss and able to give valuable feedback and help me return a disapointing quality product and get a refund quickly and replace it with a better model. 

That's the good bit - the not so good bit is selling the Kenro 4in1 slide scanner that reproduces very poor quality scans.

Title: Buying a second hand lens.

There was no pressure to buy. I bought the lens and it was exactly as described in the ad. I had shopped around so I knew the asking price was a fair one. Used it a couple of times and all appears to be in order.

Title: Very helpful staff

So a good reliable supplier with a very large website.

Title: Wex always seem to be honest and‚Ä¶
Content: Wex always seem to be honest and trustworthy. As I buy quite a bit of used gear, it is always good to have this trust. As an example, they have rejected some of my trade in items because they don‚Äôt meet the high criteria they set for selling your gear to others. This means that you can be confident that any used gear you buy is of good quality and certainly meets the criteria for their rating system.

Content:
Very poor lanyard lens guards top and bottom and solution not sufficient for a Zeiss. This I had 40 years ago with an excellent mint Trinovid recently stolen. Old lens rain guard was adequate and effective. Otherwise  Excellent Zeiss binoculars supplied via WEX. Shame about the inadequate lens rain guards.

Patrick E

Fast shipping 
Product as described
