Content: Good service but some comms disappointing. We had to ask several times for updates on the status if the work which was frustrating. Also, an email sent with the outstanding bill had a typo. The balance was ¬£162 but it was typed as ¬£612 which caused alot of stress and confusion. In store we always receive fantastic service and the range of products and prices is really good but in this occasion, we were a bit let down.

Title: 4 Stars
Content: I bought a camera from Wex by telephone rather than online as there were a few questions I wanted to ask. As usual the service was excellent. The only reason that I have not rated 5 stars is that I paid extra for next day delivery but the camera did not arrive on the next day. Fortunately this was not crucial. When I rang up they were most apologetic and it seems that there was a communication breakdown between sales and the warehouse. Suffice to say the camera arrived before nine o clock the following day and the extra payment was refunded instantly. I have bought various items from Wex in the past, will continue to do so in the future and would not hesitate to recommend them.

Title: always helpful and does what it says on‚Ä¶
Content: always helpful and does what it says on the tin.

Title: Easy Website to use
Content: Easy Website to use . Prompt delivery of the goods. No problems experienced

Title: Overall very fast and easy service.
Content:
Overall very fast and easy service, about my only complaint was no notification of dispatch of my camera after order was accepted. 

Wex delivered next day via Parcelforce with 1 hour time slot and a text first thing in the morning confirming the time, this was very handy.  

However the night before I had to log into the site to see if the item had actually been dispatched for delivery as had no messages or emails.

A quick item dispatched email would have made the services perfect.  

Items arrived very well packed and exsacly as expected and zero issues there.

Title: Good service
Content:
Good service, ordered and delivered promptly.
No complaints.

Title: I would really have liked to have given‚Ä¶
Content: I would really have liked to have given WEX five stars because they generally offer an excellent service. My last purchase was reasonably expensive and when I rang up with a question regarding a gift from Olympus i was given the wrong information which led me to a course of action where another visit to the showroom was necessary at a time when my time is required doing other things. The problem was sorted out quickly and efficiently and i ended up buying something else on my visit to show that i appreciated the resolution to the problem. On my initial show room visit to make the purchase a young female assistant helped me and was excellent, nothing was too much trouble for her and she showed great patience over a long period of time. This is usually the standard met from WEX but on this occasion the support from customer sales over the telephone fell short. I will continue to spread the word among my friends and photographic buddies that this is a good company to have dealings with.

Title: DJI Osmo 3
Content: DJI Osmo 3 - I ordered this and got next day delivery.  It was at a good price and with available stock, which a certain large american website couldn't match!

Title: As ever
Content: As ever, delivery prompt, and in order.  Good place to go and shop.

Title: Great service and faster delivery than‚Ä¶
Content:
Great service and faster delivery than expected. 4 stars only because the contents of the box was an fairly expensive lens. Packaging could have been a little better thought out, since it offered little protection to the lens if dropped.

However, it arrived in goid order.

Title: very good Service
Content: very good Service

Title: Good service
Content: Good service, prompt delivery

Title: The service from WEX was spot on, but...
Content: The service from WEX was spot on. My only slight grievance is with Parcel Force, otherwise it would have been 5 stars. I wasn't able to be in when my lens delivery took place, and the package was left on the doorstep without signature. May be to my advantage, but if it had been raining...! Why can't PF use systems like DPD (or why can't WEX use DPD), where you can change the delivery date on line?

Title: Would‚Äôve given 5 stars but...
Content: When I completed my online trade in quote I put that there was no charger with my px camera, I was happy with the quote so decided to go ahead. When I spoke to the trade in team I advised I‚Äôd found the charger and would be including this with my camera. On receipt of the camera I was contacted and given a px value ¬£40 less than the original quote and was advised this was because no charger was included. I explained there were two chargers included, one third party & one Nikon wired charger, the type that charges by connecting a cable to the camera, I was told that this wasn‚Äôt the type of charger they wanted and I should‚Äôve sent the type that holds the battery. I pointed out that the original quote online was minus the charger so I couldn‚Äôt understand why ¬£40 was being deducted? I also mentioned that the px team I originally spoke to never specified that the charger should be a certain type? The lady spoke with her manager and agreed to honour the original quote. Everything other than this was spot on with excellent customer service. I would definitely use again and would recommend despite the hiccup I experienced, it was quickly resolved. My new camera is fantastic and in great condition, very happy indeed with my upgrade, thank you Wex :-)

Title: Good service as usual
Content:
Good service as usual, Packaging was appropriate for the size of the item but I wish they would stop using PLASTIC balloons and switch to shredded paper, etc.
I also wish they would use couriers like DPD that allows you to live track your package with their app as is move's and gives a time of delivery.

Title: The order arrived at my chosen store as‚Ä¶
Content:
The order arrived at my chosen store as arranged.
However, there were 2 issues which caused confusion.
1. The order details on line showed my home as the delivery address, not the store.
2. I did not receive an email from Wex confirming that the order had been delivered. Instead I received the tracking email from Parcel Force which also caused confusion.
However, I am pleased to say that the order was delivered to the store as promised.

Title: Really good company
Content: Really good company, very helpful and fast deliveries. My only dislike is the recent quality checking of their second hand products. I ve had a few faulty lenses from them but having said that they rectify any problems without hesitation. A pleasure to deal with.

Title: Great product
Content: Great product, although delivery was a date later than it was guaranteed for - luckily no problem caused! Easy ordering and great stock levels.

Title: I ordered and it arrived
Content: I ordered and it arrived, What more can one expect

Title: Great store, too much plastic packaging tho.
Content: Great store, much more stock than Jessops which is the other main dealer near me with a store. Only reason for no 5 stars.... the amount of unnecessary plastic waste packaging. Only ordered a small product, Outer box it came in was 4x the size it needed to be and filled with plastic air cushions.

Title: Good experience purchasing from WEX.
Content:
Internet search displayed the article I was looking to purchase, one click linked through to WEX sales page (good SEO), then two further clicks to purchase and pay. Great online experience.
Item was delivered the following day. Excellent!

Title: Prompt delivery
Content: Prompt delivery, very good

Title: WEX is more like a Camera Superstore
Content: WEX is more like a Camera Superstore, as it is about the size of several average shops put together! That said, they were quite helpful but I wouldn't have minded a staff member to be more engaging with me.i shoot Micro 4/3 & really wanted to check a few different lenses out. As I went to trade in two lenses I was going to have to wait and asked where I could get a coffee locally? I got directions and found  the local Costa round the corner, however when I got back I noticed they had some comfy chairs and a coffee machine next to them, so wondered what you needed to do to be offered one? I would have liked to have more of an engaging conversation with the staff member who served me, as passionate staff are a joy to engage with, but on the whole it was positive experience and I got a decent price for my trade in's & bought another lens which I'm happy with!

Title: Decent product
Content: Decent product, worth the money, though it is essentially just a strap

Title: i recently brought new lens with part‚Ä¶
Content: i recently brought new lens with part exchange on my existing fisheye lens, tried to communicate by phone, poor response, once in store excellent service, perhaps I got wrong person, but I can assure Wex, lad on phone was most unpleasant to deal with and very nearly lost my business. Happy to say that, young lady in store was most helpful and matter was resolved, exactly as I had intended. 8/10 for that reason

Title: I have used Wex for many years and‚Ä¶
Content:
I have used Wex for many years and never had any issues with the quality of the products delivered. All orders (in my case camera equipment) have always had adequate protective packaging to ensure a safe transit from warehouse to customer, something I look for when purchasing expensive equipment.

Their customer service team have always been able to answer any technical queries about equipment prior to purchase and as a professional Photographer this is important to me. There have been a few instances where I have had to cancel orders and a quick call to their office and it's taken care of.

The reason for a four star rating however is due to Wex using Parcel Force as their delivery service. I have on some occasions been sent a tracking code only for the parcel to arrive after the given time slot where I then missed delivery, even though I paid extra for next day delivery. I must state that this is not a fault with Wex directly, but more to do with their nominated delivery supplier. Because of this, when placing high value orders for equipment which I need in a hurry then I will use an alternative camera supplier as I can track the delivery to my front door at the time slot that was allocated, but for everything else I will continue to use Wex as my main source.

Title: Easy to buy from
Content:
Easy to buy from, more difficult to get honest advice from.
Easy to return defective or unwanted goods.

Title: buying used equipment
Content: Very good service and also very helpful nn

Title: Great except for sending me the wrong‚Ä¶
Content: Great except for sending me the wrong extra battery for a camera bought at the same time

Title: No complaints at all.
Content: Talked to a knowledgeable human, goods arrived punctually. No complaints

Title: Product deal good value
Content: Product deal good value. Ordering straightforward. Delivery was a day late without an explanation. Wex customer service very helpful in pursuing delivery organisation (FedX) and ensuring it arrived ok.

Title: The product arrived within a couple of‚Ä¶
Content: The product arrived within a couple of days, which pleased me.  All in tack, and ready to go, and this saved me time and effort going to the shop.

Title: Great service, just don't use ParcelForce.
Content:
Great service, great product, only I wish you did not use ParcelForce.  They make it almost impossible to manage your deliveries.  

My heart sank when I saw it was coming by ParcelForce.  I anticipated having to go all the way to Norwich to pick the parcel up because I could not arrange for it to be delivered on a day I was in.  In the end a neighbour took the parcel, but that was fortuitous.

Title: Always been a pleasure using Wex
Content: Always been a pleasure using Wex, straightforward no nonsense. Staff always on the ball, fair pricing coupled with ease of mind should you need help.

Title: I'd defiantly buy from these again
Content: I'd defiantly buy from these again

Title: Always very easy to deal with
Content: Always very easy to deal with. Msrk

Title: The ordering process and delivery was‚Ä¶
Content: The ordering process and delivery was excellent. Dropped one star because my questions prior to purchase were slow to be answered and then not in full

Title: Wex photography offer a good and‚Ä¶
Content: Wex photography offer a good and professional service

Title: The staff are friendly helpful and‚Ä¶
Content: The staff are friendly helpful and knowledgeable

Title: Good quality used products.
Content:
Good quality used products at realistic prices.
Fast despatch time and items packaged really well.
Only disappointment when ordering was that you couldn't see which courier service was going to be used. Otherwise would give them 5 stars.

Title: Dealing with Wex is all ways a‚Ä¶
Content: Dealing with Wex is all ways a pleasure, staff are all ways polite and knowledgeable.

Title: Will be using more frequently
Content: Used to buy my first used lens, got a good experience with shipping info and product quality was exactly as expected. Recommend.

Title: Delivered a day late but otherwise‚Ä¶
Content: Delivered a day late but otherwise would have been 5 stars .. satisfied overall ...

Title: Arrived on time
Content: Arrived on time, well packaged and undamaged.

Title: Purchase of Nikon lens.
Content: Can't fault Wex Photo Video for their service, the lens was packaged securely and safely and as described. The only issue I had was that the courier, parcel force text to say they would be delivering between 11.00 & 12.00, but by 15.00 package still hadn't been delivered, and I had to go out and they tried to deliver at 17.45, so had to collect from local post office the next day, which was a minor inconvenience.

Title: I love the range of products and the‚Ä¶
Content: I love the range of products and the knowledge of the staff at Wex. They are quick to process orders and answer any questions you may have, unfortunately I can only give 4 stars at present because they still use Parcel Force who can never guarantee your order will be delivered on time! I recently ordered a strap with next day delivery but ended up having to go to the Parcelforce depot to pick it up myself or it wouldn't have been delivered on time due to the delivery label apparently being accidently ripped off. I was only made aware of the issue because I checked the tracking info and all it said was "There is a problem with your parcel, it has been delivered to the wrong depot" I contacted Parcelforce helpline who after three calls informed me that I could pick it up from Swansea which is the correct delivery depot????? The guy at the counter then told me that the delivery label had been accidently ripped off so the delivery driver refused to take it.

Title: Very competent staff
Content: Very competent staff, very helpful.  No life changing movement on the prices.

Title: If you are using the part ex facility‚Ä¶
Content:
This issue has now been cleared up and the company has improved its QA procedures to prevent it from happening in the future.

Thanks to all concerned at WEX - particularly James and his colleagues in the part ex department

Title: Canon PowerShot SX70 HS
Content: I have not been able to use the camera to its fullest extent yet but all the adverse comments I have read so far appear to be invalid. Bearing in mind the quality of the camera and materials used in its manufacture, it's surprisingly light in weight. I will comments again later if I become dissatisfied with something. The camera arrived on time, beautifully packed, within two minutes of the time slot and as advised, the driver of the van was called Richard.

Title: Solid supplier at great prices.
Content:
Solid supplier at great prices.
Some minor issues with trade in and valuation, but on the whole a good deal was done.

Title: Calibrator arrived quickly
Content: Calibrator arrived quickly, but the offer to credit the old calibrator was misleading.  Was under the impression that it was Datavision taking back the old unit in part exchange, not Wex.

Title: I received the Pixma printer in just 4‚Ä¶
Content:
I received the Pixma printer in just 4 days, I am as always very impressed with the quality of the Service. Your colleague on the phone was most helpful and very patient !

Thank you,  Michael Coles

Title: Top service once again.
Content: Great selection using their on-line system. Questions answered very quickly. My only niggle is that in this day and age, with most places offering free next day delivery, most purchases require paid delivery and even with the free option after spending a certain amount you have to wait almost a week for your goods. Otherwise, great company to deal with.

Title: Opinion depends on what camera brand‚Ä¶
Content: Opinion depends on what camera brand you want to obtain. Nikon - absolutely brilliant. Plenty of stock. Know the range and subject. Great. Pentax - only one example of what I wanted in whole company, bout 350 miles distant. Not so great. Thus 4 overall!!

Title: quick delivery
Content: quick delivery

Title: Straightforward transaction.
Content:
Straightforward transaction.
Item irived on time and in good shape.

Title: Chris in the showroom gave me good‚Ä¶
Content: Chris in the showroom gave me good advice on obtaining a small camera pouch for my bridge camera to take on a forthcoming trip to Australia. He also advised me to consider a Canon SX70 HS to replace my Canon SX60 which was great impartial advice - I had been thinking about the more expensive Nikon P1000 bridge option prior to this. Service in the showroom was excellent. It was less fluent in the trade-in logistics for my old camera, hence only 4 stars. I still think I will be visiting the Wex showroom for my camera gear in future.

Title: Informative and timely communication‚Ä¶
Content: Informative and timely communication and product arrived in time.

Title: Good show room with a wide range of new‚Ä¶
Content: Good show room with a wide range of new and second hand equipment. They were happy for me to try out the second hand lens on my camera in the store

Title: Really good process and service to‚Ä¶
Content: Really good process and service to purchase a new lens .

Title: I bought a second hand Leica S case
Content:
I bought a second hand Leica S case. 
No photos of the product on the inside, only outside photos.
Other than that great

Title: Great service
Content: Great service, product range and competitive prices

Title: As always with WEX a fast trouble free‚Ä¶
Content: As always with WEX a fast trouble free transaction

Title: 50-140mm F2.8 lens and 1.4 Teleconverter Fujinon
Content: Product dispatch and ordering efficient. Price competitive with other retailers. Delivery slightly delayed due to Pareclforce issue but still within the 4 working days promised and the 1 hour slot notified to me.

Title: Excellent website & efficient, but price .....
Content: Excellent website & efficient, but often not the best price

Title: Product was as described, easy to order.
Content: Product was as described, easy to order and pick up, only deducted a star as I was kinda ignored for 5 minutes while 2 staff members discussed something at the till. I'm happy to wait, but perhaps just throw a life line and say you'll be with me in a minute. Someone on their lunch break appeared to have to leave their sandwiches and serve me so thanks for that.

Title: Item as expected fast and efficient‚Ä¶
Content: Item as expected fast and efficient delivery.

Title: Almost perfect... Be careful when part exchanging
Content: Almost perfect. First decent camera shop I've dealt with. Done me a good deal on some used and new equipment. Tried to shaft me on a couple of trade in saying the weather sealing on the lens is faulty and they couldn't buy in. Ironically I had bought the lenses from them under 6 weeks before so I managed to get a full refund which helped me out a bit. Lol. Anyway goods came on time, all in decent order. Would definitely buy from them, trade would be questionable though

Title: Excellent range of items
Content: Excellent range of items.  Very helpful staff. Quick service.  But they then pestered me by email to buy other things.

Title: The website had a problem renewing my‚Ä¶
Content:
The website had a problem renewing my password. I phoned, spoke to a human being, who took my order and the package arrived in good time. There's a lesson for technology advocates there, I believe.
Only 4 stars because of the technological failure, but 5 for the man I spoke to!

Title: Great Company, Bad for online deliveries tho'
Content:
Great company, 

I've bought a LOT of gear off them over the past few years. The shop staff are excellent! Online they deal with any issues quickly & respectfully.

The only bad thing is they use ParcelFarce & they're atrocious. It's hit or miss if they deliver on time or at all. 

Sadly I'll not order online with them again. I've been let down for the third time by ParcelFarce. NOT!!!! I hasten to add by WEX, but by their choice of courier company. Because Wex have been excellent in trying to sort out the mess. If I were them I seriously consider using another courier. 

BUT I will continue to use the shops, it just means if they do not have what I want in my local store I would have to consider going elsewhere. Or asking the store to order for me.

Title: Excellent service
Content: Excellent service

Title: Just purchased Fuji gfx R from wex
Content: Just purchased Fuji gfx R from wex, Service from shop in this instance was excellent (not always the case) just one comment, it was cheaper to buy new than to buy second hand?

Title: Good price
Content: Good price.  Worth the wait ofter waiting for stock to come in.

Title: Light stand
Content:
Light stand. Appears to be ex display. Dent in one of the legs and signs of use. Original packaging completely damaged. Will do its job though.
- issue resolved. Thank you.

Title: Delivery iffy
Content:
Would have been five star but the delivery can be unreliable. I paid for delivery on a certain date but came a day later when I was not in.

Dear Simon, the order for which this comment relates to is 52051931

thanks Pete

Title: I paid for next working day delivery‚Ä¶
Content: I paid for next working day delivery but my delivery took 2 days to arrive, pleased I was able to track my delivery so knew it wouldn‚Äôt arrive on the said date.

Title: Was all very straight forward once the‚Ä¶
Content: Was all very straight forward once the product was in stock.

Title: Like to see things before buying
Content: Not that easy to shop on line as I like to see and have a good look at items, especially photographic equipment which isn't cheap, before I buy.

Title: Memory card supplied doesn‚Äôt fit!
Content: Purchased a second hand Nikon D200 camera body. Supplied with it was a SanDisk memory card which is not the correct type for the D200. The SanDisk was on offer with the camera. I now have to purchase the correct SanDisk which wasn‚Äôt explained on the website.

Title: I have always found Wex Photo
Content: I have always found Wex Photo, reliable, helpful and dependable. I have dealt with them for many, many years and would not hesitate to give them a good rating . Many Thanks Wex Photo . Hector Fernandez, Scotland

Title: Swift delivery
Content: Swift delivery, kept fully updated, item as described. Instructions may have been a help, but easy enough to assemble in the end.

Title: Purchase went as it should do with‚Ä¶
Content: Purchase went as it should do with prompt delivery

Title: Great item
Content:
Great item
pity you do not stock in local store
so you end up paying postage on top
as this item fits the Canon 7D The most used sports camera I would have thought local stores would keep it.

Title: Friendly helpful service.
Content: Friendly helpful service.

Title: Good service as usual
Content: Good service as usual. Item purchased was as described and at a reasonable price. The delivery side would be improved by using a logistics provider who provides advance information of delivery date.

Title: The service is top class.
Content: The service is top class and the range is also. The reason it‚Äôs not a 5 star is because the prices on new and used aren‚Äôt generally the best. If I could give a 4.5 then I would have.

Title: Blackmagic Video Assist and SD card
Content: Got a used Blackmagic Video assist and it arrived the next day! high five for that.... what was not cool is that the unit only works with older generation SD cards so the one I bought didn't work. But I went to the Whitechapel shop and George was kind enough to get out of his way going through blogs and forums right there and then. He helped me chose a card that would work with my unit. Give that man a raise!

Title: A good product
Content: This is generally a good product that seems to have a unique place in the market.  It would benefit from being 20% larger so that a small amount of other gear (rainwear) could be carried and having a waist strap (it only has shoulder straps).  The space inside is flexible, I have managed to get 2 Canon cameras + a 10-20 and a 70-300 lens in it.

Title: Wex are great for service but
Content: Wex are great for service. I‚Äôve bought plenty from them down the years. I would have scored five stars but since the name change and the almost demise of Jessops, Wex are no longer so keenly priced. For an internet company, that‚Äôs not good. If opening stores mean they have to charge more, maybe they should reconsider. Whereas before, they were my go to retailer, I now check Amazon before using Wex.

Title: Buying used.
Content: Rapid delivery of items that fully met the description and my expectations for secondhand equipment.

Title: arrived on time well packaged
Content: arrived on time well packaged

Title: No hassle here
Content: No hassle here. Ordered online and the Nikon 24-85 arrived promptly.

Title: I cannot even remember what I 0rdered‚Ä¶
Content: I cannot even remember what I 0rdered so I will only give you 4 stars

Title: I recently bought a Rotolight Neo 2 and‚Ä¶
Content: I recently bought a Rotolight Neo 2 and a light stand from the London store. Whilst these products are fine in themselves the staff omitted to tell me l also needed a screw adapter to attach the light to the stand. Wex had none in stock and l was forced to buy one from Rotolight directly - wasting a week of valuable time.

Title: Happy with product and delivery
Content: Happy with product and delivery - but box was far too large to ensure safe transit and delivery.

Title: Trade in not straight forward but Customer Service very Good.
Content: My transaction was a trade in and I was treated fairly well. My trade in was lowered due to dust and wrong battery which was acceptable. Wrong battery returned after requesting it. New camera returned as it appeared to have been opened. A replacement was promptly sent out but due to using Parcelforce took four days. The issue actually proved to be one with Olympus. The camera has two battery chargers but Olympus only put one replacement UK charger cable. WEX kindly issued me with another FOC. Thank you.

Title: Great service
Content: Great service. Only downside was I was advised I would get a call when the camera was ready and they didn‚Äôt call me. So I had to rush to shop at the end of the day

Title: Overall Very Pleased!
Content: Excellent friendly service but could have had a little more advice regarding functionality of the new equipment

Title: Good range of gear and lots of info.
Content: Good range of gear and lots of info.

Title: Great service and experience.
Content:
Great service and experience.
Only small niggle was a slight delay with the delivery but that didn't really effect things too badly really.

Title: Prompt service and no problems
Content: Prompt service and no problems. Only issue is postal charge is excessive.

Title: Would have given the full 5 stars but‚Ä¶
Content: Would have given the full 5 stars but when you ¬£3,500 on a camera and they won't throw in next day delivery for free.. Its 4 stars from me.

Title: Fuji WCL-X100
Content: Good price, prompt delivery and good product. Excessive packaging material, otherwise would be 5 stars.

Title: Great product and service from Wex, shame about the delivery service.
Content: Unfortunately Wex use Parcelforce for delivery, so the paid for next day delivery never happened. Wex were apologetic and refunded the fee, but I needed it the next day and had to wait on parcelforce before I got it. I'd rather pay more for a reliable delivery service.

Title: Great service
Content: Great service, great product, would be 5 stars if there wasn‚Äôt a charge for delivery

Title: Plenty of choices on website
Content: Plenty of choices on website, quick delivery, but expensive delivery charge.

Having tested it out it appears to work well.
Have yet to use out in the field
My only concern would be the weight and how long I could hold it for
It fits my hero and phone

Title: always very good

Title: Trade ins
Content:
Very good camera firm to trade with very disappointing they will no longer accept trade ins from the Isle of Man 
John Cottier

Title: I was talked to as soon as I arrived at‚Ä¶

Title: Sigma docking station
Content: Good selection of products, easy to order and next day delivery. I would use Wex again. Sigma docking station arrived well packaged and I was able to track the parcel. Simple and easy to use.

Title: easy to use website  and quick delivery
Content: easy to use website  and quick delivery

Title: Generally great service
Content: Generally great service; my only criticism is that the promised next day delivery did not happen, it took two days. I'm sure this was the fault of the carrier, Parcel Force, and it's a pity Wex don't use a more reliable delivery agent.

Title: Second hand lens
Content: Competitive price for a second hand lens.  Would have given 5 stars but when I went to collect from the London store, the guy on the desk finished serving the previous customer then went off saying he'd be back in a minute.  5 minutes later he hadn't returned so another sales person eventually served me.

Title: I cant give 5 stars
Content: I cant give 5 stars, nothing is perfect.

Title: Would have been five but for your‚Ä¶
Content: Would have been five but for your choice of courier. We're paying a lot for next day delivery or Saturday delivery and Parcel Force just aren't delivering with items rolling up after the weekend all the time.

Title: No problems and quick delivery.
Content: No problems and quick delivery.

Title: Bag arrived on time as promised.
Content: Bag arrived on time as promised.

Title: Good service knowledge and customer‚Ä¶

Title: Generally very good
Content: Generally very good. The only criticism was that, despite the box being full of bubble wrap, the lens was in the bottom corner of the box, right against the side, so unprotected on two sides.

Content: Very good service delivery a bit steep

Title: Initially I was told that despatch of‚Ä¶
Content: Initially I was told that despatch of my order would be

Title: Great product and price but Parcel‚Ä¶
Content: Great product and price but Parcel Force didn't deliver it to my door. I had to wait for a lift go to the local post office to collect it. I was in on the day they said they'd 'tried' to deliver it. I'd have given 5 stars if they had.

Title: Great service but required a little work from Wex
Content: Details on the site were different from advertised by manufacturer. Clarified with agent and product was delivered as per manufacturers web site. All good.

Title: Wex would have
Content: Wex would have received 5 stars if the package had arrived on time.  Paid for next day delivery, it arrived the following day.  Parcel Force's fault, would suggest Wex review their carriers.

Title: As always
Content: As always, good service from Wex whether on-line or in-store.

Title: Prompt delivery.
Content: Prompt delivery.

Title: Good customer service but poor IT‚Ä¶
Content: Good customer service but poor IT network. Website doesn't accurately represent stock levels

Title: I would have given 5 stars but the choice of courier let them down
Content:
I would have given 5 stars but the courier they use is terrible.

Regarding the shopping experience, everything was great, they processed and shipped my order in a timely fashion. I spoke to someone there and had excellent service. 

Unfortunately they are let down by the fact they use Parcelforce, I've never had a positive experience with them and deliveries always end up taking 4-5 days.

Title: Generally have great service
Content: Generally have great service, but am still waiting for rest of my delivery. Also, have ordered an extra B-Grip product, but another B-Grip  product that I ordered from Wex, has come with most of the other product included! Will wait and see if both worth keeping.

Title: Good service however old firmware on the lens
Content:
The service overall was great however the firmware on the lens I bought was two versions old. I did contact wex however the only way to rectify this was to purchase an additional accessory (¬£60) to upgrade. That is down to the lens manufacturer however I feel the lens should have been shipped with the latest firmware.

**The below reply shows the very good service at Wex. Thanks Wex for the offer to email a voucher over.

Quick efficient online service...
All went OK.. so no need for Customer Services

Having been to the showroom and completed the exchange for my trade in equipment, I then had an email saying my order had been cancelled for a lens I had not ordered. Awaiting stock. I ignored it.

Title: Camera back pack
Content:
Ordered camera back pack which had large general storage but limited camera provision.
Re ordered an alternative Vanguard 41case which is highly impressive.

Title: Great service, reasonable value
Content: Always great service from Wex and I really appreciated the proactive response this time; the staff spotted an error in my order based on past buying history, which saved a lot of potential frustration.  I would give a 5 star rating if the prices were just a little more competitive.  They are almost invariably more than most competitors, but then again I think we are paying for reliability of product and service, which has been excellent.

Title: Useful device
Content: Nicely made product which does the job but the compass needs to be better damped, as it swings a lot even when nowhere near an electrical device of any sort.

Title: On line purchase
Content: Hi, just bought a flash gun on line from Wex, no issues.

Title: Excellent- no fuss
Content: Product delivered swiftly - no fuss.

Title: This would have been a five star rating‚Ä¶
Content:
This would have been a five star rating but for the fact that my order "got lost " in the system and was not dispatched. After I raised this it was dispatched to me that day and was received the next as promised. 
The person I spoke to was polite and helpful and dealt with the issue immediately.

Title: Called in on a spur of the moment at‚Ä¶
Content:
Called in on a spur of the moment at the Manchester branch,
Very helpful, advises me of options and helped guide my future choices of camera.

Title: products as discribed work well...
Content: products as discribed work well...

Title: Great service, but still using plastic packaging.
Content: Great service, but please avoid using plastic bubble packaging when paper/card protection would suffice.

Title: I bought a used video camera
Content:
I bought a used video camera for just under ¬£2000 and the included original battery charger does not work, I reported this and initially was told that the included batteries were an extra and if they did not charge it was bad luck, I again told the customer service that it was the charger and I had 2 totally flat and one full battery, I was asked to use the battery to discharge it and then test it on the charger. I phoned back and reported the charger still did not work and had a return call to tell me that replacement charger would be supplied in about 2 weeks. I pointed out that that meant I could not use the camcorder for two weeks but the attitude was take it or just return everything. I bought a replacement charger from Amazon ,delivered the next day so I could get going. 
Following this posting WEX have kindly refunded the cost of the charger from Amazon.

Title: Great service as usual from Wex but...
Content: Great service as usual from Wex but they lose a star for the overpackaging of my purchase, which was a Nikon EN-EL15 DSLR battery. It arrived in a box that was far too large and stuffed with plastic air bags when a padded envelope would have been better.

Title: Great service as usual from Wex
Content:
Great service as usual from Wex which we have had on many occasions that we have ordered items. Only to be let down by Royal Mail. Paid for next day delivery but did not arrive, finally arrived the following day, which is not the first time it has ha[ppened. Wex refunded the next day postage costs.

Other than than great service.

Title: Simple order
Content: Simple order, efficiently executed.

Title: I purchased a lens adaptor (¬£579) on‚Ä¶
Content:
I purchased a lens adaptor (¬£579) on the Sunday via the website for 'next day delivery' (which understandably would work out to Tuesday, because of the time I placed the order).

Only additional hurdle was on Monday morning, I received an email from them asking to send in a copy of my drivers license to "verify my identity". I called their number on the website to check it was a legit request and not a scam/phishing attempt. The person I spoke to was helpful and said it was just because it was my first order, but yes it was a genuine request.

So I took a picture of it and sent it to them at 12.45pm and at 1.24pm received an email back thanking me for the copy and saying it would now be processed and dispatched.

The item arrived the next day (Tuesday) as planned.

So, ultimately I understand the need to do verifications like this for fraud prevention, but given the amount of things I ordered from different retailers that weekend (many costing much more than the lens adaptor) WEX was the only retailer that requested I do that. 

To surmise, it's not a complaint or even a gripe but just something to be aware of when ordering.

Also, the staff - both on the phone and in their email communications - were very friendly and informative.

I will use the store again.

Title: Item arrived quickly and was as‚Ä¶
Content: Item arrived quickly and was as described - thank you.

Title: Exactly as the company said.
Content: Exactly as the company said.

Title: Good experience overall but....
Content:
Good experience overall but misled on some functions of the camera.
I was sure of my understanding but took onboard the advice of the salesperson to find out he was actually wrong.
Good to have some where local‚Äôish to look at kit and with the pricing at Wex, purchases can be made knowing you are getting the best prices.

Title: Rented a light but wrong item came
Content: Rented a light but wrong item came, they quickly fixed this and sent out the correct light. Light was incomplete though so had to use a makeshift filter holder.  I would use them again as they were very helpful when the wrong item arrived.

Title: Good
Content: Good, helpful advice at Manchester branch thank you. Goods delivered as ordered, on time.

Title: Great product
Content: Great product. Shame about delivery. Very good packing and condition.

Title: Good choice of products and easy to use‚Ä¶
Content:
Good choice of products and easy to use website. Products ordered were delivered quickly and well packaged. I have no hesitation in recommending WEX as their service is normally first rate.
My only two minor issues on this occasion were :- The item web page had a box to ask questions of the product, which I used, because the item picture did not match the description - this took more than a few days to receive a reply. In the interim I telephoned WEX and the person I spoke to obviously did not have the answer, and did not offer to ring back. I am sure just a one off and with all the products available it is impossible for staff to know everything.

Title: Efficient & Prompt
Content: Delivery was next day, and second hand goods in the good condition stated on the website

Title: Great service as always from WEX
Content: Great service as always from WEX.  The only reason this is not 5 star on this occasion is that I found the same article ¬£60 less than what I paid just after I ordered from WEX

Title: I was overall happy with the way I was‚Ä¶
Content: I was overall happy with the way I was treated and how accommodating Wex were in making my trade-in/purchase experience as seamless as possible. However there is a caveat. For others considering trade in be wary of the initial quote. Perhaps I should say if its sounds too good to be true it is. My initial unseen trade in was pretty good & apart from on a couple of items was in excess of other competitor offers. However once the kit was sent in via their free courier service the final sum deteriorated significantly. Now just because you are paranoid doesn't mean they are not after you....but it was suspiciously evident that the final value for trade in was about ¬£1K under the total value of my initial order. Maybe coincidence & clearly seeing is believing so fair play quoting blind can never be accurate. My point here is caveat emptor. Just be aware. Don't rush into ordering based on the initial quote. Have a budget for your purchases & be sure to have funds to cover any shortfall. Maybe over order so the order is way in excess of your final planned purchase perhaps a little deceitful but may counter the possibility of biased final valuation versus expected sales. You can cancel items at will at the point of finalising the total transaction. Make sure you get two quotes maybe three but again understand you still need a visual appraisal to confirm final value. Maybe I was the naive one here and if so then this may just help minimise any pain for others considering the same in future.

Title: No problems
Content: No problems.  Delivered what I ordered promptly.

Title: Dont rely on the delivery service provider
Content: I have always been impressed with the WEX service, and they are my first port of call based on price and service. Unfortunately Parcelforce just dont match the service you get from other couriers, its pointless paying for named day delivery and not have the delivery on that named day, it wasnt even next day i requested.

Title: Dont expect your delivery quickly if you opt for finance!!!!
Content:
UPDATE, Wex were quick to deal with this issue and communicated with me to bring this to a swift and satisfactory conclusion. Not happy with the initial service, but credit where it‚Äôs due and Wex deserve credit for the way they acknowledged the problem and dealt with it. 

Bought a lens and opted for finance - paperwork all said confirmed and order due for delivery Saturday 2nd March, nothing arraived only to be told that barclays hadn't confirmed the agrrement to Wex - I had receievd an email much earlier in the day to say all agreed and Wex could now ship the order, need a refund for the saturday delivery whcih never arrived and hopefully the lens will arrive at some point! Not impressed...don't usually use these and now I remember why!

Title: no surprises ..

Title: Buying from WEX has always been a‚Ä¶
Content:
Buying from WEX has always been a straightforward experience. Their advice is always sincere and helpful.
Trading equipment, however can be a fraught experience, and I have done it many times. Many emails can pass back and forth, often through several contacts, and promised documents can go astray. On the plus side, the original quotation is often exceeded which shows a fair and honest company. I like dealing with WEX very much and will continue to do so just wish trading was not so stressful.
B.J Sparks

Title: As an online buy the experience was‚Ä¶

Title: Good reliable service

Only slight anxiety is there was a squashed corner of the box, which might indicate it had been dropped, and the delivery driver set it upright despite multiple arrows saying this way up. No apparent damage to the telescope as far as i can see, though.

When I ordered online the delivery was prompt and well packaged - I would definitely recommend Wex without hesitation and I shall continue to purchase from them in the future.

Title: A good service no problems so far.
Content: A good service no problems so far.

Title: More info on order status would have been useful
Content:
Once the equipment arrived (a Nikon Z6 for which I'd waited a number of months but that's probably Nikon's fault, not Wex's), Wex was very good. Contacted me, took details, dispatched for next day delivery.

Only slight drag is they were not good at keeping me informed of status. The Z6 was supposed to be shipped end-Nov and it wasn't until towards end-Jan that the stock was in. There was no information in the interim. I contacted them directly but they were unable to give me any firm idea of what was happening (it would have been nice to have received an email from time to time to say that the camera was still not in stock and they'd be sure to let me know when it was and perhaps why there was a delay). Then again, I contacted Nikon directly in Dec and even they couldn't give me a date when the stock would be available in the UK, so hey.....)

Anyway, upshot is I've used Wex before and I would again.

Title: Trade up from Nikon D810 to Nikon D850
Content: Trade up from Nikon D810 to Nikon D850.  I received a phone call from a lady saying she had just inspected the Nikon D810 and was allowing me ¬£830 as Trade in.  She would be crediting the amount back to my bank account.  She had no knowledge of the bonus trade-in of ¬£450 extra which had been promised by your sales team.  She did however phone me back saying I was right and would be crediting the new amount of ¬£1280.  I am surprised of the lack of communication between departments on this occasion.

Title: A little lower than previously but still good.
Content:
A little lower than previously. I wanted Canon Ink, put in the product - PG1-9MBK, and the site responded with a selection of cameras. I tried this several times with the same result. I then had to input Canon Ink and keep on scrolling from page to page to get to the inks I wanted. I have not experienced this problem for a long time as navigation is one of the good things about WEX.

On the other hand, I ordered fairly late yesterday and my purchase was delivered before 10am this morning. Hooray.

Title: Nice staff but terrible service
Content:
Nice staff but ordered a light over a week ago for a shoot. Light arrived faulty so sent it back and requested a redelivery. They then sent the new light to the wrong address and failed to get me a light in time for the shoot despite multiple phone calls.

EDIT: Initially gave this one star but they have called me and offered free rental for tomorrow. Thanks Wex

Title: So far so good
Content: So far so good

Title: Efficient service
Content: Received the order promptly very efficient service.

Title: Great service
Content: Great service, a company I can trust and the prices are really competitive

Title: Very good service
Content: Very good service, product fine....did not however get notification of delivery....when I did get notification the product had been delivered 2 days earlier !

Title: Delighted with my item - delivery a bit hit and miss...........
Content: Bought a second hand body and delighted with condition and price I paid. Delivery was a bit hit and miss - phoned and told it would arrive on a Saturday so stayed in but it didn't arrive. Then got an sms on Monday to give me a delivery time - would have been useful if they had advised me on the Saturday that this was the procedure as waited in all day for no reason.

Title: Excellent shopping experience
Content: Excellent shopping experience! Would have been 5 Star. Paid for a Saturday delivery, didn't arrive till following Monday.

Title: All good
Content: All good, came next day and put in for the cash back with Nikon - all received- nice one Wex
Reviewer Name: Ashley Starr - Alverdiscott Ping Pong chairman

Title: very uncomplicated and fast.
Content: very uncomplicated and fast.

Title: A great flash
Content: A great flash, and great customer service! Shame Parcelforce's tracking seemed to be having issues over Xmas

Title: Good amount of stock.
Content: Good amount of stock well displayed.

Title: Paypal hiccup
Content: Other than a small hiccup with paying by paypal, an easy, pleasant, swift delivery transaction.

Title: good service straight forward
Content: good service straight forward

Title: Just in time
Content: I know it was Christmas but the next day delivery was fine.all items came as hoped and made sure everyone had a happy xmas.

Title: Good service and prompt delivery
Content: Good service and prompt delivery

Title: Didn‚Äôt get an email to confirm item was‚Ä¶
Content: Didn‚Äôt get an email to confirm item was ready for collection, so just went a few days later and it was there.

Title: Service was great
Content: Service was great, very impressed overall.

Title: Ordered two used lenses both were‚Ä¶
Content: Ordered two used lenses both were delivered as requested.  Both matched the descriptions on-line.  Excellent service.  Very happy.

Title: I was satisfied with the service BUT
Content: I was satisfied with the service I received at WEX, but disappointed when I received an email a few days later offering an extra ¬£100 of a camera I had just purchased . Not impressed

Title: Would have been five stars ...
Content: Would have been five stars, but for the delivery by Parcelforce, who are a bit inflexible. Both of my recent orders had to be collected from the local Post Office the following day.

Title: When I phoned to order the person I‚Ä¶
Content: When I phoned to order the person I spoke to was very helpful with the technical questions I had , Information and dispatch was very quick and each step was notified by E mail , would have no hesitation on purchasing other items from Wex Photo and Video

Title: Every thing great
Content: Every thing great, including fast delivery. One star deducted for plastic packing material.

Title: All arrived well
Content: All arrived well, and only 2 days following restock.

Title: Great service would highly recommend‚Äã
Content: Great service would highly recommend

Title: Prompt delivery
Content: Product arrived ahead of the specified delivery time, so top marks for managing expectations.  The tripod collar was slightly too large for the lens that it was advertised for, but this was remedied by inserting a thin strip of felt to ensure a tight grip.

Title: I have shopped with WEX before and had‚Ä¶
Content: I have shopped with WEX before and had a great experience. This time all was well with the exception of the lack of contact to advise on delivery of my purchase. Otherwise I am happy.

Title: My Wex experience
Content: Wex had what I wanted at a good price. They were very helpful when I phoned them.

Title: Good customer service
Content: Order despatched quickly. Arrived incomplete but problem resolved quickly without fuss and missing item sent.

Title: this was my first order ,it was quck‚Ä¶
Content: this was my first order ,it was quck easy and arrived when they said it would, and it was well packed. and it worked first time.

Title: A great selection of products at fair‚Ä¶
Content:
A great selection of products at fair prices and delivery was really efficient.
Feels a bit like a monopoly sometimes!

Title: camera came with sync socket cover‚Ä¶
Content: camera came with sync socket cover missing and eye had top of rubber surround pulled out both of which were not showing in the display photo           g williams

Title: When they failed to deliver they‚Ä¶
Content: When they failed to deliver they explained they wanted me to pay again as payments were cancelled after 28 days. I was not prepared to pay again. My bank confirmed wex had taken the money. And the bank offered to help me recover the money. Eventually the matter was handed over to a supervisor who confirmed I have played. There then arrange delivery. Had it being 20 ¬£30 they may have persuaded me to pay again.

Title: Fast reliable service
Content: Fast reliable service. Helpful advice when required.

Title: Waited a while for the stock to arrive‚Ä¶
Content: Waited a while for the stock to arrive but delivery was very quick once it arrived. Would highly recommend Wex.

Title: the Go to place for photographic equipment
Content: Good service and easy to use web site. The go to place to shop.

Title: I've made two purchases
Content: I've made two purchases, the first was for a camera and lenses totaling over 10k. As suggested by the salesman I emailed my list a week in advance of collecting. Even so several items were missed, hence the docking of one star. The second purchase was made on line and arrived within 24 hours. Overall the staff are very helpful, backed up with bright airy stores and very good website.

Title: Produced the goods safe and sound
Content:
Produced the goods safe and sound, which is the main thing.

The separate operation of Discount and Cashback was pretty impenetrable.  Still don't know if I got the correct price with discount code on lens being forbidden at checkout.

Would have liked a "What's in the box" heading in specifications.  Inconsistent lists of info between different products made comparison difficult.

Automatic linking to - and info on - correct compatible accessories was limited in scope and accurate information.

Title: Order was delayed
Content: Order was delayed, but once WEX had realised what the problem was they processed the order and delivered the products quickly.

Title: Good service from Wex
Content: Good service from Wex, part I ordered wasn‚Äôt in stock, however the stock arrived within 5 days (including weekend) so overall very happy

Title: Very helpful
Content: Very helpful. I use them all the time for buying camera gear.

Title: Great online website
Content: Great online website, easy to navigate and quick delivery.

Title: Best price around for item and‚Ä¶
Content: Best price around for item and excellent delivery/pick up options

Title: I give 4 star because
Content: I give 4 star because, even though there was a mistake made on your part, your staff were very helpful and polite and ready to fix it.

Title: Reliable and trustworthy company to purchase from.
Content:
I‚Äôve used Wex before online, but this time I wanted to try a lense before purchasing so visited their Norwich store. I got great help and free advice. I was intent on only purchasing new, but after having a pre-owned lense demonstrated to me and understanding the levels of testing and gradings provided, walked out with a pre-owned lense with a significant saving over a new one, and with the piece of mind there were no lense issues or marks.  

I would have given  5 stars, but I‚Äôve yet to test the lense fully enough.  Can‚Äôt fault the help from the staff.

Title: Excellent service again from Wex
Content:
Excellent service again from Wex. Bulletproof packaging and prompt delivery
4 stars however as the product has a slight flaw 
Purchased a loupedeck which doesn‚Äôt sit flush on my desk and wobbles when using it

Title: Great service and response to request‚Ä¶
Content:
Great service and response to request about discount.
Well managed process on arrival to collect and pay for purchase.
Would expect nothin else from WEX

Title: Goods ok but tracking misleading
Content:
All goods delivered and ok as per order.
I checked tracking which said "in depot" 2hrs later it was delivered. Good job I wasn't out. Tracker sbould have shown, out for delivery I reckon!

Title: Good service and reasonably priced‚Ä¶
Content: Good service and reasonably priced products. Although "their" Black Friday deals were a tad misleading. The double cashback black Friday deal on selected canon products for example is from canon themselves and was available before and after "black Friday". Please don't try to mislead your customers, we aren't as dim as you might think....

Title: Good service but too much emphasis on‚Ä¶
Content:
Good service but too much emphasis on sell, sell!!!
Some prices are much higher than other retailers. If WEX are not careful other players will move in rapidly, including big ones like Amazon!
My local store in Birmingham is very cramped in terms of space, does not give you a good shopping experience particularly during event days.

Title: Ordered a Manfrotto video Head
Content: Ordered a Manfrotto video Head. Item was faulty and had to be returned. Wex quickly and efficiently arranged a replacement. I was impressed with the speed and quality of service.

Title: Order placed over phone to clarify‚Ä¶
Content: Order placed over phone to clarify points, assistant was very helpful and my camera was delivered speedily despite being on standard free delivery.Item packed well and met my expectations.

Title: There was a further 20% off opportunity‚Ä¶
Content: There was a further 20% off opportunity on my order which I took advantage of. However, when I got through the checkout procedure the discount was not applied. I telephoned the next morning and the discount was added and refunded to me straight away - no fuss!

Title: Items arrived as ordered and on time
Content: Items arrived as ordered and on time

Title: Wacom tablet.  Good overall experience
Content: Phone support was very good and using the pay and collect from the store option saved the uncertainty of home deliveries of expensive equipment.  Would have got 5 stars if the small accessory gift had been in stock when I came to pick up the main item, a Wacom touch tablet.  Also saved ¬£100 versus buying from Wacoms website.

Title: I placed my order on a Friday morning‚Ä¶
Content:
I placed my order on a Friday morning and it arrived early on Saturday! Excellent service. 
As it is a Christmas present,  I didn't want to open it fully and emailed customer service to ask if they could extend the 30 day return policy to 35 days.  They are happy to do that. 
So good to deal with a company who is helpful and realistic about such things. 
Great value too.

Title: Disappointed
Content: Disappointed to find out the prices were different in store than it is when ordering over the phone. Very disappointed

Title: Nice & Easy
Content: Easy ordering process and the lens I have ordered seems great after a couple of days of use.

Title: Two of the items were delivered‚Ä¶
Content: Two of the items were delivered quickly, the expensive lens and the extra body caps. Unfortunately I am still waiting for the final item, two rear lens caps, as I type this. 5 stars if all items had come together.

Title: Great service exactly what they said
Content: Great service exactly what they said. Could not ask for better.

Title: I ordered a Nikon Z7 with bits around‚Ä¶
Content:
I ordered a Nikon Z7 with bits around the beginning og October 2018, contacted customer services a few times, no product yet was the answer. 
Called again on 18 Nov and the product had been in stock since the end of  October, and was dispatched that afternoon. Someone should have contacted me was the comment. Speed was applied and I received the kit the following morning around 9:30an

Title: Good stock
Content: Good stock. Genuine products. Not the cheapest.

Title: Beth appreciated the problem I was‚Ä¶
Content: Beth appreciated the problem I was having and resolved it my satisfaction. The Trade In went ahead and now have my new Zoom Lense.

Title: Very impressed with the swift‚Ä¶
Content: Very impressed with the swift service,but my order was short of a "clip",this was a used item,so i'm not sure if the advert said "incomplete"...i can't prove anything as the advert is now removed!...but would like to know what the advert said!

Title: The ordering was very straight-forward‚Ä¶
Content: The ordering was very straight-forward and the phone advice sound. The order arrived the following day, which was well ahead of notified date. There was (and still is) a slight glitch over my account, as the equipment was a birthday gift to me and it was difficult for the sender to set up the account as requested. He keeps getting my WEX emails, but WEX did say that their technical department would be sorting that out. Good advice, though, quickly received and a great piece of kit. Thank you!

Title: Only 4* as didn't have all my order
Content: Only 4* as didn't have all my order

Title: Shame that they were out of stock on‚Ä¶
Content: Shame that they were out of stock on both items. But once they were in the warehouse, it all went very moothly. Good technical advice as well.

Title: It was good treatment and NO friction
Content: It was good treatment and NO friction - your suggestion that the treatment was decent and very little friction is nonsense.  The people I spoke to were professional , courteous and extremely helpful.

Title: So far service is excellent however I‚Ä¶
Content: So far service is excellent however I am awaiting the results from a camera alledgedly requiring a repair and Sony says it only requires a firmware update for which one was issued in 2015 to correct the sound the camera is making. If they are correct then 5 stars to you.

Title: I would have given  5 stars but i had‚Ä¶
Content: I would have given  5 stars but i had had a bit of troible with the internet.

Title: Customer service great
Content: Customer service great, delivery great but the reason for giving it 4 stars is that the website showed an offer code but the checkout would not accept it - phoned customer service and all sorted

Title: Manfrotto QR Plates
Content:
From a delivery point of view, everything was fine. One item was on back order, but arrived at the predicted time. 
Only glitch was that one of the Manfrotto QR plates did not fit the tripod head. Despite the statement in the product description, the lightweight 200PL plate is not fully compatible with heads designed for the metal version. I will have to return it. Please review your product descriptions.

Title: this is the first time I have purchased‚Ä¶
Content:
this is the first time I have purchased anything from this supplier

site easy to navigate and plenty of information available on products and so on
only disappointing things were that it was out of stock at the time with no estimated date given, but did get text message from Royal Mail to say on way and had been delivered
would have been good at the check out to ask if I need the SD/Memory Card as I ended up having to order this separately and pay yet another delivery charge and missed a deal so instead of ¬£11.95 ended up costing me ¬£19.95 so really disappointed on that

Title: Excellent problem solving.
Content:
Surprised to find the binoculars I ordered seemed to be reconditioned not new.
 Wex who had sent my binoculars the next day as promised, immediately sorted a replacement for me.

Title: Easy transaction and free fast delivery.
Content: Easy transaction and free fast delivery.

Title: Very quick delivery
Content:
Very good service and quick delivery of products.
Have bought both new and second hand equipment from Wex and never had any issues.

Title: Always quickly delivered
Content: Always quickly delivered - excellent range of products.

Title: sales executive that sold me the lens was exceptional and deserved a resounding 5 stars.
Content: The sales executive that sold me the lens was exceptional and deserved a resounding 5.  However, I had perhaps 20 minutes earlier spoken to another salesman who said that there were no lenses available in my wanted category - this warrants a downgrade by 1 point.  But note my executive was superb and extremely helpful.

Title: Panasonic Lumix Camera Late Delivery
Content: Ordered my Panasonic Lumix camera for a promised next day delivery but it didn't arrive until a couple of days later hence Iv'e docked a star. I cant fault the product which is excellent.

Title: WEX is ace!
Content: Good advice prior to purchase and a good price.

Title: Very helpful to the point they have to‚Ä¶
Content: Very helpful to the point they have to go an extra mile to get the best advice possible.

Title: Good for film
Content: Good for film. Competitive prices and a reasonable range.

Title: Very pleased with my purchase and‚Ä¶
Content: Very pleased with my purchase and support.

Title: Bowens modelling lamps
Content: Very fast delivery and products ( lamps ) were fine however the boxes the lamps came looked a bit worse for wear as they have been partially flattened during delivery

Title: Prompt deliver
Content: Prompt deliver, however no lens hood provided, makes a good priced 2nd hand lens expensive at now I have to buy one at ¬£50 or more

Title: Good quality service
Content: Good quality service

Title: Never had a problem with Wex other than‚Ä¶
Content:
Never had a problem with Wex other than 

1) On a MAC when typing Wex auto-correct always want to change "Wex" to "Sex" and; 

2) A lot of Elinchrom stuff that I would buy is never physically in stock and so I end up going to the Flash Center because they have the item in stock. 

But when they have the stuff they are the "dogs-snarklies". 

Also good returns policy.

Title: WEX is Good
Content:
WEX is fast, efficient and the staff are polite. It's not the cheapest however,
and it may be that we pay more for a good service.

Title: Good value and warranty //Low buy in
Content: Good value and warranty //Low buy in

Title: As usual Wex were great to deal with &‚Ä¶
Content:
As usual Wex were great to deal with & very helpful.
The only reason I haven't given 5 stars is that on one occasion an email wasn't replied to and I had to send a second request. 
However I would recommend Wex to anyone looking to buy photographic equipment.

Title: Speedlite or Kenro??
Content:
Went in with the intention of buying a canon speedlite 430 EXIII RT either new at ¬£270 or preowned at ¬£177 as I needed one to shoot a wedding in the week., however got great advice and ended up with a Kenro for just ¬£95 which performed fantastically well.
 So I spend the money I saved on a 70-200 F2.8L is II USM which is an awesome lens. Great advice as usual with nothing too much trouble

Title: Well described, packed and delivered.
Content: The used camera and lens i ordered arrived on time and were well packed. The order tracking worked well on the day of delivery and was easy to follow. The items delivered were well described but i would struggle to find the slight imperfections noted on the Wex website. Very pleased with my purchase and the price . Only one slight  minus point and that was with the used free gifts allocated when i added the camera and lens to the basket. When i entered the 10% discount code given on the Wex website it would not register until i had deleted the free gifts from the basket. Only a small niggle , would have given an unreserved 5 otherwise.

Title: Too expensive compared to Olympus
Content: Too expensive compared to Olympus

Title: Great service spoiled by poor delivery company
Content: I would normally rate Wex as 5 stars and their service is 5 star but the carrier they use is anything but. Parcelforce have regularly failed to meet expectations - this time they couldn't find my house (all the other carriers seem to have no problem) so my next day delivery that I stayed in for didn't turn up. If only Wex would offer an alternative.

Title: Would recommend
Content: Excellent.. good communication, quickly responses and timely dispatch

Title: Prompt efficient service
Content: Prompt efficient service

Title: Easy to order, quick to send, but less packaging please!
Content: Ordering process was simple, product I wanted was in stock (Nikon replacement DSLR battery) and felt confident that it was genuine Nikon buying from WEX.  Despatch and delivery was fairly speedy.  My main gripe was the size of the box and amount of plastic packaging - for a boxed battery that you could fit in the palm of your hand, the outer box was probably about 6 inches square and packaging was plastic inflated bags.

Title: Not always the best value for a product‚Ä¶
Content: Not always the best value for a product but with good service and vast range of equipment usually in stock it is sometimes the most obvious choice.

Title: No problem very good service.
Content: No problem very good service.

Title: Great online service
Content:
Great online service, arrived exactly on time and everything as expected. My only gripe is it was not easy to find appropriate accessories, case, batteries etc, so ended up buying some elsewhere. 
Great service for what I did select tho'

Title: Excellent service form start to finish
Content: Excellent service form start to finish, can't complain.

Title: Great price and usual excellent WEX‚Ä¶
Content: Great price and usual excellent WEX service.

Title: You can also use the phone to buy good‚Ä¶
Content: You can also use the phone to buy good quality products from Wex

Title: Problem-free first order
Content: My first order from WEX and I have no complaints, delivered what I wanted at a good price and on time.  Look forward to using them again in the future.

Title: All was fine but I did find the initial‚Ä¶
Content:
All was fine but I did find the initial stage a little odd in that the email stated my delivery should arrive within four days but might take longer! This is unusual in my experience as most online suppliers offer a definite date...even for a purchase of ¬£5...this was ¬£500. As it happened I ordered on Saturday and my delivery arrived the following Tuesday so all was well.

Just a little more certainty for a ¬£500 purchase would be a good thing.

Title: Great service
Content: Great service, 5 star if the Email info matched what actually happened. It said once I had purchased the item that it was out of stock, but 3 days later, there it was delivered!

Title: Good company I think
Content: Good company I think. Delivery can be amazing. I'm not sure that staff are completely au fait with the latest products, accessories and add-ons to make products work, or, delivery dates. However, that may not be their fault, and may be due to lack of information from suppliers. They answer enquiries quickly to the best of their ability. Prices seem competitive.

Title: First part of order arrived early
Content: First part of order arrived early, second part was out of stock, if had arrived together would have awarded 5 stars, complete order now delivered satisfactorily.

Title: Needless purchase!!
Content:
I part exchanged a tripod head..had to pay full price for new one but was later credited with the part ex once it had been assessed. All the same day.
Prompt and efficient BUT......
....... I was mis-sold the original head by WEX..as it was not arca swiss but arca swiss COMPATIBLE,  Subtle but critical difference.

Title: 4 stars because I am really happy with‚Ä¶
Content: 4 stars because I am really happy with the service and the product. Really friendly staff, they were very helpful. A couple of mistakes were made eg. It wasn't dispatched on the correct day even though i paid for next day delivery. They kindly said they would refund the charge but they didn't. I asked for a different delivery address which they said they changed and they didn't. Other than those few niggles i am very happy.

Title: I am in general very pleased with Wex
Content: I am in general very pleased with Wex Photo Video and have used them many years and spent many thousands of ¬£‚Äôs with them, but do get frustrated when I try to contact them via telephone at the week-end. Despite their web site stating they have week-end opening times, all I get is a pre-recorded message stating they are closed over the week-end

Title: I bought a bag and it was used I found‚Ä¶
Content:
I bought a bag and it was used I found Some stuff from the previous owner in there :( the bag looks like New though maybe someone returned it.
I also ordered a audio recorder and headphones they were fine. 
Not Very professional sending out a used bag thats All.

(Update) after the feedback from wexphotovideo I am happy How they handled it. Thanks Lee for the swift answer and info.
The 15 pound voucher is much appreciated.

Title: Spiffing show chaps.
Content: Spiffing show chaps.

Title: Product Condition was better than stated, and Customer Service was great
Content:
Product arrived in a better condition than stated, and the company's representatives we're polite and well informed. However, a minor gripe was that delivery was delayed by asking for my drivers licence to be used in anti-fraud checks. Although I understand that this is a necessary step for high value items, I would have appreciated being told shortly after purchase that this was needed rather than almost 2 days after order confirmation.
Bar this minor set back, I would recommend buying from this company and I certainly will be again.

Title: It was just super to give my order know‚Ä¶
Content: It was just super to give my order know problem the staff new what you need. The one stop order shop had my order next day thank you üòä

Title: quick and easy
Content: quick and easy ! just how I like it. great service and knowledgeable staff,

Title: exemplary service
Content: Quick, attentive, intelligent, professional and trustworthy. They do what they say they will do. No fuss. Very good advice, too. First rate.

Title: Need for inspection before sale.
Content: I purchased a Nikon  TC-14 E 11  1.4  Teleconverter which was delivered promptly and  appeared in perfect condition on inspection.  After mounting it on my Nikon 7200 and attaching my 300mm Nikon lens to the front I go a big surprise as the lens rocked up and down. On checking I found the 4 lens mount  screws so loose they were about to allow the mount to detach. After tightening them with my  smallest screwdriver they are now good and secure. Things should have been checked before being sold to me.

Title: I always get great service at the‚Ä¶
Content: I always get great service at the Norwich Branch.

Title: Very good
Content: Very good, except that several items were not immediately available.

Title: A very minor hiccup, quickly resolved. Well done WEX, Thanks.
Content: After sending wrong item, WEX speedily sent correct item, easy method of return wrong item. Have dealt with WEX several times and this is the only time there has been a very minor error. Would still recommend 100%

Title: Reliable Retailer
Content: Reliable delivery, product as described at a reasonable price.Website clear and easy to use.

Title: really good bag
Content: really good bag, price as always, could be a lot lower. Delivery time was also good

Title: Delivered
Content: Delivered, well packed within two working days. I had it in mind that there should have been more than just the lens (with collar) but can't check as the item is off the website now (as it should be) and the order confirmation only refers to the lens.

Title: Recommended
Content: The condition of the used camera I bought was exactly as described and it arrived promptly too. Only slightly let down by the charger which was missing it‚Äôs power plug and then  a non-std power cable was supplied. It works but it‚Äôs not original. Overall I would recommend  Wex.

Title: Arrived quickly as promised
Content:
Prospec Imaging. Universal Card Reader 

Arrived quickly as promised, not had chance to use too much but first experience shows it is much quicker than my old card reader.

Title: Good Service/Delivery most of the time
Content: Good Service/Delivery most of the time, can be a bit expensive on some products.

Title: Would give 5 but i payed for next day‚Ä¶
Content: Would give 5 but i payed for next day before 10am and it never came. So phoned up and was told i had missed the next day cut off and i would get a refund for the postage and they would send it out for the next day before 9 free of charge. The next day come item didnt turn up until after 11.30 thats not wexs problem but i was charged for the next day postage so thats the reason i am giving a 4 thanks

Title: Not always the cheapest but.....
Content: Reliable, quick delivery, never disappointed.  Not usually the cheapest, rarely the most expensive, however always hassle free!

Title: Good CS, could probably afford to lower pirces a smidge..
Content: Wex have always been on the slightly expensive side as they used Caulmet prices as a bench mark... and they we're always needlessly expensive them selves.   I had my reservations when they merged with Calumet as I have no fond memories of dealing with them.  Despite this Wex's customer service has been decent through out and they tend to share their profits with many competitions, blogs and information, but lets not forget it also grows the brand.  I can't lie however in that I only go there for specialist bands that have few dealers in the country and are the same price across the board, as it's easy to shop around and beat your average camera body else where.  In general they're a good team who are always happy to try and help where possible, and as said they do try and give back to the community, but it's not an easy industry to be in and to not watch your spending.

Title: Very efficient and friendly service
Content: Very efficient and friendly service. Would certainly shop with them again.

Title: review of teleconverter
Content: The purchase of my Kenko teleconverter went very well. I received useful advice over the phone and the delivery went smoothly. In my experience this is typical of Wex service.

Title: I was interested in trading in my‚Ä¶
Content:
I was interested in trading in my Blackmagic Ursa for the Ursa Mini Pro. I found the Mini Pro on your website but couldn't tell if the camera came with a battery plate. I rang to ask and was told it comes as standard with a V-lock battery plate, just what I wanted. I traded in the Ursa including the battery plate which I included free with the camera. I purchased the Mini Pro and it came minus a battery plate. I rang to enquire and was told it doesn't come with one and I had to order one which cost ¬£102. Grrrrrr.
Now the entire process of trading in and dealing with Wex was actually very good, I think they're a great company but this one aspect was very very annoying!

Title: Faulty nikon 24-70 f2.8 Emails ignored.
Content:
i've change my rating from 1 star to 4 stars.
My faulty lens was exchange for an upgraded lens (Heavily discounted)
The replacement lens is perfect working order with a nikon case.
I can not give 5 stars due to the 14 Days to resolve an issue that should not have happened.
But all in all ive used wex for a number of years without problems, until now. 
order ref 51862750 Purchase 23/08/18


email ref:
441234
443575

Both ignored.


Purchaced a used Nikon 24-70 f2.8 AFG Condition 7 Cosmetic!
Recieved On time. Faulty zoom ring (Tight zoom & Grinding Noise) "Not stated in description"
As of Today a week after purchace.. still no responce from 2 emails to wex. Its not as if i was after a bargain!! my total order was over ¬£1100.
