Opening a dispute with paypal as seems to be the only resolve  Would have been happy offer of replacement

Title: Was disappointed that my ordered item‚Ä¶
Content: Was disappointed that my ordered item 'click and collect from local store' took almost 4.5 days to arrive in the local store for collection.  When my order was placed on Thursday 23 August the online ordering stated that it would be ready for collection after 4.30pm the following day.  I collected my order at approximately 2.45/3.00pm on Tuesday 28 August.  However in defence of the 'click and collect in your local store system' there was a Sunday, a Bank holiday Monday in the mix.  Nevertheless I would have expected my order to have been collectable on Saturday 25 of August at the latest.  Would still use the system if it suited in the future though.  Wexphoto do generally 'deliver'.

Title: Great service from WEX
Content: Great service from WEX, however Parcel Force service has let them down! My goods have still not been received! They have been in a Northern sorting Office for 4 days, without any movement! Maybe you should carry out an audit of their performance. Will continue to use WEX, they dispatched the goods very quickly.

Title: Great company
Content:
Re-write -  Original review complained about service, however response was great and its become clear it was entirely the couriers fault. So its only fair I change my review.

Great price on the order, there was an offer for part exchanging old equipment too. Quick easy. Good customer service when there is an issue they reply promptly. Highly recommend them. Just not Parcelforce.

Title: Lastolite Camera Bracket
Content:
Purchased the lastolite camera bracket from WEX, it arrived within 48 hour's, when I unpacked it and got to grips with it, it's a brilliant piece of kit just what I was looking for, and would recommend to any one who is looking for a camera bracket, it will hold the camera in either the Horizontal or vertical Plane - (portrait or landscape). So go and get One.
Chris S
Leicester

Title: Usually
Content: Usually, I would be giving top marks to Wex, always extremely helpful, definitely my go to camera place. However, after purchasing a used lens, which after reading the condition review written by Wex looked great, the usual wear marks for a used lens etc, they failed to mention the awful clunking noise it made during auto focus, this, even though it did not effect the images, would of discouraged me form buying it as I like my equipment quiet, I provide remembrance photography and the last thing I want is the awful noise whilst I'm working with families in very sad situations. The lady I spoke to was very helpful, provided me the returns label etc but sadly a replacement would not be making it's way to me as quickly as I needed it to causing me to have to postpone work. So please, even i it doesn't effect the working of the equipment, please describe unique noises, it is super relevant, even if you don't think it is.

Title: A very nicely made case for the Canon G1X Mk3
Content:
A very nicely made case for the Canon G1X Mk3. I bought it mainly to protect the camera when not in use, not so much for when using the camera, so it will fulfil its purpose very well. It would have been even better if it had been designed for use with the optional lens hood fitted.
Excellent service from WEX as usual.

Title: Product was as expected with no‚Ä¶
Content: Product was as expected with no untoward problems

Title: Good service. Pity about the courier delivery
Content: Good service from Wex. Everything correct and arrived in good order. Customer service desk sorted out query quickly and efficiently. However, I do suggest you find another courier. Parcel Force deliveries were a complete shambles.

Title: easy to order and delivered when‚Ä¶
Content: easy to order and delivered when expected

Title: Ordered Thursday (am) .Paid for a next‚Ä¶
Content:
Ordered Thursday (am) .Paid for a next day and didnt receive until after the Monday. Also ordered a lens and the autofocus didnt work. 

Both issues not WEX fault and have sent the lens back for replacement. Hoping all works out.

Title: I recently ordered a Metz 64-AF1 flash‚Ä¶
Content: I recently ordered a Metz 64-AF1 flash gun from WEX and it arrived very quickly and I was kept informed of progress.

Title: Excellent service from Wex though‚Ä¶
Content: Excellent service from Wex though delivery was a day later than expected.

Title: Very good  service
Content:
Very good  service. Delivery  always on time.      
Pleasant to talk to on the phone

Title: Great lens, very sharp
Content: Great lens,  very sharp, shame their are few other stockist to make prices cheaper!!!

Title: Please review your packaging policy for small items!
Content: Only one grumble about two incidents: on each occasion I had bought a filter that would have fitted through my letter box in a Jiffy Bag sent by regular post, but each was delivered by ParcelForce in an unnecessarily large box with unnecessary packing materials, and I had to travel several miles to pick up each package as I wasn't in to receive them. Waste of materials, waste of car fuel, waste of my time! Otherwise, first class service as always from Wex.

Title: A part exchange deal that went well
Content: A part exchange deal that went well. I was provided with an outline valuation quickly, and a final valuation shortly after. The one, and very minor, hiccup was that the staff at the store could not initially find the lens which I had reserved over the 'phone.

Title: Excellent service
Content: Excellent service

Title: Purchase of lens
Content: Buying ok, Parcel force useless!

Title: Wex often aren't the cheapest
Content: Wex often aren't the cheapest. But their service is always second to none.

Title: Products as described
Content: Products as described,  delivered quickly.

Title: Good product
Content: Good product, fair price I would ask for little more

Title: My only reservations are the poor‚Ä¶
Content: My only reservations are the poor London location following the take over of Calumet & to my eyes smaller product range held on site comparied with Calumet Euston, with orders having to be sent from Norwich. Staff good, helpful & friendly.

Title: Recommended, will use again
Content: The website is easy to use and the staff helpful although they didnt follow through with my delivery instructions nevertheless I will continue to use WEX overall very happy with WEX.

Title: VERY GOOD COMPANY
Content: Good service and very quick with good and excellence advice available. They sell high standard genuine products. A bit more pricey than others but this assures the makes are genuine. Used stuff of a high quality

Title: Good service ..prompt at resolving‚Ä¶
Content: Good service ..prompt at resolving issues

Title: Delivery
Content: Only posting 4 star due to issue with parcel force, although they eventually delivered parcel, no issue with WEX,

Title: As always a very professional service.
Content: As always a very professional service.

Title: I have been buying from WEX for many‚Ä¶
Content: I have been buying from WEX for many year now and they always have a good selection of products with excellent service and competitive prices. Their technical advice is sound and they are are also a good company to deal with for part exchange or selling your existing stuff.

Title: Very good service purchased items using‚Ä¶
Content: Very good service purchased items using gift vouchers but sent one item wrong.Brilliant after sales though swapped no problem and sent me postage label via email. Would be 5 star if they had got it right initially.

Title: Very good service during the order‚Ä¶
Content: Very good service during the order process and delivery of my new gear (¬£4000 worth). I was disappointed in the quoted price for the part exchange being dropped by ¬£50 especially as I had enclosed a UV filter attached to each lens plus a spare battery.

Title: Got a bargain
Content:
Got a bargain, half price offer. So bought a great Large Jobi Gorillapod that should have been ¬£155!
Delivered by Post Office, so all the benefits here. Email re delivery and tracking, I texted back to take up the offer to have it delivered to a local post office, as I could not guarantee I would be in on the designated delivery date. Actually they did call at my home, so that saved me collecting from local Post Office. I am presuming here, if I wasn‚Äôt in they would have delivered to the local Post Office and informed me as such.

Title: Online and in-store purchases
Content: I purchased online and also at the Glasgow store. The staff in Glasgow were very friendly and gave advice when sought. The goods purchased online arrived on time and were well packaged.

Title: They are good at what they do
Content: They are good at what they do - and you can trust them. A secondhand guarantee of 12 months is also hard to beat. A very reliable and safe pair of hands.

Title: Excellent in all respects except one
Content: Excellent in all respects except one: I usually get things delivered to me more quickly by their standard, free delivery than when I pay for the "faster" delivery, which oddly can take an extra couple of days to arrive. So, free delivery, save money, and all is fine.

Title: Two errors in delivery caused a bit of‚Ä¶
Content: Two errors in delivery caused a bit of frustration but was fixed politely and quickly.

Title: Not happy at being charged extra for next day delivery when spending almost ¬£2k on a lens
Content:
I have never been anything but happy with the service from wex, however I think to be charged extra for next day delivery when spending almost 2k in my case a lens is ridiculous, as surely when spending that amount of money delivery should be free and fast I.e. the next day.
I wouldn‚Äôt expect free delivery on say an item of ¬£50, but at almost ¬£2k definitely.
Please have a think about your charges.

Title: Great to deal with probably need a bit‚Ä¶
Content: Great to deal with probably need a bit more internal communication but always sort any issues quickly. Would definitely recommend.

Title: Transaction went smoothly and speedily
Content: Transaction went smoothly and speedily. Product well wrapped and delivered on time.

Title: Two items ordered
Content:
Two items ordered, one not in stock. The in stock item was delivered promptly and the other notified for delivery within the week.
Good service.

Title: Delivery problem despite paying extra
Content: Website mistakenly listed unavailable item. Paid extra for next day delivery (ordered Sunday) but did not receive till Wed then remainder a few days later. Items are as advertised.

Title: very good and efficient service
Content: very good and efficient service, with quick delivery.

Title: Let down by paying for 2 day delivery‚Ä¶
Content: Let down by paying for 2 day delivery and order was a day late (3 days late if u count the weekend.)  Probably Parcelforce problem however why not use a courier that can do next day to an IV postcode - there are some around

Title: Website quite easy to use but the‚Ä¶
Content: Website quite easy to use but the search engine needs to be more accurate. Products delivered promptly despite a phone call telling me that one of the items was out of stock.

Title: Zoom H6 sound recorder
Content: Once again excellent, speedy service. Loved the free jelly beans as a thank you gift!

Title: Service from wex brilliant
Content: Service from wex brilliant , but I wish i could choose delivery methods. Parcel force and others in the past are rubbish and never find my address. Please just use post office. they deliver my letters every day and can find me, i'd rather pay the extra postage. saves me having to go collect from local post office which can be a bind as I'm semi disabled

Title: Very prompt service and delivery‚Ä¶
Content:
Very prompt service and delivery schedule. 

I could only get one out of two items wanted due to unavailability which is unusual for Wex, hence 4 stars and not 5.

Title: Excellent regarding what I purchased‚Ä¶
Content: Excellent regarding what I purchased but chaos regarding delivery, delivered a day before the day I selected and much later than the latest time advised so not here.  Attempted to reschedule and to be advised when it would arrive but failed delivery again because I wasn't advised when it was to be delivered!  Eventually caught up with it at a somewhat obscure post office.

Title: I would of given 5 stars but once again‚Ä¶
Content: I would of given 5 stars but once again let down by your courier "parcel force"  who let me down by not arriving on the given day to collect the equipment from my home (after I had stayed at home all day) which was part exchange against the new lens I was purchasing and then not delivering the new equipment on the day they arranged (after once again I had stayed in all day) they said they tried to deliver could not find the address so left a card I wish someone could explain how they left the card when they could not find the address also since the new lens arrived I have had 3 telephone messages asking if I want my part exchange equipment BACK FREE OF CHARGE even though I have been credited for it against my purchase  I have rang twice and notified them of the situation and received another message yesterday offering to send this equipment back however the new lens arrived the day after the promised delivery date and been tried out and it is magic  Derek

Title: Good service let down by poor delivery.
Content: Good reliable service provided with a fair price on this purchase only let down by the courier used for delivery. Not the fault of Wex but created a problem for me when their chosen courier said they had attempted delivery & left an advisory card when they certainly did neither.

Title: Smooth ordering and receiving of the‚Ä¶
Content: Smooth ordering and receiving of the camera.. A little bit disappointed with the condition of the camera... It was dirty but worked perfectly.. I have ordered several items through wex this is the first time I have been a little disappointed... I hope to continue ordering through them

Title: Superb service as always!
Content: Superb service, fast shipping, easy payment and brilliant price. I always trust Wex with my photography purchases!

Title: Problems with your IT system caused a‚Ä¶
Content:
Problems with your IT system caused a small problem with my order. Otherwise it would have been 5*. 
Your staff were first rate. Thanks.

Title: As always top notch service and will‚Ä¶
Content:
As always top notch service and will never hesitate to use you again. Reason for not giving 5 stars is the let down from Parcelforce regarding delivery.  Paid for next day delivery and was informed by them by text that the delivery would be within the hour of a certain time.  Checked on their tracking service, and sure enough the van was in the area and had passed the end of our road to make a delivery further away. Had not received the delivery in the next hour so, checked the tracking again and the van had returned to where he had delivered before passing our road. In order to do this, it had to pass our road again to get there. The van then disappeared from the Tracker. 
Phoned Parcelforce and was informed that the driver had run out of time to complete his deliveries as he had pick up priorities to fulfil. I said that surely anyone who pays for next day delivery should be given priority.  They said that should be the case and could only apologise.  The parcel did arrive the next day but we had to cancel plans that were made with other photographers.
Phoned Wex and was informed that should this happen again, to contact Wex, and they would deal with the matter saving me time and peak rate phone calls.
Many thanks to Simon at Wex for the advice and refunding the next day carriage cost.  It is such a shame that the top notch service from Wex has been let down by Parcelforce.

Title: Got what I ordered on time
Content: Got what I ordered on time, what more can I say.

Title: Manfrotto BeFree Live tripod with ¬£20 off.
Content: Arrived quickly and well packaged as usual. One star knocked off because voucher code didn't work online and had to order by phone.

Title: DO NOT RENT FROM WEX!!! RIP-OFFS!!!
Content:
DO NOT RENT FROM WEX!!!
I rented a lens from this company and I honestly am not happy that I am writing this because I had really high standards of the company but they leave me no choice.

To start of, I was sent the wrong lens which they where quick to have the right one sent to me. I had enquiried weeks in advance about renting the lens, I was asked to make the mandatory deposit before the dates I wanted them for use. I made the payments about a week prior to the  weekend I would use them. 

Upon receiving my invoice on top of the cost of renting the lens for ¬£35 I had been charged ¬£56 for having them delivered a cost I had not been made aware of. 

I quickly complained to them and I was told I was informed in a telephone conversation I had had earlier with them which up until now they haven‚Äôt been able to prove, I followed up with an email a week ago and it doesn‚Äôt seem like a response will be coming through any day.

I have since been contacted and refunded the cost of the delivery that was invoiced. Happy customer.

Title: 5stars within reach.
Content:
Excellent web page and competitively priced.
Dispatch process could be improved.  I felt undervalued as a customer, as I had to hasten dispatch of previously ‚Äúawaiting stock‚Äù items when they appeared ‚Äúavailable‚Äù on line.

Title: Mixed experience
Content: The telephone experience was very good, and the product was excellent. However, the warehouse forgot to pass the package over to the carrier to meet the promised next day delivery, and the parcel arrived a day late. I would have expected a phone call or email to explain the error, but in the end I had to phone to check if it was actually coming o the promised delivery day.

Title: Excellent delivery service as always
Content: Excellent delivery service as always

Title: Purchase of memory cards and batteries
Content: Quick, straightforward transaction

Title: Great products and prices
Content: Great products and prices and very pleasant contact centre staff. He only let down was not receiving return instructions for the lens rental. If this had been clearer and saved me a bleary eyed phone call after shooting a wedding, then this would be a 5-Star review.

Title: Really good customer service
Content: Really good customer service.  One item ordered couldn't be sent owing to hiccup in stock/warehouse, however email came through to notify me detailing options available.  An alternative item was fast tracked out so I received it at the original expected time!

Title: A Good Experience.
Content: Good service, friendly and helpful people and good prices.

Title: Not the usual experience with Wex as‚Ä¶
Content: Not the usual experience with Wex as problems with ordering and delivery process but still great products at competitive prices

Title: Delay with printer coming into stock
Content: Delay with printer coming into stock, otherwise everything else good

Title: I also like Sex
Content: I like Sex. They deliver quickly and the product is always as described. One qualm would be that they over package by using large boxes and lots of padding. Not really necessary for what I bought.

Title: Good price and very good service.
Content: Good price and very good service.

Title: Website easy to use. Staff very helpful.
Content:
Website easy to use. Item delivered on time to fixation which is pretty close to me.

My only quibble is that the website did not make it easy to find out which model number I needed. But the people are always very helpful.

Title: Delivery issues tainted experience.
Content: Would be 5 stars but Parcelforce soured the delivery experience (as usual) by completely screwing up 3 times !  Why companies use them is beyond me.  Otherwise OK. Well packaged and promptly sent goods.

Title: Wrong Item Received
Content:
This was not my first purchase from Wex, and the service was first class as usual. 

Sadly on this occasion the wrong item was dispatched to me as the label on the box did not match the item inside. 

 eMail contact was made and I was given the choice of a prepaid label to send the item back by Parcelforce, or to have the item collected from my address.  I also had the choice of a refund or credit to my account.  Replacement wasn‚Äôt an option as the item which I had wanted wasn‚Äôt available. 

This small setback won‚Äôt stop me using Wex, and I hope that as a result of my return that Wex will ensure that labelling will 100% match the item being sold.

Title: Ordered an 'out of stock' item and it‚Ä¶
Content: Ordered an 'out of stock' item and it arrived within the time specified. Well Done.

Title: A fair price considering the age and good condition.
Content: I was pleased to be able to obtain this lens at a good price. It's condition was as described and it came with all its accessories such as caps and pouch. But there was no instruction leaflet, and it cam in a plain box rather than the original Panasonic box I'd been expecting. It was also still at the v1.0 firmware level rather than the updated v1.1 (which was released back in September 2011!)

Title: Great products and customer service to‚Ä¶
Content:
Great products and customer service to match.
Only let down by delivery performance.

Title: A battery!? How hard can it be!!
Content:
I purchased a battery just before opening time on a Sunday, choosing collect in store with a message to the affect of ‚Äòa message will be sent 2 hours after receiving the order to say it‚Äôs ready to collect‚Äô 
I went to the city to shop and be closer ready for a message only to wait until nearer the end of the day with no message. So I decide to go in and try collect anyway only to be told ‚Äòthere‚Äôs only 2 people downstairs at the weekend so you‚Äôd have been better to reserve and collect in store‚Äô (not getting a discount in that process) 

I understand people have other jobs to do but how hard can it be to process an order and get it ready to collect, it‚Äôs a single battery. The lad who served me said it may take a long time to sort it out as I purchased online but he was back within minutes, so it can‚Äôt be that hard. 
Also, if that is the attitude/work process for a weekend then it needs to be made clearer on your website that you may as well wait until a weekday to purchase online if you wanted to collect that day (I work a 9-5 job so I can‚Äôt do that) 
Otherwise good service, I will continue to shop at Wex for my photographic needs.

Title: Would definitely recommend
Content: Have used Wex for a number of years, both mail order and in store. They are always good, offer free next day delivery, do straight forward part-ex, and are relatively well priced.

Title: Great experience, prices a tad high
Content: Ordering is easy and the items arrived next day. Only niggle is there were better prices in other places

Title: A Great Purchase.
Content:
This purchase went smoothly and I had extremely quick delivery.

As always the service was very good.

I have now purchased several items from Wex and will do so again.

Title: Speedy service
Content: Speedy service. No issues at all.

Title: Very efficient
Content: Very efficient

Title: Ordered products on 3 occasions from‚Ä¶
Content: Ordered products on 3 occasions from Wex and receive confirmation immediately. Products were dispatched same day and text received from courier same day advising on delivery options and times.   Ive ordered a tripod recently and although the specifications and overviews are fairly comprehensive a video comparison of models that take a heavy telephoto lens would have been helpful for first time buyers.

Title: Factory Refurbished?
Content: I purchased a 'factory refurbished' Bowens strobe which on delivery had a modelling light with 'blown' written across it in felt tip. The bad news was it got through QA, the good news was that Wex replaced the modelling light without query and within 24 hours. I am just left with a  nagging doubt over 'factory refurbished' - but it seems to work OK.

Title: I am a published tog and have used Wex ‚Ä¶
Content:
I am a published tog and have used Wex over the past 15 years and I would have to say all in all a great company apart from one instance, hence the missing star.  I had changed my delivery address and for whatever reason Wex didnt.- Or the Wex system failed.  On my next order we found out it was sent to the old address that was still on the Wex system along with the new address......Horrified we had to contact RM to go collect at the RM base 17 miles away.  We got the goods but that was a bit of a faff and we were really annoyed at Wex.   We called Wex and did get great service and ¬£50 of by way of a credit on our next purchase.  We purchase a lot of gear so that was welcomed.

We have since purchased some used gear and tip top.......brilliant.

We would recommend Wex   completely.

Title: Only let down by Parcel Force
Content: Only let down by Parcel Force. Text message gave good early notice of delivery between 2pm and 4pm. Actual attempted delivery 11.15am. Had to travel 10 miles to Post Office. Otherwise product, price and service first class as ever.

Title: Customer service good
Content: Customer service good. Great delivery times, and good packaging. Good returns service.

Title: Not always the cheapest
Content: but a reliable, fast service.

Title: Good Review
Content:
Not much to comment on.
A satisfactory experience of online procurement.
Good website and responses as expected.
(never give anyone 5 stars, on principle!!)

Title: WEX - good; ParcelForce - slow and confused!
Content:
I have no complaint with WEX - excellent products, excellent service and reasonably competitive prices; however, I cannot same the same for ParcelForce their chosen courier service on this occasion. 

ParcelForce allegded they made two attempts to deliver the goods on consecutive days, yet on both occasions no calling card was left and there was a person present at the delivery address throughout each day. The items where eventually delivered on the third day after having paid for next day delivery. Furthermore, on the day after delivery and, the following day, ParcelForce persisted in sending a text message stating they had attempted delivery, but there had been a problem and the items had been returned to their depot!!! 

WEX would do well to use a more reliable delivery service; I would respectfully suggest DPD, who in my experience are consistently good and dependable.

Title: Traded in some gear for a brand new ‚Ä¶
Content: Traded in some gear for a brand new shiny Sony camera - or at least I will when it's in stock. This seems to be a supplier issue so no fault of Wex who as ever have been excellent.

Title: I purchased this remote for Pentax KS-2 ‚Ä¶
Content:
I purchased this remote for Pentax KS-2 as the remote was advertised to be waterproof and compatable with my camera. Once delivered the remote was as advertised; well build and no issues with the buttons or connecting to my camera. The only minor thing is that the instructions states that it is single use (thr battery cannoy be replaced). However the instructions did state that the battey will get several thousand button presses before the battery would be depleted - a replaceable battery would be handy!

As always WEX service was excellent. I did order next day delivery however it arrived after 2 working days. This was no fault of WEX, however the courier; thr package was held at the depot but no reason was stated in the tracking website.

Title: Good company to use, small niggles during process.
Content:
No real problems experienced, always helpful over the phone.
Only small niggles: a filter I selected to buy turned out to be no longer available in the buying process; email confusion when trying to get used kit credit setup and unwanted lens sent back. Otherwise, good company.

Title: very good service
Content: very good service the item i ordered was out of stock thay ordered it for me and kept me informed till delivery

Title: Good service.
Content: Good service.

Title: I cant say a bad thing about my experience
Content:
I cant say a bad thing about my trade in with wex. It was really fast turn around and the option to pay for the things I wanted was there to use asoon as they had inspected my goods. I got abit less than the qouted price but that was more than likely down to me not inspecting the glass in my lenses properly. 

Overall would deffo use again. 

David

Title: Beware of Black Friday.
Content: I‚Äôve bought a few things from wex and never had a problem with delivery and the web site is easy to use. The reason I give then four stars rather than five is that I felt let down by their Black Friday so called sale. After sending me emails saying the camera I wanted was part of their Black Friday supposedly great deals, I ordered the camera and lens. Then on the Monday they announce that if you bought the same camera you got ¬£130 of free equipment. Aparantly cyber Monday beats Black Friday! So I don‚Äôt feel I got a good deal, in fact the only deal I got was from Fuji who were offering double cash back . Nothing from wex, I‚Äôll be careful next time not to believe the Friday hype!

Title: Wex are always well stocked
Content: Wex are always well stocked, the website is easy to use and delivery is always when stated. Nothing to moan about!

Title: Quick and easy ordering but only once ‚Ä¶
Content:
Quick and easy ordering but only once did I get the free post, That was after haggling, even though I have spent nearly ¬£2,000 on my last three orders. My last order of ¬£500 for a printer should have included a free pack of printing paper but had to phone them to tell them it had not been included with the printer. 
Small things but still annoying.

Title: Very much improved delivery experience ‚Ä¶
Content: Very much improved delivery experience compared to a previous occasion. Product well packaged. Can‚Äôt think of a better retailer for website choice. Norwich showroom, while not huge, is a joy!

Title: Bad start, great finish!
Content: Unfortunately I was sent the wrong item but they did sort it out very quickly and shipped me the correct item on a next day delivery for a Saturday without even having the wrong item in exchange. Collection of the wrong item arranged for a convenient time the next week.

Title: Excellent little Flashgun
Content: Excellent little Flashgun - taylor-made for my Pansonic G7.   One improvement that I suggest is a booklet in English to be in the pack advising new users how best to take advantage of its features (reflector, diffusing panel, soft box).

Title: Camera body purchase
Content:
Great to deal with. Could not get my payment to go through as sales person entered  card data incorrectly. Had to call card company to find out issue.
Camera body arrived quickly. Well packed

Title: Good px prices
Content: Good px prices, quick delivery

Title: Lost a star for delivery.
Content:
Paid almost ¬£5 for next day delivery but had to wait 2 days.
It didn't cause a problem and also my purchase was ordered later in the day so I'll give WEX delivery the benefit of the doubt.
Lens was as expected and as described.

Title: Generally good, one star deducted.
Content: Generally good. The price of the item was competitive, the ordering process and delivery was smooth and the item arrived well packed. I only have one slight grumble regarding customer service. I pre-ordered a camera body with a free half carrying case. On the release date people were sharing their pics of this new body, but I heard nothing. Five days later I contacted the company and was advised that the body was in, but not the free case, and would I like the body to be sent separately (Er...Yeah!!). I would have given five stars had I been contacted to advise that the body was in and offering to despatch straight away.

Title: Lense for canon
Content: Product wonderful packaging was terrible!!! The box arrived dented, opened it the box of my product opened, my lense out of the protection plastic tube checking lense hope hasno damage

Title: Love Wex Not Fed Ex
Content: I am always pleased with the service from Wex  but my issue is with Fed Ex who delivered the product. The cardboard around my paper roll background was so battered I dread to think how it had been thrown around with its time with Fed Ex. Holes in the cardboard and ripped packaging and lots of grease (yes grease) on the box which got on my lounge carpet!

Title: Had to wait for out of stock issue but ‚Ä¶
Content: Had to wait for out of stock issue but was informed along the way and given option to cancel... fair enough. Item was finally discontinued which was disappointing but found the equivalent on Amazon at the same price so no problems with WEX who I have been using for years as my first port of call for photographic equipment.

Title: Ordered a used Fujifilm X-T2 and new ‚Ä¶
Content:
Ordered a used Fujifilm X-T2 and new Vertical Power grip for it.
Item arrived in very good time, ordered late on friday evening and it was here Monday lunchtime.
There was however a pc cover missing so I called and they send me a generic one. I called again and explained that the camera is not weather proof without the original cover and they duly send me the correct cover.
Overall happy with the experience.

Title: Easy to use, order and reliable.
Content: I have used  Wex for many years and have always found them to be highly reliable, with plenty of selection and an easy to use ordering process.

Title: Excellent service
Content: Excellent service. Very professional.

Title: Normally my dealings with WEX are 5 ‚Ä¶
Content:
Normally my dealings with WEX are 5 star. However on this occasion there were a few problems!

Fortunately, after some effort on my part, the  Part Exchange manager recovered the situation and WEX will continue to be my first photographic stop

Title: Good advice and service
Content: Good advice and service

Title: Great company
Content: Easy to use site, fast delivery,great product,definitely recommend.

Title: Great customer services
Content: Great customer services , I already recommend some of my friends

Title: Usual fantastic Wex customer service.
Content: Usual fantastic Wex customer service let down only by Parcel Force (or should I say Parcel Farce?!) who were a total shambles. Please use DPD or UPS Wex because PF are spoiling your otherwise exemplary customer service experience.

Title: Great all round service
Content: Great all round service, just a little disappointed that when my Part EX was evaluated it seemed like every microscopic scratch had been found to devalue my camera. I would recommend for service but may Ebay my camera next time.

Title: Easy web site to navigate
Content: Easy web site to navigate. No problems with order, fast delivery.

Title: Very good service good communication
Content:
Very good service good communication
Been using a long time 
Got 4 out of 5 because I think they would benefit from a loyalty card scheme 
Overall will use all the time

Title: Item required out of stock initially
Content: Item required out of stock initially, but good communication and subsequent delivery procedure very good.  Consider product and free accessories very good value

Title: I got what I wanted
Content: I got what I wanted, but would have bought more if the website had not kept rejecting my attempts to buy more at the price and reduction advertised on your website. Help offered when queried but the time had passed.

Title: Wex Photographic
Content: Good range of products both new and used, web site generally of a high standard though I invariably come across some broken links and products in the wrong section ( must be my Aspergers.... I don't miss much üòÅ). Not always the cheapest though generally good value for money and a good return policy for those 'it's not quite what I expected' orders. On my occasional visits to the showroom when at the nearby Star camp at Kelling Heath, sometimes I was underwhelmed by the staff attitude and knowledge, I thought I could do better myself.  On the whole though a good company to deal with.

Title: Easy to buy from
Content: Easy to buy from and good customer service.  Benefitted from voucher code to get free next day delivery.

Title: Another purchase from Wex and again ‚Ä¶great service prixma 8750 printer
Content:
Another purchase from Wex and again first class service.....a slight problem with the usb cable being supplied being the wrong one but this was quickly rectified with no fuss.The value is very good and the advise and time spent with Wex staff always very good.

Many thanks again

Title: Ordered Nikon 77mm Circular Polarizer ‚Ä¶
Content: Ordered Nikon 77mm Circular Polarizer Filter. Came fine excellent product from Nikon as you would expect. But the box was not sealed properly by Wex. So the box which holds the filter was not sealed made me bit disappointed as I didn't expect that from Wex.

Title: Reasonable service - delivery odd.
Content:
Reasonable service, how delivery was odd.

I ordered two of the same item. Due to stock availability, the arrived separately. The first by Royal Mail letter post and the second by Parcelforce. The Parcelforce delivery will have costed at least four times, if not five times more that Royal Mail. Parcelforce delivery will have cost around 50% of the item ordered.

Title: Wex is knowledgeable
Content: Wex is helpful, knowledgeable, and trustworthy company. They need to brush up their despatch system. But if something goes wrong they will put it right immediately.

Title: Only comment I would have is the choice ‚Ä¶
Content:
Only comment I would have is the choice of carrier. Furthermore I was not informed that 'next day' on Friday orders meant Monday, even though the paperwork was showing Saturday.
The service and information otherwise was very good. Having dealt with other retailers who use DPD there is no comparison, they give an hour slot by Email and in my case with several separate orders was never missed.

Title: The item arrived on time but the inner box was shabby.
Content:
The item arrived on time and the packaging was in good order, but when I opened the outer packaging and removed the bubble wrap the box the item was in was very shabby and looked as though it had been opened before.
The item inside was in good order ( not used yet ) , but when spending over ¬£300 on an item I would like a better experience when opening the box.
Maybe you think this is petty, hopefully not.

Title: Very helpful and understanding PEX ‚Ä¶
Content: Very helpful and understanding PEX team. ParcelForce lost the camera that'd been sent to WEX, and after some delay, WEX completely resolved the issue which was not of their making.

Title: The order came quickly and the product ‚Ä¶
Content: The order came quickly and the product was fine (a battery so can't say too much!). The one disappointing aspect was the size of the packaging. You could probably fit about 15 batteries in the box - I only had 1so it was mostly dunnage, what a waste.

Title: Very good delivery
Content: Very good delivery. Love the product it will be useful with my camera.

Title: Order arrived the following day
Content: Order arrived the following day, as promised, complete & intact. Only problem using Royal Mail, is you don't get a 1 hour delivery slot.

Title: Wex Photography is great for photography but...
Content:
If you are looking for photography equipment and advice or If you are looking for video equipment and know what you want, Wex is excellent. 

If you are looking for video equipment and need some help, go elsewhere.

A couple of times I have popped into their store when I've been in the area (4 hour drive) and asked video related questions and they have been useless. Their customer services come across very good on the phone and extremely helpful. I have just taken the biggest step in my life and bought a Canon C100 mkii with atomos ninja 2 and trusted their recommendations of lens. Canon EF 24-105mm f4L IS II USM Lens. Very disappointed, no face detection, poor in low light with unreliable AF and noisy focus. I get better results from my old Tamron lens.
They didn't tell me The Atomos would need a hdmi lead and an adapter to fit on camera.
When I went to collect the camera I also wanted advice about weather to get another radio mic or and portable digital recorder and he said to me "you know about them than me" he said just buy the zoom h4n and see how you go.
I'm left with a bitter taste of disappointment. Im so scared to use the camera at a wedding in a few weeks time. I'm not confident it's low light ability or focus ability. Just hope I can practice enough before the wedding otherwise I won't be taking the canon. I wouldn't ask Wex for video related advice again.

Title: Unusual experience
Content:
Unusual experience, interpret as you will really, I bought a used, rated 9+,  Fuji x-t10, it had 5 frozen pixels on the sensor that showed up prominent in all JPEGS, wex exchanged, np at all, paying postage, for a different x-t10, this one had 4 frozen pixels on the sensor all showed on JPEGS, so I got a refund, all very quickly actioned and wex were spot on. But I got an x-t10 elsewhere, no frozen pixels first go, and if you read about x-t10 frozen pixels isn't a noted problem... Like I say wex where very good at actioning problem, but I wasted 2 weeks getting essentially faulty cameras listed as like.  I would always shop at wex because they did handle refunding flawlessly, but I would always double check all functionality of any used goods, idk were they sourced this Fuji gear.

So do I trust them with my money... Definitely yes!!
Their camera testing for used kit is what I would question.

Title: Great help and advice
Content: Great help and advice, friendly service and prompt next day delivery . My only quibble is they can be a little on the pricey side although in this case the show price was pretty much equal to the cheapest price I could find at the time

Title: I've found the staff at Wex ‚Ä¶
Content: I've found the staff at Wex Photographic very helpful when I have had a query about a product. They have always helped me to make informed choices when upgrading my camera gear and I find it refreshing that their opinions are very unbiased towards specific brands. I am an enthusiastic amateur and value there help and experience. My recent order of a Plamp 2 and flash soft box was delivered well packaged and very quickly.

Title: Quick delivery and replacement of faulty item
Content: Used Wex for several orders, definitely recommended. Quick delivery of XT2, lens and accessories. Parcel Force box had slight damage and corner of camera product box was damaged, suggesting a possible fall or hit, and some chance that it left the warehouse in that condition. Found an issue with the camera after a couple of days so returned for replacement. Return and replacement was no hassle, quick and easy. Replacement delivery had even more damage to the parcel box than the first, but product box ok this time and camera seems fine. Labeling boxes as fragile, considering switching to a different courier and proactively soliciting feedback on package condition would be a good idea.

Title: Pretty good - have already used again!
Content: Great prices, comms and excellent service. Couple of products that claim to be in stock aren't always in stock but was kept updated - I suspect down to drop shipping. Otherwise would have been 5*

Title: Excellent service always
Content: Excellent service always

Title: Good service and complete clarity in decision making.
Content: Items sent for sale were quickly assessed and I received very fair treatment and was pleased with the prices paid.  I was kept informed at all times.  The items I selected were delivered promptly and were as requested.

Title: Natural first choice
Content: They are the "go to" online retailer for photographic eguipment.  Service is excellent but they use Parcel Force for deliveries which is unfortunate as they do not give timed delivery slots.  Since most purchases require a signature, a timed slot would be a great benefit.

Title: Excellent, but dreadful couriers
Content: Wex is excellent to deal with. The only thing that lets them down is their lack of options for delivery - shipments from them to central Scotland take 4-8 days to turn up and their "next day" courier simply doesn't offer a service.

Title: Great company, but could be better
Content: I have always had great service from wex but it would be even better if they could keep you informed of the likely delivery dates when items are awaiting stock.

Title: Nearly perfect Canon 24mm TSE II
Content: The used Canon 24mm TSE cost nearly as much as a new lens only 6 months ago, so I thought it was expensive, although I still bought it.  It was rated as 10, and to be picky it should have been 9.7, as it was missing the shift knob cap (another ¬£20 from Canon) and the focussing ring is slightly noisy.  However, it's a great lens and it was delivered very quickly.

Title: What do we want? When do we want it?
Content:
Wex have a great range of gear in stock for next day delivery, so when I wasn't getting the results I wanted with the paper I had, I ordered a pack of Canon PT101 Pro Platinum for next day delivery. The next day being a Saturday should not have been a problem as Wex can deliver seven days a week and I was willing to pay the extra to get it on Saturday morning. This meant I could finish the job I was doing over the weekend.
Sadly, and its becoming a regular problem, my parcel never arrived the next day. This must be the third or fourth time I have ordered from Wex for next day delivery and Parcelforce have failed to deliver.
Luckily, Wex are a very reliable team and they monitor their twitter feed throughout the day and found out that my parcel would now be delivered on the Monday for which they apologised. On the Monday, I saw the Parcelforce van drive past my house without delivering my parcel. With tweets flying backwards and forwards between myself, Wex and Parcelforce, nobody was none the wiser as to why Parcelforce had failed once again to deliver my parcel. Wex for their part did everything they could to track my parcel down and keep me informed even to the extent of calling me and offering to deliver another pack of paper for delivery before 9am on the Tuesday. By this time, I had received a phone call from the local Parcelforce depot and, without making any apology, the manager informed me that someone would be out with in the hour (it was not 2pm on Monday afternoon) with my parcel. It eventually arrived just before 4pm.

Wex, for their part cannot be faulted. They did everything within their power to sort the problem out. they refunded my the cost of the Saturday delivery. All I got from Parcelforce was an apology via twitter. To infuriate matters, the Parcelforce tracking system makes no allowance for their own errors when they fail to make a delivery. Instead, they blame the customer by stating that they will attempt a second delivery when they haven't even made any attempt to deliver in the first instance.

I will continue to shop with Wex because their service is customer service is second to none. I just wish they would change their courier to someone more reliable.A special mention for Josh from Wex for doing the best he could for me under the circumstances.

Title: consistantly good service and prices
Content: I have made several purchases over recent years for differing pieces of equipment both large and small - they always deliver both in prompt and efficient service at very competitiveprices

Title: Reliable
Content: I have purchased from Wex Photography a number of times and have found the Web page to be good and reliable. Before purchasing I have occasion to call them and found that the staff have been helpful and informed and should they be uncertain they consult with other members of staff so that the information is accurate.

Title: Genuine Nikon Parts
Content: After dropping my Nikon A900 for which I had a leather case, I could only afford an S7000 for a replacement due to insurance excesses.  I wanted a decent case and the only supplier I could find for a case which included a spare battery was Wex.  I've bought several things from Wex before (Panasonic Cameras etc) and was confident in buying from them again.  They didn't let me down, supplying a genuine Nikon case and battery at a reasonable price.  Pity they no longer handle some of the Panasonic lenses for my GX7.  I had to get my 3D lens elsewhere.

Title: Excellent Service
Content: My only reservations regarding WEX is that they can be over priced compared with others. That said, if I'm not sure of the competitor i will stick with WEX and pay the extra to a firm i know and trust.

Title: Quick delivery
Content: I ordered a 'box opened' camera at a good discount. It arrived quickly, as described, so I am well satisfied.

Title: Great service via the phone ... Packaging not so good!
Content:
The team i phoned for advice on the photographic equipment i eventually bought was very good and honest.
 I would have given 5 stars if it were not for the packaging though. The cardboard box size was (approx 5 times) too large and there was a hole in one corner on delivery!!, and the protective super large bubble wrap took up 80% of the space inside of the box.I was relieved to see the hole in the box was not near the camera and separate lens boxes inside the bottom corner of the box and there seemed to be no damage to my lens and camera body boxes!

Title: fuji remote
Content: works well ideal for wild life photography

Title: Came good in the end
Content: I ordered a lensbaby  spark with free 0.6 wide angle/macro convertor and 'Bend Your Perspective' book. The lens arrived very quickly but without the free items. I contacted Wex via their Livechat facility and was informed that he free items in the offer were out of stock.. I was offered the option of returning the lens for a full refund or accepting a ¬£15 credit note in lieu of the free items (valued at ¬£80). I chose the refund. A couple of days later I was browsing the Wex website and noticed that the 'out of stock' free items were being offered for sale as in stock items. I contacted Wex by email and to their credit they admitted their error and offered to resend me the lens with the free items by return of post. All items arrived the following day and I am delighted with them. A shame Wex couldn't get it right first time but hats off to them for coming good in the end.

Title: Always reliable
Content: Wex is a very reliable and good value  supplier who carry an extensive range of in stock items.  However, I use them less than I once did as their prices - unlike a few years ago - aren't always the sharpest. Hence the 4 rather than 5 star rating. To end on a positive note their customer service & technical advice team are superb.

Title: Good but should be clearer as to accessories needed to make it work
Content: Excellent product as described.  1 star deducted as it was not clear that I also needed a compatible memory card (that happened to be different type to any that I already have).

Title: Sigma 150-600mm Lens and Sigma 95mm UV Filter
Content: It was great to get my Black Friday order the next day as promised.  I saved a lot on the Sigma 150-600mm lens .  My only gripe is that I could not claim the 15% discount off the Sigma UV filter as it was on the same order.  I should have ordered this on a separate order to get this.  Perhaps WEX should look at this procedure as I feel I was done out  a lot of discount because it was on one order.  Won't be doing that again in the future. This was not made very clear on their webpage!

Title: Good service
Content:
Recently made quite a significant purchase from Wex, there had been an offer on some of the profit gear I wanted with ¬£ 240 worth of free items, and I had the items in my basket for a few days but was traveling and could not get online. 

by the time I went to complete the order, the offer had expired.  Given the over ¬£ 3,000 price tag of the items, the free stuff was a bit of a deal breaker.  I explained the situation and the team seat about dealing with my request to complete the order despite it having expired.  It took a while in correspondence to get it all sorted out, but we got there in the end.

Upon delivery one small item was missing but this was soon rectified and shipped on accordingly.

All in all good service.

Title: Slight confusion, but otherwise good
Content:
Recently pre-ordered a Fuji XT2 camera and promptly received it on the day of release, all appropriately packaged and tracked via Parcel Force. This was all fine.

My main gripe (and reason for docking a star) is that the process to 'cash-in' credits earned by part-ex was unclear. Before part-exchanging, I asked 3 times what the process would be (how would the credits actually be applied). The response was vague and unhelpful.

In the end, I was told by the part-ex team that this would be 'automatic' (as would the trade-in bonus). This proved to be incorrect as Sales told me that I had to to phone it in.  Why couldn't they have told me this right at the start of the process when I asked ? It's not rocket science.

Apart from this aggravation, the rest of the advice and customer service was very good. I would not hesitate to use them again.

Title: All good except for delivery
Content:
Good site and you informed us of the update of stock quickly.

However the delivery by Parcel Force on the day we were advised did not happen.  We waited in ALL day and no delivery.  The delivery was made the next day in the afternoon.

You really should use better courieers than Parcel Force please as Parcel Force made this customer cross waiting in for a day and a half.

Title: Service
Content: Still not my favourite online company, but this order went fine

Title: Good as always
Content: What can I say? Good website, easy to order from and quick service, what kre can one ask for?

Title: Canon camara
Content: Had a bit of bother but once we got it sorted good job ace camara vary happy with it. And now when I am looking for a couple of lens which I will be looking at in the near coming months I will give Wex another chance.

Title: Everything happened to plan
Content: Ordered on Friday, delivered on Monday. Parcelforce was a good choice, since I could pick up from my extended hours Post Office Local. Thank you.

Title: Great stock, great service, poor carrier
Content:
The Wex element of this purchase was exemplary - they had the stock, gave a good turn-in price, discounts, helpful phone-calls. Straight 5 from that point of view and I'd use them again like a shot.
However Parcel Force let them down pretty comprehensively - turned up twice to collect the part exchange and then missed the specific delivery day for which I'd paid extra. Also their website didn't admit to anything being out for delivery until after it had been delivered. Many couriers now send you text or email specifying delivery, on the day, to within about an hour. Time for a new courier?

Title: poor aftersales which did get better
Content:
The order experience for my sigma 150-600 lens was really good and i have never had any issues at all with any orders from wex always delivered on time and we'll packaged.   However 2 months after light use the zoom is jammed completely and needs repair.  I understand wex policy but I have a holiday next week which I had specifically purchased this lens for as I am watching wildlife I have never been near before and may not have a chance to ever again, they didn't seem interested at all.  They have no loan lens to cover the period of time of repair which is 4-6 weeks which would have been a bettwr result as I would not expect this issue to have occurred with light use within first 2 months which must have been faulty when sold and my understanding is that it on on the onus of the seller to prove otherwise.

07/07/16 update, Mark in aftersales really great, got in contact to try and resolve and did seem to listen.  I would give them another go based on this communication in the end.  I have changed my score to reflect this.

Title: Great service
Content:
I ordered three products, but unfortunately they sent one wrong item - It was a Sony rear lens cap I ordered but was sent a 58mm front cap for something else - When notified they immediately offered to rectify order but sadly this was a stock mix up and the item was currently not available in their warehouse - I needed this item immediately as travelling so cancelled that part of my order
At all times WEX kept me informed and refunded my money - 

Great and polite service and I will use them again - and recommend the company to others

Title: Worth waiting for
Content:
When Panasonic introduced the GX8 camera I was interested but not at the price listed, I did however go and look at one and decided to wait until the price was more realistic. Thanks to a WEX offer, that time occurred recently and I am now the owner of the above model and pleased with my initial hands on experience.  
It is heavier and all round slightly larger (about 5mm) than the GX 7 but I find it easier to hold.  Their are still the odd button that you catch (the display keeps changing in my case) but hopefully I will learn to avoid it.  The similarity to the GX7 is such that  I have had very little problems learning to drive it, and up till now I have not missed the Flash, only time will tell in hat respect. So all I need is some good weather days to fully test it out.

Title: Used Nikon 80-400mm AF-S Nikkor f4.5-5.6G ED VR Lens
Content: Service was excellent. I had vouchers which I couldn't use via the online site. So I spoke to a member of staff and he kindly processed the vouchers for me. Thanks Wex!!

Title: velbon PH157Q tripod head,
Content: I ordered this with special instructions to be delivered the following saturday.It arrived on the dot and early in the morning.The head was exactly as advertised and was well packed.Very pleased with the sesvice.

Title: Online Order with No Problems (Telephone Assistance Abrupt)
Content: Over the years I have purchased a few items from Wex both online and also gone out of my way to visit the store in Norwich and always had first class service. Although recently when compiling a few items there were a few items not in stock on my wish list, so I thought I would ask the question on delivery for these items. The call was rather abrupt, "when we get them they will be available" and when asking for a time scale I was told " when we get them they will be available" I think someone must of been having a bad day. Moral is if it in stock the service will be excellent but don't ask otherwise.

Title: Good prices and reliable delivery
Content: Would have been five stars but for one minor quibble and that was to do with next-day delivery from Fedex - they did not give a delivery slot on their tracking which means I had to be in all day. Otherwise Wex were perfect.

Title: Prompt delivery,
Content:
Prompt delivery, well packed. Helpful contacts.
BUT still waiting for PX to be settled

Title: Pin Free Process As Ever
Content: My third order from Wex and once again pain free,easy to order reasonable postage and packing and speedy delivery,highly recommended

Title: Delivery improvements
Content:
Overall service with Wex is very good and the pricing and availability is second to none. The one are I would like to see improved is the choice of courier. My orders recently have been delivered by Parcel Force. Although a National and recognised company there level of service is far below some of the better ones out there. They adhere to the policy of "we'll turn up when we feel like it and you better be at home". In this day and age when we are all busy and have lots to do this is not acceptable. Other companies provide on-line tracking, named drivers and route indication. They even have the chance to change the delivery "mid-flight". This would be a far better method to be associated with rather than one stuck in the 90's.
All other parts of your service are just what we want ..... this final part is what lets you, and us, down.

Title: Efficient supply of photographic items
Content: I have used Wex for a long time, and always have great service.  This last order was for a few minor things that I might normally have bought from another well known online retailer, but I have become annoyed by having to always reject additional offers.  Wex is straightforward, ordering is simple and delivery was faster than expected.  Excellent service all round.  Prices may be slightly higher than some other places, but you know that everything is as described and genuine.

Title: Very good service!
Content: Quick and well packaged!

Title: One slight glitch - no longer deliver to Ireland
Content:
I've bought from Wex before and always found them to be excellent.  However, when I put in my most recent order (March 2016) I discovered that they no longer deliver to southern Ireland (where I live).  I rang them up and the person on the phone was very apologetic and helpful.  He mentioned that other customers have used a service that forwards parcels from the UK to Ireland.  He did not name one but at least I discovered that there is such a service.  I managed to track down one (Address Pal).  I got my goods sent through them.  This has worked a treat and I got the goods within the week inclusive of the time for the parcel to be forwarded.  Not too bad.  However, to use this service one has to put in a reference number which has to be on the parcel.  This was not very easy to do on the Wex site - there are restrictions on the numbers of characters in the fields for address when ordering that make this a bit tricky.  
Goods arrived in good condition.  
I'm happy to use Wex again and to recommend it to my Irish friends although I will have to tutor them in how to get their purchases to Ireland.

Title: Surprised
Content:
This order was for several items 2 of which were on back order, however WEX failed to advise me when items came into stock.i had to contact them upon seeing that all my order was in stock and the surprising part was the reply received back 

"This will still be showing as Back Order on your account as we had not heard from you as to when you would like delivery for this, however upon further inspection I can see that for some reason an email notification was never sent to you to let you know of this."
 This implies that it was my fault for not notify them but only that I checked to see if items were in stock I received no communication from WEX

I hope that this problem is now sorted as I have another order awaiting stock

Title: Canon EF 100-400mm f4.5-5.6 L IS II USM Lens
Content: I would like to thank Wex Photographic fro excellent service in the placement and delivery of this product, within 24 hrs of placing the order.The item is one that i have been contemplating purchasing for some time and since the announcement of the MKII version and the reviews i have read and heard i was excited to possess this lens. The reality of the purchase has lived up to everything i had expected and i can safely say that this will add to my range of Canon L lenses and be one of my favourite pieces of glass. Thank you for the excellent service. Kindest Regards Neil Skipper

Title: Good service and quality equipment.
Content: My Opticron monocular was promptly dispatched, appropriately packed and well priced. I'm a satisfied customer.

Title: Normally 5 stars
Content:
Having ordered many times from Wex and have always received the item as expected in the condition expected and on this occasion that happened to.
However this time stress became a factor as the lens i ordered for a shoot within a tight timeframe did not go to plan because of the IT system did not show what was happening, my lens was in packing for 48 Hours.
With a Sunday delivery booked and confirmed and needing to leave Monday for the shoot knowing it was on route was very important.
Upon calling Wex on Sunday when it opened it was confirmed that the lens had been dispatched and i got a tracking number which sadly then needed a further phone call due to parcel force not updating there information easier.
The other disappointment was an almost flippant comment when i mentioned that the system was not updating and having a comment that well it happens occasionally did not help.
Should i have just gone out to the high street and brought the lens in my hand job done possibly.
In the end the lens did get delivered Sunday and my shoot went to plan though i did get a very nice email on Monday telling me that my lens had been dispatched and a tracking number, only a day and a half late.
Maybe the IT systems at Wex are still adjusting to having to work a 7 day week.
For such a good company normally a black mark, would i use again of course, would i use if i know i must have the delivery probably not.

Title: Good but greater consideration should have been given to packaging
Content: As I've most always experienced with Wex, a decent and easy shopping experience. The product I was after was competitively priced and the delivery options are plentiful. My only disappointment and cause for concern was that a NAS external hard drive was enclosed with no protective packaging and would have been free to move around the larger box that contained the rest of the order. Fortunately, the drive appears to be responsive and healthy, although I will be keeping a keen eye on it.

Title: Accurate info. Painless ordering. Competitive pricing. Speedy delivery.
Content:
The WEX website doesn't yet have user reviews of the particular Nikon camera i'd later settled on. So, for my own peace of mind, i resolved to independently carry out a little extra research elsewhere.
Though their website did have fairly extensive & relevant Nikon product features, specifications & accurate stock status info. 
It was listed at a fair enough price, but which offered better value when bought simultaeously with a memory card.
Once i'd decided which camera would meet my nephew's requirements best it was a doddle processing the order. And after payment had been confirmed early on Monday morning, i'd received the camera within three days.
We put the camera through it's paces on a day out along the Thames, Tower Bridge & The Tower of London & it was obvious my nephew couldn't be more thrilled with his new gadget.

Title: Delivery charges
Content: I have always had to pay a much larger delivery charge for next day delivery which I require as I always want the item asap. When I am spending nearly ¬£1,800 on an item I think it is a bad policy - perhaps on an item worth for example ¬£1,000 a next day delivery charge should be worth giving away to help keep your regular customers. I have over the last few years spent what I consider to be a lot of money with you - wouldn't it be nice to give something back to regular customers?

Title: Set of Lenses for Canon
Content:
I've ordered set of lenses for canon and delivery was very quick. Items were well packed and secured - as usual. I'm very happy with WEX customers support- they are always very honest and helpful. It's not my first buy from them and not the last one either. What could be improved is the option of having 12 months interest free repayment on more products (hence 4*). It would honestly push me to spend more money :) . The 24 months option is in my opinion far too long. technology ages too fast this days... 
Right, and now a few words about the lenses:
1. Canon 16-35 f4 - really great lens, very sharp from corner to corner. I primarily use it for long exposures with 100 mm filter system from Nisi. AF is fast and precise- no issues at all. The lens is well build and performs very well as for now. 
2. Samyang 14 mm f2.8 - fully manual lens with great picture quality for the price. Despite of what you can read online, this lens is very simple to use with Canon. It doesn't communicate with the camera at all therefore you can only use it in manual mode. I use it for long night exposures mainly. Optics and build quality are very good. MF ring is very precise and we'll set up - I can fully rely on the focus distance marks. No issues at all. 
3. Sigma 50 mm f1.4 art - love it! Very heavy and cold in touch - made of solid materials. AF is very precise and fast out of the box, not as fast as some canon lenses but fast enough for wedding and portrait . Very quiet and pin sharp from corner to corner. 100% recommended. 
Bodies used by me: Canon 5d m3's 

Thank you
Robert Bilinski

Title: Canon EF-S 10-22mm f3.5-4.5 USM Lens purchase
Content: Website is easy to use. Prices are keen. Delivery swift. Lens is light. Yet to use.

Title: Trustworthy company
Content: Over the years I've purchased a lot of photographic equipment from Warehouse Express. They're a top company and I have no hesitation in recommending them. The only downside is that they use Parcel Force for deliveries. So, don't rely on your purchases arriving promptly if you work during the week!

Title: Relatively smooth part exchange
Content:
I wanted to part exchange my Canon EF 100-400 lens for the new version.  I was given a provisional value of ¬£550 over the phone for the old lens but after it had been inspected I was told that it had possible moisture inside and that, even though this would not affect images at all, it would need repair by an authorised Canon repairer and could cost around ¬£160.  I am not an expert so I decided to take their word for it.

In the event, I was quoted ¬£300 and, although greatly disappointed, I decided to accept this.  The blow was softened a bit because there was a ¬£250 part exchange bonus offer at the same time.

The whole procedure from first contact was about 4 weeks - the initial inspection and eventual repair by the Canon repairer took 2 weeks of this time.

The final invoice was strangely laid out but, since I had paid the correct amount on my card, I was not worried.

The new lens arrived free of charge, well packaged and within a reasonable time.  I would recommend Wex but be prepared for possible disappointment when part exchanging.

Title: Great offer combined with reasonable part-exchange
Content:
Took up part-exchange offer for Canon 7D Mrk II including trade-in bonus and free tripod.
Plus points - trade-in offer was good and the free tripod was excellent value
Minor negative for me is that having offered a certain value for the camera obviously dependent on condition I felt Wex were a bit harsh on reducing the value (by ¬£50) on that offered due to a few scratches. Especially considering I supplied a camera that worked, the original box, the leads, the manuals etc.
Would be wary of using Wex part-exchange again - but apart from that have purchased several items from Wex and the service has always been very good.

Title: Good price, speedy delivery
Content: The price of the rucksack I ordered was competitive and it arrived only a few days after I placed the order. Thank you.

Title: Top UK photographic company
Content:
Excellent selection, knowledgable staff, good website.. Generally.. Only stock 5 star products ..

Basically my first choice when I'm shopping for lens, cameras etc..

Don't always end up buying from them as SOMETIMES not competitive, especially on the smaller items..

Occasionally great deals on bundles (eg: slr+tripod) 

Must visit store next I'm in Norwich ...

Title: Surprised at the packaging!!!
Content: Excellent delivery, ordered Sunday evening and arrived Wednesday afternoon. Bought a used lens and was slightly surprised how it was packaged and sent... no box just wrapped in bubble wrap and put in a plastic carrier. Wasnt expecting the original box or anything but thought it may have been abit better packaged especially as we all know how courier drivers are with parcels!!! Not tested yet so cant say if any damage has occurred in transit.

Title: great
Content: very good service overall

Title: Good item but unenthusiastic staff!
Content:
I was looking in the used section and had noticed a Canon 1d mkiii.
I read the description and looked at the pictures but there were a couple of little things that I would need to establish such as if the picture showed a reflection or an actual mark on the screen?
I phoned and asked the question about the mark/reflection. The lady said `It could be just a reflection`. Could be or is was my reply! Not sure was the reply. I then thanked her and decided not to buy the item.
Then I kept thinking about how I liked the camera but needed to establish if the picture was showing a reflection or a mark.
I phoned again and a gentleman said it was a reflection.
Great I thought and asked my next question. Is all the software complete? I think so was the reply! Can you confirm if it is all there? The reply was the description says the software comes with it. Yes but is it all there?
I gave up. I thought long and hard and took the decision to buy the camera and it turned out to be good but with little or no help from the staff!
Once these issues are sorted this company would be 10/10 as they under sell the used goods in that they are better than rated by them.

Title: Very poor start but a good recovery
Content:
Received a quote for part exchange a couple of weeks back but felt the quote was a bit too low. Last week the price of the Fuji X-E1 with 27mm lens dropped in price and decided to go ahead with the purchase. I asked for the item to be reserved until the part ex went through.
Today I received part ex confirmation and called this evening to purchase the Fuji kit. I was initially told there was no reservation (by the same person that reserved the kit)  and eventually that they did not sell the 27mm with a kit and that I must have been mistaken, as he had reserved a body only.
I was then passed to sales who at least confirmed that the Fuji was on sale the previous week with 27mm lens but that I wouldn't have got it anyway as they did not have enough stock to fulfill the orders.
At first I could not believe the incompetence but on further reflection I do believe I was given the runaround and the camera kit had been sold in the previous week. Not had as poor service as this in the last for a long time.

Now I have to wait for the return of my (part ex) camera and start the search over again, after spending time packaging and having someone wait in for the courier to collect. 

Update: Was contacted by Mark the next morning who offered to source a replacement camera and send it next day delivery. Received next day by 9:am, thanks Mark/Lee. Should have been like this 1st time but will look to do business in the future.

Title: Very quick and hassle free!
Content:
I have ordered a few things from WEX now, as well as part-exchanging a lens, and I have found WEX to be, on the most part, swift and very reliable.

So far all orders which I have made, from flashguns to lenses, have been a pleasant experience. Not to mention, I have been kept up to date with events and seminars which I may find of interest whilst following my creative passion.

In short, I would very much recommend WEX Photographic to anyone that is looking for equipment which pertains to photography.

Title: Prompt Service
Content: My preferred site for photography related products.

Title: My bag
Content: Purchased camera I week ago with free card but no case I was told now yr recent e mail is giving card  and bag  not so happy customer ! Regs mike barrington

Title: Cancon 5d mk3
Content:
I am very happy with my Canon 5d mk3 and 24mm to105mm lens .
I cannot say the same for the Canon strap that Came with the camera unfortunately  I think Canon could do better.

When I bought the camera it was advertised on the website has a camera that the box had already been open so the camera is reduced in price On the webpage there were showing that there would be some software I would come with the camera When I asked the gentleman if this was going to happen he was not certain and would send me an email to cry situation He did send me an email Saying I would not get the software Considering this is the advert show the software on the web page I thought Wex would honour that I also thought that you would not have to pay the postage and packaging
Delivery considering The overall cost of the camera.

Title: Great service but..........
Content:
I always purchase my photographic equipment from WEX.
As always it was a pain free experience the website is very intuitive and all went smoothly. I asked for a Saturday delivery and paid ¬£7.50 for this privelege but the goods came on Friday! If I didn't want a Saturday I could have gone for free delivery in 3-4 days maybe I will give a full five stars if I get a refund on the wasted Saturday cost?

Title: Great price and quality, but not suitable for all wide angle lenses.
Content:
Bought the Cokin ND "Z" set as I needed larger ND filters for my full frame camera.  On any lenses wider than 20mm the filter holder intrudes into the frame.  This is disappointing as I wanted them principally for my Nikon 16-35mm.  I cannot afford the Cokin "X" range and if I could I'd have bought Lee filters.

A lesson learned, but I can use them fro 20mm upwards.  The quality is good and they are presented well. Docking one star as the Cokin sales blurb mislead me.

Wex remain my first port of call as their service is second to none.

Title: Hard search but delivered well.
Content:
Although I like Wex photographic for its wide palette of offered product, it was relatively hard to find some of the accessories. Wex should probably give more attention to improving the quality of their database.

On the other hand, my order has been completed quickly and delivered well.

Title: Fast, reliable service
Content: I've ordered numerous items from WEX over a period of time: in-stock goods delivered quickly and well packed.

Title: Excellent
Content:
Excellent speedy service, everything arrived more quickly than expected. 

One minor quibble: I received a misleading email which said I had to call Wex to guarantee delivery . I called, was told delivery would be sent that day,  my order arrived later the same day!. It seemd an unnecessary call and whoever answered the phone should have known my order had been posted,

Title: very good and prompt delivery
Content: The buying experience was excellent and the goods were delivered next day, however they just let themselves down by offering  the same camera discounted a week later, after i bust my budget, thanks a lot Wex, otherwise you would have got 5 Stars

Title: Good prices and delivery
Content: Bought digital cameras from this company twice and both times all went well.

Title: Fast customer services response and low prices
Content: Ordered from Warehouse Express because of their low prices and fast delivery.  As it was my first order I had to provide proof of address however this was dealt with quickly and did not delay my order. Parcel "Farce" unfortunately are their courier of choice who messed up the next day delivery in every way they could - after I informed Warehouse Express of this, who were not at fault, they refund my delivery costs.

Title: Decent Service, expensive P&P
Content: Phone uped, gave correct price, and delivered next day, the site even gives youa  count down until how much time you have got till the next day ordering finishes.
